about_the_game:
Dr. Pumpkin Island is shrouded in mystery and intrigue, with its inhabitants being some of the most unusual creatures you'll ever encounter. From the moment you step onto the island, you'll feel like you've entered a different world, with strange noises and peculiar sights around every corner.

The island is home to a variety of puzzles, ranging from easy to mind-bending difficult. The inhabitants of the island seem to take great pleasure in devising these puzzles and watching outsiders struggle to solve them. Some of the puzzles are physical, requiring you to use your strength and agility to get through, while others are more mental, requiring you to use your wits and intellect to unravel their mysteries.

As you explore the island, you'll encounter a variety of strange creatures that seem to have evolved in ways that defy explanation. Some are small and nimble, darting around your feet as you walk, while others are massive and lumbering, capable of crushing you with a single swipe of their enormous claws.

One of the most fascinating aspects of Dr. Pumpkin Island is its flora. The island is covered in lush, vibrant vegetation, but many of the plants seem to possess strange, otherworldly properties. Some plants glow in the dark, while others emit a strange, hypnotic scent that can put you into a trance-like state.

Despite the many dangers that lurk on Dr. Pumpkin Island, there is something undeniably alluring about the place. Perhaps it's the sense of adventure that comes with exploring uncharted territory, or maybe it's the thrill of solving puzzles and unraveling mysteries. Whatever it is, one thing is for certain: those who dare to venture to this strange and mysterious island will never forget the experience.

game features:

Lu: "land of chaos" was learned and developed because the author wanted to make an interesting brush music game. At present, it is still in the process of learning, and it is still insufficient in all aspects. I also apologize for this.
The current online version does not represent the final product. There are still many bugs in the game, but the author will continue to update it to achieve the best effect

about_the_game:
An atmospheric Horror game inspired by the popular internet creepypasta, The Backrooms.



You have found a camera with a footage in it. For some reason you can't rewind the video, and as soon as you try winding it forward you find yourself in the Backrooms. Figure out whats in the footage and try to ESCAPE AS FAST AS POSSIBLE!

There are multiple levels and it seems impossible to escape, but dont give up! You have to get out of here!



Linear space in Level 0 is altered drastically; it is possible to walk in a straight line, return to the starting point, and end up in a completely different set of rooms than the ones previously passed through. Due to this phenomenon, and the visual similarity between each room, consistent navigation of Level 0 has proven very difficult. Devices such as GPS locators and compasses fail to function within the level, and radio communications are audibly distorted and often prove unreliable.



"If you're not careful and noclip out of reality in the wrong areas, you'll end up in the Backrooms, where it's nothing but the stink of old moist carpet, the madness of mono-yellow, the endless background noise of fluorescent lights at maximum hum-buzz, and approximately six hundred million square miles of randomly segmented empty rooms to be trapped in.

God save you if you hear something wandering around nearby, because it sure as hell has heard you."

short_description: You have found a camera with a footage in it. For some reason you can't rewind the video, and as soon as you try winding it forward you find yourself in the Backrooms. Figure out whats in the footage and try to ESCAPE AS FAST AS POSSIBLE!

about_the_game:
Nyxia has fallen into darkness. This land once harmonious and peaceful is now invaded by evil forces coming from Hell to enslave humanity. Guided by Light and Hope, Heroes are rising to free the world and bring back peace and greatness to Nyxia's lands, but will they be strong enough?!


Play with one of the 12 Heroes, chose between more than 100 unique abilities make your own combination. Defeat thousands of monsters and face Epic bosses with powerful attacks.


Collect almost 200 items and chose the ones corresponding to your playstyle and Hero to make your unique equipment. Upgrade your items to increase their power. Gather monster's souls and use it at the Soul's altar to improve your attributes. Fight, fall, rise again, become stronger.


Defeat evil forces in a captivating campaign where progress is candenced and balanced. Then discover the "Inferno Waves", a challenging game mode with infinite replayability where Mutators affect the player and enemies. The more you progress, the more enemies are stronger and the more Mutators you will have, but better rewards are granted. This is a challenging game mode that will make you think about your build: Hero, items, abilities and more. Theorycrafters will love it!


Explore 7 different environments, all hand crafted and designed for a balanced experienced. Every environment has its own secrets to discover that may make you stronger for the current run or forever. In Nyxia Survivors, you won't stay immobile, you will want to explore and find what every map has to offer, and you will be rewarded for that.


Climb the leaderboard as high as possible in the "Inferno Waves" game mode and show to the world who's the best.

short_description: Protect the world of Nyxia against hordes of monsters and demonic creatures coming from hell. In this Action-Roguelite dynamic game, play multiple heroes, find powerful equipment, spells and talents to defeat mighty enemies and rank among the best.

about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey alone or with friends in this fractured world of floating islands. Thrive by strategically exploiting diverse ecosystems and climates, while surviving, exploring and uncovering the mysteries of this world.

Exploration

Explore a vast world of floating islands, delving into caves to unearth rare minerals unique to each ecosystem. Discover ancient desert ruins, scavenge remnants of airships, and forgotten machinery and structures as you unravel the secrets of a once-thriving civilization.

Exploit Ecosystems and Climates

Strategically optimize farming, resource gathering, and energy production by analyzing islands and considering island-specific factors like wind and solar intensity, minerality index, terrain fertility, temperature, and humidity.

Employ suitable machinery on designated islands to maximize productivity.

Airship Building

Build your airship for islands traversal, defense against threats, storage space, machinery deployment and any other purpose you desire. Enjoy full customization options, but be mindful of energy consumption.

Overcome Extreme Weather Conditions

Ensure you are prepared for extreme weather conditions and consider leveraging them to your advantage.

Other Key Features:

  • Plant breeding: Create new plant species by crossbreeding from diverse ecosystems!

  • Smelting mechanic: Combine various minerals through smelting to obtain new ones with distinct characteristics.

  • Crafting mechanic: Basic and advanced crafting with a crafting station.

  • Blueprint system: Explore to unlock new recipes for crafting, plant breeding, and smelting mechanics.

  • Character stats: While taking care of your mechanical parts and lubrication, ensure biological maintenance of your human arm by utilizing the multitude of organic compositions available.

  • Drone: Deploy a drone to explore hostile or unreachable areas.

  • Defend yourself: Watch out for hostile flora and fauna!

  • Minor mechanics involve mining, locating underground objects, navigation tools, and more!

short_description: Hold or Die is a last-stand cooperative survival 1st/3rd person shooter where you need protect your base against hordes of mutants. Unite with other survivors. Craft barricades traps and turrets. And try to survive.

about_the_game:
Meow meow meow dear friends! There are Hidden Cats in London, let's find them all.
A short and pleasant experience in a big and pleasant illustration! Start with a Beautiful monochromatic scenario, relax, and find all the cats one by one to reveal the final colored art.

More than 560 Hidden Objects to find!
Play through different modes, find special cats, and unlock bonus levels!

LONDON - NORMAL MODE

  • Find 100 cats in fixed positions.
  • 3 hints.

LONDON - ADVANCED MODE

  • Find 150 cats in random positions.
  • Find special cats and city people to earn hints and unlock bonus levels.

HIDDEN KITTENS BONUS

  • Find 50 hidden kittens on each level: Book Shop, Pub, Tube Station, Music Studio, Palace Room, Christmas.
  • 1 hint use.

ACCESSIBILITY

  • Dark Mode
  • Invert Mouse Zoom
  • Mouse Drag Sensibility
  • Edge Screen Scrolling

name: The Classrooms
short_description: The Classrooms is a procedural, liminal-space, found-footage, survival horror game. Explore The Classrooms and discover the various anomalies it contains; from malicious entities, to harmless oddities. And remember, it's different every time you play, so your found footage is uniquely yours.

name: Planet Achelous
short_description: PLANET ACHELOUS is a action adventure, free-roaming game. Developed by Archer with the help of Unity's 3D Game kit*. *Game kit is built entirely from the ground up, no sample levels used, just assets :)

name: Mega Fast Food: A Fast Food Simulator Game
short_description: Build and manage your own fast food store. Decide how your store will look like, hire the best staff, manage inventory, offer drive-thru, create your own custom food menu. Become the best and most popular fast food store in town!
steamspy_name: Mega Fast Food: A Fast Food Simulator Game

about_the_game:
This game was created as part of BYKING Inc. newcomer training program.
Depending on your PC environment, the game may not run properly.
Also, unforeseen problems may occur during the game.
Please be aware of this.

*Although it is a local play-only title, it is possible to play online by using Steam Remote Play Together.
*Requires 3 controllers

About the game

“RunOut" is a 3-player action game in which you control unique robots to blow your opponents into a hole!

Exhilaration of attack

Exhilaration due to the sound and direction released when an attack hits!

Simple operation

Simple operation with only move, attack and stun bullets.
Even action newbies can enjoy it.

Flexible character selection

In the character select, as in practice, you can choose while moving the character!
Even if you are playing for the first time, you will have a perfect grasp of how to fight. Start the match with your favorite character.

Robots with a lot of unique characteristics.


Power Type
Rush to keep hitting opponents with his big arm!
Stun the opponent, adjust the angle and blow him away!



Speed type
High-speed slash attack from a small body
Dodge their stun bullets with agility and cut them down at a moment's notice!



Tank type
From his huge, tank-like body, he swings his hammer down and attacks a wide area!
Build up your strength and blow away two opponents at the same time with a full-bodied blow!

short_description: Flight Level is an Air Traffic Control simulator made by real radar controllers to give everyone a chance to experience what the job is like. The game also teaches the core concepts of ATC and lets players work together in multiplayer.

name: Deathrun Guys
short_description: Deathrun Guys is an online platform racing game with a Bunnyhop system to gain speed! Compete in competitive mode or against your friends. Run, jump and knock down your enemies to win the race and secure your trophy.

name: Don't Fraud My Heart!
short_description: Don't Fraud my Heart is a visual novel made entirely in Microsoft Powerpoint. It is a romantic, financially literate adventure that brings you into the exciting world of tax auditing.

name: Magenta Horizon - Neverending Harvest
short_description: Magenta Horizon is a fast-paced 2D action platformer with challenging spectacle fighter inspired combat. Playing as a Reaper of the twisted purgatorial afterlife, push your skills to the limit to destroy the hordes of demons and epic bosses to reach your destination.

name: Bombing!! 2: A Graffiti Paradise
short_description: Welcome To Graffiti Paradise! Explore for hidden secrets, meet interesting friends, unlock painting tools, and fill your world with colour!

name: He's Nut Your Princess
short_description: Fight with June in this Metroidvania, as you bust through the unknown with the hopes of rescuing your boyfriend, who has been mistaken for a princess and kidnapped by a serious nutcase. Will your relationship survive the cracks of this new adventure or if it drown in the nuts of your enemies?

name: Thesis of Love 心动论证
short_description: During the endless summer in Chishima, you join a graduate program hoping to become worthy of your crush. Little do you know what awaits... In this otome dating sim, experience campus life with three lab members trapped in toxic relationships. Your choices may lead them to new paths.

name: Unreal Vendetta
short_description: You are a successful thief who periodically makes forays into various dungeons in search of treasures and wealth! Every outing you play with death, because the dungeons are full of traps and monsters that are ready to destroy you!

about_the_game:
Terminal Breach is a timed survival shooter where you get data experience to level-up and gain upgrades, demolish as much waves of enemies as you can and survive until the timer is complete to successfully breach the terminal.

// GAME CRASHING SYNERGIES

Experiment and play with different playstyles by combining breachers with other item upgrades, bullet modifiers and weapons to unleash countless bullets to your enemies.

// DIVERSE SELECTION OF BREACHERS

Choose a breacher that is fit to your style. They vary stats from each other and have their own strengths and weaknesses, distinct feel and an active ability to aid you in your breach.

// FEATURES FEATURES FEATURES


  • Procedural map generation to make every run just a little different from the last.
  • 4 Maps are planned to be released in the full version of the game.
  • 20 Unique item modifiers that alter your gunplay.
  • 90 Stackable passive upgrade items to infinitely scale your stats.
  • 30 Playable breachers with their own playstyle and ability.
  • 25 Permanent upgrades you can invest in your breacher for further progression.
  • 60 Varied weapons in your arsenal. (pistols, smg's, shotgun, assault rifle, sniper rifle, throwers, repeaters and launchers)

name: War Obelisks
short_description: Protect the obelisk and save this world! The obelisk that gives life to all living things is under threat! Defensive structures will help you in defense, some deal a lot of damage, some slow down or attack over long distances.

about_the_game:
Warlocks quarry, a prelude to Warlocks Entanglement.  Use your skills in looting, fighting, exploring and base building to survive and progress in Warlocks world.

  • Destructible environment

    Destroy anything you see and build something new with the resources.

  • Combat

    Fight a variety of different creatures with various weapons that you can either find from looting or craft yourself as you learn.

  • Day and night cycles

    Craft torches to provide you light or enchant one of your weapons with radiance to help you see in the dark, You can carry torches in both hands giving much more visibility in dark places.

  • Looting and exploring

    There are many locations to loot but as you exhaust areas you must start heading further afield to find what you're looking for.

  • Base building

    You can occupy a house and convert it to your own requirements or build one from scratch, there are many different resources around that you can utilise to aid you in this.

  • Levelling

    As you gain experience create more advanced high tier weapons / bows and armour.

  • Gardening

    You can create or loot seeds and plant them to grow crops, Cross contaminating some crops can cause more exotic and useful plants to grow, You can learn the secret to this as you go.

  • Brew potions

    As your cauldron grows stronger with the ingredients it needs you will be able to brew more powerful potions, Providing an array of additional skills to aid you.

  • Delving deep underground

    There are many chasms that open up to underground tunnels and sometimes cities, There are many precious recourses to loot and mine underground
name: Warlocks Quarry
short_description: Use your skills in looting, fighting, exploring and base building to survive and progress in Warlocks world.

name: Trail of Toads
short_description: The cozy village of Toadholm has been cast into darkness after the sacred relic was stolen, and you, as the chosen Toad, must use your platforming skills to retrieve it. Trail of Toads is a quirky 3D platformer and collectathon, set in a vibrant world full of secrets, puzzles, and traps.

name: Slay The Zone
short_description: Face hundreds of monsters, upgrade your equipment and try to survive as long as you can. In this Action Roguelite choose from a variety of upgrades, unlock unique characters and create the best build to slaughter everyone in your path!

name: Idle Vikings Clicker
short_description: Idle Vikings Clicker is a fun and immersive clicker game. It's easy to learn, but contains many various mechanics, so you could spend hours and hours playing it and trying different tactics.

name: Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Chapter IV: "Sacred Feathers"
short_description: NINA AQUILA is back for her brightest, boldest, most magical adventure yet!
steamspy_name: Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Chapter IV: "Sacred Feathers"

name: Tower Walker: MMO Grind Simulator
short_description: Tower Walker is a fresh new type of addictive semi-idle auto-grinder rich with features, inspired by classic MMORPGS and RTS games with indirect control over your hero. The mysterious tower awaits!

about_the_game:
Ancient is a third person exploration action-adventure game with shooting mechanics built on the Valley of the Ancient Sample Project provided by Epic Games.

Play as Echo, a troubled girl, born with magical abilities, trying to find answers to her past after an experiment gone wrong stripped her of all memories.

After attempting to go back in time to find answers, the portal malfunctioned sending her back to 100 years after the collapse of the old civilization, the Panthynos. Now you must work your way back to the portal to get back to the present and find answers to your past.

Play the game however you like with all of the following planned features for 1.0 release!

--Doom Tower (Scale 100 floors in the Doom Tower, facing familiar enemies as it gets progressively more difficult.)

--Single player Campaign (A complete story that takes the player through many missions, facing challenging enemies and forging alliances. Discover lost ancient abilities, uncover your past and make your way home.)

--Modding Tools (A modding toolkit that allows for the creation, distribution, installation, and loading of mods allowing you, the player to build and design custom maps, stories, tools, basically anything. It's only limited by your creativity!)*

--Full Linux Support**

*Modding tools are not available at launch and will be released to all owners of the game once released.

**Linux is not currently supported, however, it is planned to be supported sometime before 1.0, likely early in release.

-Transparency and Copyright Disclaimers

Valley of the Ancient is a sample project released by Epic Games as a tech showcase for Unreal Engine 5, which is provided as a sample project and template for developers to use. Ancient is built on top of this project, to enable the best experience possible. Valley of the Ancient, and related characters, code, assets, or artwork are owned exclusively by Epic Games, Inc. and used by MinoDab Productions in ways pursuant to the Unreal Engine 5 End User License Agreement (EULA)

Ancient ©️ 2025, MinoDab Productions, All Rights Reserved

name: Guncar Arena
short_description: Guncar Arena is a chaos-fueled action game with bullet hell battles on wheels. Outrun your enemies in high-speed chases and obliterate alien invaders and rogue vehicles to unlock explosive new abilities. Survive the mayhem, fight your way through relentless foes, and stop the alien invasion!

about_the_game:
The weather was beautiful in the land of blobs, until the day when a huge golem arrived.
When he saw Orange and Purple he amused himself by separating them.

Orange and Purple had no other choice, they had to find a way to reunite again.

Color the world is a very fast platform game, where you play with the colors
You must drive your blob to the end of each level , solving puzzles based on the colors
there are some rules
  • you can cross a wall if you got the same color or a complementary color
  • Some color sources are moving
  • Some switches can change the walls colors
  • You can walk or run
  • and even fly or more in later levels (but no spoil of course)
But keep in mind the most important part:
Colors are the key, they will help you to solve everything

You have to use all your skills to reach the exit in each level, being carefull of the timer.
Some levels will contain moving platforms, water, lava, wind, locked doors and many more traps.

And if finishing a level is not impossible, you can also fight for the time and unlock 3 stars for each level.
It's not an easy task

short_description: 在90年代的东欧国家，由于艾斯佩罗族和伊多诺族之间的矛盾，进而引发了双方的战争。玩家将扮演故事的主人公艾斯佩罗族的少女——弗洛拉，穿越战火过后的断壁残垣，结识抱持着不同想法理念的人们，在残酷的战争中竭尽全力生存下去，并揭开隐藏在战争背后的真相。

name: Obedient Women
short_description: This is the main game for accessing each heroine's story in Obedient Women.

name: URBO
short_description: URBO is a relaxing and meditative city-building puzzle game. Begin with an empty grid of landscape, choose an architectural style and build. Watch the population grow and the city flourish.

name: The Riese Project - Prologue
short_description: The Riese Project - Prologue is an adventure game you'll never forget. Immerse yourself in a universe full of intriguing puzzles, explore real locations created using the latest Lumen and Nanite technologies employed by Unreal Engine 5

about_the_game:
We offer you to be in the role of air defense adjuster. You will have to shoot down enemy aerial targets that were launched from enemy rocket systems over your city. Air defense is a set of measures and weapons that help shoot down enemy planes, helicopters and rockets.

The game is not simple. You must aim and shoot not at the missile, but at a point further along its tracking route. Air targets are usually very high. While your projectile will fly to intercept the enemy target, a certain amount of time will pass. During this time, the enemy will fly some more distance. You must fire at this distance for your projectile to collide with the enemy missile. Remember that your weapon reloads. This is not an machine gun that can fire bursts. Therefore, each shot must be clearly on target.

To fight the enemy, you will have a normal projectile, as well as four additional types of weapons. You will be able to buy new weapons with coins that can be collected during the game. With in-game coins, you can also purchase powerful power-ups that will help you destroy the enemy.

Achieve new records and get new ranks! There are 24 different ranks in the game (4 categories of 6). To set new records you need two things. First, play more often and practice your shooting skills. Second, accumulate money to play a round with a large supply of powerful bonuses.

Forward to defend the airspace!

name: Bengan Yes
short_description: Bengan Yes is an action-packed arena fighting game designed for livestreaming. Choose to either let your viewers brawl it out or simulate a clash between thousands of bots. Everyone has an equal chance of winning with both the arena and stats of players being randomized.

name: Last Look along Woodward Boulevard
short_description: A horror puzzle adventure, where your thoughts and mood affect the environment around you.

name: Twilight Of The Gods
short_description: In the 8th century an unexpected explosion happened between the morning and the night, on the exact moment of the twilight. After that day, strange kinds of monsters appeard on earth. Man kind had to make a stand to live.

name: ENERGY SURVIVORS
short_description: In Energy Survivors, you play as a mercenary in a third-person shooter roguelite game. Your mission is to invade a hostile planet in search of its energy source. You can choose from a variety of upgrades to create unique and powerful builds that can change the course of the game.

name: Petit Petit Petit
short_description: Get ready for an exciting and refreshing adventure! In this thrilling game, you will be in charge of manipulating immune cells and medical nanomachines to fight off invading pathogens and save unknown creatures from deadly diseases.

about_the_game:
WITHSTAND THE ZOMBIE HORDE


  • Defend your base against an increasingly difficult onslaught of zombies.

ASSEMBLE YOUR ARSENAL


  • Choose from a variety of weapons including pistols, shotguns, rifles and grenade launchers.
  • Upgrade your guns to increase your chances of survival against the horde.

FORTIFY YOUR BASE


  • Build fences and traps to provide some defense against the zombie horde.

name: Paranormal Observation
short_description: Paranormal Observation is a single-player point-and-click ghost hunting game. Use your computer to identify the evil spirit by finding enough evidence and exorcise it with your professional tools.

about_the_game:
Story


Princess Estelle was trying to cure a lingering succubus curse in an old castle with her servants, knights and priestesses. However, not knowing whether she succeeded or not, Estelle fell unconscious. When she awakes, everyone is no longer with her. Brave Princess Estelle is determined to find out what is going on. What awaits her is hope, or is it just despair...?

Gameplay


Explore the old castle, find items that will help you in battle, fight enemies and challenge bosses.


- Combat
You only have a short-ranged sword and long reload time musket., to defeat those brutal and strong enemies, utilizing the melee, range attack with dodge to your best.

- Accessories
Accessories are items that can be found throughout the game. Each accessory has it own unique skill to enhance the princess. Find and choose the right accessories that suit your playstyle.

- Adult contents
Taking damage from an enemy tears the princess clothing. When the princess gets naked (low on hp), Enemies will try to grab you. Fail in defeating the enemy that got you before the sanity ran out will resuit in defeat.
Rape/defeat animation + CG

* Ctrl + F1 turn on/off undead mode (hp won't drop below 1)
name: SusRitual
short_description: A 2D action game with difficult bosses, defeat animations and CGs
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

developers: Bow Tie Cat Studios, Heat Wave Games
name: Kittens with Cannons
short_description: An action-RPG where you control a squad of gun-wielding cats! Complete quests, aid kitizens, and blast your way through the robot army!

name: Litha and the Sunhouse
short_description: Litha and the Sunhouse is a rogue-lite dungeon crawler with a flashy, fast-paced combat system. You will explore the complex lair of the mighty Sun Usurper while defeating monsters, collecting treasures, avoiding traps, discovering secrets, and helping unlucky fellows you meet along the way!

name: Find you
short_description: Find you is a puzzle adventure where you will have to help Mimi & Mimo to find each other again after being separated into opposite worlds.

name: The Fall Visual Novel
short_description: A short visual novel about a man living its worst nightmare. There is no way out, no safe place, no death, just eternal limbo. Only you can help him... if that's what you want.

name: Hypno Mama
short_description: Keep your bully's mom on speed dial. Mind-control that MILF into becoming your perfect lover!

about_the_game:
Alice, the reaper girl, found herself lost in the Underworld! She must escape this forgotten land before the corruption takes over everything, but she's not alone!
With the help of a Soulvolver, a weapon capable of shooting souls, and her new friends, Alice will face the dangers and become, once and for all, a Soulslinger.


  • Reaping an enemy soul will recover your Soulvolver ammo!
  • Destroying obstacles and defeating enemies helps the level progression, the more you destroy, the faster you'll progress!
  • Blessings and curses are permanent power ups, each one with it's own special effect!
  • Pies are consumable temporary power ups, each one with it's own purpose; use them wisely!


  • Three levels of difficulty;
  • Five stages, each one with its own boss;
  • Three special soulblasters to use;
  • Nineteen different blessings to obtain;
  • Five flavors of pies;
  • Five playable characters skins;
  • 20+ hats to collect;
  • Endless mode.


  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
  • Left Mouse Button - Attack
  • Hold left mouse button for autoswing
  • Right Mouse Button - Switch weapon
  • Shift or Space - Use pie
  • P or Esc - Pause
  • Enter - Confirm
  • F4 - Toggle fullscreen

Controller:
  • Left Stick or Direction Pad - Move
  • A, X, Shoulders or Triggers - Attack
  • Right Stick - Move cursor, aim and switch weapon
  • B or Y - Use pie
  • Start - Pause
  • A - Confirm
  • Back - Open Steam Friends

about_the_game:
Lost Amulets: Mystic Land is a unique combination of hidden object fun, tile-matching puzzles and challenging mini-games. The magical amulets held the five natural elements in balance. Restore harmony with nature by finding the lost amulets. Along your journey reveal the magic spells and collect power-up pearls. Includes two ways to play: Mystic Land & Zen Mahjong solitaire.
  • Challenging mini-games
  • Immersive music
  • 6 Gorgeous tile sets

A Fast paced Platformer, run as fast as you can to reach the end and discover the truth as to why are you here.


Key Features:
-Wallrunning
-Crouching/Sliding
-Dashing

HyperSpeed Mechanic:
Fill the bar when reaching base speed to achieve
Faster speeds!

12 levels in total to beat!
name: Hypersense
short_description: A Fast paced Platformer with advanced movement uncover the truth of your existence.

name: Loading...
short_description: Loading... is a 2D-3D shifting adventure game about a boy who finds out about his brother’s life and death through an all-night gaming spree.

name: Surfwords
short_description: Surfwords is a fast-paced word building game. Letters drop from the top of the screen in two columns. You have to choose which column to take at each row, in order to build up a series of words. Bet you can't last 30 seconds!

name: Galaxy Bricks
short_description: Two classic games collide to create one amazing experience you can always just pick up and play. Enjoy Endless levels and see how high of a score you can get.

name: Trader of the Night
short_description: A horror-themed stock market simulator where the player must make enough money to pay their debt in time. Buy, sell and short shares in fictional companies, earn dividends, pay taxes and follow the in-game news for possible hints on what to invest in. No previous experience in stock market required.

name: L30-P4RD
short_description: L30-P4RD is Sci-Fi Top-down shooter. You explore planets as a member of the L30-P4RD, a special force that pioneered planets for civilization.

name: I'm Late
short_description: An arcade game, stylized on an 8-bit production from the 90's.Go through the stages, where each next one increases the level of difficulty. An ideal game for players who like retro games. Thanks to its simplicity, the game is also perfect for younger players.

name: Road To Salvation
short_description: Road to Salvation is a stylized action adventure game set in the 80s. As a result of the chaos and gangs that arise as a result of a spreading virus, your wife dies and your daughter is kidnapped. Throughout the journey, you will be trying to find out who kidnapped your daughter, where and why.

about_the_game:
You are the actor of the story, playing a lord, leading a group of loyal knights to expand your territory in the chaotic kingdom. By occupying resources, producing goods, attracting immigrants, expanding the territory's facilities and expanding the scale of the city-state. The lord can also obtain funds through the trade between the city-state, and gain prestige by completing the task. Through the ocean port, he can open up overseas colonies to obtain more territory and resources. Finally, a great and powerful city-state will be established.
You can also be the creator of a story. Based on resources, you can redesign all products, equipment, mission props and match the corresponding workshops to form a new production system. You can also redesign the trading needs of each city and build a new trading system. You can also flexibly use five task modes (item exchange mode, clue continuation mode, battle mode, riddle and password mode, and place opening mode) and add dialogue of characters to the task to supplement the story, so as to build your own main story and branch story. Various indicators, soldier models, attack methods, promotion paths and factions of soldiers in the game can also be edited, which makes it easy to combine unique combat units. Finally, the stories you edit can be easily shared with everyone.

Main features

Perfect MOD editing and sharing function - through the concise editing panel, players can modify every link, item, production, building, city, mission location, transaction, mission, faction and even army and soldiers of the kingdom. So that every player can easily build their own kingdom and story. You can also export the packaged MOD file to other players to share your story by simply copying it.

Five scenes -- The kingdom has five regions, each of which has different areas and environments, and different regions will produce different raw materials. Competing for limited resources with the forces in each region will be the key to decide whether the city-state is rich or not.

Powerful production system -- The game has more than 10 kinds of raw materials at the beginning, and 9 kinds of production workshops. On this basis, a complex production system has been established. More than 60 kinds of goods required by residents and city-state greatly enrich the interest and complexity of trade behavior. At the same time, the editable function also reserves a huge space for players to play.

R&D and investment -- 64 kinds of R&D and investment are responsible for managing the production of production products, optimizing urban facilities and improving the ability of knight.

Upgrading of cities and buildings -- With the growth of population size and lords' influence, the city level will be improved. The city level will determine the number of knights that can serve, the number of territories that can be controlled, and the level of items that can be opened. The higher the level of the city, the more abundant the goods. The production buildings are divided into five levels. Upgrading the buildings will greatly improve the production capacity.

Factions and soldiers - There are 42 types of soldiers in the game, belonging to 7 factions. There are four levels of soldiers. In the training field of the same faction, soldiers can be promoted, so as to gain more powerful abilities. Each soldier can have two promotion directions when upgrading.

Trade and goods exchange - Each area of the kingdom has 5~10 places or cities. As the city size grows over time, the larger the city, the more commodity output and the more commodity purchasing power it will have. However, with the growth of urban scale, cities will also expand their territory and occupy more land. The stronghold can exchange important props.

Characters and equipment -- Knights can obtain skill points by working and commanding battles, or they can strengthen their abilities by using the city's training facilities. Lords can obtain equipment blueprints through missions to forge equipment, or they can obtain fallen equipment by defeating hostile forces. The knight can gain a lot of ability improvement with excellent equipment.

Soldier Proficiency and Faction Proficiency - Soldier Proficiency and Faction Proficiency can improve soldiers' combat capability. The knight has the ability of Faction Proficiency by default for the soldiers of the same faction. The knight can also obtain the Soldier Proficiency by learning from the experience. The two proficiencys can be stacked. In this way, soldiers will gain the strongest ability bonus.

Combat skill - Each knight can master a skill to assist in fighting, and use the skill value accumulated when attacking or being injured on the battlefield to release it. Reasonable skill combination can help the army win the battle more easily.

Overseas colonization and trade -- There are ocean ports in the royal city area of the kingdom where ocean exploration can be carried out. Through exploration, we can find islands with rich products and profitable commercial routes. The reclamation and colonization of the islands will further expand the size of the population and the source of raw materials.

"The rise of the kingdom of knights and craftsmen" is a story directed by our team on the stage of the "Golden Empire", "The lord seeks blood gems, saves and revives the kingdom". We also hope that more players can write better stories to share with us on this stage.

The "Golden Empire" is our stage.

name: VInput
short_description: VInput is a plug-in for sending data to VTubeStudio. Support game controller and racing steering wheel, time data, hardware monitor data and custom formula.

name: The Will of Arthur Flabbington
short_description: A comedy point-and-click adventure game about a dead uncle, a hidden treasure, a reluctant ghost sidekick, old people and pizza.

name: Daemonum
publishers: Trial By Fire Games, Vidas Salavejus
short_description: Detective Andrews is called to a residence after a message is placed to dispatch regarding a disturbance. Not everything is as it seems, leaving you to question your own sanity whilst figuring out how to escape with your life.
steamspy_publisher: Trial By Fire Games, Vidas Salavejus

about_the_game:
In this single-player roguelike, control an army of RECLAIMERS through a dangerous procedurally generated world. Explore, collect resources, and craft upgrades to advance your army to fight orcs, trolls, and more monsters. Defeat enemies in battle to collect better armor and weapons to finally fight the orc king.

Crafting

With your RECLAIMERS, collect resources from the world to craft into weapons, tools and armor!

Recruit RECLAIMERS!

Get more reclaimers for your army by finding houses with peasants in them. They want to reclaim the land just as much as you!

Monsters:

Orcs normally reside in groups of 3 to 10 at their camps. They can be found in desert, snow and mountain biomes! They will throw a few punches but your RECLAIMERS can easily knock em down!

Trolls are another foe who lurks in the mountain biome. They are far more dangerous and should be avoided at all costs.

List of Features:

  • Explore a procedurally generated open world full of dangerous monsters & orcs! 

  • Recruit members to your RECLAIMERS army from the several villages across the map.

  • Survive and fight back against orcs, trolls and other monsters!

  • Collect resources from different biomes to craft tools, weapons and armor.

  • Attack the Orc capital to face the Orc King and his legion of troops!
name: Reclaimers
short_description: In this single-player roguelike, control an army of RECLAIMERS through a dangerous procedurally generated world. Recruit troops, collect resources, and craft upgrades to advance your army to fight orcs, trolls, and more monsters. Defeat enemies in battle & fight the Orc King!

name: Two Beasts Or Not To Beast!
short_description: Can you resist the temptations of the furry seductresses around you, or will you give in to their insistent advances?
steamspy_name: Two Beasts Or Not To Beast!

about_the_game:
The action of the novel takes place in the USSR in 1982. Vitalik, an ordinary teenager, comes to visit his grandmother in the summer. Here he meets his old friends and finds new ones. Summer, the river, his grandmother's warm pies, nighttime gatherings around the campfire and the long-awaited holiday of Ivan Kupala.... What else can you dream of?

At first, nothing bothers him here, except for a couple of random oddities, which, as it turns out, will be something more than it seemed at first glance....

Whether the protagonist will be able to unravel the mystery of this place - depends only on you!
detailed_description:
The action of the novel takes place in the USSR in 1982. Vitalik, an ordinary teenager, comes to visit his grandmother in the summer. Here he meets his old friends and finds new ones. Summer, the river, his grandmother's warm pies, nighttime gatherings around the campfire and the long-awaited holiday of Ivan Kupala.... What else can you dream of?

At first, nothing bothers him here, except for a couple of random oddities, which, as it turns out, will be something more than it seemed at first glance....

Whether the protagonist will be able to unravel the mystery of this place - depends only on you!
name: Solar Pall

short_description: It seems that nothing has changed in the quiet village of Vitalik's grandmother. It's time to have some fun and make new friends! But what if strange things await here at every step? Get ready to go on an adventure full of secrets and mysteries!

about_the_game:
Golf with Guns is a casual version of online mini golf with one major twist... GUNS!

Advance your golf ball throughout the course by shooting it with different powered guns, or screw over your opponents by shooting their golf balls (be sure when you do this because it will still cost you a stroke and probably make your opponents mad). Play casually (or seriously if you want) with friends (currently up to 8 players) or random opponents online to shoot the lowest score.

Never run out of fun with community-made maps in the workshop

With an in-game map creator, anyone can bring their map ideas to life and contribute to the never-ending fun! Have an idea for a new asset or game mode? Make a post about it in the workshop where the community can vote on it. Highly requested features will likely make it into future releases.

name: Boing
short_description: "Boing" redefines retro space shooters with its potent weaponry. Defend, attack, and level up as you twist through challenges. Endless fun for all!

name: Seductive Solitude
short_description: Seductive Solitude is a horror psycho game. Where you need to escape from the family Smiths house, because this house is not normal. The more time you are there, the crazier it gets. Can you escape the Smith family before it's too late and uncover their secret?

about_the_game:
Upgrade your skills in this game and sweep away the constantly gathering monsters.
The Blood Fight of True Heroes unfolds right here.
Save the planet by strengthen skill-up using the minerals dropped by the monsters.

1. Feel the pleasure of wiping out lots of monsters with the simple touch of a hand.

2. Choose randomly given skills to build up your own deck.

3. Use the minerals created on the map to level up much faster.

4. When your skill level reaches its maximum, you'd be able to get bonus stats.

5. If you learn all the skills over one time, you'd be able to get bonus stats.
name: SAVE THE EARTH
short_description: Dangerous monsters are invading the entire planet There is a crisis in the planet You have been given a important task to protect the planet
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean

name: Boat Builder: Andy's Story
short_description: In this game you have to play as Andy, an experienced yachtsman who starts his new way of life working at his own shipyard. Buy materials, build boats and yachts, complete orders. Start with something simple and build your skills from fishing boats to racing yachts.

about_the_game:
【Background Story】

The game is set on a remote island research base where scientists are studying a mysterious wormhole. During an experiment, the wormhole suddenly emits strange signals, causing all the researchers to mutate into powerful monsters. The player will take on the role of a special forces soldier, tasked with saving the island by eliminating all the mutant monsters, uncovering the secrets behind the incident, and protecting the world's safety.

【Gameplay Features】

Free exploration and combat
Players can freely explore various areas of the island and engage in combat with mutant monsters. Each area has its unique map and features, requiring players to use different strategies and weapons to face various challenges.

Diversity of mutant monsters
The mutant monsters come in different types, each with its unique abilities and weaknesses. Players need to understand different types of monsters and use corresponding strategies and weapons to defeat them.

Variety of weapons and equipment
The game offers a range of weapons and equipment for players to choose and use, including shotguns, pistols, sniper rifles, melee weapons, grenades, etc. Players can collect resources or complete tasks to obtain more advanced weapons and equipment.

Survival elements
The game also incorporates survival elements where players need to manage their character's health, water sources, and food to maintain vitality and stamina.

Realistic weather system
The game features day-night cycles, changing weather conditions, and different time periods, affecting the abilities of the monsters.
name: Singularity - 奇异岛
short_description: You are lost in the sea while driving a fishing boat, encountering severe thunderstorms and stranded on a remote island filled with strange things and monsters. You need to survive on the island and fight against unknown monsters to uncover the unknown side of the island.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Traditional Chinese

name: Off Shore
short_description: Off Shore is a first person survival horror game with a nautical theme. You must survive while solving puzzles in hopes of being rescued from a derelict lighthouse.

name: TOUCHSTARVED
short_description: TOUCHSTARVED is a dark romance visual novel where your choices determine whether the story ends with gothic romance or blood-curdling horror. Explore an enigmatic city and find a cure for your curse by entrusting your fate to 5 love interests, each uniquely monstrous in their own way.

about_the_game:
The world of endless parrying!

Tiger, the world's best Energy Blast Master.
Phoenix, an invisible man.
And many Masters from all over the world.
​Join the exciting battles and new challenges!​
​

When all the five Magic Orbs are collected, Genietty, who makes the wish come true, will be summoned.
Powerful Masters fight to collect them all.
Join the clash of fates approaching around the orbs.
​

The Legend of Tiger And Phoenix is a unique timing-parrying and infiltrating game that allows you to experience Fireballs, Energy Blast, ​levitating, and the life of an invisible man.
The player can feel the pleasure of penetrating powerful challenges through sophisticated quickness and fast input.

Features

  • This game is played in two main ways.
Parrying: The player must succeed by pressing the displayed button accurately within the set time.

Infiltrating: The player must move to the target point without being detected by other characters.

  • The player can enjoy the fun of supernatural powers, invisibility, and levitation.
  • The player can enjoy fun and mysterious stories and beautiful game levels.
  • This game gives us an opportunity to think about the potential hidden within us, the mysteries of the universe and life.
name: The Legend Of Tiger And Phoenix
short_description: The Legend of Tiger And Phoenix is a unique timing-parrying/infiltrating game that allows you to experience Fireballs, Energy Blast, ​levitating, and the life of an invisible man.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian
steamspy_name: The Legend Of Tiger And Phoenix

about_the_game:
Discord:


Brutal Strike is a cross-platform first-person shooter game that offers exciting gameplay on traditional platforms, with optional virtual reality support for an even more immersive experience. The game features robust mod support and a level editor, allowing players to create and share their own custom mods, skins, and maps with the community.


In Brutal Strike, players can experience a wide variety of game modes, including zombie mode, where one player becomes a zombie and must try to infect the other players, and battle royale, where teams of players drop onto a large map and fight to be the last ones standing.


Whether you prefer to play in VR or on a traditional platform, Brutal Strike offers endless hours of thrilling gameplay for players of all skill levels. Join the action today and see if you have what it takes to survive the brutal world of Brutal Strike.
name: Brutal Strike
short_description: Brutal Strike is a multiplayer shooter. Fight as two teams and show off your shooting skills to give your team the edge in combat.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

name: BOWLOUT
short_description: Defeat pins with rapid-fire bowling balls or powerful melee strikes to avoid getting guttered in this First-Person PvE Bowling game.

name: Pleh!
short_description: Pleh! is a short psychological horror walking simulator that tells the story of a depressed game developer, his intrusive thoughts and his dark mysterious secrets.

name: Orbital Cargo Division
short_description: The crew of a cargo ship arrives at what appears to be an abandoned space station. Power appears to be there, but no one is responding to their radio messages. A pixel art point & click adventure with an exciting story and lots of humor.

name: Chase Survivors
short_description: Survive the apocalypse for 15 minutes! In 'Chase Survivors,' evolve your character and your weapons to face hordes of horrifying creatures. Rescue is already on the way, just wait.

name: Krytix
short_description: Wall runs, explosions, fast-paced shooting, physics and high-speed gameplay, that is the recipe used in the making of Krytix, a 3D single player game. Story divided through chapters, each of them taking place in different environments with new enemies and new mechanics.

name: My Swordsman
short_description: Open world, multiplayer online tower defense confrontation game. Fight with teammates to upgrade your heroes, build bases, produce your own troops, command troops to form formations, and defend or attack enemy positions. Come and build your online fortress together.

name: Project Canopy: Prologue
short_description: Experience the beginning of learning how to survive in an alien jungle. Harvest, Build, Craft and Explore this first dense biome among massive trees, plants, and hostile creatures to survive. Learn the ropes, build a base, and craft essential tools to survive and unravel mysteries.

name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2023
short_description: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2023 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Guilt
short_description: A beautiful first-person narrative short story set after your death. Immerse yourself in a mind-blowing world as you face a traumatic event from your past.

name: Once upon a Dungeon II
short_description: Explore an open world, descend into dark dungeons, defeat challenging creatures and collect unique loot in this hardcore traditional roguelike game.

name: Ragnarök TD
short_description: Ragnarök TD is a 2D top-down tower defense game created as a case study of Ninja Kiwi's Bloons TD 6 by the University of Michigan's WolverineSoft Studio. Follow the story of a small village in the North as they fend off the beasts of Ragnarök in this revamped Steam iteration of the original project.

name: 下山的试炼之江湖遗失录 A test before Jianghu
short_description: It's a story about the mountains before we came to Jianghu You can play a boy or a girl, figure out your identity, collect G's, and win the test
steamspy_name: 下山的试炼之江湖遗失录 A test before Jianghu

name: See Ya Later!
short_description: Your ship crash landed on a randomly generated map, survive long enough to escape by crafting, mining, fishing, and farming!

name: Above Snakes: Prologue
short_description: In the prologue of Above Snakes, you awake in a destroyed settlement and help the survivors rebuild it. After that, expand the world with world pieces, craft, farm, hunt, build a base, and fight to find out more about what happened.

about_the_game:
Simple but complex gameplay

Dragonium Adventure is a turn-based combat RPG that uses a few simple fundamental mechanics: Attack, Defense and Objects. During the course of your adventure you will clash with many enemies, one more powerful than the other: to face them, you will need to constantly change and improve your strategy, and to do so, you will have to make use of new fighting techniques and tools. Learn to master these elements and become Akinori's best fighter!

Story mode

Akinori has been quiet for millennia since the last sighting of a monster, but apparently these mysterious creatures have made their appearance again - it's up to you to figure out what's happening and restore peace to the kingdom. Fight, improve yourself and save Akinori!

  • 8 zones to explore with 5 levels per zone, divided into 3 normal levels, 1 mini-boss and 1 boss!

  • Improve your character by acquiring more powerful fighting techniques!

  • Free Akinori from the malus and find out what's happening!

Add spice to the fight!

There are many different combat techniques: from those that simply hit the enemy and inflict damage, to those that restore your health, give you an advantage in battle, and more. By defeating enemies, you will obtain Experience points that will be used to fill the Experience Bar. Once filled, you will advance one Level, and every now and then you may acquire new combat techniques. Master the combat techniques and create a moveset that suits the situation!

Power up with Medals!

Medals grant passive effects to the player. There is one for each enemy you will encounter in Dragonium Adventure.

Their effects are varied: increasing attack, defense, speed... and more! You can upgrade Max Medals by defeating the corresponding enemies and thus increasing their level, increasing the passive effect granted.

You can upgrade a Medal to a maximum of level 3.

You can equip up to a maximum of 3 at a time, so combine their effects based on your moveset and the enemy in front of you!

Test yourself in Rush mode!

Defeat many enemies, one after the other, with a completely random moveset!

Try to survive as long as possible: plan a winning strategy with what you come across and you will prevail.

Rush mode is great for getting Max Medals and acquiring fighting techniques that cannot be obtained in Story mode. More fighting techniques will be added via free updates after the game launches, and the only way to obtain them is by increasing your level in Rush mode. You will be able to expand your strategy and show it off in online multiplayer battles (coming after launch)!

To unlock this mode, you need to reach a certain point in the game in order to become familiar with the combat system and acquire the fundamental fighting techniques.
name: Dragonium Adventure
short_description: Fight and make your way through the world of Akinori in this strategic turn-based RPG! Defeat powerful enemies, complete the intriguing story mode, upgrade your character, unlock new skills and join the fray!

name: System of Souls
short_description: SoS is a puzzle and first-person platform game, where you play as L-064N, who wakes up in The ION laboratory, place where you will have to go through different logical trials created by the artificial intelligence of the place, in order to recover memories and understand this enigmatic world.

name: JUNK! A Demo About Robots Playtest
Mushroom Collector Simulator
short_description: Mushroom Collector Simulator is a mushroom picking simulator that involves you in the hunt for many different mushrooms that grow in the wild. Collect mushrooms, enjoy walks through the forest, complete missions, upgrade your hut and equipment.

about_the_game:
JOY OF PROGRAMMING - Software Engineering Simulator is an immersive 3D programming puzzle game about automating and controlling realistic machines, robots, drones and more using real Python code. Build actual coding skills while playing, solve exciting bite-sized programming challenges and progress to unlock new programming features and improved machinery. Prior programming knowledge recommended.

Automate logistics to quickly transport items    Stabilize robots with control feedback (PIDs)
 

Write navigation code for cars           Crack passwords with brute-force
 

Solve classical algorithms and data-structures  Accurately control sniper rifles
 

Use image processing to count coins              Apply computer vision to guide missiles
 

Get it now and dive into your programming adventure!

A Fair Warning

JOY OF PROGRAMMING is not a casual game. In fact, it is one of the most difficult games on Steam. It offers the real programming experience: Lots of thinking, hard work, gathering information, debugging and some frustrations. But you will also learn new skills, become a better developer, and most of all enjoy that sweet sensation of finally cracking a hard problem.

Features

  • Tutorial levels to get you started with the programming concepts in JOY OF PROGRAMMING

  • Create your own puzzles with the included level-editor

  • Find collectible factsheets with interesting computer-science tidbits

  • Earn stars by completing levels and use them to unlock new programming features

  • Work towards achieving many different certificates for completing all levels in one category

  • Real programming: No pseudo code, no imaginary language. Instead, fully functional python code with your favourite packages like numpy, pandas, scipy, pillow, sklearn and more. Some basic prior programming knowledge (in Python or otherwise) and a strong interested in programming is recommended.

  • In-game IDE: A codemirror based in-game Python IDE offers syntax highlighting, auto-completion, docstring tooltips, debugging, auto-indentation, code-folding, copy/paste and undo/redo. Advanced users can also opt to use external IDEs like VSCode or PyCharm instead.

  • Realistic challenges: From robotics to abstract algorithms and creative coding - the full breadth and depth of computer-science awaits.

  • Open puzzle design: Each level has many different valid solutions.

  • Clear goals: Each level has one mandatory goal and up to three optional goals.

  • Immediate feedback: Never wonder whether your code is working. Get immediate, incremental feedback on each good (or bad) step towards a working solution.

  • Performance metrics: Compare your best solution anonymously with others with respect to speed, memory usage and code length.

  • No hard locks: Never get stuck on a single level, there are always several open challenges available.

  • Optionally submit your solution and your code to the leaderboards and share it with the world.

Designed By A Computer Science Professor

The game is developed primarily by a single developer, who also happens to be a computer science professor. An accompanying Youtube series by the developer provides example solutions for several of the levels and walks through them step-by-step.

Level Editor

An innovative Python based level editor allows creating and scripting entirely new levels with exciting new challenges. Optionally, these new levels can also be shared with the community via the game's Workshop.

Happy Coding and get JOY OF PROGRAMMING now!

In JOY OF POGRAMMNIG you are executing real Python code with minimal safe-guards on your own PC.
Only run code generated by the game (i.e. in tutorials), code you wrote yourself, code you checked yourself or code written by others you trust 100%. You are fully responsible for the code you execute! By purchasing, downloading and installing JOY OF PROGRAMMING you acknowledge and agree to the points above.

about_the_game:
THE NIGHT IS FINALLY HERE

Every early December another kid from your school goes missing, and rumors on the playground have circulated that it's related to Krampusnacht- the night that a half-goat half-demon named Krampus comes and steals away naughty children and spares the good. But what is it that determines if people are taken by Krampus?

For Goodness Sake is a very short horror text heavy game, focusing on several trolley problem situations. While completing the chores around the house, you find yourself reflecting on situations involving the neighborhood kids that have gone missing & ultimately deciding what you think might have been the right thing to do. Will you be taken by Krampus at the end of the night like the others, or will you be spared?

  • Playtime: 15-20 minutes.

  • 3D first person navigation

  • Ending depends on your answers given

  • Rich audio design and unsettling atmosphere

Created in one month, for the HauntedPS1 community's Madvent [3] Calendar project.

This was created as a small mental break from DEAD LETTER DEPT, a psychological horror typing game also available on Steam.

Be in control of a dog in an adventure action horror game. Set in a fantasy medieval open world full of mysteries where aliens took over and there is no one left to help you. Explore the different areas of the map to find out how to defeat them.

Out of Nowhere is developed by one passionate brazilian who wants to create a short but unforgettable experience for everyone.

name: Math World VR
short_description: Math World VR combines fun games with simple math to exercise the brain! This STEM Accredited VR game consists of 12 fun mini-games for all ages to enjoy! Each mini game in Math World VR combines simple math that adds a fun challenge. Who said brain exercise can't be fun?

name: Craftia's Defender
short_description: Craftia's Defender is a epic open world adventure. Where you fight off invaders and explore the land of Craftia. Do quests, upgrade weapons, plan battles and more.

about_the_game:
Six months had passed since Mira's father disappeared and was presumed dead. The other day an old computer of his showed up mysteriously. It's unlike any computer she had seen before and convinced her the answer to his disappearance could be found on it. As the last person with any hope of her father's survival, she eagerly began investigating.



Project RyME is a puzzle adventure game where you investigate a strange, old computer to get to the bottom of Mira's father's disappearance. With the help of some interesting allies, use a variety of techniques to hack your way into systems that might have clues. Over the course of the investigation you'll experience at least a dozen different game genres.



  • Navigate a simulated desktop computer's windowing system
  • Use the command terminal to access other computers, run advanced operations and explore the network.
  • Hack into various systems using techniques inspired by real cybersecurity vulnerabilities.
  • Chat with your allies to discuss strategies, review clues and talk about your favorite anime.
  • Play through a variety of digital worlds and minigames that are tightly woven into the story.
  • An interactive tutorial and extensive in-game resources make Project RyME accessible even for those without much knowledge about computers.
name: Project RyME
short_description: Project RyME is a story-focused puzzle adventure where you take on the role of a young woman investigating her father's disappearance. Use your computer hacking skills to investigate the internet and an odd, old computer to solve a mystery that deepens at every turn.

name: Captain Velvet Meteor: The Jump+ Dimensions
short_description: Explore the imagination of an anxious boy who transforms into “Captain Velvet Meteor” to battle his fear of the unknown! In this meaningful adventure, visit foreign lands and engage in tactical, turn-based combat against hordes of enemies alongside a quirky cast of Shonen Jump+ manga heroes.
steamspy_name: Captain Velvet Meteor: The Jump+ Dimensions

name: Loaders
short_description: War always changes: antigrav tanks and pilots using remote sensing are both called Loaders. Fight 10 vs 10 battles with guns so powerful that rocks are a weak cover and magnetic shields protect your hull. Fight, die, reload: War never ends, but neither do you. Load up again!

name: Cat + Dog
short_description: Control the cat and dog at the same time so they can collect their favourite snacks. The cat loves fish and the dog wants bones! The cat must not touch the bones and the dog must not touch the fish. A relaxing puzzle game with Sokoban elements.

name: Rune Monsters
short_description: A unique spin of the RPG monster collecting genre; taking inspiration from the classics. With over a hundred different monsters to collect, there exists a number of possibilities to choose from as you explore a world full of adventure, and untold dangers.

about_the_game:
Tales Of Polygonia combines the best of souls-like and crafting RPGs into an interesting and challenging low-poly game.
You awake alone in a desolate world seemingly abandoned by mankind. Initially you’ll encounter more questions than answers! Embark on an unexpected journey through multiple biomes. Discover clues that will guide you to uncovering what transpired.
Recover crafting recipes to upgrade and craft new weapons and armor! Utilize the items you find to quench your hunger and thirst in the harsh conditions of Polygonia.
Show your determination by defeating the boss monsters in demanding souls-like fights!
detailed_description:
Tales Of Polygonia combines the best of souls-like and crafting RPGs into an interesting and challenging low-poly game.
You awake alone in a desolate world seemingly abandoned by mankind. Initially you’ll encounter more questions than answers! Embark on an unexpected journey through multiple biomes. Discover clues that will guide you to uncovering what transpired.
Recover crafting recipes to upgrade and craft new weapons and armor! Utilize the items you find to quench your hunger and thirst in the harsh conditions of Polygonia.
Show your determination by defeating the boss monsters in demanding souls-like fights!

about_the_game:
Ghost Reaper is A fast-paced shooter inspired by combining "Doom Eternal" weapons switching combat with "Titanfall" movement mechanics.

  • Keep Moving
    Holding the "W" key is not going to cut it in this game. To move fast you are going to use every movement that you are given. "Wall running, Sliding+Jump, Dashing" keep moving, keep dancing.
  • Quick Switch
    You will be equipped with some very powerful weapons and each shot is going to take a long cool down, by mastering the art of weapon switch you will become an unstoppable titan.


Recommend for experienced FPS player.

  • This is not a mindless shooter game and you will be asked to use each tool for each problem.
  • It’s a fantasy that is earned and not given.


STORY:
God has fallen

In the future, human technology has become so advanced, they were capable of opening a magical seal, to a portal that seemed to be a magical realm.

What they didn't know, the magical seal was the last protection from the god who kept and prevented the dark age. Who could have imagined that humans are powerful enough to break the seal. An invasion happened. Not even gods can stop this madness.

Fast forward, gods have fallen and now it is up to humans to stop the dark age.

The chosen one was born and was gifted with power from the last will of gods. It was not a powerful strength, nor lighting speed, but a truly immortal power that can overcome time, space and possibly the future "Return by Death."

about_the_game:
Gorgeously illustrated, Orc Covenant is a sextacular romp into a fantasy realm full of sultry elves and beefy well-endowed orcs!



The sorcerer elf Xareth should be prince of Zellerwind, but his father was usurped by King Trum'kel, an inept conman. Xareth now seeks help from the orc tribe to take back his throne.

A NSFW visual novel with four love interests to choose from! Will Xareth regain his throne and fall in love? Or do the orcs have other plans for Zellerwind?













The Orc Covenant Visual Novel Contains:

  • Orc/Elf
  • Orc/Orc
  • Elf/Orc
  • And Orc/Elf/Orc!
  • Four Love Interests
  • 20 Hours of Game Play!
  • 143 Color and Black and White Images!
  • A Hard-Hitting Music Sound Track!
  • Dozens of Possible Endings!
  • Deep and Compelling Storylines in Every Route!

We will be adding even more content to Orc Covenant until June 2025!

name: RUBATO
short_description: RUBATO, an experimental, 2D physics-based take on the collect-a-thon genre!

about_the_game:
3D space multiplayer party game. In every single game, crews need to move the spaceship to the final within 40 minutes. Imposters need to stop crews from doing that.


Press F to interact, long press F to mine/repair;
Click the left mouse button to use the selected item;
Left-click to use ice to add oxygen to the space suit;
Left click to use energy can add energy to the space suit;
When both of them are wearing spacesuits, they can connect. The connecting person only consumes the braking oxygen of one person, and the connected person moves with the connecting person without consuming braking oxygen;
Kinetic guns cause air leaks on spaceship and spacesuits, and repairs require consumable parts. Air leaks in space suits can only be repaired by others;
The imposter presses the middle of the mouse to open the seethrough vision, and the imposter can craft things directly by pressing E in the spacesuit state.


The game has designed an EMP gun, and the effect is still being planned. I hope players can give me more suggestions.

Alpha testing QQ Group: 321173720

Chisel away a fully destructible landscape while searching for minerals to craft bigger and better explosives. Recover cryptic computer logs from old work sites in search of the legendary Actaeon Mine.

About Adventure Apple Robots
In Adventure Apple Robots, Help the Hero bring back his fleeing brother, venture into this fantastic world and find out why his brother is always running away from you.




Fun and challenging achievements!
Take control of the hero in this classic platformadventure, overcoming obstacles and unleashing new abilities as you progress through the stages.
Main campaign with 4 distinct worlds with their own characteristics and challenges.

about_the_game:
Throw Planes, Buy Upgrades, and Place Towers to defend against the oncoming waves of luggage! With 50+ unique upgrades to buy, discover new builds run after run. Unlock tons of froggy cosmetics in this Character Tower Defense!

  • 50+ unique upgrades, all with interesting synergies!

  • Ultimate Upgrades that add a twist to the endgame

  • 7 unlockable levels spanning a range of difficulties

  • Tons of hats, skins, and planes to customize your character with

  • A couple of unique achievements for the insane!

Upgrades in the shop range from new towers, to health upgrades. Between waves you'll need to save up and purchase upgrades to get the job done. What you pick influences your Ultimate Upgrade options, so you can spec into certain areas!

You will need a great build to become an Air Star!
name: air star
short_description: Throw Planes, Buy Upgrades, and Place Towers to defend against the oncoming waves of luggage! With 50+ unique upgrades to buy, discover new builds run after run. Unlock tons of froggy cosmetics in this Character Tower Defense!

about_the_game:
The adventurer, summoned to the Otherworld, journeys with the goddess Mershana to the Temple of Legends to restore the disrupted balance of the world. Together with the goddess, the adventurer will defeat monsters and have fun with her!

Game Features

Grow your character attributes at random, upgrade your skills and challenge the monsters of the other world!

Gameplay

The goddess can be equipped with multiple skills, including single, ranged and elemental skills.

Use attribute advantage to defeat the monster in front of you!

Choose random attribute growth at the end of the battles. Each run will be a different experience.
Defeat monsters to earn crystals and upgrade different passive skills to create your own unique fighting style!

Rest and have fun with the Goddess on your journey to recover your strength for the continuous challenges ahead!
name: Adventure with the Goddess
short_description: The adventurer, summoned to the Otherworld, journeys with the goddess Mershana to the Temple of Legends. Together with the goddess, the adventurer will defeat monsters and have fun with her!

name: Valkyrie: Dawn of Ragnarok
short_description: At Lord Odin's behest, Lilyth went to gather the souls of fallen warriors, bolstering Asgard's forces for the impending clash between Niflheim and Muspelheim. This marked the start of the most ferocious war ever: Ragnarok.

name: nothing_matters
short_description: A short point & click narrative adventure inspired by the real life experience of a struggling solo indie game developer. A story about everything and hence nothing at all. Discover what truly matters to you.

name: Kitten Kingdom
short_description: Join adorable kittens in Kitten Kingdom, a 2D platformer game with engaging gameplay, cute graphics, and an amazing soundtrack. Explore a vast and colorful world, collect money, and navigate challenging obstacles. Escape the monotony of everyday life with this charming game for all ages.

name: Lawnmower Game: Ufo Chase
short_description: Lawnmower Game series is back. Now enemy UFO with several weapons are chasing Lawnmower guy. Cut enough grass and earn stars to unlock new levels and avoid UFO

name: Speedway Ringer
short_description: Speedway Ringer is a top-down racer inspired by American stock car oval racing and the real-life challenges of Motorsports. Drivers will need a balance of aggression and patience to perfect their technique and succeed in a chaotic online multiplayer environment.

name: Four Color Puzzle
short_description: A chill puzzle experience. Set the colors of the pieces so that no two adjacent pieces have the same color. Complete 35 handmade levels, or explore infinite randomly generated 3D puzzles.

about_the_game:
On our Steam discussion boards you will find more details about the game and free content!





Tell Us About The Game's Story

The main character is a professor at a local community college. He has a wife that he has been with for eleven years, and a nine year old daughter. They have created the normal life that many strive for... nice car, nice house, good jobs....

However, the last year has brought some concern to light for our main character. His wife has become more distant, reserved, and indulgent. He contemplates that he is overthinking it all. When he brings the topic up to his wife, she calls him crazy and states how busy she has been with work. However things are not okay in this seemingly normal suburban home. Our main character discovers his wife's affair and that is where "Illusion of Being" really digs in.

Our main character is forced to make choices he wishes he never had to. Will he succumb to depression and possibly upset those who care for him? Will he embrace the single life and have more attention than he ever thought possible? Will he find true love within his new found freedom? As the player, the choices are yours to make... All the rewards as well as possible consequences, are yours to experience....

Why did we make Illusion of Being?

Illusion of Being was made to bring back the story telling that we crave while also bringing you some of the most intense visuals and emotions that a story like this can convey. It approaches difficult subjects on many different levels from substance abuse, adultery, friendship, betrayal, lust, fantasy, and much more! The game highlights elements that we believe have not been explored before in a detailed adult visual novel. It is grounded, real, immersive, heart breaking, inspiring.... With some of the best animations and characterization within the genre to accompany the tale. We aimed to create something both thought provoking, emotional, and yet thrilling to experience. Illusion of Being Chapter 1 is just the beginning of this journey, there is still so much more to come!

Game Highlights

- Branching story paths that matter -
- Story and animations are presented cinematically -
- Sweeping movie-like soundtrack that conveys emotion -
- Choices that can greatly affect how the story unfolds -
- Realistically modeled characters that have depth and story arcs -
- Almost all renders will be unique, very few repeating backgrounds -
- Many unlockable SFW and NSFW renders -
- A wealth of content including in-game achievements and galleries -
- Timed hidden object events to find extra content and unlockables -
- Cinematic and immersive H-Scenes with multiple angles -
- Mini games -
- Full story will be 4 chapters -
