about_the_game:
You're a dirty scallywag with nothing to lose. Dirty Dirty Pirates is a fast-paced, chaotic, player versus player fighting game, where fast reflexes and improvisation will help you become victorious. Stab, throw, roll, dance, mount, catch, and smash your way through frenzied battles in a looped battleground and enjoy the hilarious brutality.

LOCAL-MULTIPLAYER MAYHEM

Brawl with 2-8 players in a top down, blood-soaked, pirate battleground not for the faint of heart.

CHAOTIC LOOPED BATTLEGROUND

You and your thrown weapons wrap around the level, creating chaotic ways to slay your enemies (or yourself)!

POUNCE AND EXECUTE

Mount a downed pirate and choose your killing method.

GRATIFYING KILL CAMS

Watch the final kill of the match in slow motion and celebrate the brutality.

WEAPONS WITH A MIND OF THEIR OWN


Not only are the weapons pointy and eager to impale – but they follow you! Better hide, catch, or roll, ya buccaneer.

SLAUGHTER IN DIVERSE LANDS


Slay your foes at ship docks, ancient jungle ruins, desert, caves, and icy tundras.

CUSTOMIZE THE CHAOS


Reduce or increase the blood/gore to your liking (or disable it). Color blind mode is available as well.

Please note: This is a local multiplayer game without online gameplay. For the best experience, find a comfy couch and some friendly mateys in the same room or with Steam Remote Play.

name: Containment Zone
short_description: Containment Zone is a hardcore, realistic, tactical shooter in which the player fights his way through escaped mutant experiments, zombies, and military private contractors to uncover the secrets of the Object 1611 laboratory hidden deep within the Soldanesti district Containment Zone.

name: FARSIDERS
short_description: 'Farsiders' is a top-down (isometric view) 3D action Hack-and-Slash RPG game set in a stylized futuristic cyberpunk world. Embark on a journey as 'Cassie' to the past with references to real world legends (Arthurian) where the worlds of sci-fi technology and medieval magic collide.

name: Voxile
short_description: Explore gorgeous raytraced voxel lands, meet the local mutated wild-life, find out what went wrong, and quest, craft, loot, build, destroy and shoot your way to the top of the foodchain! Play alone, or with friends! Assuming you know how to share..

name: Fingerspelling Unleashed - BANZSL Edition
short_description: Fingerspelling Unleashed - BANZSL Edition focuses on teaching you the two handed sign language alphabet of the British/Australian/New Zealand hearing impaired communities.

name: Fiery Rivaz
short_description: Fiery Rivaz - Reanimate Shmups !!! It's time to revive the shmup genre. You can expect a shooter that focuses on varied and innovative level design. It is accompanied by cool 3d graphics and a great soundtrack.

about_the_game:
Feeling bored while waiting? Why not support our development efforts by playing "The Cold War Era"? -

Arms Race 2 is a turn-based strategy game based on the events of the Cold War between the Americans and the Soviets, spanning the 1950s through the 1990s. In just a few hours of gameplay, players will immerse themselves in five decades of contention, paranoia, secrecy, proxy wars, and the overarching "us vs. them" mentality.




Here's what sets Arms Race 2 apart from other war-based strategy games:

Immerse yourself in a realistic atmosphere that retells the story of the Cold War.
Choose your side and play as either the Americans or the Soviets to rewrite history.
Deploy military and espionage units to support allied governments or transform rebels into revolutionaries in opposing countries.
Establish spy networks to bolster government propaganda campaigns or undermine the opposition's stronghold.
Launch rockets, satellites, and astronauts or cosmonauts into space to astonish the world and prove your superiority.
Devise your own strategies and tactics, forcing your opponent to play by your rules.
Organize pro-government parades or incite riots to plunge countries into chaos.
Experience the technological, nuclear, arms, and space races through historic units, models, and names.
Encounter global consequences from historical international events that impact both superpowers and neutral regions.
Utilize powerful UN decisions to intervene in other countries or protect them from your foe's intervention.
Access a comprehensive database with pictures of influential politicians from both superpowers' governments.
Vote and establish your government with its own specific characteristics, such as politicians' skills and conservative or liberal views.
Experience industrialization, which promotes international cooperation within your alliance and enhances your gaming score.

GAME EXPERIENCE:

Arms Race 2 offers an easy-to-play experience suitable for gamers of all ages and skill levels. In-game tutorials and user-friendly menus provide information on:

Players' influence in each country and worldwide.
Opponents' influence in influenced, neutral, and opposing countries.
Number of military units stationed in each country.
Spy network status and propaganda campaign success.
Player's budget, which can be used to enact your regime.
Nuclear, arms, and space race milestones, which contribute to global influence and firepower.
Score values for each country, used to calculate a player's budget.
Total score as game events unfold.
Political and global consequence points—use them wisely, as they are limited.
Firepower for military and geographic landscape—truly lead an arms race!

WHAT'S NEW?

Arms Race 2 is the sequel to Arms Race - The Cold War Era game, developed and released by Alina Digital. Arms Race 2 incorporates the core AR-TCWE game mechanics and all DLCs. AR2 has been graphically redesigned to provide an improved user interface experience. Additionally, new features have been added to AR2, including highly requested changes to the community's favorite game mechanic, Global Consequences.

name: The Dark Pictures Anthology: The Devil In Me - Friend's Pass
short_description: Don’t play alone – invite a friend and double the scares during your time in The Devil In Me. The Friend's Pass works on a single save game and allows you and a friend one full playthrough of The Devil In Me with only one full version of the game.
steamspy_name: The Dark Pictures Anthology: The Devil in Me - Friend's Pass

name: Tunnet
short_description: Build, debug and optimize a computer network in an underground facility.

name: Helmetman
short_description: Enjoy a rouge-like deckbuilding card game and story at once! Helmetman, who was just an ordinary delivery guy, became a hero out of vengeance. He is shockingly ugly, but don’t worry, since he always has his helmet on! You may be able to start a relationship... but... that probably won’t happen...

name: Jump Fucker
short_description: Jump Fucker is an adult platformer that combines classic platform jumping mechanics with steamy, sexual content.

name: Super Fantasy Kingdom
short_description: Rebuild your kingdom and explore a vibrant fantasy world in this roguelite city builder. Defeat hordes of monsters with a unique team of defenders as you harvest, build, mine, cook, brew, and grow. But if your defenses should fail, be prepared to watch it all burn!

about_the_game:
-!THIS VN IS STILL IN EARLY ACCESS!-

Welcome to Cyberlinxxx

After the megacorporation's war fallout, the government relinquished control, granting megacorps extraterritorial rights.

This sparked the rise of Megacities, fuelled by advancements like AI, VR, gene editing, food printing, and advanced robotics,
elevating life standards at a cost. In Arriaka's depths, you once manipulated DNA for false identities, served time, and earned a 2nd chance at Plumbella Corp. Your expertise birthed a potential cure for "Morbus Malkov," a coveted breakthrough for megacorporation factions.

Now a target, they'll stop at nothing to seize your creation. But you refuse to surrender without a fight. Because if there's one thing everyone lives by is the mantra "Success is the only thing that matters".

Arriaka can be a dark place, a dangerous and lingering moloch of a city. Yet, there's enough place to slip through the cracks and it can be funny and entertaining as well. Every character you meet there enriches the story and deepens the immersion as the different paths unfold before you.

A big cast of characters from all walks of life awaits you. Decide with which you want to connect. It's all up to you. Some choices can lead to surprising results.

Here, have a look at three of the nine girls you'll meet in Cyberlinxxx

Zandra Bellerose, ex-Mafia guard, gets clean about her past by working a Corpjob at Plumbella Corp. She's curious, observant, and always in the moment. Zandra needs some help for a certain condition she carries. Maybe you can help her?

CT-KLT 2098 aka A-Z is your loyal female droid companion. Built for deep space operations, exploration, and ... household activities. She's always been by your side since she came with the house you bought before starting at Plumbella. A-Z is kind and sweet but can be ferocious and direct. Her production line was decomissioned by the state authorities after a droid uprising in the Mars asteroid belt but somehow managed to slip through the cracks. Lucky for you, no one in Arriaka gives a shit about gov law.

Trish Walker. At first, the secretary seems like a typical adrenaline junkie, always searching for the next big thrill. It's a side of her that seems contradicted by her normal wage job at Plumbella. She's hungry for life and even was a winner in the Memphidrome's droid fights 2 years ago. And she never backs down on a challenge.

Do you want a cyberpunk theme-inspired visual novel? You got it.
Do you want story and character development? You got it.
Do you want the visuals to support all that? You got it.

Features

  • 2400 renders up until now with more coming

  • 9 girls to meet

  • Expanded music tracks. Ranging from Synthwave to hardbass.

  • Different routes and choices

Coming up

  • Gallery

  • Scene replay gallery

  • Steam achievements

Gameloop

This game is an adult visual novel. Comparable to an interactive book or choose your adventure games. Many types of choices await you. Some will affect with which girl you want to engage with. You can choose your favorite girl, no forced choices here. Other choices impact the game itself i.e. weapon mods for your droid and so on.
name: Cyberlinxxx
short_description: Experience the thrills of a cyberpunk adventure with a cast of sexy and strong women. Dive into the shadows of the Megacity Arriaka and find out who wanted to kill you.

name: My Summer Jobs: Dialing for Dreams!
short_description: My Summer Job: Dialing for Dreams! is a puzzle game where you guide a young girl Molly through the world of telemarketing. Test your skills in cold calling, product knowledge and time management to match the right product to each customer's desire and save enough money to make dreams come true!
steamspy_name: My Summer Jobs: Dialing for Dreams!

developers: Lee Hall, Jonathan Haseldine, Vexed Enigma
name: NightFall Hollow
short_description: Investigate the strange town of Nightfall Hollow, and see if you can get to the truth. Enjoy the opening chapter of our game, meet some of the residents, solve a selection of puzzles, and have your first glimpse into Nightfall Hollow. There's plenty to discover, and the odd Easter-egg or two as well

about_the_game:
Spell Disk is a rogue-lite action game with a unique synergy building mechanic so that your runs can never be the same. Strategize and create your own spell combo synergies to blast through enemies on your way! Each run is unique, so you must plan out how to build your power.


Discover combos and synergies that no one’s seen before! Maximize your power to better your chance of escaping the dungeon of Spell Disk.


Craft spells, disks, and artifacts during your run that synergies with each other in their own ways.


Unlock new weapons and powers to hack and slash through the enemies blocking your way.

Craft spells, disks, and artifacts during your run that synergies with each other in their own ways.


Unlock new weapons and powers to hack and slash through the enemies blocking your way.

name: Dreamscape Runners
short_description: Chaotic fast-paced racing game that can be played solo or with a friend locally! Use various power ups to reach (or open up!) other paths - or use them to mess with your friend.

name: To the stars
short_description: The picture-book-loving Little Princess lives happily in the Castle with her best friends Little Seal and Little Sharks day after day. However, the Little Princess, long “Protected” in the Castle, has always been dreaming of seeing the beautiful starry sky depicted in the picture book.

name: MDF: Magical Defense Force
short_description: MDF: Magical Defense Force is a unique story focused Magical Girl Visual Novel, featuring a cast of strange and entertaining character, monster of the week action, comedy, a rocking soundtrack and artistically rendered fight scenes.

name: Delivery Kore
short_description: It is an open world adventure game that tells the story of Kore, a girl who lives in Eleusis, a forest in Middle-earth where spirits gather, and Poring, who was born from Soul Jams. Become Kore, a forest girl, explore the forest of Eleusis with Poring, and deliver Poring to a new world.

about_the_game:
Jigsaw Realm 3D is a puzzle for relaxation, assemble the puzzle in a cozy room, under the purring of a cat, the sounds of a fireplace and pleasant music in the background.
In Jigsaw Realm 3D there is no donation and microtransactions, choose what you like and start the game.

- 72 unique images.
- 9 categories ( Fantasy, Art, Water, Architecture, Waterfalls, Nature, Animals, Flowers, Food.)
- Full 3D.
- 4 difficulties.
- Hints.
- More than 40 pleasant musical compositions.
- Convenient player with a choice of music.
- Built-In Radio.
- Nice modern graphics with a warm atmosphere.
- Smart save system, for each picture. (The build will continue where you left off last time.)

Jigsaw Realm 3D is developed by one person, and the income from the game and future DLCs will go to the development of story driven Jigsaw Realm 3D, on the theme of vampires. In it you will find a full-fledged plot and a story that will open after assembling various locations of the game world. The game is sure to please every fan of such puzzles.

name: De Feet
short_description: De Feet is a first-person role-playing game, set partly in a medieval fantasy world and partly in modern times. The player controls the character Ricky in a switchable first-person and third-person perspective. Combat is reminiscent of a first-person shooter.

about_the_game:
On a newly discovered planet, the reconnaissance base goes into a state of alert, losing communication with the members. Your mission will be to regain control of the base while trying to find your wife who is part of the reconnaissance team.

The atmosphere of fear, insecurity and instability is well balanced with moments of action and strategy.

The setting is varied since it takes place on a planet with several biomes. Passing through factories, large constructions, caves, forests, volcanoes, among others.

Mechanics are a strong part of the game, both in combat and movement. Like a good metroidevania, it brings the system of acquiring new resources, weapons, skills with a slight rpg touch.

Well-crafted and thought-out enemies have synergy with scenery and other enemies, preventing you from using the same strategy, weapon or skill.

Horde mode comes in tower defense style where you defend your base from massive waves of enemies and bosses at the end of them. You can also unlock new characters and play cooperatively with a friend.

The progression and sense of evolution in the game is continuing.
name: The Search: Lost Dreams
short_description: The Search: Lost Dreams is a game made for players focused on fun and gameplay. Improve your combat arsenal, equipments and learn skills that will help you survive on this hostile planet.

name: 香恋Ready！
short_description: You run your own perfume store as the owner of a perfume store. A sudden accident has involved you in the investigation of your own resurrection from the dead. The truth gradually emerges with three employees - a love affair about perfume. Harvest the memories of your own heartbeat in the game!

name: Patchouli's Adventure In Doll's House
short_description: Let's unravel the mysteries of the Doll's House with witch Patchouli! Embark on an adventure in the mysterious and beautiful doll's House, find items, solve puzzles, and find the whereabouts of her beautiful lover - Alice. Experience a relaxed and fun story, and discover the secrets of the witches.

about_the_game:
Are you looking for something new and never seen before?

Cartoonite is for you. It offers you a completely innovative sand box racing game experience never seen before.

Do the usual games bore you and would you like something fun and competitive at the same time?

Cartoonite is for you. It takes you to the discovery of a colorful and fully explorable world in which you can build and collect resources crashing into objects while challenging your friends in multiplayer with a cartoon style.

Do you want to have fun in a colorful world and challenge your friends in multiplayer?

Cartoonite is for you. Choose your favorite vehicle from an infinite number of possibilities. Decide between offroad, drift with FR legendary cars or choose between all sorts of vehicles. Have fun crashing into objects to collect resources and build your own world. Show your friends what you've built and do stunts with them.

Cartoonite is a limitless world full of color and fun. It offers you a box full of tools and toys to enjoy with your friends in multiplayer in this sand box game.

Download now to experience the fun:

- A FULLY EXPLOREABLE WORLD : you have the freedom to do what you want. You can play with your friends or challenge them to breathtaking races. Exploring a free and colorful cartoon style world.

- BUILD AND RESOURCE SYSTEM : A racing game finally joins a survival game. Collect resources by crashing into all sorts of objects and use your resources to build your world. Like any survival game you have to manage your resources well and explore the map to find all sorts of secrets.

- ALL SORT OF VEHICLES : You have the option to choose all sorts of vehicles. You can drift with FR legendary cars or get your car dirty with mud from offroad cars. You can choose trucks or supercars. The important thing is that you make them as unique as you are.

- MULTIPLAYER SYSTEM : Share your creations with your friends and have fun with them. Race alongside your friends in this survival racing game and become legendary.

Download now and enter the world of your dreams through this revolutionary new sand box racing game full of fun and color in a cartoon style.

about_the_game: Quack Town Smack Down is a 3rd Person Arena shooter wrapped in a Goofy Rubber Duckky Toon Theme!  Hustle to pick up randomized abilities spread throughout each map to give you an advantage. The Pistol, Bubble Buckshot, Sniper Soaker, Kahuna Kreator, and Whirler all await to give you an edge over your fellow Dukkies in Free-for-All water combat! Soak the competition by utilizing Bounce pads, water abilities, and terrain. The Bubble Bathtub is the Dukkies home turf sporting colorful toys and open areas. Take it out back in the Sandbox with more verticality, tight spaces, and run-and-gun tactics.  Don't forget to customize your Dukkie's Hat, Eyes and the very rubber around their squeakers to make sure the lobby knows who the Smack Down King is!

about_the_game:
Embark on an "epic" adventure in a 2.5D topdown perspective game where you can shape the world to your liking. Explore the vast cave systems and conquer dangerous biomes as you gather materials and craft powerful tools to aid you in your quest. With a dynamic tier system, you'll be able to break harder blocks and conquer more challenging enemies. But be warned, the cave is filled with deadly creatures and giant bosses that stand in your way.

The fate of a magical tree rests in your hands as it is under siege by the enemy biomes. Your ultimate goal is to heal the tree and secure its safety. Along the way, you'll have the opportunity to fish, build, ride in a minecart, wire up some lights and farm crops to aid in your journey. Can you rise to the challenge and become the "epic" hero the cave needs? Find out in this survival game. About a cave.

name: Story of Animal Sprite
short_description: Story of Animal Sprite is a casual merge game where you will restore the homeland for cute animals by building various fancy structures.

name: Too Many Chickens!
short_description: Too Many Chickens! is a twin-stick bullet hell style couch co-op battle game. A large roster of bizarre weapons, power-ups and abilities awaits so choose ya favourite gun slinger, grab ya M79 chicken launcher and blast your best friends into tiny pieces for ultimate glory!!!!

name: HERO OF GIANTS: DINOSAURS STRIKE VR

about_the_game:
See how long you can survive in a world full of brainless zombies and heartless humans! Develop unique relationships with 200 other characters spread across 8 warring factions - each with their own beliefs about what the problem is and how to solve it. Explore over 50 different locations on your journey to reclaim every corner of the city, with hundreds of interactive objects to help you survive in real-time. Inheriting the combat system from the wrestling games, tearing enemies apart has never been so satisfying! For the 1st time ever, the original touch-screen concept has been adapted for a controller.

Fully unlocked as standard, you can start with a character of your creation and save your changes to all others to make the world your own. You can even choose how many zombies you start with to either dive in at the deep end or ensure a slow build. If you prefer, a whole other "Deathmatch" mode gives you all the fun of slaying zombies with none of the pressure!

  • Survive among 200 other characters spread across 8 warring factions!
  • Explore over 50 locations to reclaim every corner of a huge city!
  • Immersive gameplay challenges you to survive each day in real-time!
  • Dozens of interactive weapons & objects that can be used for crafting!
  • Wrestling-based combat system makes it satisfying to tear enemies apart!
  • Atmospheric music reflects the danger of every moment!
  • Stylized 2D visuals draw inspiration from pop culture!
  • Edit every character to make the world your own!
  • Act out your own scenarios in the "Deathmatch" mode!

about_the_game:
CRAZY GUY is the story of a space tramp who travels across worlds with the simple goal of clearing out enemies. You joined a war nomad as he explored a small cluster of enemies on a secret planet.

Together with the nomads, you quickly determined that the planet had been invaded by space terrorists. In each sector, a certain group of enemies with the latest weapons settled down and who knows what plans they have in mind. You have nothing left but to go into a dishonest battle and clean up all the enemies and eliminate their weapons.

Game Features:
• Classic 2D platformer
• Various weapons and enemies
• Nice pixel graphics
name: CRAZY GUY

Traverse treacherous landscapes, confront formidable foes, and uncover dark secrets as you strive to reunite a fractured kingdom. Band together to save the land from chaos, all in a stylized vector style.

name: The Executive - Movie Industry Tycoon

about_the_game:
You, the magic ball, have lost your sorcerer and in order not to perish you must find him again. For this reason, you start your journey. Initially, you'll find yourself in a magical, dreamy world that matches the ball. During your journey, however, your real adventure begins.

Tales of the Magic Ball is a puzzle platformer where you'll experience a fantastic story during your adventure in a magical world. Use your magic to solve puzzles. Use magic to defeat your enemies. Interact with the inhabitants and get help. Face the challenges and try to survive. Let the world enchant you.

-Play with a physically simulated ball and solve difficult bouncing passages.


-Let the puzzles challenge you.


-Use your magic to defeat your enemies and solve puzzles.


-Fight your opponent and adjust your tactics.


-Enjoy the story.

-Explore hand-built levels.


Wildmonkeygames is a small 1-man-team with a few freelancers who, besides their regular work, have dedicated themselves to game development with a lot of love and passion. Originally "Tales of the Magic Ball" was planned as a fast skill game/roller ball, but in the course of development more and more a more modern kind of roller ball crystallized out, meanwhile it became an adventure platformer, in which you can experience a story. The whole thing is spiced with puzzle game elements and packed in a beautiful fantasy world.
I hope you will enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed developing it.

about_the_game:
People come here for two things. Eating donuts or ordering someone's death!
Ahh don't worry! Of course, this cozy shop has a killing method to suit your taste. Let's see what's on our menu! Shall we kill with a poisonous snake or with a ninja sword? Let it look like a natural death from a car crash or do we add a bitter poison to your food! Don't forget our rocket launcher and machine gun desserts!

Get a Killing Job from Mystery Clients

Your secret customers, silhouetted on the screen, will tell you the profile information of the victim and how to kill them. It is entirely up to you to accept or reject the job. Once the task is complete, your money will be instantly deposited into your account by bank transfer.
What you need to pay attention to here is the way the job is done. Remember, in order to please your customers, you must kill the victims in the right way, as desired.

Save Money and Buy Materials on the Black Market

Your family's black market market "BLACKAZON" continues to serve you uninterruptedly! In the game, with the money you earn from the jobs you complete, you can supply all kinds of tools that a hitman might need from the virtual black market platform.
From poisonous scorpions to dangerous chemical acids, from sniper rifles to samurai swords, from modified vehicles to tnt explosives, everything is waiting for you in BLACKZONE.

Upgrade your Center Base and Gear your Equipment

Your center is your home! In order to get bigger jobs, you must improve your headquarters, modify your vehicle, level up your gear, and expand your venue. With each task you complete, your experience level will increase and you can make your headquarters a more professional place. You can continue your adventure, which you started with a small one-story back room, in a huge armory by completing missions and gaining experience.

Complete Missions with Dozens of Different Kill Methods

Use your imagination and be a little innovative! We're not talking clichéd Hitman-style silenced guns and backstabbing here! Let's explore some of the trendiest poison recipes and prepare a poison with our knowledge of chemistry. Or let's take the poisonous viper that we have been feeding for days out of its cage and put it quietly in our victim's bed. Did our client want the victim's death to look natural? So let's go for a ride with our mustang car lying in the garage and crush the victim. Get ready to explore dozens of different killing styles and become a Professional Assassin!


Embark on an exciting journey through our vast collection of children's online games, spanning dress-up, puzzle, action games, and beyond on . Immerse your kids in the gaming world with beloved Poki and KralOyun titles. Begin the adventure today, and let the learning and fun commence! You can find many articles about games on Kid Games Free website.

name: Unrelaxing Quacks
short_description: Survivors but fast. Ditch the waiting simulators. Embrace the speedrun. Power up quickly, but expect the challenge to match with dynamically raising difficulty. There is no meta progression to save you, only option is to learn the map and get good at the game.

about_the_game:
Unleash your creativity and paint realistic terrains in just a few minutes !

Terrain Painter is an interactive, GPU-accelerated terrain painting software that allows you
to design stunning landscapes in real-time !

Each brush literally "paints" the selected matter (rock, lava, sand, water, ..) on ground to get an immediate realistic result !

With features such as rain, erosion, volcanic eruptions, each brush stroke adds a new layer of realism, from sand dunes to raging rivers !

Designing custom environments that look and feel real has never been easier !

Features
• Interactive painting of natural terrains !
• Physical brushes (sand, lava, water)
• Classic brushes (raise, dig, smooth, smudge, ..)
• Multi-layers, merges layers
• Interactive simulation
• Advanced lava simulation
• Erosion, matter transport
• HD rendering
• GPU accelerated (OpenGL 4.6)
• Native seamless tiling !
• Textures UV édition
• Export to UHD 8K !
• 8/16/32 bits PNG import/export
• Export of diffuse, height, normal, metallic and uv maps
• Export of complete terrain mesh/scene in OBJ, ASE and FBX

Useful shortcuts
• Mouse Middle Pan View
• Alt+Middle Rotate View
• Ctrl+Scroll Changes Brush Layer
• Shift+Scroll Changes Brush Strength
• Alt+Scroll Changes Brush Size
• Ctrl+B Change Brush Shape
• Ctrl+G Draw Cursor
• Ctrl+E Objects Selection
• Break Play/Pause Simulation
• +- Changes Simulation Speed
• */ Multiply/Divide Layer Height
• Ctrl+U Show Color Dialog
• Ctrl+I Inverse Layer (height)
• Space Convert Layer to Ground
• Shift+Space Merge to Lower Layer
• Shift+B Blur Layer
• Shift+N Sharpen Layer
• T Top View
• P Perspective View
• C Center View on Cursor
• N Normal Map View
• W WireFrame View

Kill the zombies and take on challenges by helping the last survivors in the city. The Last Survivors is action roguelike game. You can never stand still, always collecting XP and boosters to get stronger with your weapons. Beat the game by completing all the challenges in town.

You will play the charismatic Ava, one of the last survivors born in the apocalypse.

The Last Survivors is a casual apocalyptic survival game with Roguelite elements.

Kill All the Zombies

Eliminate as many zombies as possible to survive.

Never stop

Collect as much XP and boosters as possible to get stronger.

Challenges

To win the game, complete the challenges by helping the last survivors who are still alive.

about_the_game:
Dimensional Animals is a metroidvania adventure about five cute animal friends with crazy abilities in a peculiar quest.

Through exploration, meet and partner up with new animals! You'll then be fused together, having access to their skills all at once!






THE DOG
Name: Bingo
Abillity: Teleporting
Likes: Playing catch
Dislikes: Veterinarians



THE DUCK
Name: Fidget
Abillity: Spin Jump
Likes: Spinning mug rides on theme parks
Dislikes: Days without wind



THE CAT
Name: Scott
Abillity: Wall Climbing
Likes: Climbing on top of fridges
Dislikes: Being cuddled too hard



THE FROG
Name: Papo
Abillity: Dive Jumping
Likes: Trampolines on pools
Dislikes: Being mistaken for a toad



THE RACCOON
Name: Tucker
Abillity: Vertical Teleporting
Likes: Hiding in difficult to find spots
Dislikes: Difficult games



Main Features

  • One HUGE interconnected multi-dimensional level - You'll explore multiple dimensions with your sci-fi empowered animals. Traverse through portals to find new areas, uncover new unlockables and learn new skills!
  • Exploration comes with rewards! - Find up to 50 hidden diamonds and 25 health orbs to unlock new colors for your pets and improve your survivability by increasing your maximum health.
  • Tight and juicy - Controls are fine tuned so that it's fun to climb and teleport around the game's environments!
  • Eye candy - Visuals are inspired by retro games and animation movies. Expect some colorful, cute and nostalgic sights!
  • Original soundtrack - Dimensional Animals will literally be music for your ears, with a soundtrack that changes depending on the gameplay situation!
  • Thrilling to complete - Completionist players will be pleased by a numerous amount of achievements to accomplish in this game!
  • It's just so cute! - Everything, from the colorful levels to the beautifully animated pixel art, will make a cute and fun experience. You're gonna have trouble deciding your favorite character!

short_description: Suit up and sling some shells at sadistic, superpowered sci-fi slugs. Snag some secrets, suffer some shrapnel, and shoot stuff silly in this one-of-a-kind twin-stick shooter.

name: Kingdom Unwritten
short_description: "A heartwarming kingdom simulator + procedural story generator = make villager's life difficult, friendship betrayal, love entanglement, conflicts, join cults, overturn leaders, dragon dueling, turn villagers into animals, to create a beautiful ending." --- 10/10, anonymous.

about_the_game:
Game characters:
There are 12 characters and 12 talent skills in the game.

skill:
The talent skills can be switched at will, and a team of five people can be matched to take risks.
Each character can have up to 16 passive skills.
There are more than 30 passive skills to choose from. Each passive skill is suitable for different genres.
Players can match any genre they like.

Transgenic system:
When the character reaches 100, it can be reincarnated. Reincarnation will add a passive skill, up to 16 skills.
Reincarnation will also increase the character's attributes and the team's BUFF.

Equipment system:
This game does not set equipment according to character level. In its place is the rune system.
It is not limited by level and can still be used after reincarnation.

Combat system:
At present, the game has three different combat modes.
Ordinary ones are divided into 10 layers according to difficulty. The difficulty increases.
Lord, every kill will increase the difficulty.
Unknown creature has a lot of life. It takes a long time to kill.

about_the_game:
You will play as a pancake chef, on a never-ending snack cart, constantly making “chinese crepes” for the customers who come by, and getting ratings and ingredients.

First sprinkle some flour, beat some eggs, add some scallions, and finally add some toppings, spread some sauce, and a piece of authentic 'Jianbing guozi' is freshly baked!

Features

  • Cyberpunk art
  • Sensational music
  • Easy to play
  • Rich ingredients
  • Realistic cooking simulation
  • Most items on the snack cart can be interacted with
  • Immersive gaming experience

Story

In 2098, although the technology of the earth has “progressed”, human civilization has taken another path. The “humanism” spirit brought by the Renaissance was replaced by “technologism”. People believe that the development of technology will bring unlimited freedom and even create infinite possibilities. For example, the invention of electronic brains allows people to truly feel what is “imagination without boundaries”. The invention of electronic limbs and auxiliary body parts allows people to see and accept the death of God in religion and the birth of God in technology.

People have become accustomed to and enjoy letting technology dominate everything, from birth to death, from three meals a day to work and leisure, as long as they have money, they can live like gods. There has never been a kind of capitalism that makes everyone so firmly believe in the power of money. Money buys technology, and technology summons God.

Of course, the remnants of the old enlightenment’s “humanism” have not been extinct. They can always survive on the edge of cities and networks. In 2098, in New Dragon City of the American Federation, an organization called “Imune” removes identity chips for people for free, to get rid of the information control of the capital government union on individuals. At the same time, the advertising department of Pineapple Dragon, the largest company in New Dragon City, is hunting down “Imune”. The player-controlled “chef” is one of the leaders of “Imune”. According to the law designated by Pineapple Dragon and the government, such a thought criminal as “Imune” will be subjected to “thought deprivation” punishment, implanting brain invasion accessors for criminals, and providing some customers with special services-legal brain invasion (role-playing), to deprive thought criminals of their right to use their own brains.

Some thought criminals will act as cleaners on the outer walls of skyscrapers, some will be arranged as executioners for illegal violent organizations, and of course, there are also some low-stimulation occupations, such as some thought criminals will be assigned to snack stalls as stall owners. It should be noted that this service is different from the “Braindance” system used by ordinary customers. After all, BD is just a kind of “replay”, but this service provides a kind of “realest experience”. Customers can see in reality the consequences caused by their own actions.

In snack cart No. 98, players will invade into the brain of a former leader of the “Imune” organization, play as a chef, cook pancakes and get feedback from “customers”.
name: Cyber Puncake
short_description: Welcome to your favorite TV show “Goodies Everyday”. "BD Plus" that lets you live different lives in others’ brains. Be a gangster, a pineapple dragon boss, or a snack stall master. Come and watch the first part of BD Plus: Cyber Puncake, where you control the stall master to cook pancakes.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

name: Apocalypse Run!
short_description: Apocalypse Run... Apocalypse Fun! A Roguelike-Strategy-RPG with guitars and cats, and lots of car battles— and very little Florida.

name: Fireworks Frenzy
short_description: FIREWORKS FRENZY is a Small multiplayer fireworks game, with hundreds of fireworks and multiple maps, that tries to give you the experience and the feeling of the beautiful fireworks to blow up stuffs together.

about_the_game:
Welcome to Grapple League.

You'll soon embark upon a high-flying swinging adventure through several different worlds and levels to prove your skill against others in the League. Will you be able to conquer the various levels, reach the mountaintop and go beyond? Prove yourself as a master grappler!

Features
Five different worlds!

  • Ocean World! Every grappler's first world. Colorful tarp covered objects create intense obstacle courses!
  • The Canyon! The windy canyon makes for winding tight passageways and wide areas for free swinging!
  • The Mountain! Exceptional difficulty renders most grapplers unable to complete the daunting task of traveling vast distances and ascending to the peak. Prove yourself!
  • Space! Gravity is no longer down! This may get tricky quick!
  • The City! A foggy grey cyberpunk city where the fastest and only way through is by swinging across flying cars!


Swing in Style Gain Style by swinging and grappling quickly! Manage to get up to S-Style and you'll find boost plentiful!

Build Boost by building Style! Boost charges dynamically based on your speed and style while you swing!

Unlockable Boost Types!
The initial boost is incredibly handy, but some say they have found other boost types with significant advantages!

  • Base Boost. Jet yourself in the direction your facing! A grappler's staple.
  • Jump. A direct leap upwards. Exceptionally useful in some situations!
  • Glide. More useful than it seems. Dampen momentum in all directions except the one you're facing!
  • Bounce. Difficult to master, but improbably handy. An isosphere that reflects anyone who impacts it perfectly. Also grappleable. Nice.
  • More? Rumor has it there was another, hidden and lost to space!

Endless Mode
Master all the courses available? Get some distance in this endless run where instead of time, distance is your foe.


The Ultimate Test
With Steam Leaderboards enabled test yourself against your friends and the best of the best. Think you're the greatest? Prove it!

Swing and fling yourself into the finish!
name: Grapple League
short_description: Utilize skill to swing yourself through multiple jaw-dropping levels in this time-trial, swinging, physics based platformer. From oceans to canyons to mountains and beyond take your swinging prowess across the world in obstacle filled levels. Swing into the finish. Set new records.

name: A Heart Sprouting Pink A Memory Burning Red
short_description: Tilia, who turns 20 this year, is a bit of a tomboy. One day, while Tilia was working as per her master's orders, a mysterious man appeared in front of her. As one of the servants, he will serve in the royal palace of the Kingdom of Birbarad. Will the truth behind Tyria's parents' death be revealed?

name: The Artist
short_description: Do you feel good where you are? Some people do, some don't even if they have everything in the world. Does love fix that sort of feeling, even if such feelings feel so hard to grasp and such love could be toxic to yourself? What is a loving muse to the artist who paints them?

name: The Red
short_description: Debt-ridden and desperate? Get out of the red and into The Red! Join the Red Horizons on Mars as an Extraction Security Associate and pay off your debts by defending your way to wealth in this ironic first-person-shooter/tower-defensy/existential-horror adventure!

about_the_game:
EndlessEx is a jumping/flying/casual mini-game with unlimited credits that will make our boring lives even more boring!

The screen you see is the whole game, with no upgrades or levels, and the way you do it is by tapping the keyboard in a continuous rhythmic manner: W.

Of course, the makers also thoughtfully added the ability to switch backgrounds for players to make it less monotonous, using keyboard :D. Of course, this will not affect the progress of the game.

Conditions of Death:
1. The energy bar state disappears, i.e. loses power, so collect as many batteries as possible to maintain energy.
2. Avoid hitting the exclamation mark! (very obvious hint).

Points Requirements:
A successful crossing between exclamation points earns one point (even if you don't get an energy battery).

Please note: there is no upper limit to the maximum score!

Have fun!

about_the_game:
Danse Macabre: A Revolutionary AI-Powered Text RPG - Immerse Yourself in a World of Intrigue, Deceit, and Mystery


Embrace the Future of Gaming with the World's First AI-driven RPG - Available Now for FREE on Early Access!

🔥 Welcome to Danse Macabre, a groundbreaking text-based RPG where every NPC is powered by state-of-the-art Artificial Intelligence, ChatGPT! Experience the thrill of true interactive storytelling as each character comes to life with dynamic, unique responses to your every words. Are you ready to dive into an immersive world of deception, danger, and dark secrets?

🕰️ Unravel a gripping tale set in the 14th century as you investigate the chilling assassination of Duke Friedrich II von Habsburg. Step into the shoes of a brave Inquisitor and navigate the shadowy halls of the Abbey of Neuberg, Austria, where evil lurks around every corner and the devil hides in the details.

💬 Engage in captivating conversations with NPCs that adapt and react to your choices in real-time. Utilize the power of ChatGPT to uncover secrets, and outwit your enemies. The possibilities are endless!

🎮 Early Access - Be among the first to experience the future of gaming! As an early access title, only the first chapter is currently available, with 8 more acts coming soon. By playing, you're helping to shape the evolution of AI-driven gaming and supporting an innovative community of developers.

💰 FREE & Open Source - Danse Macabre is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of gaming, which is why it's absolutely FREE and open source! Access the source code on github and join the growing community of players, developers, and enthusiasts.

🎲 From Tabletop to PC - Adapted from the beloved tabletop RPG Prima - Danse Macabre, also free and open source. Experience a seamless transition from the physical world to the digital realm as you embark on an unforgettable adventure.

Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to become part of gaming history. Download Danse Macabre today and immerse yourself in a world where the line between game and reality blurs, and your choices truly matter.

Join the revolution - Try Danse Macabre now! 💀💀

Note : This game is not related in any way to the Danse Macabre collection by Big Fish Games
name: Danse Macabre AI Text RPG
short_description: Danse Macabre: A Revolutionary AI-Powered Text RPG - Immerse Yourself in a World of Intrigue, Deceit, and MysteryEmbrace the Future of Gaming with the World's First AI-driven RPG - Available Now for FREE on Early Access!

Hide from the watching eyes, go over the fire pits. Run over platforms that are rebuilt every time. Every new day, you will strive to rise to the top of the leaderboard and you will want to be the best of that year.

ONLINE RACE

SQUBE BIRD!

You should definitely try this game that is not complicated, does not tire the eyes, is relaxing, completely original.

During their time in jail, one of them was a witch who casted a spell to shrink many police officers to the size of an ant. short_description: ArchiHexago is a casual puzzle game which takes inspiration from match-3 genre and takes it one step further. Each tile type has unique pattern which you need to match in order to gain points. And each level has different tile sets and obstacles to give you a variety of challenges.

name: Atom☭grad
short_description: A linguistic detective game. Decrypt the Soviet computer to prevent total nuclear annihilation.

name: InfiniPicross 3
short_description: InfiniPicross 3: The Conclusion of the InfiniPicross series! Faster and more complex procedural puzzles (as well as better looking), even more puzzles, a smooth interface built on previous improvements, easy to tweak themes and a very easy built-in puzzle editor.

name: Mystic Mischief
short_description: Fly as Mammon the chaotic thieving bird as he attempts to achieve the biggest heist of his life. Poop, caw, and steal your way through his adventures. Avoid the dangerous dragons as they try to keep you from stealing their treasures.

name: Sex Simulator - Gym Girls
short_description: An interactive sex simulation game with visual novel elements, with realistic looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of a sexy lesbian gym trainer who just loves to get kinky with her female clients during the late workout sessions.

name: 百日行 Hundred Day Journey
short_description: In this game, you will play an exile who has lost his memory, exploring an unknown world. Cultivate randomly generated characters or "reincarnators" with storylines in the game to find ways to escape this world.

name: Absolute Skat for Windows 11
short_description: Absolute Skat for Windows® 11 comes with an extensive game evaluation, intelligent opponents, voice output of the players and much more.

about_the_game:
Welcome to Borefest. The most boring game ever made.

Do you hate having fun? Enjoy torturing yourself with lackluster puzzles, dialogue that tries WAY too hard to be funny, and/or graphics "drawn" by someone who can't draw? Well, you've come to the right place...

Borefest is the most boring game in the world, and in it, you'll be waiting in line at the post office, answering questions during a workplace safety meeting, serving customers during a VERY slow shift - basically, all the most tedious things in life are in this game...

Only those with brave enough souls and the most tenacious spirits can endure:

  • - 6 "mini"games that each span upwards of 30 minutes
  • - An unlockable 'hard mode' that makes those "mini"games EVEN worse
  • - A soundtrack comprised of royalty-free 'Kevin Macleod' music
  • - Extremely long loading screens
  • - Dull gameplay mechanics that include: waiting around and pressing one button, QTE's, quizzes.
  • - Unskippable dialogue

Don't buy this game if you enjoy having fun - if you want to experience the most boring things life has to offer and try to conquer them in an extremely anti-climactic fashion, this "game" is for you!

You'll have the life sucked out of you as you visit: the post office, a fast food restaurant, the A&E waiting room...

You'll meet moderately humorous characters such as: a creepy clown, your boring boss, an obsessive stamp collector...















...Honestly, just go play something else.
name: Borefest
short_description: "Why would you waste your time making this? Couldn't you have made something fun instead? Games are supposed to be fun..." - The Game Developer's Dad

name: Squid Commando
short_description: Squid Commando is an action-packed, classic arcade run & gun game that can be played solo or in co-op.

name: Please Be Kind To The Chickens
short_description: A serious 3d puzzle adventure about a yeti kidnapped by aliens and some unruly chickens.
steamspy_name: Please Be Kind To The Chickens

name: 丧尸收割者
short_description: This is a shooting game withTPS and RPG. When the devil returns to our world, we will resist, enter the game, become heroes, and use guns to fight against enemies. Players will useguns to fight against various monsters in randomscenes, and strengthen themselves with the items dropped bythe monsters.

name: Super Bear: Hunt for the lost beer
short_description: Enemy Spider and his army has robbed Super bear beer bottles, so now you have to kill enemies and big spider boss to save beer bottles.
steamspy_name: Super Bear: Hunt for the lost beer

name: Phantom Thief Effie
short_description: Join Effie, the Legendary Phantom Thief, as she battles an evil organization to save her peaceful town. Wield magic, infiltrate, and confiscate dirty money on naughty and thrilling missions to reclaim the stolen peace!

about_the_game:
BTDB is a 2D puzzle platformer game that will leave you truly feeling like a delivery bot.

The future is now, all delivery companies have opted into automated delivery services. YOU are a part of that service, a mere tool at the hands of a giant delivery company.

As B-B0, the Delivery Bot, your responsibilities are :

  • NAVIGATING LEVELS, PUZZLES, AND TRAPS TO SAFELY GET FROM POINT A TO POINT B.

    delivering packages won't be easy, there's always gonna be something in your way...

  • DELIVERING YOUR DESIGNATED PACKAGES AS FAST AS POSSIBLE

    time is money, no one likes a late delivery. impress your customers by delivering their package right on time.

  • GETTING RID OF YOUR COMPETITION

    you will be the greatest delivery bot there is! even if that means ridding of all your competitors.
name: B-B0 The Delivery Bot
short_description: A 2D puzzle platformer where you play as a robot whose sole purpose is delivering packages on time! Your package is your only means of defense and attack, use it wisely to navigate levels and reach your goal, like a good little delivery bot :)

name: Project Arrow
short_description: Project Arrow is a 2D platformer game with puzzle environment elements. The game follows the story of an archer cat trying to find its way back home in a strange and mysterious world.

about_the_game: Journey across the Scorched Sea, utilizing fluid environmental movement systems and abilities to defeat a cosmic threat that devoured the sun. Numerous hazards push combat to be adaptive and play off the environment to create endless ways to navigate the world and dispatch foes.
detailed_description: Journey across the Scorched Sea, utilizing fluid environmental movement systems and abilities to defeat a cosmic threat that devoured the sun. Numerous hazards push combat to be adaptive and play off the environment to create endless ways to navigate the world and dispatch foes.

about_the_game:
As unknown viruses spread, human civilization has fallen from grace. At the intersection of the old and the new world, you are the Commander in this doomsday that marks the fall of the old and start of the new. Crossing this threshold to enter the new world will be a very challenging task. But don’t worry, you are not alone in this fight for survival.

Zombiflux: Sleepless War is a modern zombie apocalypse strategy game. In this brand-new zombie-themed SLG game, you can explore the map, expand territories, and battle to survive in a world of rampant zombies and smoldering forces of chaos. As the Commander, you have a crucial mission to lead the Survivor Camp and fight together with other Survivors to live.

▶ Survive the Zombie Horde ◀
While the humankind is falling apart, you will thrive to win every future battle in the doomsday. Build, upgrade, and expand your own army into an invincible force. Zombies are everywhere attacking in endless hordes. This power will help you survive. Survivors also want more than just surviving. They can be as dangerous as zombies. You’ll need the power to fight against them too. Every victory will push you further on the path of survival.

▶ Build Your Base ◀
Survive first to rebuild human civilization. Build your base from scratch to make it safe and stable. When doing this, you need to manage all resources to maximize productivity of the base and enhance the defense system to prepare for future attacks both inside and outside the wall. This is not just any base. It is your home, Commander. Please protect it!

▶ Real-Time Strategy ◀
During a horde attack, you can be ambushed at any time. But no worries, March forward! As the Commander, you need to deploy different heroes strategically so that they can break through the siege of the hordes. Only those with good tactics can survive! Use your strategies to survive in this world full of zombies!

▶ Unite with All Survivors ◀
Hearing "you are not alone" from someone in the doomsday is heartwarming yet somewhat daunting. Meet other survivors and build an alliance. But remember, choose your allies carefully. A friendly environment and a decent leader of the alliance will help you grow better. Or, you can become the leader yourself to forge a powerful civilization in this deadly jungle. Be careful of survivors lurking in unknown places. After all, human nature is unpredictable, especially in the doomsday when old rules don’t work any more.

▶ Explore the Map ◀
In the doomsday, this vast land is no longer in the hands of human beings. But humankind cannot be chained between those high walls! You need to climb over the walls, investigate, explore, and fight to get more food and resources for the base or even save other Survivors. In this wasteland, you will also encounter unusual challenges. Use strategies and the power of your army to conquer them one by one. Commander, do you have the will, the commitment to bringing back human civilization to its former glory?

short_description: Survive and create your own civilization!

name: Marine Glory
short_description: Marine Glory is a single player sailing looting adventure. Find treasures, buy and upgrade new ships and explore multiple universes.

name: Tavern of Empire
short_description: Tavern of Empire is a story role-playing game. It has a turn-based action system. As a spy from a different country, you are sent to clean up monsters in a town. Thanks to graphics and music, you can play calmly or ambitious.

name: Through the Mist
short_description: A terrible disease known as the Blight is spreading across all four corners of the world. Without a cure, he who is afflicted by it, is doomed. As the Lighwielder, Edan must now find it's origin and cause and put it to an end. He is people's last hope.

name: Athena's Revenge
short_description: Two sisters venture into Hell to rescue Medusa who is being held captive by the goddess Athena. To get to Athena, they have to defeat three powerful Demon Lords and an army of demonic creatures.

name: Task Force 9
short_description: Get ready for Task Force 9 - the VR game that puts your combat skills to the test. Take down enemies using force or stealth while controlling your AI partner. Use cover, explosives, rappelling, wall breaching, and ambushes to survive. Sharpen your situational awareness in close-quarters combat.

name: Neve
short_description: Neve is a non-linear interactive fiction in which your decisions can completely change the course of story. Manage your team, race against time and unravel the mysteries surrounding your ship's crash in this suffocating retrofuturistic thriller that will have you hooked from the first second.

about_the_game:
Backrooms: Lost Place

A single-player adventure horror game based on the Backrooms universe. The game combines puzzle, adventure, and horror mechanics. Dive into the fascinating and mysterious atmosphere of the Backrooms universe, playing as a student who accidentally finds himself in the Backrooms.

Procedural generation

Most of the levels in the game have procedural generation elements, which adds an element of replayability and interest to the playthroughs

Idea

The game is not similar to other backrooms projects, as the game has no goal to scare you. There are elements of horror in the game, but the main idea is to explore and immerse all of us in our favorite world of backrooms. The game has a lot of puzzles and emphasis on visual aesthetics.
name: Backrooms: Lost Place
short_description: Single-player horror game based on the backrooms universe. Your task is to pass levels, puzzles and try not to die during all this.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Czech, Japanese, Serbian

about_the_game:
"Heroes of Spyria" is a classic JRPG-style game that will take you on an epic adventure across the world of Spyria. Join the brave trio of Madilyn, Hiro, Winter and a colorful cast of supporting characters as they embark on a dangerous journey to save the world from the evil organization known as LEGION. Using turn-based combat mechanics reminiscent of classic Final Fantasy games, you'll engage in exciting battles against hordes of enemies as you level up your characters and unlock powerful new abilities.

Drawing inspiration from classic NES/SNES games like Chrono Trigger, Final Fantasy, Lunar Silver Star and Legend of Zelda, "Heroes of Spyria" is a nostalgic trip down memory lane for any fan of retro gaming. Featuring 5 chapters, over 20 hours of game-play, side-quests, achievements and hidden secrets, you'll be immersed in a world filled with magic, adventure, and peril. As you level up and progress through the game, you'll uncover more of the lore and secrets of Spyria and discover LEGION's true agenda.

Set in the fictional land of Spyria, the game features three unique kingdoms and a host of colorful characters to meet along the way. From the bustling streets of the eternal city of Ivalace to the dark depths of abandoned ruins lost to antiquity, the world of Spyria is waiting for you to explore. It's a journey that is sure to capture the hearts of classic JRPG fans everywhere!

It's a journey that is sure to capture the hearts of classic JRPG fans everywhere!

name: Retro Rocket Raiders
short_description: An old school fast action twin stick shmup, featuring more than 20 weapons that you can equip your ship with and 30 different enemies

name: Mayhems World
short_description: Mayhem's World, a fighter game, a adventure game, a relaxing game, a farming game. Play how you want in Mayhem's World!

name: Minesweeper Madness
short_description: The classic puzzle game with modern quality-of-life improvements and features! Enjoy High Scores, Intuitive and Convenient Controls, Alternate Game Rules, Infinite Game Boards, and Deeply Customizable Appearance!

name: Infernal Apocalypse: Rise of the Underworld
short_description: The first online Strategy game based in Hell. As a low-rank demon, you and your friends build your own kingdom, manage slaves and resources, fight hordes of demons, and rise up the ranks until you meet Satan himself. After all, our eternal damnation is certain, so why not practice beforehand?

developers: Sweet Dreams Studio, Marion Denmat, Guillet Anthony, Sylvain Kauffeisen, Manon Liénart
name: Des racines et des graines
short_description: A garden game where you will explore a calm and peaceful island. Gather some seeds from the vegetation and re-plant them close to each other to get hybrids. Day after day, you will cross-breed the plants to create some new ones, to finally find and restore the ultimate tree: Yggdrasil.

about_the_game:
Originally released in 1983, this game for the Commodore VIC-20 from prolific developers Imagine saw players take on the role of busy store detective Barney Bootlace. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version.

Gameplay

Appease the shop manager by running around the shop floor dealing with various problems: returning dropped items to the lost property office, guiding lost children back to their parents, busting shoplifters before they get away, or even deal with planted bombs!


This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including:

  • Saving/loading the game at any point
  • Support for most modern game controllers
  • Full control remapping
  • Image scaling and smoothing options
name: Catcha Snatcha
short_description: In this VIC-20 game from 1983, busy store detective Barney Bootlace must appease the shop manager by running around the shop floor dealing with various problems, from dealing with lost property and children, to apprehending shoplifters and even dealing with planted bombs!

name: IF: Walls could answer
short_description: What if walls could answer? Whatever that means, you’ll explore the memories of a neurotic scientist resolving puzzles that could help his mental state, discovering different endings of his life.

name: Cooking Pix
short_description: CookingPix is an online cooking card game for 1-5 players.You can enjoy simple yet deep strategy building and bargaining.You can play many times in a short time, so even people who don't have time can enjoy it easily!

about_the_game:
Gobbo's Gambit is a stealth action game about a sentient NPC that decides he no longer wants to perform his minion duties. He must think with his mind as he navigates the treacherous dungeon he once guarded.

Jump, climb, crawl, push and knock enemies unconscious in this fantasy dungeon extravaganza! Players must meticulously outsmart their foes, or succumb to their brute force power. Can you escape the dungeon?

This game includes:

-Beautiful 3D Fantasy dungeons
-Fully immersive character animation
-Strategic stealth gameplay
-2 full levels of awesomeness!
name: Gobbo's Gambit
short_description: Jump, climb, crawl, push and knock enemies unconscious in this fantasy dungeon extravaganza! Players must meticulously outsmart their foes, or succumb to their brute force power. Can you escape the dungeon?

about_the_game:
Trouble has fallen upon King Joy. The Prince, his only heir, has been kidnapped. But that's not all, The Queen has also been transformed! The mysterious villain that is responsible for these nefarious acts was last seen heading into the wildlands of Zana. Play as Fantastic Fania and track down this elusive agent of chaos, rescue The Prince, save The Queen and save the day!

Gain new abilities and power ups along the way. Including but not limited to:

-A grappling hook.

-Special attacks and acrobatic skills.

-Healing Potions!

Conquer 13 levels. Among these are 2 top down shooter levels, because sometimes flying through the air with a jetpack is exactly what's needed.
name: Phantom of Zana
short_description: Swing, dash, slide and slice your way through this retro style 2D side scrolling platformer! Blast, hack and slash your opponents or bounce off their heads! Power up Fantastic Fania to finally confront the Phantom of Zana!

about_the_game:
SIZIF is 3D endless runner in a glowing and kind of abstract environment wich was originally designed to pass time while waiting on a computer.

While the sphere will be rolling forward by itself and increase it speed, you'll have to moove sideway and jump to avoid osbtacles.
You'll get the possibility to take some risks and charge bonuses during a run. It could make your run easier for a small amount of time with a double jump for example or double the score you generate.

During a run you generate a score. Your best score is automatically upload at the end of the run.
You could see it on 2 leaderboard, one with only your contact and a global leaderboard.
name: SIZIF
short_description: SIZIF is a 3D endless runner where you simply control a ball and avoid obstacles to generate score for the longest time possible and climb the leaderboard. During a game you can unlock bonuses to either make your run easier or generate more score.

name: Forklift Fury
short_description: Forklift Fury is an exciting and hilarious online and local party game that pits you and your friends against each other in an OSHA-violating forklift battle. Drift, smash, and fork ‘em up!

name: Succubus's making lunch
short_description: Everyone loves to eat, and succubus is no exception! Our succubus loves to eat and has an inhuman appetite! Help her cook before she eats you! 😈

about_the_game:
Embark on an eerie journey into the depths of the Backrooms, a mysterious realm inspired by the famous creepypasta. Gather up to three friends and brace yourselves as you navigate through 100 procedurally generated rooms, each presenting new challenges to overcome. Progress through haunting chapters drawn from the darkest corners of the Backrooms lore and see if you can survive the madness that awaits.

Survive the Endless Labyrinth

Brace yourself for an otherworldly challenge as you traverse an ever-shifting maze of rooms, twisted and distorted in a nightmarish fashion. No two playthroughs are alike, ensuring a fresh and unpredictable experience every time.

Cooperative Exploration

Team up with friends in intense multiplayer co-op gameplay. Utilize proximity chat to communicate and coordinate your actions as you unravel the secrets of the Backrooms. Support each other in moments of terror and strategize to overcome the sinister entities that lurk within.

Fearful Entities

Beware the malevolent entities that roam the Backrooms. Each with their own distinct behavior and abilities, they will stop at nothing to ensnare unwary explorers. Only through cunning, resourcefulness, and cooperation can you hope to survive their relentless pursuit.

Unlock Dark Chapters

Progress through the game's spine-chilling chapters, each inspired by the haunting lore of the Backrooms creepypasta. Descend further into madness as you delve into the sinister origins of this twisted realm.

Unearth Mysteries and Gather Resources

Scour each room for vital resources and hidden clues that will aid your survival. Solve cryptic puzzles, discover hidden passages, and uncover the secrets that lie within the labyrinthine corridors.

Unsettling Atmosphere

Immerse yourself in an atmosphere dripping with suspense and unease. Haunting ambient sounds, dim lighting, and eerie visuals combine to create an unforgettable and immersive horror experience.


Prepare to confront your deepest fears and venture into a nightmare realm like no other. Will you conquer the abyssal depths of the Backrooms, or be forever lost in its inescapable grasp?

Backdoors is the ultimate test of courage, teamwork, and sanity. Can you survive the relentless horrors that await within?
name: Backdoors
short_description: Enter the twisted realm of the Backrooms. Explore 100 procedurally generated rooms, and survive with up to three friends in intense co-op action. Unravel the secrets, beware of lurking entities. Find the way out or become lost forever in the depths of the Backrooms.

name: Mars Survivors
short_description: Ready to tackle the challenge? On Mars, confront countless mutated creatures and mechanical monsters. Choose survivors, weapons, and skills wisely for diverse battles. Employ precise shooting, agile dodging, and strategic use of props and skills to fend off enemy attacks.

name: Vegangsters
short_description: Embark into a deck-building roguelike where real-time action will challenge your reaction and strategy skills. Face the deadliest criminals in intense turn-based combat, where each card defines the pace of the battle and save the city from the Vegangsters!

name: Yume Memory
short_description: A relaxing Match Two Minigame featuring Anime Characters from the Works of Yume Creations.

name: Nephilim
short_description: "Nephilim" is a single-player social deduction game to reveal the heretics who have infiltrated the congregations. Throw down God's judgment on the fools who rebel against the omniscient machine god "La Place".

name: Hoop Land
short_description: Experience the ultimate hoops sim in Hoop Land, a retro-inspired basketball manager with modernized gameplay and fully customizable leagues. Build your legacy, lead a dynasty, or simulate endless seasons from college tournaments to championship trophies!

about_the_game:
A back alley that became the setting for Hong Kong noir in the 1980s



Genre : Topdown Shooter

I came here to keep my loyalty with my brothers and to seek revenge.

Hongkong Noir is set in the dark backstreets of Hong Kong, where players fight as members of the Hong Kong mafia against evil forces trying to rule the city. This game is once the player dies, they have to start all over again.
The game captures the noir atmosphere of Hong Kong and offers immersive gameplay.

It is a game that can be played in a short amount of time, provides a leaderboard, and is a game that can be continuously challenged.

If you enter the YouTube link, you can use the music of the noir genre you want to hear as the background music for the game.

It is a game where you move with the keyboard and shoot with the mouse.
name: HongKong Noir
short_description: This is a Hong Kong noir action game from the 1980s.

*languages with full audio support

name: Ironsand
short_description: Ironsand is a dynamic FPS rogue-lite. Your team lands on a desert planet of Long-eared to protect them from the followers of the Cult of the Iron God. Your opponents will be cyborgs, alien beetles and huge Titan combat robots

about_the_game:
Sandy's Great Escape is a charming, pixel art puzzle game with nostalgic box pushing mechanics and a forgiving rewind mechanic. Death is never the end for Sandy, as you magically respawn and use your shell to help navigate through different obstacles.



Each of the four themed worlds adds unique mechanics to the field, giving even the most crabby player hours of entertainment with 100 levels in their claws.



And if thats not enough...

Perfect levels and earn currency to spin at the "Gachapon-d" to win over 40 unique skins!



Snap to the beat with the nostalgic chiptune soundtrack!



And did we mention CRAB FACTS?



The game was originally created for the SD IGDA 2020 Game Jam, and won 1st place. Sandy's Great Escape was created in GameMaker.

about_the_game:
Dinosaurs escape from human captivity and face human tank attacks in the city. Players control dinosaurs to fight back against human tanks;

Players will get points for destroying tanks. If the points are satisfied, they will get a state of 100% body size enlargement. This state is immune to damage and lasts for 10 seconds. Players can complete the level by destroying the specified number of tanks within the specified time.


Instructions:
Kill 60 tanks to win
Steering: left handle up/down/left/right
Movement: Right handle left/right
Attack: Right handle trigger button
Menu: handle menu key

about_the_game:
Light Bearers 2 is a fast paced game that pits an evil Shadow against a party of clumsy, goofy Light Bears.

The Light Bears try to evade corruption, surviving until the Pool of Light appears and they can escape. A bear that gets tagged, can still be saved during their transition phase. If they are not, that bear joins the Shadow in their hunt of the Light Bears!

Better and Bigger

Light Bearers 2 builds off of its predecessor, all systems have been redesigned from the ground up to support a richer gameplay experience.

Sporting the world's best hide and seek movement mechanics, Light Bearers 2 has raised the skill floor so that anyone can jump in and become a parkour master!

  • After 7 years of lessons learned, each Shadow has been remastered to best support their design and fun factor.

  • New Shadows added.

  • New maps with unique mechanics to spice up your Friday nights.

  • Many Light Bearers 1 maps returning with modifications and updates.

  • New Body system, each body now gives you unique abilities as a Light and Shadow bear.

  • Reworked mechanics that offer hiders much more freedom.

  • Familiars that give unique passive abilities.

  • and much much more!

Same Fat Bomb Humor

The game is still goofy, punny, silly, dumb and slightly offensive.

If you've played our other games, you know what to expect!

Replayability

Light Bearers 2 introduces a new system called Chaos Infusions to make every round feel special.

Between the Chaos Infusion system, body abilities, familiars, remastered and new shadows, new and returning maps, there is a ton of replay-ability value to keep you engaged for as long as you need.

No Renting Us Your Wallet

Light Bearers 2 is a free to play game, this allows a large chunk of the game to be experienced without ever having to pay anything. One DLC, One Payment forever.

Servers are hosted by players utilizing Steam's awesome network. This means that even if we were to vanish in an unprecedented rapture, you'd still have access to the game to play with your friends or enemies!

short_description: Light Bearers 2 is a fast paced hide and seek, asymmetrical multiplayer horror game. A Shadow is trying to corrupt all Light Bears. The Light Bears must use their movement and cunning. To keep each other from becoming corrupted by darkness.

about_the_game:
• Build a maze before the battle begins! Be creative and find the best setup with the block cards in your hand.

  • Make good use of your limited wall blocks! Will you make the monsters take a longer route, or will you use the blocks to position your towers more strategically?

  • After the battle, add various runes to the block cards! Runes can enhance your towers, grant blocks special abilities, or even double their size!

    • Tower with various sizes: 1x3? 2x2? 3x3? Building powerful towers requires careful planning!

    • Poison Towers that Span Monster Paths: Instead of shooting, we pour poison directly on the enemies' heads!

    • Drone Towers that Track Enemies: Why wait for enemies to come? Attack is the best form of defence!

    • D20 Towers that Test Your Luck: Higher number equals higher damage! (And yes, there's the infamous CRITICAL FAILURE)

    • (...and a lot more!!)

    • Choose your character and fire source before starting your adventure!

    • Each run is unique with different maps, tower compositions, and mazes.

    • Collect new towers, block cards, or power relics during your journey.

    • Each battle grants you experience. Learn from various talents and become stronger for your next adventure!

short_description: Build twisting mazes with tetromino blocks and deploy unique towers in this engaging roguelite tower defense game!

short_description: The core gameplay involves interacting with NPCs to obtain game resources, joining factions, and recruiting or appointing generals to defeat other factions and unify the realm. The end goal is to challenge and defeat the final boss, completing the game.

name: Remnants of Dawn
short_description: A string of campus killings. A newly-turned vampire struggling to adjust. A monster hunter seeking answers. Worlds collide as Dante Jones and Nick Torres, both in danger of being accused of the crimes, team up to reveal the true culprit in this chilling supernatural horror visual novel.

about_the_game: Challenge your memory by playing against the clock, flipping two tiles at a time to find a matching pair. Be cautious of explosives, as finding one will disrupt your game. Utilize the radar to detect the locations of explosives or use clues to identify matching pairs. Additionally, a clock is available to grant you extra time. This game offers a variety of amusing characters and combinations for you to enjoy.

about_the_game:
Overview


"Sundown Survival" plunges you into an adrenaline-fueled top-down shooter experience set within a relentless post-apocalyptic world. Day and night aren't just time of day here, they are your life cycles, each with its own dangers and opportunities.

About this Game


Venture into a world lurking not just with zombies, but with human marauders as well. As daylight breaks, use the time wisely to craft gear, and build fortifications - assuming you don’t catch the interest of marauders or other survivors. Once the sun sets, be prepared for a nail-biting fight against an onslaught of zombies.

Gameplay


Survival in "Sundown Survival" demands strategic thinking and quick reflexes. Gather resources and craft whenever you can catch a peaceful moment. Level up, choose perks and fight bosses. The game offers a thrilling combination of survival, crafting, and top-down shooting.

Features


  • Top-Down Shooter: Navigate intense top-down shooting action that will keep you on your toes.
  • Day/Night Cycle: Learn to use the day for crafting and the night for survival. It's a brutal world that demands strategy, and the invaders will do everything they can to throw you off your guard.
  • Crafting System: Utilize resources to craft gear and build fortifications. Your survival depends on it.
  • Action RPG Elements: Every decision you make, every upgrade you apply matters. Build your character in the best way, from the gear and perks you come across. This is where survival meets action RPG.
"Sundown Survival" blends heart-pounding top-down shooting with an intense survival challenge. Will you survive to see the dawn of a new day?
name: Sundown Survival
short_description: "Sundown Survival" is a heart-pounding top-down shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Navigate an intense day-night cycle by crafting gear and fortifications during the day to fend off zombies at night. Survival meets Action-RPG: every decision, every upgrade matters. Can you make it till dawn?
