about_the_game:
The Farming Frontier is a relaxing farming adventure game where you can chop wood, mine ores, fish, grow crops, bake bread, and raise cattle at your own pace. Alongside the open-ended sandbox gameplay, the game also follows a light, linear story where your farming skills are key to overcoming enemies.

In this world, everything is connected.

To defend your frontier, you must train soldiers — but soldiers need weapons and a strong economy to survive. As the farmer, it’s your responsibility to manage and grow the economy that supports them.

First, you will need wood.

Chop trees and employ woodcutters to process logs into usable wood for constructing buildings. Some structures also require stone, so you’ll need to quarry rocks and refine them into building materials.

Expand your village by building a fishery, a bakery, and a mill to produce food for your growing population.

Your peasants need comfortable homes to rest and eat when they are tired and hungry. Keep their houses stocked with food to keep morale high.

Learn crafting to speed up production and unlock new tools and upgrades that make your frontier thrive.

short_description: This game was developed for those who are "very lucky", "like roguelikes" and "like beautiful girls" and fit these three elements. This game is your most coveted game. By the way, a cute girl has been waiting for you for a long time, so let's start the game!

about_the_game:
You won't last two hours playing this game!


—What's Carlos Klauss - Episode ZerØ about? Well, Carlos is quite a hassle to explain.
Is it a game? Well, yeah... but no.
Is it a Visual Novel, a Graphical Adventure, a point-and-click? Well, a little bit of this, a little bit of that, you know how it rolls.
Do I get to make my own choices? Well not really, but you still get to make them.
If we were to measure the freedom this game gives you, in a 1 to 10 scale, Carlos would be in lockup.
I wouldn't vouch for Carlos to any person disliking games in general. All the fewer recommendations for someone who does, in fact, enjoy them.
Because the essence of Carlos isn't a game... Carlos is...
—Hey, Chief, I only asked if this is the bus stop for the 87 line.
—Oh, sorry about that. No, not here, just around the corner.

Play Carlos Klauss - Episode ZerØ and unveil the tale of Carlos and his related (and maybe not so related) life occurrences, spinning the threads of this passionate attempt we call a story!



Features? Sure, have at you:
  • Humble, independent. The world's dimmest budget fund in the last 50 years.
  • You get to know Carlos the Mannequin in full spirit, have a little chit-chat, he's alright. You also talk to him in first person.
  • Varied sketches of different styles.
  • Cool little tunes.
  • Embedded with an included tutorial.
  • Straighter-lined than our Obelisk.
  • Based on real events.

Electronic game displayed via screen. Play with moderation.
name: Carlos Klauss - Episode ZerØ
short_description: Carlos Klauss - Episode ZerØ is a Graphic Adventure with Visual Novel elements which introduces you to the life and history of Carlos Klauss and his misadventures.

short_description: Your dog has been kidnapped, and that’s reason enough to kill everyone. Starboy Adventures is a run and gun collectathon where you kill monsters and rescue dogs on a quest for vengeance against the pigeon that stole your puppy.

about_the_game:
An unexplored world, with everything you need.

Survivors of a homeworld devastated beyond hope of restoration, you escaped into deep space, looking for a new planet to call home.

You discovered an unknown planet rich in resources and unique life forms.

Explore the planet, gather resources, and fight monsters to ensure your survival!




A breathtaking world awaits, filled with lush forests, towering mountains, crystal-clear seas, and mysterious ruins. Every corner of the planet holds secrets to uncover, daring you to explore its hidden wonders.



The planet is home to a variety of unique monsters, some lightning-quick, others airborne. Defeating them gives you materials, while trapping and capturing them allows you to tame them. Tamed monsters can be ridden as mounts, or bred with their own kind to bear offspring. Bringing them into your everyday life will make survival that much easier.



This vast open world of a planet requires you to be self-sufficient in everything, from food to weapons and equipment. You’ll start out with the bare mininum, but as you progress in the game, you’ll be able to craft building materials and combine them to create your own base! Further improve your base with facilities such as crop fields and fish tanks to increase your resources and expand your options.


PROJECT SURVIVAL allows you to enjoy multiplayer with more than one person over a network. Join forces to take down powerful monsters, or collaborate to explore the wide, wide world!
name: PROJECT SURVIVAL #Working title
short_description: PROJECT SURVIVAL is an open world anime-style survival crafting adventure that you can enjoy solo or with friends, featuring epic journeys, a deep crafting system, and monster taming and breeding - choose your own playstyle!

name: Adventure In Wachirawit World
short_description: The most mind-blowing RPG Maker game from Thailand. With unique storytelling, gameplay, and presentation. Created by an expert of the RPG Maker Thailand community. In this game, you will go on an adventure in Wachirawit's world. You must play this!!!

name: Phantom Wardrobe
short_description: Explore a mysterious land infested with ghosts and creatures to find out the truth about your past. Collect hats with unique powers that can help you overcome challenges and change the way you play. There are many to secrets to uncover and evil creatures to defeat.

name: Wrenched
short_description: Wrenched is a 3d bullet hell platformer where you dodge bullets and destroy robots with a giant sword! Explore a post-apocalyptic wasteland, meet its survivors, hijack vehicles and platform your way through dangerous areas! All to get parts from the guts of giant killer robots!

name: TD Tower Defense
short_description: Build your towers according to the enmey you are facing in the wave. Upgrade your turrets to increase range, damage or rewards. Each enemy wave will be random and increases in speed and damage resistance. How far can you go!

name: Bellus Battle
short_description: Enter the world of Bellus, a world where cute animals run wild in a epic battle for glory. Blast your friends with Shotguns, Rail guns, Zeus lightning bolts, Bombs, Portal Guns, and much more. This is BELLUS BATTLE. Be the last one standing!

about_the_game:
Welcome to the Burger Kombat Kitchen!

In this virtual kitchen, there is no logic – ingredients randomly appear on your table every couple hours. All you can do is hope that your culinary skills will be enough to figure out what can be prepared from them! Combine various ingredients to create new burgers and amaze everyone with your mastery of cooking from the most absurd and incompatible products.

The rarer the product, the cooler the burger.

Collect the rarest ingredients to make the most expensive burgers out of them. In the Burger Kombat's kitchen, the main indicator of a chef's mastery is the ability to make burgers that people would want to pay any amount of money for!

And remember the main thing – this game will not teach you how to cook delicious burgers, it will teach you how to cook EXPENSIVE burgers.
name: Burger Kombat
short_description: Assemble your most expensive burger from whatever you can find in the kitchen.

name: Ovine Replica
short_description: A fantasy visual novel featuring action, horror, and multiple endings to a tale of suspense, intrigue, desperation, and desire. Part I of The Enonoia Saga.

name: West Ride
short_description: Explore a mysterious world, conquer challenges in West Ride, an anime-inspired open-world driving game full of excitement and adventure.

about_the_game:
A Souls-Like game like nothing seen before


Trapped inside a Labyrinth constructed inside a demonic realm, our hero must face the deepest and darkest depths inside these twisted walls. Imbued with the power of magic, combat, and archery.

Will you escape the Labyrinth?


Fight your way against hordes of monsters while traversing through the twisted hallways.

Various Combat Styles


Use different styles of combat like one-handed sword & shield, bow & arrows, and magic! With many more combat styles on the way.

Level up through Gear!


Become stronger by wandering through the labyrinth and acquiring new weapons and armor.

Many updates on the way (Early Access)


This game is still in it's infancy and will continue to grow, for the time being it is in Early Access right now.
name: Labyrinth of Rage
short_description: Enter the Labyrinth... at your own demise.

name: Love Tavern 2: Beastmen Kingdoms
short_description: After your death due to a car accident, you have been summoned by the goddess to take care of a tavern in an Isekai world. Your job is to hire different staffs from various tribes and races to help out the business there, as well as build up room by room of the tavern to expand the business.

name: Adventures Of Squeak Bottoms
short_description: A rogue-like, RPG style game with tantalizing, comedic retro style gameplay. Face randomized level difficulty using procedural level design. Enjoy in-game economy to purchase upgrades and pets to help you on your journey to save your beloved pet from the evil clutches of Psycho Taiter!

name: RUSH: Only Up Multiplayer
short_description: Join this intense MMO 3D platformer! Jump, parkour, and compete against others in a race to the top. Challenge your buddies, beat them, smash records, and reach unprecedented heights! The only rule is not to fall!

name: Everwayne
short_description: Tactical deck-building roguelike with interactive arenas. Lead your party, create powerful synergies, uncover biome secrets, and shape the fate of your heroes on the path to hidden endings.

name: Top Gnome
short_description: A top down shooter where the only way to move and fight is with the recoil of your blunderbuss. Whirl through waves of garden-destroying pests to defend Bert's garden, strive to reach higher and higher scores and become the Top Gnome!

name: 末日公会 Apocalypse Guild
short_description: Apocalypse Guild is a challenging Japanese-style roguelike turn-based RPG that focuses on resource management and skill combos during adventures. Recruit, train, lead, and manage a group of heroes with unique personalities. Can you restore hope to humanity and fight against the impending apocalypse?

name: Fantasy TD Battles
short_description: Competitive, multiplayer Tower Defense with RPG elements. Upgrade your towers, cast abilities, choose your talents, and outlast your opponents against waves of enemies. May the best strategy win!

name: Air Hockey VR
short_description: The ultimate Air Hockey VR simulator

name: Match Gem 99
short_description: MatchGem 99 is a unique large-scale 3-match puzzle battle royale game where 99 players compete in real-time. Master the use of special blocks and gauge attacks to outlast your opponents and be the last one standing!

name: Future Weapon 2D
short_description: Future Weapon Online is an online space shooter where you can host a server for you and your friends to annihilate the universe together. Grab a gun, grab a spaceship, explore the universe, punch rocks, upgrade everything, and recruit a fleet of warships to wreck everything in your path.

name: Pest Apocalypse
short_description: Pest Apocalypse is a hyper-realistic post apocalyptic physics based pizza delivery action rogue-lite! Boost, jump, and drift across different maps in a bouncy pizza van. Pick up kooky passengers along the way and focus on the driving while they handle the shooting!

about_the_game:
WERK while you play as a young woman who has moved to a big city to pursue her dreams. However, life in the city is tough, and you quickly realize that making ends meet is no easy task. With rent, bills, and other expenses piling up, you must find a way to earn enough money to survive.



WERK resource management simulator where you have to balance your time, money, and energy to achieve your goals. You have to take on various jobs, each with its own set of challenges and rewards. You find work in places you would normally look past, on platforms that only the brave would consider, or take up a job at a club that no one talks about. The more you work, the more money you earn, which you can use to pay your bills, rent, and anything extra you may want out of life.

However, time is limited, and you need to be careful not to overwork yourself, or you'll run out of energy and won't be able to perform tasks effectively. Additionally, unexpected events and emergencies can arise, such as getting sick or dealing with a sudden financial crisis, which can impact your progress and force you to adapt to new challenges.



The ultimate goal of the game is to survive and thrive in the big city. You need to make enough money to pay your rent and bills, build up your savings, and eventually achieve your dreams. But it won't be easy. You'll need to work hard, manage your resources effectively, and make tough decisions along the way.

As you progress, you can upgrade your skills and equipment, allowing you to earn more money and take on more significant challenges. You can also interact with various characters, including other struggling individuals like yourself, who can offer you advice, support, or even job opportunities.

short_description: "WERK" - Dive into a gripping adult sim. As a determined woman, thrive in this sultry world. Balance survival, charm, and secrets under neon lights. Harness your allure and resilience, navigate trials, and dance your dreams to life in this city's hard-knocks hustle.

name: Cleric and Goblins
short_description: "Cleric and Goblins" is a VR action game where you rescue a Cleric from a dungeon filled with goblins. The procedurally generated dungeons offer infinite adventures, while the physics-based combat system provides engaging battles.

name: Polyglot Language Learning Quiz
short_description: Learn languages like a polyglot! Build vocabulary in French, German, Italian, Lithuanian, Polish, Portuguese, Spanish, Japanese, Chinese & Korean

name: Hot Beaver Camp
short_description: Enter a world of horror and suspense, in this RPG action game, fight to survive, rescue and escape alive from a camp in the middle of the forest.

name: Verve™
short_description: Welcome to Verve. You are RT-6, a member of LiminalLeap's highly-trained professional rescuing team. You are tasked to find the location of a small group of research scientists who sent out a high-level distress call from deep within the void of Verve. Good luck, the Verve is unforgiving.

name: Spirit of Meda
short_description: Spirit of Meda is a Pixel Art Adventure game, set in a world open for exploration and self-discovery. You will play as a young Traveller with the freedom to explore the vast and beautiful world of Meda at your own pace.

name: Challenge from the Black Cat
short_description: Old-fashioned block crumbling with a cat motif Simple controls allow a wide range of players from small children to adults! It also comes with an ending! The volume has been increased to play up to a total of 10 stages! Can you win the challenge from the black cat?

I am thrilled to announce that "God Within VR" is now available in Early Access!I have poured heart and soul into crafting this game, i recognize that there's always room for improvement. This is where my dedicated community comes in. I invite you to join me on this journey of refinement and evolution. By sharing your feedback, insights, and suggestions, you play a crucial role in shaping the final masterpiece. Together, we can elevate "God Within VR" to unprecedented heights, creating a game that resonates with players around the world. Dive in, share your thoughts, and let's make gaming magic together.

"God Within VR" is dedicated to regular updates and continuous improvement. My roadmap is packed with upcoming features and content. Stay engaged and excited, as our virtual adventure is set to grow and evolve.If you are interested in my game, please add it to your wishlist. It would greatly help us. Thank you for your support!

God Within Vr Overview:

Step into the mysterious world of God Within VR, a fully immersive souls-like adventure built for virtual reality. Summoned by an enigmatic woman to a realm ruled by demonic forces, you must embark on a perilous journey to save a world teetering on the edge of ruin.

Explore forgotten lands, face relentless foes, and awaken the divine power within you.

Key Features:

  • 🌀 Immersive Souls-like Combat: Designed for VR, every strike, dodge, and parry is under your full control. Precision, timing, and skill are your keys to survival.

  • ⚔️ Physics-Driven Battles: Engage in melee, ranged, and magical combat, powered by realistic physics and a dynamic ragdoll system that makes every encounter feel visceral and unique.

  • 👁️ Advanced Enemy AI: Fight intelligent enemies that adapt to your playstyle, keeping you on your toes at every turn.

  • 🧩 Puzzles & Exploration: Uncover ancient ruins, solve environmental puzzles, and discover hidden treasures and legendary artifacts scattered across a vast, mysterious world.

  • 🐉 Epic Boss Fights: Confront colossal, intricately designed bosses that challenge your strategy, reflexes, and courage.

  • 🌍 Deep World Immersion: From crumbling temples to cursed forests, each region is richly detailed and packed with secrets waiting to be unveiled.

You are more than mortal—you are a vessel of godly power. Conquer the darkness, master the unknown, and shape the fate of a forgotten world.

Are you ready to awaken the god within?

name: Chat Guess Games
short_description: Chat Guess Games is a community game for Twitch Streamers. A game for your community to battle it out and see who truly knows the most about video games!

name: Arcana Alchemia
short_description: 《炼爱秘仪》是由日本知名美少女游戏品牌Lump of Sugar（方糖社）制作的奇幻恋爱题材作品。本作由萌木原文武担当原画与角色设计，由业内多位剧本家携手担当剧本，人气声优天知遥、步莎拉领衔为本作女主角献声。曾荣获萌系游戏大赏年度声音金奖以及月间奖。

about_the_game:
Game introduction

This is a role-playing game. You are the CEO who manages a huge family business. You need to interact with the characters in the game (E key) and complete the tasks assigned by them (about 15 in total).
After completing the task, the market value of your company will be increased, so that you can recruit more employees; among them, there are four beautiful employees that you can develop intimate relationships with, help them solve problems in work and life
Difficulties and troubles, as the friendliness increases, they will slowly open their hearts to you...

Digging game

Be sure to check out our youtube channel and discord channel, there will be surprise content in it, the link is at the link at the bottom right of this page.
other link：

Game control

Use WSAD to control the character movement, mouse movement to control the viewing direction, use the E key to interact with people and objects in the game (dialogue, pickup, etc.), use the Tab key to open the task information bar, and ESC to open the game menu.

Role introduction

Lisa
As an assistant to the president, she is considerate, beautiful and generous. She usually likes to dress herself up carefully. If you have anything you don't understand, you can ask her.


Sakura
Sakura is a shy and shy girl. She just graduated from university and works as an administrative assistant. She doesn't know much about many things. You should take care of her.


Berry
Berry is an economic consultant from France. She is enthusiastic and unrestrained. She likes fitness and swimming. She will be of great help to the company's economic management. Please contact her.


Nana
Nana is still studying at the university, and now she is an intern at the company. The position is HR. Nana is lively and cute. She has a cute Cat at home to accompany her.


Luo
The CEO of a family business manages the operations of the family business, grows the company, and recruits more employees.

name: Psycholog

about_the_game:
Put your skills to the test with "Currently Unstable"! Transfer electricity from the Main Generator to the Power Core in this fun, challenging game. Test new components, connect them wisely, and see how electricity flows. Whether in a busy warehouse or a cozy room, watch everything light up.

Your goal is simple yet challenging:
transfer electricity from the Main Generator to the Power Core.



Test new components and understand how they work.



Strategically place objects on the map, connect and create circuits.



Over 20 Unique components to test and play with.



Various themes to add some color to our game.



Master the art of electrical transfer, overcome obstacles, and conquer each level to illuminate the Power Core and claim victory.
Are you ready to embark on this electrifying puzzle journey? Unleash the power of your mind and tame the currents in "Currently Unstable" today!

Features :

🟡 Extremely challenging levels across various difficulties .💡
🟡 Changing themes to immerse you into the atmosphere. 🏡
🟡 Numerous unique components that will make your head spin. 🤯
🟡 A soundtrack that will keep you relaxed while your mind is blown. 🎵
🟡 Level Editor (Coming soon...). 🏗️

name: AimRogue
short_description: AimRogue is the roguelike that tests your aim. Use your cursor to blast through waves of targets as you stack upgrades and create absurdly broken builds.

name: DCOP
short_description: Step into the gritty world of law enforcement in DCOP, a groundbreaking full motion video (FMV) police simulator that thrusts players into the heart-pounding action of a newly graduated police officer facing off against a ruthless criminal syndicate.

about_the_game:
Fulfill your epic destiny in mythic ancient China! Lead armies, wield magic, and put an emperor on the throne - or become the emperor yourself!

Tale of Two Cranes is a 750,000-word interactive epic historical fantasy novel by Michelle Balaban and Stephanie Balaban. It’s entirely text based, without graphics or sound effects, and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

The mighty Qin dynasty has fallen. As the land breaks into warring states, everyone must choose their side in the growing civil war.

Within this epic turmoil, you have been chosen to fulfill a grand but mysterious destiny. You are a Yǒngshì warrior, bonded with a heavenly spirit that grants you magical powers, and trained since childhood in the arts of battle. Your spirit is greater than any Yǒngshì has ever been: you are the mortal link to the Red-Crowned Crane, a mystical patron unique among all of the heavens…or so you thought. As war rises around you, you discover that there is a rival: Chan Ming, bonded to the Other Crane, is the only person who could ever match your power - or he might even exceed it.

Your mystical power can sway the course of the war and determine who will be the next emperor. Whose faction will you choose: Liu Bang, a charismatic lord beloved by the people; or Xiang Yu, a veteran of war respected by the military? Can you navigate the politics of the Imperial court, or will you gather your power in seclusion at your country estate? When China’s enemies encroach from the northern steppes, can you negotiate with them to call a truce - or even win them over as allies? Will you prove your loyalty to the new Emperor, or will you betray your allies at every turn? Uncover conspiracies of spies, trace the source of rebellions and mutinies, blackmail an Empress, marry into the Imperial family to become the power behind the throne - or even become the Emperor yourself!

And through it all, cross paths and swords with your rival, the Other Crane. Will you defeat him in an epic battle for the ages, or will you join him and create the most powerful mystical partnership the realm has ever known?

  • Play as male, female, or nonbinary; gay, straight, bi or asexual.
  • Find romance amongst your six closest allies or opt for an arranged marriage.
  • Choose from four magical classes: mystic, militant, sage or strategist.
  • Unravel the mystery of your mystical link to the Crane and discover the truth behind your unique connection to a fellow warrior.
  • Fight epic battles across a landscape inspired by the Warring States period of ancient China.
  • Build your personal power, customizing your estate to create a place specializing in military training, agriculture, spiritual enlightenment, scholarship, commerce, and more!
  • Master the Imperial court to propel yourself into the administration, nobility, or even to become ruler of all China!

Your destiny calls, and a new dynasty awaits!

about_the_game: Arcane's Watch is a Stealth Horror Puzzle game where you return to your hometown to search for your missing father, but upon arrival, you discover that the town is in shambles. Five abandoned houses, each with puzzles inside, contain clues to your father's whereabouts. And one neighbor, in particular, seems suspicious. Will you be able to unravel the mysteries of the town before it's too late?
name: Arcane's Watch
short_description: After Returning to your hometown in search of your missing father, you find that the town has been abandoned, search for clues around the town to find your father, but be careful, you aren't the only one there

name: Up or Lava!
short_description: Participate in only up races with 100 players. Fall down, and you'll burn in the lava! Play with friends or other players. The last survivor wins. Could it be you?

about_the_game:
This game consists of the best mini-games and item search scenes by DominiGames! This time we continue the detective's journey of investigating a series of star thefts from across the universes. We start with an interrogation of a man who we arrested previously. He won't budge, though, refusing to tell us who he works for. We have to make a truth serum to reveal the name of his employer: a mysterious King Jotar. We set out in search of him through many worlds, and it's no easy task: the clues to his current location are scarce and he is a powerful magician, too. Many lives are at stake. Perhaps even yours. Will you put an end to his devious scheme? Reach for the stars, gather your wits and intelligence for an unforgettable detective story in this pulse-pounded new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

🔍 Solve the case!
Ever wondered how the characters are doing since your shared adventures? Finish the main game to access a bonus chapter and help Caitlin, as she always does in every investigation you pursue, to find her lost lover!

🔍 Earn stars!
Solve mini-games and brain teasers to earn stars! At each stage of the game you need to earn stars to advance to the next level, an abundance of exciting puzzles will not leave anyone indifferent!

🔍 Enjoy the quest!
Explore a wonderful variety of locations to find all hidden items in order to advance in the investigation! Show off your detective skills and logic, save worlds and become a true hero!

about_the_game:
Embark on the grand saga of the Empire of Brazil in "Pedro of Brazil". Join historical heroes like Dom Pedro II, Dom Pedro I, Princess Isabel, André Rebouças, and Maria Quitéria, and fight for honor, duty, and destiny.

Uncover hidden abilities deep within Brazilian history, facing challenges from the Independence to the battles of the Paraguayan War. Withstand external threats and ensure the security of the largest empire in the Americas.

From Quasares Game Studio, this next-generation Action-Adventure brings to life the vibrant events of the Brazilian Empire.

Choose from various historical characters and navigate through conflicts, betrayals, and alliances on your journey across Brazilian lands and beyond.

In a vast country, filled with challenges and opportunities, your path will be shaped by the decisions you make. As the empire grapples with revolutions, political intrigues, and supernatural forces, the fate of the nation rests in your hands.

Developed with the powerful "Unreal Engine 5", "Pedro of Brazil" delivers a storyline true to reality, curated with the expertise of renowned historians. The game offers unparalleled freedom to explore and interact in a world that responds to your choices. The captivating and cinematic narrative brings characters to life in a unique way, creating an immersive experience in the heart of imperial Brazil.

The Empire of Brazil, a land of diversity and wealth, conceals secrets and offers profound exploration that challenges the player at every turn, with maps true to historical cities.

The gameplay of "Pedro of Brazil" is not just about combat. Assist the Abolitionist Association and Princess Isabel in freeing the enslaved, fighting for abolition and the rights of the oppressed.

Historical Characters: Dive into the journeys of legendary figures, each with their unique characteristics, motivations, and visions. Recruit them to fight by your side or experience each of their personal journeys.

Dynamic Combat: Rely on authentic combat techniques from the era, emphasizing strategy and insight. Challenge yourself across different difficulty levels and feel the impact of every decision on the battlefield.

A Cinematic Journey: "Pedro of Brazil" is more than a game; it's an experience. Relive the nation's historical events with intensity and passion.

Quasares Game Studio invites you to this experience. Step into history and leave your mark in "Pedro of Brazil".
detailed_description:
Embark on the grand saga of the Empire of Brazil in "Pedro of Brazil". Join historical heroes like Dom Pedro II, Dom Pedro I, Princess Isabel, André Rebouças, and Maria Quitéria, and fight for honor, duty, and destiny.

Uncover hidden abilities deep within Brazilian history, facing challenges from the Independence to the battles of the Paraguayan War. Withstand external threats and ensure the security of the largest empire in the Americas.

From Quasares Game Studio, this next-generation Action-Adventure brings to life the vibrant events of the Brazilian Empire.

short_description: Delve into the epic saga of the Brazilian Empire in "Pedro of Brazil". Master gunfights, swordplay, and hand-to-hand combat. Play as historic figures and immerse yourself in events like the Brazilian Independence and the Paraguayan War. Relive the glory and challenges of an era!

name: Hentai Maze
short_description: Welcome to the exciting world of "Hentai Maze", a world of mazes and puzzles where you play as a ball and must complete 48 levels to win! From simple mazes to complex puzzles, each level offers a unique challenge and riddles.

name: The Tower Of Tears
short_description: The Tower Of Tears is a non-linear Survival-Horror game that blends 3D metroidvania elements with light dungeon-crawling. Explore and fight or sneak your way through this menacing tower. You are NOT alone and danger is lurking in every corner. Use wisely every tools at your disposal to stay alive...

name: The Princess's Dragon
short_description: Traverse the winding dungeon of the dragon as you attempt to reverse the curse that has been set upon you by the cursed sword.

name: FarmCraft 2
short_description: Investigate an experimental Farm and stop the Global Vegetable Crisis!

name: HostageHub
short_description: Team up with friends in HostageHub, the ultimate wave-based hostage rescue experience. Fight, rescue, win cash, and repeat. Can you master the art of hostage rescue and financial balance?

about_the_game:
You are a Magister, a wizard with the unique ability to open portals to different parts of the world - Shards, shattered by the Cataclysm. As a Magister like you, you can pass through portals safely for yourself and your team.

MMO


The Shards, known to all Magisters, serve as an arena for thousands of players. Here you will find city-states where every decision you make will affect the future of the world. Take part in grand events that determine the fate of the universe. Build cities, manage them through diplomacy or force, and become a key player in this epic journey.

Single player game


Explore the shattered world and find maps that are only accessible to you. You'll encounter a wide variety of races and creatures, from lizardmen and skeletons to golems and various human ethnicities and cultures.
But don't just try to categorise these characters as good or evil. In Empolicy, each race and faction has its own interests and goals. The choice is yours: will you ally yourself with the orcs or prefer the path of a supreme necromancer? Or perhaps the idea of becoming an elven ruler appeals to you? Either way, your choices will affect the world around you and its inhabitants.
Complete faction quests, trade with them, hire their representatives into your squads, spy for them, fight with and for them.

Cooperative play.


If you can't do it alone, friends can help! Invite your friends to the Shards of the shattered world you find and work together to overcome the toughest challenges. Create new maps with the map editor and play with like-minded companions.

Seamless gameplay


You have a consistent pool of heroes and inventory throughout the game. Money earned in single-player quests can be used to hire troops on multiplayer maps and vice versa. A unique teleportation system allows you to move heroes between maps instantly, allowing you to respond quickly to current needs and strategic tasks.

Heroes


Warriors use brute force to solve problems.
Diplomats persuade and negotiate.
Scouts scout, weaken and kidnap.
Mages are capable of anything.

Economy


Build trade ports, mines, pastures and other buildings to extract important resources from your land.
In towns, you can build workshops to increase the range of goods available, from armor to jewelry. These goods will allow you to effectively equip your heroes and their troops.
Upgrade buildings and study new blueprints and production techniques to provide your subordinates with increasingly powerful improvements.

Join Empolicy, where every Magister is a key figure in the epic saga of rebuilding the world after the Cataclysm.

name: Sound of silence
short_description: "Sound of Silence" is a short isometric exploration and adventure game in which Jihad attempts to rescue his sister Marwa from under the rubble and, at the same time, find a way to avoid the airstrikes.

name: Ys X: Nordics
short_description: The story takes place in the northern sea Obelia Bay, a bay filled with countless islands of all sizes. Ys X: Nordics depicts a brand-new adventure in the northern sea Obelia Bay, featuring the young adventurer, Adol Christin, as its protagonist!

name: Hammer Dudes
short_description: Hammer Dudes is a casual 2D platform fighter. Dodge, throw and strike with your hammer to defeat your opponent and reach their final scene! Play on the couch with a buddy or even online in this competitve and crazy 1v1 game.

name: Golf Odyssey 2 DX
short_description: Golf Odyssey 2 DX is the ultimate relaxing and challenging experience in a 2D golf game. Hole out all holes to unlock new and challenging courses, improve your skills and become a real golf legend!

name: THE SOUL OF TOO BIRDS GAME
short_description: Destroy all art. Free the soul.
steamspy_name: THE SOUL OF TOO BIRDS GAME

name: My Douchey Boss Has a Gentle Twin Brother?! - BL Visual Novel
short_description: Kyle's new boss, Vincent, is mischievous and eccentric. One day, Kyle bumps into his boss after work and is surprised when his superior acts kind. Later, he finds out he'd actually met his boss' twin brother, Vernon. The brothers are estranged, but what happens when they fall for the same person?
steamspy_name: My Douchey Boss Has a Gentle Twin Brother?!

about_the_game:
Key Features


Old-School FPS Thrills: "Ground Wars KDR Alpha" pays homage to the golden age of first-person and third-person shooters. Relive the intense gunfights, fast-paced action, and diverse weaponry that defined the genre.

Tank Battles: Intense Third Persona Tank Immersion Experience and more importantly Fun Tank Warfare

Varied Arsenal: From revolvers and shotguns to an array of classic weapons, arm yourself with a diverse selection that harks back to the roots of FPS gaming. Hone your marksmanship and tactics to outmaneuver your opponents.

Alpha Stage and Beyond: Take an active role in shaping the future of "Ground Wars KDR." Your feedback and contributions are vital as we work to transform this homage to classic FPS gaming into a modern masterpiece.

Host Your Battles: Relive the LAN party spirit with server hosting. Create custom lobbies for you and your friends or jump into classic matches using our matchmaking system.

Multiplayer Mayhem: Whether you prefer solo tactics or cooperative team play, "Ground Wars KDR Alpha" offers a multiplayer experience that caters to your love for old-school FPS action.
developer: Robert Greene, Skip Munger, Robert Thompson, Maxwell Greene,  Scott Greene, Deborah Spruill
name: Ground Wars KDR Alpha
short_description: Dive headfirst into the classic era of first-person and third person shooters with "Ground Wars KDR Alpha". Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding action and diverse arsenal that defined the early days of FPS gaming. Engage in awesome multiplayer mayhem across multiple maps.
steamspy_developer: Robert Greene, Skip Munger, Robert Thompson, Maxwell Greene,  Scott Greene, Deborah Spruill

name: Virago: Reality New
short_description: Virago: Reality New invites you to a chilling adventure where you guide Willow, a survivor escaping abuse, through a world of terror. Master the torchlight, outwit relentless stalkers, and navigate between reality and nightmare. Can you ensure Willow's survival in this heart-pounding pursuit?

name: Monster Hero: Adventures
short_description: Monster Hero is an adventure RPG featuring companion gameplay, unorthodox puzzles, quirky boss fights, and a heartfelt story between humans and monsters.

name: Aquarium Land
short_description: Dive into the water and explore lands full of amazing animals that you can catch and sell in your very own shop! Become the best fish tycoon, let the tides lead you and rule your tile aquarium!

name: Dinolords
short_description: Dinolords is a realtime strategy game where you gather resources, build fortifications and command units in defence against the invading Danes with their arsenal of fierce dinosaurs. A shocking new age in medieval warfare.

about_the_game:
The Hell Inside is an action roguelike taking place in familiar places turned unfamiliar.

Waking up with nothing but a book as a weapon, you must battle through hordes of monsters that do not seem to have a place here.

The book is your weapon, and your only one. Your life depends on it.

The book starts out as as a weak projectile, but with the power of adding pages with upgrades written on them, the book can change and morph into what is needed. Upgrades range drastically with some playing a more supportive role such as a laser sight or a more offensive role, like changing your projectiles into knives.

New pages can also be written by finding ink during runs. These pages can be written before a run starts to have a chance of dropping during the next run.

Escape The Hell Inside
name: The Hell Inside
short_description: An action roguelike about escaping familiar places. Use your book to survive hordes of enemies and add new pages to the book to change how it works. Escape The Hell Inside.

name: Alien
short_description: 'Alien' is a cartoon style 2D platform jumping type game. Players need to control their characters to avoid the enemy and finally reach the end to win.

name: Late Amusement
short_description: Were they all just accidents, or were they? Late Amusement is a first-person survival horror from a small indie studio. You play as young student Liam Snow and survive for as long as you can to uncover the secrets of the theme park.

name: Stagelands – eternal defense
short_description: Defend your lands from crowds of enemies! Create a unique multi-floor defense of your kingdom! Arrange your troops wisely, use ancient magic, repel the onslaught of the enemy!

name: Ultimus
short_description: Introducing Ultimus: A Vision of First-Person Shooters, circa 1965.

about_the_game:
Ambusher is a tower defense game. Set your traps. Build your towers. Prepare your defense and survive until sunrise.

CARD SYSTEM



Create your deck.
Prepare a deck to defend by drawing random cards from the deck pool every morning.

TRAPS & TOWERS



Plan your defense wisely.
Build your traps and towers using your cards.

UPGRADE



Improve your castle. Strengthen it with new towers.

SURVIVE



Defend night after night.
If you manage to survive, you will be rewarded with new cards and abilities.
name: Ambusher
short_description: Ambusher is a tower defense game. Set your traps. Build your towers. Prepare your defense and survive until sunrise.

name: Sporeborn Dark
short_description: Break out of a maze surrounded by darkness, infested with growths and filled with hideous monsters. Explore the randomly generated locations of the experimental zone to find something that will help you delay your doom. A dark, atmospheric, scary top-down horror roguelike

about_the_game: Get ready to challenge gravity, jump like never before, and experience the exhilarating world of parkour from a new perspective. This is a casual game. This is the ultimate parkour challenge that will push your skills to the limit, traverse complex obstacles, climb towering mountains, and win. There was no turning back from the beginning; One mistake, you will fall all the way. Are you ready to prove your parkour ability and reach the top?
name: 猛男跑酷（Strong man parkour）
short_description: A parkour game, mainly for leisure, featuring the operation of a fierce man, using jumping and running walls to reach the pinnacle of life.

name: Crazy Castle
short_description: Crazy Castle is a crazy competitive party game where you smash your friends in chaotic Death-Matches and Mini-Games. Upgrade your character as you creep through a spooky castle of zany characters and unique levels to claim your crown!

name: Escape!
short_description: A sci-fi based puzzle platform strategy game. Third person action adventure where you need to use your wits and skills to overcome deadly obstacles and complete the goals. Can you Escape?

name: KumaWelt 1: Honey Frontier
short_description: KumaWelt 1: Honey Frontier is a 2D tower defense game, featuring towers like chess pieces and unique commanders. Build towers in chessboard-like levels to defend the honey depots from nightmare invasion.

name: Bumpkin and Sprout
short_description: Embark on an unforgettable co-op 3D platformer adventure in "Bumpkin & Sprout," where action, humor, and environmental awareness unite! Join these two whimsical mushrooms on a mission to save not only themselves but also Nature herself from the clutches of the nefarious Pollution Spirit.

about_the_game:
Embark on an extraordinary puzzle journey with Enigmarble, the game that brings puzzles to a whole new level! Get ready to immerse yourself in a world of intricately designed challenges and mind-bending fun.

Take control of a marble with your mouse, collect pick-ups and strategically touch interactive blocks while mastering precise movement and dodges to conquer the hazards.

Handcrafted Levels



Immerse yourself in 90 unique level designs meticulously created to test your problem-solving skills. Each level is a work of art, offering challenges that eveolve as you progress. Prepare for an adventure that's as visually stunning as it is intellectually stimulating.

Visually Diverse Worlds


Explore the hand-drawn landscapes of Enigmarble, where each level is a visual masterpiece. With six distinct themes, you'll navigate through mysterious dungeons, mechanical steampunk, candy wonderland, lush forests, and futuristic sci-fi. Enigmarble takes you on a visual journey like no other puzzle game.

Strategize, Solve, Suceed


Unleash your inner strategist as you encounter a plethora of interactive puzzle elements in Enigmarble. Maneuver through switches, doors, pipes, pistons, and a variety of pushable and destructible blocks. Watch out for perilous traps and enemies as you navigate the mazes, making every move a strategic choice.

Boss Challenges


At the end of each world face the ultimate test in a boss level that will push your puzzle-solving skills to the limit. These challenges are not for the faint of heart. Test your skills and strategic thinking, providing an adrenaline-pumping experience for those seeking the ultimate Enigmarble conquest.

short_description: "Undead Uprising" immerses you in a post-apocalyptic world swarming with zombies. Battle through endless waves of the undead. Continuously evolving, the game offers regular updates and fresh content. The fate of humanity rests in your hands. Are you ready?

short_description: SkateNationXL is an arcade skateboarding game that celebrates the spirit of the classics, set in locations inspired by real-life spots. Master challenges, pull off wild tricks, hang out with friends in Lobby Mode, or join Showdown—an 8-player competitive mode.

name: WildFront
short_description: A 100% FREE unique roguelike deckbuilding experience! Collect cards, relics and monsters, but be careful not to lose your loot. Can you survive the challenge?

name: Life Eater
short_description: If you don't sacrifice your neighbors, the world ends. Life Eater is a horror fantasy kidnapping simulator where you must become intimately familiar with your targets' lives one intrusive action at a time... and hope that the dark god you serve is even real.

name: Bee Craft Sweet
short_description: Real-time simulation game of bees Can you survive?

about_the_game:
Shape the void with the power of your cursor! A Void Shaper is an arcade game about avoiding shapes and killing them, while you collect upgrades. Unlock new enemy shapes and upgrades as you progress through the game and complete your collection.


Your only task is to avoid the shapes and survive as long as possible. And all you have to do is to move your cursor.

You're controlling "Null Sphere+", a special probe sent by humanity to find a proper new planet.


There are lots of enemies and even a first boss you can encounter in the void. Each enemy shape has a specially adjusted behaviour and stats to keep the game fresh and exciting. Each enemy shape has different variations called "Champion" and "Giant", these have adjusted stats and can possibly even drop special upgrades. You will unlock new enemies and therefore new upgrades as you progress!

Your task as Null Sphere+ is to collect data, while you kill enemy shapes, the "Planetary Void Allocation Agency" (the organisation that sent Null Sphere+ into the void) researches new upgrades for your Null Sphere+ in the background.


Collect upgrades to get stronger. Each upgrade makes it easier to survive in the void. There are a lot of different upgrade types that you can unlock and collect as you progress. For example:
  • Attack Speed Increase (ASPD+)
  • Magnetism
  • Homing
  • Projectile Count Increase
I'm sure that you will find upgrades that you like!

Each upgrade either improves an existing component or even adds a new module to the Null Sphere+. This probe is the only chance for humanity to find new planets to inhabit, so all resources are invested to analyze the data that Null Sphere+ sends. This analyzed data is used to develop new improvements or modules.


It's time to shape the void! A Void Shaper features a masterfully handcrafted soundtrack, composed by K1ngKapra. The soundtrack is a combination of electronic and metal music. You will bang your head to this!
name: A Void Shaper
short_description: Shape the void with the power of your cursor! A Void Shaper is an arcade game about avoiding shapes and killing them, while you collect upgrades. Unlock new enemy shapes and upgrades as you progress through the game and complete your collection.

name: Spotless
short_description: Clean, Clash, and Collect through 30+ spooky sites in this Single-Player, Clean 'Em Up Rogue-Lite. Spend your meager earnings wisely on both permanent and temporary upgrades, so that even the thriving haunts of cute and creepy creatures can’t stop you from cleaning 'til everything's Spotless!

name: Rugby League Riot
short_description: Rugby League Riot is here! A keyboard operated Rugby League game. (Not a Rugby Union game) Choose from 17 teams, play a singles match or compete in a finals series. Unique gameplay. Many pass and kick options, simple defense. Fatigue system, commentary.

name: Backrooms:MEG Archives
short_description: Backrooms:MEG Archives is a single-player horror exploration game. Experience the hidden layers of the MEG archive, explore that dusty story in danger, and witness the hierarchical adventures of the explorer's predecessors.

about_the_game: Spider-guy has been imprisoned by the dastardly Cheddar-Head within the cheese place. You take control of our protagonist spider-guy as he fights through hordes of the viscous cheese amalgamations that lie between you and the exit. This action packed platformer side scroller is vibrant with depictions of cheesy horror. Spider-Guy: Trapped in the Cheese place is a single player game that uses left, right, and jump to control the character.
name: Spider-Guy: Trapped in the Cheese Place
short_description: take the role of spider guy and escape the cheese place!

about_the_game:
Once sworn enemies, Slavs and Lizards made peace for the glory of the Holy Stand! Two species coexist in harmony, enjoying life of passion and lust with each other. Exactly as father Perun willed it... Although it is only true for a single village. For now.



Ratibor, the champion of Slavs, and the warrior lizard Viente travel to the Lizardwomen capital, Atlantis, to seal an official friendship agreement between the peoples and spread peace and love into every corner of both Hyperborea and Atlantis.

But can the century-long grudge between lizards and Slavs truly be cast aside? Or is it just a calm before the storm? Might Mathematics, the goddess of lizards, be planning something? Or maybe there is some third party seeking to shatter the fragile peace?

PREPARE FOR:
  • Historically accurate depiction of the events leading up to the formation of the Atlantic Treaty
  • Dearly beloved match-3 challenges, rewarded with EVEN SPICIER animated and voiced sex-scenes
  • Branching story
  • Even more naked maidens and lizard-women, longing for passion!

name: Resilience
short_description: Come face to face with the dangers that await your crew on a distant planet with extreme temperature conditions. Gather resources, explore, defend against aggressive flora and fauna, develop technologies to survive and leave the planet.

name: Ashes of Ambition
short_description: Enjoy 4 different types of vehicles, earn money, craft, gather, trade, produce electricity - sell or use it, establish a radio station to contact other survivors and trade with them. Experience the thrill of rising from nothing to the top and dive into the story that awaits you.

name: Hiraeth
short_description: HIRAETH is a sci-fi, first-person survival game set on a desolate, alien planet. Adapt to various threats while discovering the secrets of the abandoned, dystopian colony. You can choose between two distinct game modes that share common gameplay mechanics - sandbox and story.

name: Astraia Land
short_description: Astraia is an innovative game that combines equipment building, dungeon challenge, platform jumping and LAN team up online. The game requires a certain amount of maneuverability, players need to sprint, jump, and avoid enemy skills and barrage.

name: WARLANCER - Armored Survivor
short_description: WARLANCER - Armored Survivor is a top down survivor shooter where you employ weapons within weapons to decimate hordes of enemies with multiple waves of firepower. Configure your mech with upgrades and randomly generated weapons to survive the relentless tide of alien invaders.

name: IS THIS EVEN CHESS?
short_description: Prove you're worthy of King's Challenge! Master items, navigation, and combat in over 30 levels of increasing difficulty! Many contenders have failed before. Will you be able to defeat King and claim the ultimate prize?

name: Frontier Ferris For Adventurers
short_description: This game is a real-time battle action game. Winning battles in an area earns experience and skill points. You can grow stronger by leveling up and acquiring skills from the skill tree. You can earn money by selling items and treasures obtained in battles and by completing requests.

name: The Jackbox Naughty Pack
short_description: Bring the heat with a threesome of fun in Jackbox Naughty Pack. Find out who’s the best liar in Fakin’ It All Night Long, illustrate spicy prompts in Dirty Drawful, and answer questions like “How does this avocado get aroused?” in Let Me Finish.

name: Zombie Rooms
short_description: The zombie apocalypse takes a hilarious dimension

name: Golden Axe Idol - Escape The Room
short_description: Golden Axe Idol Kimmy is going to collaborate with a newcomer idol Snow, and they are planning to play the game “Escape the Room”. However, they soon discover that there are erotic traps in it. Will they be able to beat it?

name: ChronoBabes
short_description: Match3 adventure with 15 hot babes to undress. 5 unique eras, 28 skill deck building, interactive story and smart AI. Build your deck, find cool artifacts and enjoy epic battles!

about_the_game:
Our favorite agents must put a stop to the dangerous and destructive Sexta Secta led by the evil Priest Apoteosis, who is determined to obtain two objects at any cost: the first is the sacred book of the god Ra-Amón, and the second is Cleopatra's dung beetle. With these two objects, he intends to perform a curse through a ceremony to the god Ra-Amón.

Extended version with alternative passages of the merging of 'Operación Moscú' and 'El Escarabajo de Cleopatra.' Local multiplayer option available.

A great point & click adventure where you can control Mortadelo or Filemón according to your preferences: switch between characters and choose who will perform each action.

about_the_game:
Wormswarm is an experimental platformer about jumping on abstract wriggling worms while scoring points. The game is based on a simple concept - the ground under your feet is constantly moving. Your goal is to score as many points as possible, dodge all the dangerous red worms and not fall into the abyss...
The huge number of moving objects forces you to quickly find the best routes and show miracles of reaction to get to the top of the leaderboard!
name: Wormswarm
short_description: Wormswarm is an experimental platformer about jumping on abstract wriggling worms while scoring points.

name: Of Murder and Moonshine
short_description: Set in prohibition-era New Orleans, Of Murder and Moonshine is a 2D, side-scrolling noir shooter filled with strategic assassinations, frantic getaways, and brutal combat. Will you and your gang be able to conquer the swamps and the city, or will a rival crew bring you to your knees?

name: Crazy People
short_description: This is a cartoon shooting

name: Prince Adventures
short_description: Embark on an epic journey through the mystical realm of Magical Oasis in "Prince Adventures." Once a land of harmony and tranquility, it has now fallen under the grip of darkness as an evil demon has seized control, spreading chaos and destruction throughout this enchanted land.

name: Chaos Sisters
short_description: Chaos sisters is a beat'em up of demon girls fighting their way through monsters and heroes. Fiery Puna fights in close combat hack and slash style, while Sini casts a barrage of spells and combines them to conjure powerful Invocations. Uncover secrets and survive the night!

name: Halloween Sinister Trivia
short_description: Humorous surreal horror. Never before has so much plot twist per square meter. 10 different endings, and in each one, you'll end up blood-stained. Dare to experience the unexpected!

name: Sempra Infernalis
short_description: Fight your way out of hell against the increasingly dangerous hell spawn devoted to making YOU, the latest addition to the unhappy infernal family. Upgrade your character to improve your chances of escape and seek out and unlock legendary weapons and abilities in this epically fun demon slayer.

name: Ballionaire
short_description: BALLIONAIRE is a fast-paced, kinetic roguelike where strategy meets physics to create outrageous wealth! Find and exploit game-breaking synergies as you theorycraft your way to victory. Welcome to the autobonker genre!

name: 100 Asian Cats
short_description: 🏮🐈 100 Asian Cats - Join the cutest adventure in the Asia! 😻 🌸 Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of Asian temples 🏯 as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. 🕵️‍♂️❌ Can you find them all? 🕵️‍♂️🐈✅

about_the_game:
Stories is a choice driven RPG where your enlightened choices will forge your path. Survive in a ruthless desert while unraveling the mystery of Egypt's leaders! Will you be the master of your own destiny, or will you let others write the chapters of your stories...


Stories is my take on the famous Choose Your Own Adventure books genre.
The amazing city of Heliopolis is soon to be under attack by the Persian army. At the same time, you have discovered some very disturbing secrets about Egypt's most prominent figures. Are they harboring secrets that could alter the course of the war? Which side will you choose?

Stories is split into two major phases.

Exploring the City

While within the walls of Heliopolis, you will have control (mostly ;)) over your actions. You will gather resources, meet people, and avoid malicious encounters to prepare yourself for the unforgiving nature of the desert.

Surviving in the Desert

The desert completely surrounds Heliopolis. It's scorching hot, food is scarce, and water is long gone. But beneath its burning sands lie very valuable treasures. You can explore wherever you want, in whichever direction you choose... You might encounter people, animals, experience hallucinations, explore forgotten tombs... But always keep an eye on your vital signs...

But be careful, in Stories time is ticking fast...

Features

  • 500+ Unique Events
  • 1.000+ Choices
  • Unique Desert Exploration System
  • Inventory & Crafting
  • 20+ Equippable and Upgradable Rings with Unique Powers
  • Skills (actives and passives)
  • Moral System Affecting Events and Choices
Musique originale composée par rivblazing.
name: Stories
short_description: Stories is a choice driven RPG where your enlightened choices will forge your path. Survive in a ruthless desert while unraveling the mystery of Egypt's leaders! Will you be the master of your own destiny, or will you let others write the chapters of your stories...

name: Block-ed
short_description: Block-ed is a 3D puzzle-platformer inspired by Bloxorz, where you control a rectangular parallelepiped through challenging levels that test your spatial reasoning and timing. Create your own maps with the level editor, share them with the community, and play maps designed by others.

name: Heart-S-Truck
short_description: Navigate a world on the brink in "Heart-S-Truck," a challenging physics-driven platformer where you steer heroic delivery trucks on a mission to save humanity!

name: Rose Bullet
short_description: Rose Bullet is a Retro, Comic Style, Horror RPG! Play as a vampire hunter on his way to kill the count and avenge his lost lover.

name: VAGRIENT
short_description: Play as an Armlys alien named Vagrient in this sci-fi action/adventure game, featuring RPG elements. It's full of exploration, combat, character progression, puzzle solving and obstacle clearing!

name: 末世孤镇 Doomsday Lonely town
short_description: 《Doomsday Lonely town》is an idle tower defense game. In the doomsday world, you can form your team to resist the attacks of monsters and protect the isolated town behind you.
steamspy_name: 末世孤镇 Doomsday Lonely town

name: Finite State Automaton Challenges 2
short_description: In the second episode of Finite State Automation Challenges, you will use finite-state automata to overcome 80 challenges from character string manipulation, computer science, and mathematics.

about_the_game:
Andrea si è appena trasferito nella città di Foggia e ha tutte le caratteristiche del nuovo arrivato: solitario, cuffie alle orecchie, timoroso del nuovo percorso scolastico, impacciato con i suoi coetanei e perso nei suoi pensieri. Le sue cuffie, però, iniziano a captare strani sussurri, pianti, terrori. Andrea dovrà viaggiare dentro i corridoi e le stanze buie della sua scuola e collegarsi alle anime dei suoi compagni di scuola.


Le anime degli adolescenti sono alate, ma spesso quelle ali sono annerite dai dolori, dall'incapacità di stare al mondo senza sentirsi troppo poco. Ogni personaggio che incrocerai vive una battaglia di cui non immaginavi l'esistenza.


Autolesionismo, ansia sociale e depressione sono spade dentro la schiena. Nei panni di Andrea sentirai le stesse cose? Proverai disagio o empatia?


Bullismo e social usati per ferire e ridicolizzare sono armi nelle mani di tutti. Comprenderai Dea e i suoi dolori? Riuscirai a salvarla?


La reputazione sembra essere l'unica cosa che conta, ma quanto pesano le maschere? Quanto dolore esiste dietro la popolarità? La sessualità è solo un traguardo?


Esplora la zona, bevi caffè, ignora o ascolta gli ordini di un'app che sembra conoscere i tuoi segreti e ascolta le cuffie magiche e trova gli adolescenti perduti. Ogni tua azione avrà conseguenze sulla storia.


Questo videogioco tratta di tematiche delicate legate alla salute mentale. Il tuo albero delle abilità ti donerà un vero report su come vivi questi disagi, su come lo vivono gli altri e vuole aprire un dibattito, una feritoia attraverso cui far passare la luce.

Bluethroot è un gioco educativo contenente indicatori psicometrici di ansia sociale e disagi mentali: è pensato per essere una esperienza da vivere insieme a scuola, per essere discusso, analizzato e per aprire dibattiti.
developer: Axel Fox, Daniele Sichetti, Daniele Piccolino, Andrea Fusti, Francesca Balestri
name: Bluethroot
short_description: Bluethroot è un'avventura narrativa che esplora le fragilità della Gen Z. Una misteriosa e distopica app spinge un gruppo di liceali a scavare dentro i propri disagi psicologici. Tra malinconie, iper-pensiero e paura del futuro, Bluethroot si ispira alla serie tv Tredici
steamspy_developer: Axel Fox, Daniele Sichetti, Daniele Piccolino, Andrea Fusti, Francesca Balestri

name: Gravity Lab
short_description: References to games Superliminal and Portal. Gravity Labs is a new first-person puzzle game based on gravity. Players will take on the role of a job seeker and try to pass the layers of tests set by the mysterious mega-company THE COMPANY.

name: My Confounding Cat is Criminally Cute!
short_description: A cute, wholesome yaoi / boys love visual novel about a grumpy wizard and... a black cat? Wait, what?
steamspy_name: My Confounding Cat is Criminally Cute!

name: Forgotten Knight
short_description: It's a turn-based deck building RPG based on 2D dots. In an environment where attacks work differently on each turn, set the best strategy to defeat your enemies and upgrade your equipment to be stronger!

name: Genocide for Future
short_description: Genocide for Future is an isometric action bullet hell shooter where you fight with up to two other friends or alone against the machinations of an evil AI. With up to three unique weapons and special upgrades, fight against the henchmen to protect the intelligent life of the universe.

name: Strange Pong
short_description: Strange Pong is a classic Pong game with the addition of new game mechanics. This game is a game of tennis, the player controls a racket and must hit the ball. However, each level has its own features that make the game more interesting.

name: A group of beauties surrounded me
short_description: This is a male-oriented, high-freedom cultivation work. You are the wealthiest man, surrounded by beauty. A total of 155 characters can be pursued, with one tailored to your preferences. The work has super high freedom, with no fixed plot. Come explore five very different plot lines quickly!
steamspy_name: A group of beauties surrounded me

name: Warcrow Adventures
short_description: Companion app for Warcrow Adventures, a fantasy board game by Corvus Belli.

name: Bubble Chicken Farm
short_description: "Bubble Chicken Farm" offers an immersive game experience where adventure, farm management and magic merge to create a world full of possibilities. Discover the joy of being a pirate-farmer and create your own legend in "Bubble Chicken Farm".

about_the_game:
“ルールはただ一つ！「ゲームをクリアしないこと！」”

「MORATORIUM」は、子供だけがプレイできる楽園のようなゲーム。
このゲームをクリアすることすなわち、大人になってしまうこと！
でも、大人になって労働するなんて、ヤですよね。
だからこそ・・・このゲームはクリアしてはいけないゲームなのです！

“固定観念にとらわれるな！発想の転換がカギのいじわるパズル、マシマシ！”

でも一筋縄ではいきません。
ゲームをクリアさせようと、様々ないじわるパズルがあなたを待ち構えています。
パズルはどれも発想の転換が求められるものばかり。
固定観念にとらわれた考え方では歯が立たず・・・すぐさまゲームクリアしてしまうでしょう。
脳みそのシワを増やして、シナプス強火で立ち向かおう！

“大人になりたくないあなたに、ちょっと沁みるテキストたち。”

あなたの敵となる「サー・イエティ」は、サラリーマンの哀愁漂う大人。
社畜ジョークや、大人として生きるアドバイスなど、色々なことをしゃべってくれますよ。
ちょっぴり笑えて、ちょっぴり「大人」が楽しみになるかも。
(でも、そそのかされて大人になっちゃダメですよ！)

◆利用規約◆

・実況プレイ、二次創作、SNSへの掲載は大歓迎です！
　(ただし、公序良俗に反するものや、政治的・宗教的な要素を含むコンテンツへの利用は禁止いたします)
・その際は、ぜひsteamページや作者のtwitterアカウントを引用ください。
・誹謗中傷、特定の集団への差別的な要素を含むコンテンツに本ゲームを利用することは禁止いたします。
・許可なく本ゲームを再配布することは禁止いたします。
・許可なく本ゲームに含まれる素材を流用することは禁止いたします。

◆クレジット◆

・制作ソフト：　GameMaker
・フォント：　PixelMplus（ピクセル・エムプラス）
・その他大体(プログラミング, イラスト, BGM, SE)：　O’chu (オチュー)

short_description: このゲームをクリアしてはいけない・・・永遠に子供のままでいたいなら。Moratorium: Don’t Beat This Gameは、いじわる謎解きてんこ盛り、「クリアすると大人になっちゃう」ADVゲーム。子供の楽園「モラトリアム」で待ち受ける理不尽なパズルたちを乗り越え、大人への成長を拒み続けましょう。

name: Dice & Fold
short_description: A turn-based dungeon crawler where your only way of attacking the enemy is by rolling dice. Roll dice to damage enemy cards to FOLD. Inspired by classic Solitaire, in a top-down table and enemies made out of cards, try to beat the dungeon with 35 unique classes. Build your deck, kill monsters.

name: Void Gore
short_description: Void Gore casts you as an ace pilot descending through the levels of hell and getting rich in the process.

name: Synthwave Runner
short_description: Synthwave Runner is a casual game where you have to jump over different obstacle to keep running and increase your highscore in an stunning synthwave style.100x Steam Achievments (just start the game)

name: Situation Succ: Inn Elysium
short_description: Situation Succ is a Dark-Fantasy game with a mythos inspired in part by both Asian and Western occult influences. As a detective who finds himself trapped inside an ancient inn by four evil entities, you have to use your wits and investigative abilities to try and escape.

name: FastPack
short_description: FastPack is the worlds number one leading logistics company. We offer the quickest delivery on the planet! This training program is made for you to get up to speed with our delivery methods. Do you got what it takes to work for us?

about_the_game:
Valor Of Man is a tactical RPG with roguelike mechanics where enemies react to your actions. Lead your party of heroes as you anticipate and outsmart your enemies. Make careful decisions as you forge your path to victory.


Death is tired of reaping souls all day, and enlists you, Alistair, as his avatar of destruction. Explore an intriguing narrative as you throw the world into chaos in your quest to stop the Perpetual Cycle.

Enemies respond to your attacks with original Reactions. Use your wits and arsenal to best over 60 foes including elites and bosses, each with distinctive behaviour and mechanics.

Unleash devastating critical hits that uniquely affect each enemy by disabling their special behaviours, buffs or abilities.

Choose your party from 12 hero classes across 4 archetypes. Set up deadly combos, discover powerful synergies and wreak havoc on your enemies with 250+ hero abilities, 250+ items and 150+ game-changing artifacts.

Experience a Roguelike adventure where, after each win or loss, you unlock new gear and abilities to empower your heroes in future runs.

Enhanced by dynamic map generation, a 3 Chapter story, and varied enemies, each run is shaped by your choices.

Adjustable difficulty spans across 10 Valor Levels, progressively unlocking new story chapters while intensifying the challenge.

About us: 

We are Traian and Florian, 2 brothers, who love playing and making games, and together we have created Legacy Forge Studio. Driven by passion to craft innovative gameplay experiences with unique mechanics, we take elements from different mediums (ex: board games) and implement them in video games.

about_the_game:
In Kukinta, the essence of strategy is not conquest, but comfort. It's a game where planning meets tranquility, and where your crafted world is a cozy corner of calm in the bustling universe of strategy games.

🌱 Cozy Crafting

Enter the relaxing realm of Kukinta, where city-building meets the laid-back pleasure of crafting. In this tranquil space, strategy is a gentle stream, not a raging river. Delight in the simplicity of merging raw materials into valuable commodities, and watch as your islands blossoms with every thoughtful addition. The crafting system is designed for comfort, inviting you to unwind as you create.

🏞️ Peaceful Planning

Plan your island's future in the cozy confines of Kukinta, where every expansion is a step toward serenity. Take the time to strategize at your own pace, with no pressure, only the pure satisfaction of seeing your well-laid plans come to life. The game's peaceful pacing allows you to savor each decision, crafting an island that's as much a refuge as a residence.

🧘‍♂️ Tranquil Gameplay

Kukinta offers a sanctuary where strategy and serenity coexist. The harmonious soundtrack and gentle visuals provide a backdrop for a game that celebrates the joy of planning over the rush of competition. Here, strategy comes with a breath of fresh air, a place where your mind can wander freely and your decisions carry no weight but the joy they bring.

🍵 Relaxed Engagement
For the planner who takes pleasure in a laid-back approach, Kukinta is your canvas. It's not about the challenge; it's about the experience of seeing your strategies come to life in a calm, responsive environment. The game grows with you, offering complexity that feels like a cozy blanket, inviting you to wrap yourself in the craft of gentle governance.
name: Kukinta
short_description: Step into Kukinta, a unique blend of city-building and idle crafting. Assemble resources and refine them into complex goods to develop your island community. Let your strategic skills blossom. In Kukinta, every resource shapes the skyline of your serene retreat.

about_the_game:
Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

The game is a 3D puzzle, the player needs to put in place the missing pieces of the puzzle (items) scattered around the location. To create an entire location.

You need to go to the item, take it by pressing the left mouse button and take the item to the desired location marked in green. If you brought the correct item, it will snap into place and you will receive leaderboard points and achievements for this.

Collect as much items as possible as quickly as possible to get more points for the leaderboard.

If you brought the wrong item, you can throw it away, it will return to the starting location so that you can pick it up again.

about_the_game:
❀ ABOUT THE GAME ❀


❋ Continuing the long line of shoot'em up classics!
Boasts unique and charming protagonists, a variety of bosses with bizarre and fantastical designs, and waves upon waves of enemies to keep players on their toes!

❋ The charm of Eastern fantasy!
In reimagining the Youkai from Korean folktales and historical records from a new perspective, the game features inventive original characters drawn in an elegant fashion and a gripping story fully-voiced by professional voice actresses.

❋ Soul collection system
Shikhondo: Youkai Rampage features a unique system called 'Soul Collect', where players can charge their 'Soul Gauge' as they avoid enemy bullets. It's perilous, but the closer players stay to bullets, the faster their gauges charge!

Then, players can use their dodge to evade bullets for a moment!
Nullify enemy attacks and shoot for a new high score!

❋ Various game modes!
Play through the main story in Arcade mode, focus down the bosses in Boss Rush mode, or get double souls but lose in a single hit in Hardcore mode.

Shikhondo: Youkai Rampage also features a new Dual mode, a strategic single-player mode that allows switching between the two protagonists to match the circumstances players face!

In addition, the game has been reworked, adding new optional features and even a new stage!

❀ CHARACTER INFO ❀


《 The Girl 》
One day, the girl falls into this world, losing even the memory of her own name.
She begins her harrowing journey to fight the youkai in search of her memories, her hometown, and her family.



《 Grim Reaper 》
Death's emissary who must face the begrudged souls-turned-Youkai and perform her given duties.
She happens upon the girl, teaming up to help her.



©2024 DeerFarm All rights reserved. Published by CFK

※ Regarding gameplay upload and streaming
Any individual or company may stream or upload videos of this game as long as the copyright information and store URLs are included within the video description or the video itself. We would appreciate creators leaving out spoilers of the ending whenever possible.

about_the_game:
Meet our little friend Sputnik. Help its journey to become the greatest star in the solar system - the Sun!

Unique Gameplay With Cosmic Gravity


Cosmic gravity is applied to the planet, which makes it different from the classic Suika-style game.
The ability to target the other side of the planets adds much more strategy and depth to the game!

Merge Planets


Match two identical planets to create bigger celestial bodies.
Discover 10 dazzling planets, each with its own place in the solar system!


Watch out for the bubble! If the planet pops out of the bubble, it's game over.

Meet the Adorable Planets


Our planets aren't just celestial bodies – they're full of life!
Watch them interact – they might greet each other with a smile or gaze curiously at one another.
Get ready for a whole lot of cuteness as you merge your way through the solar system.

about_the_game:
With a nice visual mix of cel shading and stylized.
A Package For Space is a survival game with a unique concept: you will face not only the environment and deadly abominations but also time.
Can you escape and flee to the stars before it's too late?
A real race against time begins, your priorities will determine your success or failure.
Explore the environment and the remains of civilization to find materials and resources to build your own shelter and contribute to your survival.
At first you will have to find all kinds of food and drinks to survive day after day, but think about your own food, it is much less dangerous.
You will have to equip yourself and find or make a weapon to face the multiple dangers of this devastated world with dynamic weather.
Sometimes only a shelter can save you.
You will fight for your life, but in the end, only flight can save you.
Will you make the right decisions? Will you manage to escape or find a still possible solution to confront evil?

Wherever you go, you will have to survive or die...

about_the_game:
Ah, my glorious kingdom! A land where peasants toil, miners dig, and knights train... but only when I look at them! My gaze is law—progress thrives where I watch, but the moment I turn away? Laziness! Chaos! I must choose wisely: should I focus on the fields for food, the mines for riches, or the barracks for defense? With resources, I can even expand my all-seeing gaze, ensuring my kingdom flourishes… and that no one slacks off under my rule!

Water, wheat, stone, coal, silver—every resource fuels my empire! Farms feed my people, mines fund my ambitions, and workshops forge mighty defenses. Shall I invest in archers, reinforce the walls, or harness magic? Even my castle needs repairs when the enemy strikes! Every decision shapes my reign, and only a well-managed kingdom will survive the storm.

Rulership is no easy task! Each land presents new trials, from cursed cemeteries to infernal depths, forcing me to adapt. Yet every defeat is a lesson! As a true roguelite, my efforts grant permanent upgrades, unlocking new abilities, stronger defenses, and powerful strategies for my next reign. A true king doesn’t just rule—he evolves, forging an unstoppable legacy with each attempt!

Each battlefield hides unpredictable threats—enemies are led by unexpected Generals, demanding unique tactics to defeat. Want to conquer them all? You’ll need multiple runs! But fear not! My royal council aids me with cavalry masters, arcane sages, and cunning strategists. With their wisdom—and my unwavering gaze—victory is inevitable!

short_description: The King is Watching is a roguelite kingdom builder. Rule by the power of your royal gaze! Decide between producing resources, training armies, or balancing both, while adapting to unique events every run

about_the_game:
概览

在勇者大地上展开惊心动魄的冒险之旅！

《勇者之路》由向左行驶工作室倾力打造，是一款可以在广阔的世界里自由冒险、随心所欲地探寻宝物的2D冒险RPG。

故事

生活在新原镇的乔迪是一名见习勇者，为了实现自己成为“最强勇者”的梦想，在德雷克博士的指引下，踏上了冒险的旅程。在旅途中，乔迪遇到了维特博士的孙女玛西、试炼场馆馆主夏奇拉、女弓箭手莉奥妮等人，他们结为伙伴，挑战试炼场馆，一起成长并收集沉睡在勇者大地上的宝藏。围绕着试炼硬币，以城镇、山洞、沙漠、海岛为舞台而展开的波澜壮阔的故事就此开启。

主要特色

职业：战士、魔法师、弓箭手、刺客将在本作中悉数登场，每种职业都拥有独一无二的武器类型，以及各具特色的职业技能。只有深入了解每个职业的特点，才能最大化地发挥出他们各自的作用！

元素：本作包含炎、冰、雷、水、土、风、光、暗八大元素属性。通过探索不同元素之间的克制关系，正确掌握元素之力，做出策略性的抉择，最终达到事半功倍的效果！

回合制战斗：《勇者之路》既拥有适合新手玩家的简单游戏机制，又具有可满足硬核玩家需求的深度，现在就来一起体验带有现代特色的经典回合制战斗吧。

场地：勇者大地涵盖了森林、平原、雪地、峡谷、沙漠、海岛等完全不同的广阔地貌，让玩家可以在自由冒险的过程中，于世界各地尽情地展开寻宝！

about_the_game:
Welcome to the project: Emplorer.
You will be piloting a micro-robot to explore the inside of an animal.

Exploring life will not be easy.
Defeat the various immune cells that attack you to move forward.
When you reach your destination, move to the next stage.

You have to fire bullets at specific timing to do higher damage.

If you stimulate the immune cells too much, your test subject's body temperature will rise.
Be careful, because bad things happen when the body temperature is too high.

Upgrade your robot to become more powerful as a reward for your work.

Manage your resources properly to get the job done efficiently.


Key features:
- Diverse enemies
- Biological tissue-themed stages
- Various stat upgrades as you progress through the stages
