about_the_game:
ZomBay is a zombie shoot'em up game.

In ZomBay, players will face relentless waves of the undead while defending their base and their own survival in various heart-pounding game modes, each with unique challenges:

Zombay has 3 modes:

  • 1. BASE ATTTACK MODE: is based around the idea of WW2's battle of Normandy, while using modern elements from past popular shooting games. Hence the name, ZomBay.

  • 2. SWAM MODE: Survive waves of endless zombies and gain exp to get the best guns!

  • 3. CLEAR MODE: Clear each level of zombie as quickly as possible to get the best score!

In ZomBay you'll find yourself defending your base, as well as your player. In Base Attack Mode zombies will charge the barricades and break through while you desperately try to hold them back! In Swam Mode zombies will swarm the player and increase in numbers over time! In Clear Mode zombies will patrol the map and the player will try to clear the level as quickly as possible!

Features:

  • 1. Tons of UNIQUE guns, with ADS (Aim down sights) or alternative firing modes!

  • 2. ZOMBIE HORDES!

  • 3. Online leaderboards with anti-cheat

  • 4. "Roguelike" gameplay loop (No winning, only getting better each time!)

  • 5. Tons of GPU instancing and object pooling for optimal game performance!

  • 6. Unlock guns for free up to level 60!

  • 7. Skill tree with upgrades to improve player performance!

  • 8. Updates with new content and bug fixes!

about_the_game:
Welcome to the unique world of "E-Girl RoomMate," the game that will take you into the fascinating and intriguing behind-the-scenes world of online content creation. You will play the role of an engaging protagonist who shares her life with a charming roommate, who dedicates herself to creating content on OnlyFans. Your mission? Help her grow her fan base, gain followers and achieve online fame. Unlock upgrades, acquire resources, and discover new interactions on your journey to digital success!

Main features:


Click to make more followers:

Interact with the world of E-Girl RoomMate by clicking on the screen to gain followers, the main currency of the game. Every click will bring you closer to online glory, but be careful, because time is precious and competition is fierce!

Kitten Power-ups:

Purchase adorable kitten-shaped boosters that automate the process of gaining followers. Each kitten has a special ability that accelerates your path to success. Choose wisely which kitten to adopt to maximize your potential.

Scenes with the roommate:

Invest in special scenes with your roommate to unlock intriguing dialogue and deepen your connection with her. Each scene adds a narrative element to the game, revealing insights into life online and giving you new opportunities to engage your followers.

More kitty power-ups:

Don't settle for just one kitten! Expand your collection of feline power-ups to increase your efficiency!



Cute Steam Achievement



and more!

about_the_game:
Neon Runners: Craft & Dash – The Ultimate Racing & Running Game!

Get ready for an action-packed racing with simple controls!

Compete in fast-paced running races, conquer stages, and defeat monsters in a thrilling sprint to victory.

Unleash your creativity in the Level Maker, share your designs, and challenge the world to fun, neon infused races!

This is the core mode that defines Neon Runners: Four enter, but only one emerges victorious. Race against three opponents, each equipped with powerful abilities, and be the first to reach the goal. The courses are filled with game-changing power-ups and gimmicks that add excitement—or chaos—to the competition.

Daily Contest
Take on the ever-changing Daily Contest map to receive amazing rewards.
The greater your skills, the better the rewards that await you!

Stage Mode
Clear 100 unique stages and test your racing skills.
Collect super coins to level up and grow your character!

Endless Mode
Keep the challenges going in Infinite Mode.
Show off your skills without any limits and dominate the leaderboard!

Build and Share Your Own Levels!

■ Create your own levels with a simple and intuitive level editor.
Design race tracks that are nearly impossible to conquer or create the fastest route imaginable.
You can even craft challenging puzzles that will push your friends to their limits!

■ Create with the community!
Share your custom courses with the community and showcase your creativity.
Build your own racing kingdom and become the star of your maps!

Race with Style

Discover your favorite among a cast of vibrant and distinctive characters that can change the game.
Experiment with different Runners or master a single one to showcase your true skill.
Receive rewards based on your mastery level and unlock exclusive character skins for each one.

Neon Runners: Craft and Dash

about_the_game:
Eclipse Breaker is a timing‑driven action roguelike that asks you to dodge, parry, and counter in real‑time combat while forging ever‑shifting builds from the divine powers you collect. Conquer procedurally generated dungeons ruled by elemental gods, recruit the lingering spirits of lost allies, and push toward a climactic showdown with the sun‑goddess Solara. Built from scratch yet wrapped in late‑’90s PlayStation flair, every run rewrites the battlefield and your fate until you finally make your last stand.

Timing-Driven Action Roguelike

Fast-Paced, Strategic Combat

Every battle balances timing and relentless divine punishment. Dodge attacks, block incoming strikes, and reposition on the battlefield while managing cooldowns, chaining abilities, and seizing the perfect moment to strike.

Ever‑Changing Divine Realms

Procedurally generated dungeons shaped by the elemental gods who rule them. Defeat these celestial warriors and discover new elemental abilities, crafting new builds every run. No two runs are the same.

Choose Your Allies

Select from a roster of Companion Spirits, the lingering souls of Ember’s former friends and party members. They grant powerful abilities, guide her through battle, and challenge her with their own regrets, humor, and memories. Their past lives fuel your fight, and who you bring with you shapes your journey.

Face Powerful Gods and Endless Foes

Battle a pantheon of bosses and enemies, each with unique attack patterns, elemental abilities, and unpredictable tactics.

A “Remastered” Classic… That Never Existed?

In the late ‘90s, a legendary roguelike was released and all but forgotten. OK, maybe it wasn’t… 

But if it had, Eclipse Breaker would have been the kind of game you rented from a video store and played obsessively. Now, returning to your save file after 25 years, this lost classic is making its grand return; fully “remastered” (read: developed from scratch) with smooth mechanics, enhanced visuals, and the challenge modern roguelike fans crave.

The Story: A Hero Out of Time

Back in ’99 you led paladin Ember toward a showdown with the rogue sun‑goddess Solara… then life (or a corrupted save) intervened. Twenty‑five years later, you’re loading that save again. Ember returns to a world still shrouded in darkness, hailed as myth by some and blamed by others. To restore the sun, she must storm the Divine Realm run after run, mastering new powers and rewriting fate until the cycle finally shatters.

Developer's Note

Hey everyone, I’m Jorge Rodriguez, the developer behind Eclipse Breaker. This game is a love letter to the roguelikes and PlayStation-era RPGs that shaped my love for gaming: fast-paced battles, deep mechanics, and a world full of mystery and danger. We’ve had a blast crafting this ‘remaster’ of a game that never actually existed, and I hope you enjoy discovering it as much as we enjoyed making it.

If you’re curious, try the demo! Your feedback means the world to us, and we’d love to hear what you think. Whether you’re here for the strategic combat, the nostalgia, or just to break the cycle, thanks for giving Eclipse Breaker a shot. Now get out there, challenge the gods, and let’s see if you can survive.

Master fast-paced combat, inspired by classic JRPGs, collect divine powers, and fight through ever-changing dungeons in a relentless cycle of epic boss battles.

about_the_game:
ONE FENIX DOWN is a story-driven RPG and a passion project spanning nearly a decade. Inspired by the SNES-era classics, it strives to blend the perfect balance of story-pacing, combat design, and timeless characters that defined a generation of gaming.



  • Classic turn-based combat with three difficulty levels.
  • Powerful skills including elemental magics, martial arts, deadly traps, and even the abilities of monsters themselves!


  • A large cast of fully fleshed out characters, each with their own benevolent (or diabolical) objectives and ambitions.
  • 14 playable party members who frequently come and go, keeping gameplay exciting as you continually adapt new strategies.


  • Hundreds of unique items and equipment are spread throughout the world, many requiring an adventurous spirit to obtain.
  • A legendary story spanning multiple continents, kingdoms, and beyond!

Story

Seven years ago the Kingdom of Torloria was besieged by the bestial Goa Empire. Through decisive strategic planning and the sacrifice of countless heroes the Iron Guard of Torloria managed to keep the relentless hordes of Goa at bay. The Kingdom now finds respite under a thin veil of peace.

“The Roshel mines are undermanned.”

In the country’s outskirts, many of the young are summoned to the frontlines while those who remain toil in the mines, seeking a rare resource coveted by a religious order.

The sudden reappearance of monsters in the mines will spur one young miner to challenge his destiny — to confront his shameful past, seek redemption, and carve out a legacy befitting the son of the fabled 'Hero of Torloria.'

To succeed he must decipher a cryptic message that he alone can hear:

“You must protect Fate.”

His is a journey fraught with tribulation, but his companions just might be the strength he needs to overcome the trials that lie ahead.

Will they rise to the occasion, and together save Fate from the forces that lurk in the shadows?

about_the_game:
In this game, players embark on a maritime journey, sailing across the vast ocean to assist communities living on the water. Using modular blocks, players construct various buildings and homes. Throughout the building process, players will face natural disasters such as tornadoes, earthquakes, and thunderstorms, which have realistic, physics-based effects on the structures. Players must balance stability and aesthetics to create safe and beautiful homes for the people they meet along the way.

Additionally, the game features a Painter Mode that allows players to use acquired color palettes to repaint their already constructed buildings. This mode encourages players to fully unleash their imagination and creativity, giving each structure a unique and personalized touch.

about_the_game:
KEY FEATURES

  • The World of Hoodies Squad: Explore Grochów and other expansive locations, solving the secrets and mysteries hidden in various corners of the iconic Hoodies Squad series universe.
  • Inseparable Three: Play as three inseparable buddies - Spejson, Wojtas and Walo - who face the challenge of a lifetime as they try to unravel the mystery of strange human behaviour in one of Warsaw's neighbourhoods.
  • Meet Familiar Characters: Meet iconic characters familiar from the series on your journey. Earn their favour and make use of their extraordinary skills in numerous battles against enemies who will try at all costs to prevent you from discovering the truth.
  • Dynamic Battles: Face your opponents using the unique skills of each character. Reflexes and quick decisions are the key to success in clashes.
  • Character Development: Gain experience and develop the skills of your heroes, adapting their abilities to suit your own play style. Become more powerful to meet increasingly difficult challenges.
  • Recognisable Graphical Style: Experience a recognisable and very distinctive graphical style taken alive from the works of Bartosz Walaszek, giving the game a unique atmosphere.
  • Compelling Storyline: Immerse yourself in an immersive storyline where absurd humour, adventure and mystery create an unforgettable experience.

GROCHÓW AND BEYOND

In the game Hoodies Squad: Alcoholypse you will move to Grochów, a district of Warsaw, where a mysterious force disturbs the peace of the residents, making them think all too soberly. Explore a variety of places, from Grochów apartment blocks to mysterious corners not from this world. Everywhere you'll find puzzles to solve, hidden secrets to uncover, and characters whose stories create an unusual mosaic of this bizarre reality.

COMBAT

During your journey, you will have to face opponents who want to stop the buddies on their mission. Combat requires cunning and skill, and the variety of opponents makes each skirmish unique.

COLORFUL CHARACTERS

Meet interesting characters who will help or hinder your mission. The creative character palette reflects the diversity of Grochów, adding depth to the story and variety to the interactions.

ALCOHOLYPSE

Will you succeed in restoring normalcy to Grochów before the neighborhood collapses? Discover the true meaning of the Alcoholypse and face the challenges that await you in this unique game where humor, adventure and mystery are intertwined in a fascinating story.
name: Hoodies Squad: Alcoholypse
short_description: In Grochów, something strange is causing the residents to behave abnormally. Three inseparable buddies must restore balance by discovering the causes of this confusion and heading deep into the mysterious Alcoholypse. Will they succeed in restoring normalcy before the neighborhood collapses?

about_the_game:
Bastion of Beginnings is a tower defense game that seamlessly blends roguelite elements and rich replayability.

Key Features:


Foundational Upgrade System: Start with a simplified upgrade system designed as a precursor to our comprehensive tech tree. This initial system allows us to build out the necessary elements, and will evolve into a more complex and branching tech tree system in the future, adding depth and richness to your progression.



Procedurally Generated Maps


Every game presents a new map, featuring unique terrain generated by our procedural algorithms. Our path generation system, which is tweakable, allows for both crazy and simple paths, perfectly tuned for tower defense.

Scaling/Varied Enemy Types: Face off against enemies that scale and grow tougher with each wave. Anticipate a boss wave every 10th wave, offering not just a challenge but also rewards that enhance your gameplay.

Adaptable Tower Upgrades: Embrace a versatile "attribute" system for tower customization, allowing you to fine-tune stats such as RPM for cannons or firing rate for snipers. Your strategy shapes their evolution. As bosses fall, you're offered a roll on the upgrade system, granting the choice to select enhancements for your towers. This system fosters numerous synergies, stacking effects, and unique special abilities.

Early Access Roadmap:

  • Driven by the Community: Your insights and input are crucial. Engage with us, share your thoughts on features, pinpoint bugs, and help direct the game’s progress.

  • Refinement and Enhancement: Expect ongoing enhancements that polish gameplay, graphics, and performance, delivering a seamless experience across a range of devices.

  • Fresh Threats and Defenses: Stay on the lookout for inventive tower options and new enemy variants that will join the fray.

  • Expanding Tech Tree: Delve into an intricate tech tree with diverse pathways, ensuring each choice has a significant impact on your play style.

  • Dynamic Landscapes: Look forward to more sophisticated world generation, including multiple enemy paths, alongside general improvements and optimizations.

Performance Improvements on the Horizon:
  • Behind-the-scenes work is set to majorly advance performance, paving the way for larger-than-life battles and a smoother gaming experience. Our future plans include transitioning to Unreal Engine’s Mass framework for unparalleled performance enhancements.

    We are currently maximizing what we can achieve with UE’s standard actor system. The shift to Mass is planned as our next big leap forward after we lay the foundation with our community’s support.

Join us in the world of Bastion of Beginnings and help us craft a game that’s as engaging to strategize as it is exhilarating to play.
name: Bastion Of Beginnings
short_description: A tower defense adventure with endless strategy. Experience procedurally generated maps, unique foes, and a comprehensive tower upgrades system, as you progress through the waves. See how long you can hold down the homebase in this dynamic and replayable game!

about_the_game:
Version 7
Helbreath is an MMORPG (Massively Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game) that combines elements of action, strategy, and fantasy.

Set in a dark medieval world, players choose between two warring factions: Aresden or Elvine.

You can explore a vast world, battle monsters and other players, complete quests, and participate in epic battles.

The game is known for its intense PvP (Player versus Player) gameplay, trade-based economy, and strategic alliance-building to dominate territories.

Get ready to immerse yourself in an exciting and challenging adventure in Helbreath!
name: Helbreath Nemesis
short_description: Helbreath is a dark medieval MMORPG featuring intense PvP, strategic alliances, and a trade-centric economy. Choose between two warring factions and immerse yourself in epic battles and quests in a vast fantasy world.

about_the_game:
Step into the metallic boots of an abandoned robot in The Redundant, an exciting action-adventure with multiple ways to play. Take on the role of CF5, an abandoned robot in a mysterious facility besieged by a virus-infected mechanical army. As you explore the facility, you'll unravel a twisting story while isolating each section from the network, before it's too late.

Go in all-guns-blazing, or opt for a stealthy approach. Will you take the battle to your foes, or stick to the shadows?

With different ways to play, you'll need your wits about you to manage the meager resources at your disposal. Think carefully and plan tactically in order to stay alive.

Enemies each have unique strengths and weaknesses, while a diverse array of environments each present their own obstacles. How will you make it through?

Unpick the mystery of the facility and the virus that has ravaged its robot denizens. Tease apart the story piece-by-piece as you fight for survival.

about_the_game:
Agent Brain: Tricky Puzzle is a groundbreaking puzzle platformer that challenges youto think outside the box in ways you never imagined.

Explore the limits of your creativity, and uncover its well-hidden secrets. Dive in and let each challenge inspire your next great solution.

Every level introduces a unique solution method, breaking the fourth wall between the game and the player in unprecedented ways. From using a pause button to halt threats to turning off the sound to put an enemy NPC to sleep, the game continually surprises and engages players.

What to Expect in the Game:

  • Portal jumping

  • Gravity control

  • Managing a flying drone companion

  • Driving a car

  • Dangerous traps

  • Jetpack flights

  • Lasers

  • Boss fights

  • Different super agent gadgets

  • And many other fun features that will keep your brain active

"We want this game to delight players at every level, ensuring they always experience that Aha! moment. That’s the essence we’re capturing here." – dev team

In addition to the main puzzles, the game conceals well-hidden secrets that aren't so easy to uncover, adding an extra layer of challenge for those daring enough to seek them out.

short_description: Every level introduces a unique solution method, breaking the fourth wall between the game and the player in unprecedented ways. From using a pause button to halt threats to turning off the sound to put an enemy NPC to sleep, the game continually surprises and engages players.

about_the_game:
Embark on a tranquil journey to uncharted waters in Collector’s Cove, a farming adventure set on the high seas! There are no enemies in this world: it’s just you, your animal friend, and an ocean full of secrets and surprises.

Grow a flourishing floating farm. Cultivate rare crops and reel in elusive fish. Discover new islands and climate zones, each with its own collection of unique local flora. Fill in your Collector’s Compendium. Craft items and personalize your ship, transforming it into your own home. Learn how to gather enough rare crops and fish; you might even rise to the ultimate rank: Named-Collector!

Best of all, you don’t journey alone. Your animal friend will come along for the ride! Strengthen your bond, customize her with accessories, unlock new interactions, and grow together as you venture onwards!

Key Features

  • 🌽Farm: Cultivate your own farm on the deck of a ship, surrounded by the open sea!

  • 🌊 Discover: Sail across uncharted waters and forage on unseen islands!

  • 📔Collect: Find rare crops and fish on your quest to fill in every page of the Collector’s

    Compendium!

  • 🦕 Befriend: Forge a bond and customize your trusty animal friend who can lend a fin whenever needed!

  • 🎍Personalize: Craft useful items from foraged materials and transform your boat into your own home!

about_the_game:
My Grandpa's Haunted House is a 2D top-down survival horror game based on the story of a girl named Emily who has returned to her grandpa's house from abroad only to find out that her grandpa passed away and his spirit got trapped in the house by a Demon.

During the early 1990s, Emily grew up living in her grandpa's house. She had a lot of fun memories with her grandpa in that house. During the early 2000s, she moved out of her grandpa's house and went to a foreign country in pursuit of better career opportunities. One day, she got a letter from her grandpa's address that stated his deteriorating health conditions, which compelled her to return to her country. But little did she know that her grandpa had already passed on 2 years ago and his house was full of the Evil spirits. The letter was delivered to her just to lure her back to her grandpa's house so that the spirits could take away her soul too.

After entering the building she called out to her grandpa but was met with silence. She realized that something was wrong and she started looking for him in the kitchen, dining and bed rooms. When she first came across her grandpa, she calmed down for a while thinking that he was okay. But when he got taken away by a Doppelganger right before her eyes she realized that it was her grandpa's spirit. The spirit taking him away looked exactly like her, with the same hair style which she used to wear when she was a child. This incident made her so angry that she wanted to fight back but it was a tall order for her without the expert's help. She took away her grandpa's belongings in a silver box in order to free her grandpa's spirit. Only if it were that simple. She decided to investigate the entire house in search of clues and to find out a way to free his spirit from the grasp of the demons residing in the house.

You play as Emily and will you able to find and free your grandpa's spirit from the grasp of the Demons?

Key Features:


  • Explore your grandpa's haunted house!
  • Collect items like silver box containing your grandpa's belongings, the ritual book etc.
  • Explore the scary basement, and spirit world.
  • Come face to face with Doppelganger, the dark entity and other spirits!
  • Avoid traps like spikes and more!
  • About half an hour of paranormal investigation.

Warning:

This game contains flashing lights which may not be suitable for people with epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.



Note: I am a solo game developer and I have done all of the graphics, animation, programming, character and level design except for the music. I hope you will enjoy the game.

about_the_game:
"Through two doors at once."



This is a sci-fi mystery visual novel game. Each decision you make not only shapes your destiny but also peels back layers of hidden truths. Assemble the fragments of reality scattered across various outcomes to reconstruct the complete narrative. Dare to unravel the mysteries—your choices are the key to revealing the full spectrum of secrets.



Plunged into the depths of despair, Haryuu Ryoushi finds himself compelled by dire circumstances to a hidden underground research facility. There, he encounters Kosakai Mio, his childhood friend thought dead for nearly a decade. As fragments of a forgotten summer surge through his memory, Ryoushi is thrust into a bewildering puzzle.

The uncanny revival of a long-lost friend, the unsettling bend of time, and a sequence of chilling murders within this isolated enclave... Ryoushi is forced to navigate through this maze of mysteries, seeking clues that might unravel his twisted fate.

Confined spaces and impenetrable locks, a chain of unexplained deaths; the bending of space-time, quantum entanglements, and experiments that challenge reality itself. Prepare for the science fiction mystery you've been longing for.



Clear script structure, refined narrative, multi-round unlocking mechanism, blue silhouettes...
A return to origins, paying tribute to the classic form of visual novels.

  • Retro-style performances
  • Full Japanese voice acting
  • Cross-platform cloud save
  • Forward and backward jumps, multi-round sharing, the most perfected flowchart system in the "Reincarnation Butterfly" series to date.

about_the_game:
Welcome to SMYS : Classic, a local multiplayer stairs building race game.

In SMYS, you play as a zglub, a wild little creature with an insatiable hunger for sweets of all sorts. Above all, yumyums are by far zglubs' favorites and it is no surprise you'd be willing to fight over your comrades to be the one to get a taste of those heavenly delicious treats.

  • Hop in your canon and collect blocks and bonuses
  • Build a staircase to get to the yumyum before the other team
  • 2 to 4 PLAYERS locally or remotely using Steam Remote Play Together
  • Infinite round based

Final Version
This game is what I originally planned for SMYS : Show Me Your Stairs, but I happened to overscope and feature creep so hard that the project ended up not looking like what is was supposed to be. The final version plays different, the item collection part is separated from the building part, but features way more content and multiple game modes.

If you liked SMYS : Classic I'm sure you'll enjoy what the project eventually came to be so make sure to check it out.

short_description: Dish Up Fruit is a 3D puzzle game where you combine fruits and arrange them on a plate. Enjoy the colorful design and changing fruits as you play. Load up on lots of fruit and beat your high score now!

name: Doodle Deities
short_description: Doodle Deities is a roguelike deck builder that is all about creating powerful synergies, discovering new treasures and unlocking bosses to play as. Never run out of content again with a simple editor that requires no programming and full steam workshop integration

about_the_game:
BECOME AN ASTEROID MINER




Loot the precious gems contained within the asteroids and use them to upgrade your spaceship from the most basic vessel into a steamrolling death machine!

SINGLEPLAYER




Stand your ground against waves of vicious alien ships. Fight through galaxies of increasing difficulty and ultimately challenge the boss alien.

As your ship grows stronger from looting, for each level-up you'll be provided a choice of various upgrades to select. Take a moment to think about how you'll build your ship as all upgrades unlock interesting and valuable abilities!

MULTIPLAYER




Instead of aliens you will fight against other miners in PvP multiplayer matches of up to 16 contestants.

Allocate your loot in real time into upgrade levels to make your ship perform the way it needs to to come out on top!
name: ROIDERS
short_description: Become an asteroid miner and loot your way to supremacy! Fight waves of vicious aliens or battle against your friends.

name: Armored Suit Solgante
short_description: Play as a mech pilot battling against threats to your nation. But in your struggle to defeat the terrorist forces, you become implicated in one of the very schemes you're fighting against...

name: Circoid
short_description: One-button precise, dynamic 2D platformer. Collect pixels, open doors, avoid obstacles and enemies. Find your way to the finals and unlock the next levels.

name: Project P
short_description: Explore the maze, run for your life and aim your arrows carefully in this minimal top down survival game.Use the layout of the maze to sneak around, take your shot and run before you get spotted by the monster you are trying to take down.

name: EMITIME
short_description: A Roguelike Grid-based deck builder where music and beat are your strategies. Expand your deck as you defeat the enemies you encounter along the way, and switch between the two protagonists from the past and future as you explore the map.

about_the_game:
A cat spirit appears one day in a typical village from eastern France. Villagers there all seem to struggle with mental health. Depression, loneliness, trauma, burn out, regrets, anxiety, and grief are part of their daily lives, but you can help them feel better and regain some emotional stability. Katzala tackles difficult themes in a soothing and poetic atmosphere where dialogue and explanation give way to contemplation and suggestion.


During the day, listen to conversations to learn about the villagers! Although you are not able to be seen or heard, or even talk, you can still learn a lot about the villagers by wandering around the streets, watching people's routines and interactions, and listening to conversations. You will thus gather a lot of information that will allow you to understand what's going on with each character and how to help them.


Read people's mind! As a cat, you have a sort of sixth sense that makes you visualize people's thoughts. Sometimes they use words, sometimes only images, but you can still understand a lot just by observing.

As a cat spirit, you can visit villagers at night when they are asleep. They have lowered their mental barriers and are more receptive to whatever you want to say. Depending on your progress and on the villager, you will have access to different levels of depth for the subconscious. The easiest thing to do at first is to influence someone's dreams. Indeed, when you're wandering the village during the day, you can collect words, ideas and even smells to release them at night in people's minds. This allows you to convey messages through dreams and it will influence the way villagers act or feel the next day.

At night, unlock some memories of villagers to understand their past and how it can affect their present.

The deepest level of subconscious involves hidden emotions and traumas. They are represented by different mini-games with several levels that evolve with your progression in a character's story. You need to fight negative emotions and inner demons in order to bring peace and emotional balance to the minds.

Throughout the game, you are also led to discover more about your history as a cat spirit and the reasons of your existence.


Katzala offers an emotional experience with several strong points:

Soft and hand-drawn visuals by a talented artist
A point of view rarely explored in narrative games: the player embodies an invisible and inaudible character, which adds a dimension of complexity and depth to the interactions
Difficult themes are addressed in a poetic and soothing atmosphere, offering contemplative reflection
An original geographical and cultural anchor: the story takes place in a picturesque Alsatian village
15 different characters with a history, a past and a deep personality
Each psychological problem is represented by a mini-game, and the exploration of memories, dreams and subconscious minds offers a rich variety of gameplay in service of the story

name: Ruby Dreams: Immortal Promise

about_the_game:
Twilight Bastion is said to be an abyss situated between illusion and reality. Popularly believed to serve as purgatory for the condemned, you wake up in this very place, unaware of who you are, or why you've been sent to this winding, ominous castle to suffer its torture.

FEATURES

  • Collect Armor, Shields, & Weapons
Open chests, pillage corpses, or find secret areas to discover new armor, more sturdy shields, and more powerful weapons.

  • Define Your Playstyle
In Twilight Bastion, there is no predefined starter class; Throughout your quest, you will have the ability to naturally progress into your preferred playstyle. As you accrue Sanctity—the currency used to upgrade your stats—you can elect to invest in Strength and Dexterity to mold yourself into a swordsman; you could elect to invest in Intelligence to become a powerful sorcerer; or invest in Luck and Stamina to be more of a vagrant who's shifty and relies on luck to stumble into powerful items.

  • Vibrant Retro Graphics
Inspired by the 5th console generation, experience a world flush with detail, harboring the unique yet nostalgic graphical fidelity from the mid-90s.

  • Soulslike + Metroidvania
Twilight Bastion encompasses in-depth 3D Platforming where you will have to push, pull, climb, grab and shimmy your way into new areas to progress and find power ups. Simultaneously, you can expect a robust combat system with the ability to dodge, jump, block, parry and perform execution moves on your enemies.

name: Pyromania
short_description: Pyromania is an action-packed horde survival game. Strategy and movement are key to surviving the ever-growing hordes of zombies, wild animals and other monsters. It can be played either solo or in online-coop with up to 4 players.

about_the_game:
A focused dungeon-running romp through the land of Relaryia! The land is sliding into chaos, and Avatars have emerged from the elemental planes to restore balance to the land by rooting out the sources of corruption.

Features:

  • Explore a variety of dungeons and places including crypts, ruined castles, deep forests, with more dungeons being added over time!
Turn based battles with unique strategies that build on:
  • Character skills and synergies - most skills have multiple functions
  • Weapon and Elemental damage types / Enemy Weaknesses and resistances
  • Statuses that can be used in combination with some abilities

Assemble your team of Elemental Avatars!

Gren - Avatar of Flame
  • A strong melee fighter that wields a greatsword and elemental fire to scorch his enemies!
Tiefe - Avatar of Water
  • A mystical warrior with a scythe along with water and ice spells to damage and impede enemies!
Holtz - Avatar of Earth
  • A naturalist who employs a staff along with earthen magic to heal allies and crush foes!
Aike - Avatar of Storm
  • A wild dual-axe swinging barbarian harnessing the storm to deliver thunderous, rapid pain to her adversaries!
Ratha - Avatar of Light
  • A stalwart healer and caster with a hammer that heals her friends and judges enemies with the power of light!
Sareth - Avatar of Darkness
  • A crafty whip wielder that shifts with the shadows, shaping the darkness to her will to break her enemies down!

about_the_game:
Welcome to Bob the Block Rebooted, the remake of a really, really old game I made in a class at school! Control Bob and venture through unique stages, all of them slightly increasing in difficulty over time. Use your trusty gun to reach places no ordinary block would be able.

The game includes:

~ Clean, precise platforming controls with WASD and mouse
~ 40 unique stages that get harder as you progress
~ Crisp sound effects and a chiptune song, made by my good friend Ttenneb!!

This game was created out of boredom over a summer break when I wanted to learn a bit of coding- this game would not be possible without the helpful tutorials made by Shaun Spalding, huge thanks to you!! The game itself is short and sweet, but hopefully you can get some enjoyment out of it :3

Embark on an epic journey to reclaim the Dwarven homeland of Moria, and explore, craft, and build in procedurally generated worlds. Play as a solo adventurer, or join friends in co-op gameplay for up to 8 players.

name: Spellomancer
short_description: Battle your foes for enchanted letters using wacky weapons and earn points by constructing words in your team's spellbook in this new action platformer spell-em-up!

short_description: Loki’s Revenge is a bullet heaven roguelite where you play as Norse gods fighting Loki’s army of monsters! Level up to gain powerful upgrades and explore hand-crafted maps to find secret items. Build the ultimate overpowered god with permanent upgrades and master each god’s signature weapon.

name: Pelago
short_description: Pelago is a creature-catching adventure game! Explore the islands of Pelago and befriend the creatures that live there. Build your perfect team to overcome any challenge and unravel the mysteries of the islands.

about_the_game:
Tilt and jump your way out of the depths of a grand city.

                                     Ascend to the stars and meet the great spiral!

                                        Our game is based on these principles:

                 The new innovative potted plant controls really make you feel like a plant.

                                           Your determination is of utmost importance.

                                                                     and

name: Fire Magician: Arcana
short_description: "Fire Magician" is a third-person action shooter game where the player controls a cute magician named Arcana, battling poker enemies. By stacking energy, the player can use cool wind and fire abilities to defeat the Poker King, Suoha, reclaim the Wheel of Fortune, and save their plundered homeland!

name: Carbon Reset
short_description: Enter a future of democratized space travel and exploration with one catch – a powerful corporate consortium pulls the strings. An expert combat pilot wakes up unbeknownst of her whereabouts, history and name. She will fight to determine who she is, what it means to her, and what the future holds.

name: 9SHOT
short_description: This game is purely for catharsis; there's no main storyline and it will never conclude "9Shot" is a first-person shooter game set in a zombie-infested Tokyo streets. Your objective is simple: survive against waves of zombies for as long as possible. Earn points by killing zombies to upgrade weapons

name: Gun Runners
short_description: Blast your way through ever increasing hordes of space bandits and alien creatures in this action roguelite. Level up your character and obtain powerful upgrade items with a variety of effects. Procedurally generated enemy waves and item choices prevent any two runs from playing out the same way.

name: MOON THIRST
short_description: MOON THIRST - A lonely ancient vampire who was banished into the tangled and dangerous dark forests by the forces of ancient magicians. Left without your normal strength, you must explore cursed forests, encounter and defeat various enemies and creatures.

name: Eulogy of an Insect
short_description: A skullcap-wearing woman makes a woefully wrong turn, ending up in a crapsack world full of fantastical creatures. Among them she finds misery, BUGS, apathy, and a shockingly strict adherence to paying one's fair share in taxes.

name: Cave in
short_description: stuck in a cave, survive and escape.

about_the_game:
Prepare for an epic naval showdown like never before in Battleshots: Chaos Edition – the ultimate battleship board-style game with a thrilling twist! Engage in fierce naval combat with up to 8 players at once, as you command your fleet to victory in the high seas.

Strategize, plot, and maneuver your ships across the game board, carefully targeting your opponent's vessels while safeguarding your own. But beware, for every attack you make could be influenced by unpredictable random events that shake up the traditional gameplay dynamics.

Navigate through treacherous waters where sudden storms, rogue waves, or unexpected reinforcements can turn the tide of battle in an instant. Adapt your tactics on the fly as you contend with ever-changing conditions and rival captains vying for supremacy.

With customizable fleets and a plethora of random events, Battleshots: Chaos Edition will offer endless replayability and excitement for both seasoned commanders and newcomers alike. Will you emerge as the undisputed master of the seas, or will you sink beneath the waves? The fate of the fleet is in your hands!
name: Battleshots: Chaos Edition
short_description: Strategize, plot, and maneuver your ships across the game board, carefully targeting your opponent's vessels while safeguarding your own. But beware, as for every attack could be influenced by unpredictable random events that shake up the traditional gameplay dynamics.

name: Gunbug
short_description: Unleash mayhem as a heavily armed centipede in this top-down 2D shoot 'em up. Start with sharp mandibles and build your ultimate arsenal to survive relentless hordes and boss battles. Play solo or team up with up to nine friends for multiplayer mayhem. Guns, bugs, and chaos – what could go wrong?

name: Hidden Vintage House Top-Down 3D
short_description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Dashlab
short_description: A 2D time attack game where you dash around rooms and collect buffs and debuffs to complete levels as fast as possible. Featuring an endless mode where you can use your own songs!

about_the_game:
Greta Tanner died in her sleep last night.

The doctors don’t know what to think. Sure, Greta was old, but not old enough to die without an apparent cause. She didn’t take pills, had no medical problems, and had no recent surgeries.

Winter creeps into the small town of Trenton, Alaska. The roads are blocked with snow, and the wind carries an icy dagger.

Dr. Grayson, the town’s new resident doctor, examines Greta's corpse. Some bruising. Slight burn marks on her legs – it could be frostbite. Hidden under Greta’s hair are five crescent-shaped wounds. None are severe enough to have been the cause of death, but the marks are fresh and bloody. There has to be a connection.

Was Greta murdered? Or is there something else going on in Trenton? Some people in town have been acting weird, and a strange song is singing in the wind. Or is that just madness?

Dr. Grayson must find whatever killed Greta Tanner and stop it from killing anyone else.



The Sleeping Sickness is an interactive short story that allows the player to guide the main character's actions.

Each day, the player chooses where Grayson investigates. The player’s choices will lock and unlock future locations, change dialogue, and alter the story. Choices matter in The Sleeping Sickness.

While The Sleeping Sickness includes sounds, graphics, and interactive sections, it focuses on the story.

The game is designed to play like a choose-your-own-adventure book and is an excellent choice for horror fans, avid readers, and lovers of creepy pastas.



Each playthrough lasts 45 – 60 minutes and covers ~9,000 words. The entire story is approximately 31,000 words (roughly the length of Of Mice and Men by John Steinbeck).

Each playthrough will feel like a complete short story altered by the player’s choices. However, multiple read-throughs will be required to uncover the entire mystery.

The Sleeping Sickness has six possible endings. Will you experience them all? Will you solve the mystery? Will you cure the sleeping sickness?
name: The Sleeping Sickness
short_description: The Sleeping Sickness is an interactive short story that allows the player to guide the main character's actions. The player’s choices will lock and unlock future locations, change dialogue, and alter the story. Choices matter in The Sleeping Sickness. It is an excellent choice for horror fans.

about_the_game:
# Enigma Of Forest

4v1 Werewolf Hunt Multiplayer Horror Game Unveil the mysteries of the darkness and prepare to survive!
Enigma Of Forest: Delve into the forest with a group of 5 friends and witness the horrors of nature.
But this innocent exploration will turn into a nightmare as one of you succumbs to a terrible curse. One of you is now a werewolf!
Cooperate to survive: You will need to work together to find out who the werewolf is and escape its savage attacks.
Follow clues, set traps, and trust each other to solve the mysteries of the darkness.Each game is a different experience: Procedurally generated maps and random events make each game unique.
You will never know what you are going to face, which will increase the tension and excitement.
Feel the tension and fear: Atmospheric sounds and terrifying visuals will rip your heart out and make you feel like a monster is lurking around every corner.
Enigma Of Forest offers you:4v1 co-op horror experience Procedurally generated maps and random eventsTense and terrifying atmosphere
The challenge of working together with your friends to surviveThe mystery of finding out who the werewolf is Step into the darkness with courage and fight to survive!

# Community

about_the_game:
In the “Ice & Fire Unrivaled", players take on the role of a powerful adventurer, entering ruins to search for treasures. The entire treasure hunt process was filled with tension and excitement. As an action role-playing here can bring you an unparalleled gaming experience. Defeat enemies and obtain spoils of war, cultivate powerful characters.

Collect gems to enhance skills

By searching for treasure chests and defeating enemies, you can obtain gems, which can be used to enhance your own abilities and increase your magic level. When encountering obstacles from strong enemies, level up your character and challenge again after becoming stronger. Both new and experienced players of action games can enjoy the fun brought by the game. After experiencing death, we should strive to survive even more.

Prepare your weapons and embark on an adventure to search for treasures.

about_the_game:
"Bunny Space Odyssey: The Countdown" is a hidden objects game: you need to find 100 eared helmets.
Explore the scientist's lab, find all the bunny helmets, and start delving into the story of the hopping pixel universe.
Just click on the helmet if you find it - and the countdown will begin! Make sure to catch everything!

"Bunny Space Odyssey: The Countdown" can be considered a prequel to the big story of the planet FlopHop, so you can also discover parts of the bunny world narration while searching for the helmets.
Click on those items where the cursor becomes a magnifying glass instead of a carrot - and you will learn more about the Bunny Space Odyssey world.
Will rabbits fly away from Earth, where life is becoming dangerous? Are you ready to embark on this mission?

Get achievements for finding helmets, reading lore, playing with the timer and setting new records! Is everybunn ready?


Find the link under the 'Basic Info' tab and join the AinkOink Discord Server!
name: Bunny Space Odyssey: The countdown
short_description: Seek out and collect bunny helmets scattered across the laboratory. But wait, bunny helmets with ears? Perhaps the veil of mystery will be lifted, revealing why we're collecting these ear-topped helmets?

name: Urok
short_description: Use the natural resources in your environment to cast epic elemental spells! In this turn-based strategy game, every stone, wind, and flame is yours to control. Discover new spell cards and outwit cunning enemies!

name: Fantasmigon
short_description: Fantasmigon is an original turn-based strategy set in a vibrant fantasy world. Engage in thrilling battles and tactical gameplay as you lead your band of characters through challenging encounters

about_the_game:
Beautiful landscapes come to life with poetry, music, and art from around the world. Verse VR invites you on incredible journeys, letting you relax and explore eight distinct environments. Wander through open VR spaces, discovering hotspots that trigger beautifully illustrated works, spoken word, and classical music inspired by the world's rich cultural history. Comment end  Trigger stunning art that comes to life as you let yourself be carried away by illustrated written works and spoken word from diverse cultural histories of the world. Discover 28 spoken word experiences woven within the environments, each waiting to be revealed.

Explore 17 music hotspots, including many original recordings exclusively for Verse VR, embedded throughout the landscapes. Let the inspiring sounds envelop you—featuring music from European, West African, Chinese, and Middle Eastern artists.


Immerse yourself in eight breathtaking environments, each featuring art designed in collaboration with artists steeped in the region's traditions and culture. Experience the warmth of an African community, the tranquility of a Chinese garden, and more as you connect with the unique atmosphere of each culture.

Sit back and relax, surrounded by a world of beauty. Whether you're seeking a peaceful escape from a busy day, a few moments of tranquility, or a deeper connection to rich cultural traditions, Verse VR is made for you!

short_description: Immerse yourself in beautiful landscapes full of poetry, music, and art from around the world. Relax in a Chinese garden, explore the ruins of a mythical land, discover the joy of a West African village, and lose yourself in a Victorian conservatory. Welcome to a VR experience unlike any other.

name: Skel Dungeon: Heroes Must Die!
short_description: Skel Dungeon is a real-time strategy defense game. Become a small skeleton and defeat the heroes invading your dungeon. Set up and upgrade trap rooms, expand your dungeon, and strengthen your skeleton to stand against increasingly powerful heroes.

name: The Final Keeper
short_description: You are the last surviving keeper, tasked with the recovery of the relics dropped by your fellow fallen keepers. Explore a fully destructible dark fantasy post apocalyptic world, as you fight your way towards redemption.

name: FindMe
short_description: This is a 2D flatformer game where you go on an adventure to regain your body, and you arrive at your destination through various sections. Lots of prepared obstacles, traps, and tricks. I hope you reach your destination with all your detailed manipulation, memory, persistence, and luck.

name: Abandoned Hut
short_description: Explore scary places in this first-person horror game. Interact with characters, solve puzzles and discover that bad intentions can lead to catastrophic consequences.

name: Whisper Of The Shade: Gray
short_description: 《煙硝絮語 灰鷹》是基於手遊《煙硝絮語》製作的咖啡廳模擬經營遊戲，遊戲中玩家扮演的主角因為姐姐失蹤前往一間咖啡廳；而在看似普通店面的偽裝之下，這裡其實為一處國家級的情報機構秘密據點，為了能找到失蹤的親愛家人，女主角誤打誤撞成為這間咖啡廳的店長，將在尋找線索的同時肩負起經營咖啡廳的責任。

name: Red Ruins: Asymmetric VR vs. PC
short_description: Red Ruins is an asymmetric VR game created by students, where one player becomes a Demon Lord in VR, facing off against Heroes on PC. With powerful weapons and strategic gameplay, players must either vanquish their foes or join forces to conquer the Red Ruins together.

name: The Betweenlands
short_description: Mori is stuck on the Core, miles below the beautiful Surface. She must use her trusty grappling hook to traverse the Betweenlands, clusters of floating islands hovering between the Core and the Surface. Explore and climb unique skyscapes to discover Mori's true desires in this precision platformer.

name: Marfa
short_description: Marfa is a quest, where you can immerse yourself in the airy atmosphere of the summer and sunny world and help the cat Marfa fulfill the dream of her owner, an artist, to realize the plan of an ideal city.

about_the_game:
It was just another peaceful day for Kappa Yo and his pal Tanuki Jo when suddenly the evil Oni Shogun cracked open a portal from Oni World and invaded with his army of yokai! The yokai have kidnapped the princess and even pilfered Yo's stash of cucumbers, what a disaster! Now it’s up to our heroes to defeat the Oni Shogun and his fiendish army, rescue the princess and take back their cucumbers.

Kappa Quest is a fast-paced, retro-inspired action adventure through ancient Japan. Play as either Yo or Jo on a mission to defeat the army of yokai and save the day. Encounter challenging levels full of treacherous tricks and traps. Use Yo and Jo’s special abilities to take down bosses and track down treasure.

name: Arcane Trigger
short_description: From the Creators of "Endgame of Devil" comes their latest masterpiece! This time, you’re not the Devil Lord — you’re a gunslinger with magic at your fingertips! Pick your Arcane Bullets to lay down some serious firepower!

name: AI Confidential
short_description: Artificial Intelligence, Real Problems: You are Makenzy Turner, an affable RoboTechnician employed by AI megacorp, Indelligent Solutions. With your trusty assistant ARI, use high-tech tools and old-fashioned empathy to mend everything from broken parts to broken hearts.

name: 幻兽纸牌
short_description: Each start will have a different beginning. The game is set in a cartoon style, with simple and fresh graphics. Players need to deal high damage to defeat their boss through playing cards to clear the level. Suitable for players who enjoy challenges, randomness, and creativity.

name: Scyla
short_description: Dive into the waters of Scyla, a third-person 3D exploration adventure inspired by Lovecraft's universe. Discover the mysteries hidden into the depths as you pilot a submarine through a strange cave system. Run away from a criature that stalks you.

name: Rise of Tochos
short_description: Take action in this immersive 3D experience where you can build your own village, command your troops into battle, and plunder resources from enemies.

about_the_game:
The game is still being worked on so try the demo first and buy the game if you want to support the development!

This is our first game so we want to let as many people try it as possible, but if you enjoy it feel free to support us by buying the game! The demo gives you access to 3 characters and lets you try the game before you buy. Please give it a try and if you have any issues or feedback contact us! We are still working on the game and fixing bugs, but people wanted a way to support the development so the game is available for purchase.


Knock back and knock out opponents

Fight and launch your opponents around the arena. As you deal damage your opponents will get knocked back further and faster. Position yourself and aim your attacks to knock your opponents out of the ring. In the Bash game mode knock opponents into parts of the environment that have been corrupted by magic to knock them out. 

Tag team fighting

Create a team of three characters that can be swapped to mid combo. Strategically create a team, pick characters that cover each others weaknesses, or play to each others strengths.

Brawl and Bash

Fight against 3 other players and many enemies to get loot that powers you up in this unique 4 player free-for-all throughout the city.
name: Brawlers of Duality
short_description: Brawlers of Duality Is still being developed. It is a top-down arena fighter where damaging enemies launches them harder, launch enemies out of the arena to defeat them. Battle in 1v1, 2v2, and a FFA mode where you defeat enemies to power up and take on other players.

name: Vs. Self
short_description: Tyoma leads a double life... a life of crime and deception. His carefully crafted life is thrown into shambles when he creates an unexpected bond with a gas station customer.

name: Cherophobia
short_description: You find yourself stranded in a forest after your car breaks down. A short psychological horror game.

name: Gimmick! 2
short_description: Embark on a sparkling journey in this long-awaited sequel to SUNSOFT’s legendary 8-bit platformer Gimmick! Solve puzzles, trick enemies, and explore a physics-based playground. Yumetaro is back!

about_the_game:
patterns in sensate experience reinforce an illusion of CONTINUITY
the DREAM is a construction of the MIND that perpetuates the ILLUSION

the cartesian prison is a hall of mirrors, a recursive LABYRINTH
each a reflection of me - only PATTERNS and PROCESSES

the present moment is the only thing that is real - FOCUS
chaotic attractors are seizing your ATTENTION. don't push or pull at it

you have to reduce model complexity, you must cultivate FLOW
the GAME, is about keeping your MIND at ONE place!

CONCENTRATE

and remember…

ATTENTION IS ALL YOU NEED
☯️🧘🙏

Features

TAMASHIKA is a fast-paced arcade style corridor shooter with hand drawn animations, precision sound effects and upbeat background music

You get
ONE weapon: A semi-automatic pistol
ONE side-arm: A tantō blade
ONE level: Procedurally generated, layout changes every day
ONE achievement: 1 hidden

Actions: Walk, strafe, shoot, reload, melee, parry, blink (teleport) & astral projection

There are No Checkpoints, No Unlocks & No Cutscenes
(the game does NOT include these features!)

The developer predicts this game could be described as difficult & repetitive

Total playtime is approximately 10 minutes (start to end, no restarts - pending playtesting)

Please note - This feature set is subject to change prior to release! Changes will be published here and posted on the community forums

short_description: Godforged: Origins of Ozgalor is a story-rich, single-player Action RPG set in the world of Nelethar. Experience tactical combat, class blending, and kingdom ruling in a world besieged by a god, where your actions and choices shape the future of Ozgalor.

name: Kiki
short_description: Kiki, is a single player story driven action adventure game with survival elements where you will control Kiki as she goes into a journey to save her village from years of curse in a fantastic world.

name: Summon: Joint escape
short_description: Summon: Joint Escape is a cooperative horror survival game for 1-4 players. Find a way to escape from a stalker in camouflage uniform who wants to give you a piece of paper with the inscription "Summon".

name: Low Batt
short_description: Step into the thrilling world of Low Batt, a heart-pounding Top Down Shooter that pits you against the formidable security forces of L.E.A.D. Industries. Navigate through intense challenges requiring a blend of skill and strength and embark on an epic robotic adventure to rescue your robo-dog.

name: Cave Crawler 2
short_description: Cave Crawler 2 is a retro-inspired 2D side-scroller. Escape a series of winding caves full of strange creatures and treacherous platforming challenges.

name: Virus Hunter - Adult Only
short_description: “This game is an sexy_action game. The protagonist, Aiko, is a heroic figure fighting for justice. She must save a world that has been ravaged by the H_virus.”

name: Aria - Das Echo der vergessenen Zeit
short_description: Experience a Time Travel with Aria in "Aria - The Echo of Forgotten Time". Discover mysterious eras, develop skills, and influence destiny.Which path will you choose, and will there be a happy ending? It's in your hands!
steamspy_name: Aria - Das Echo der vergessenen Zeit

name: Stronghold Defenders
short_description: Gather and manage resources, defend your stronghold, explore and expand your kingdom and fight back against corruption.

name: Smol Survivors
short_description: Smol Survivors is a 2D reverse bullet-heck where smol blocks have become lost and need to find their friends and a way back home while fighting through hordes of enemies.

about_the_game:
An adult visual novel game, "Kitagawa Yuko" (39 years old), depicts a single mother who lives alone with her son, "Kitagawa Hiromi" (20 years old).

Yuko's husband ran away, leaving her burdened with debt.

Yuko and Hiromi's suffering worsens when debt collectors come after them to repay the debts left by Yuko's husband.

As time passes, Hiromi and Yuko support each other to survive.

Hiromi, unable to bear seeing his mother working so hard to pay off the debts, reluctantly drops out of college.

The twenty-year-old man works tirelessly, even holding down three jobs as a laborer on construction projects, a food delivery driver, and writing his own novel.

Yuko's innocent and caring nature would make Hiromi do anything to make his mother happy.

Despite their hard work to repay the debts, their relationship grows incredibly close as mother and son, as they must rely on each other.

Due to their poverty, they can only afford to rent a small apartment with one room.

This situation forces them to share a bed, and although their lives are difficult, they become even closer because of it.

They often confide in each other every night, discussing work, future plans, money-saving strategies, women, and sometimes delving into slightly sensitive topics.

Sometimes the sensitive topics they discuss day by day make things even more awkward, especially Yuko.

For example, when Hiromi asks about sex, Hiromi is anxious about finding a girlfriend or woman.

Yuko tries to be calm with her son because the conversations sometimes cross the line.

However, it's just a topic that makes things temporarily awkward.

After that, they would joke around with each other and the atmosphere would return to normal.

But will these enjoyable days last?

One day Hiromi accidentally saw his mother naked because his mother was changing clothes.

And since then Hiromi couldn't get rid of thoughts about his moher.

Hiromi sleeps in the same bed as his mother, right?

After all, Hiromi is also a man, something could happen, right?
name: Room of Lust - Dirty Conversation With Mom
short_description: An adult visual novel game, "Kitagawa Yuko" (39 years old), depicts a single mother who lives alone with her son, "Kitagawa Hiromi" (20 years old). Her husband ran away, leaving her burdened with debt. Then the relationship between mother and son crosses the line due to accidents and circumstances.
steamspy_name: Room of Lust - Dirty Conversation With Mom

about_the_game:
Being in complete darkness, a person is involuntarily seized by the thought of whether they are alone in it. Perhaps one day, after turning the light off, you will hear someone non-human breathing behind your back. What is happening in the darkness is changing rapidly, but will the light be able to dispel the evil?

Use the flashlight to protect yourself from the evil.


Just a short time ago, it was your home, but something’s changed… There are coming from behind the walls, they’re hiding in the dark, THEY’RE FOLLOWING YOU. But do they really exist or it’s just your insanity?

The events are rapidly changing!


They’re changing it. From now on, it’s their dwelling and they’re waiting for the darkness to come to get to you.

Will you be able to survive?


Use the found objects, complete the tasks while avoiding and scaring away the creatures. Try to defend your dwelling!

Game features:

  • Intense horror gameplay: you will experience moments of fear and surprise.
  • Using the flashlight: the creatures fear the light..
  • Various tasks: find and use objects to complete missions and explore the changing dwelling.
  • Unpleasant enemies: avoid and fend off attacks from sinister creatures lurking in the darkness.
  • Changing locations: your dwelling gradually changes under the influence of the invading creatures..
  • Storyline: multiple endings are present.

Get ready to immerse yourself in an atmosphere of horror and tension, where every step you take could be your last. Your dwelling has become an arena for battling evil. Can you survive and keep your sanity?

name: Endeavor
short_description: Endeavor is a 3D Space Adventure. Explore, Gather, Build and Battle your way through the unknown frontiers of deep space.

name: Nihiland
short_description: Have you ever felt the Nihility? A feeling that everything is meaningless and feeling down because of it... Come to Nihiland to relax and meditate and hopefully you will have all the answers.

name: Flight Risk
short_description: Fight Risk is a minimalistic desk job game where you play as an air traffic controller trying to save a rogue flight. Master the communication systems before it's too late, or just wing it and see what happens!

name: Hunter's Arena: Revolution
short_description: “Hunter’s Arena Revolution” merges survival and escape elements of the extraction genre with thrilling combat action, offering an accessible yet immersive gaming experience.

about_the_game:
Hundreds of beautiful girls are captured by horrible monsters, who exploit them to extract magical energy. You'll embark on adventures in dungeons, aboard pirate ships, and through forgotten temples to rescue these hostages from their vile captors. Defeat the guards and decide the fate of the prisoners. Remember, each girl’s release grants you new magical powers and skills, which you can use to compete in the Pleasure Tower, where the best heroes vie for the Stud Throne!



Immerse yourself in captivating match-3 battle gameplay where you align elemental gems to unleash magical techniques and triumph in combat. Craft ingenious strategies by combining hundreds of abilities and effects, tailoring your approach to each unique opponent.



  • Dynamic Role System: Each girl you collect enhances your team's capabilities, making every acquisition meaningful and impactful.
  • Vast Character Roster: Amass a diverse collection of hundreds of characters, each brought to life with stunning high-resolution animations and compelling backstories.
  • Strategic Progression: Utilize special items to amplify your team's abilities and fuel your adventures.
  • Engaging Weekly Events: Dive into riveting storylines that offer opportunities to recruit new characters, acquire valuable items, and gather resources to bolster your team's strength.

name: Escape Horror Online
short_description: A multiplayer horror escape game for one or up to four players, PvE mode allows you and your friends to work together to escape from an area. In PvP mode, you can also play as the monster and prevent players from escaping. Use your special skills to prevent them from escaping!

name: TouchNothing
short_description: 3D view, first person but no person，challenge yourself，several levels，A torture game.

about_the_game:
Imagine being confined to your bed by sleep paralysis, unable to move, while something keeps you company in the darkness of your room on a stormy, rainy night. Your only hope is to survive until dawn, using your wits to overcome fear and stay calm. But here comes the real challenge: every blink counts. Can you maintain your sanity and survive until daylight dispels the night terrors?

Welcome to Bonanit, a 100% random game where no two playthroughs are the same. Each night brings new horrors, and every moment of sleep paralysis tests your mental resilience. The sinister atmosphere intensifies with every whisper in the dark, where each decision could be your last.






In "Bona nit," experience the paralyzing reality of sleep paralysis. Imagine being trapped in your bed, unable to move, while sensing a sinister presence lurking in the darkness of your room. Every sound, every shadow, and every whisper will make you question your sanity. Can you survive until dawn?




You will never know what to expect in "Bona nit." Each game is a unique experience, with randomly generated horrors ensuring that every night is different from the last. This unpredictability keeps you constantly on edge, never knowing what terror awaits around the corner.




"Bona nit" not only tests your survival skills but also your mental strength. Face your worst fears while trying to stay calm in sleep paralysis situations. Every blink and every decision are crucial. Do you have what it takes to keep your sanity amidst the chaos?




Immerse yourself in a terrifying environment with a raging storm outside and chilling whispers filling the darkness of your room. Sound and shadows combine to create an atmosphere so realistic that you will feel the terror in every fiber of your being. In "Bona nit," every moment could be your last.




The real test comes at the end of each night. Your goal is simple: survive until dawn. But with a malevolent entity lurking, every second feels eternal. Only the bravest and mentally strongest will survive the longest night of their lives. Are you ready to face the unknown and test your endurance?

"Bona nit" not only tests your survival skills but also your mental strength. Face your worst fears while trying to stay calm in sleep paralysis situations. Every blink and every decision are crucial. Do you have what it takes to keep your sanity amidst the chaos?




Immerse yourself in a terrifying environment with a raging storm outside and chilling whispers filling the darkness of your room. Sound and shadows combine to create an atmosphere so realistic that you will feel the terror in every fiber of your being. In "Bona nit," every moment could be your last.




The real test comes at the end of each night. Your goal is simple: survive until dawn. But with a malevolent entity lurking, every second feels eternal. Only the bravest and mentally strongest will survive the longest night of their lives. Are you ready to face the unknown and test your endurance?

name: The Supper: New Blood
short_description: Do you hear the doorbell, Stewie? Your first guest is here...and something tells me they’ll never leave this motel...

name: Metamorphosis

about_the_game:
Build, Manage, and Race in the World of GTR - Garage Town Racing

Take the wheel and control your own garage in GTR - Garage Town Racing, where you’re more than just a driver! This management and racing game lets you customize and enhance every detail of your workshop and cars. Collect exclusive vehicles, build models from scratch, and challenge friends in thrilling PvP races!

GTR - Garage Town Racing combines the adrenaline of racing with management strategy, offering players the chance to transform a small garage into the biggest hub in a city full of automotive enthusiasts.

Game Features

  • Expand and upgrade your workspace, attract more clients, and increase profits while transforming your garage into a powerhouse.

  • Compete against friends in real-time challenges and prove that your garage produces the city’s best cars. 

  • From engines to paint, customize every detail of your cars. Decorate your garage to stand out and attract new clients. 

  • Find exclusive parts, manufacture original vehicles, and create a one-of-a-kind collection of cars.

  • Visit friends' garages, challenge them to races, and trade rare parts to upgrade your inventory.

A Personalized Racing & Management Experience

In GTR - Garage Town Racing, the passion for cars goes far beyond the track. Customize every detail of your car, prepare for exciting races, and build connections with other players as you transform your garage into a workshop that stands out.

If you’re a fan of racing and strategy, GTR - Garage Town Racing offers the best of both worlds, in a setting where your workshop is the city’s core, and the open road is your stage.
name: GTR - Garage Town Racing
short_description: Take the wheel in GTR - Garage Town Racing! Manage your garage, build and customize unique cars, challenge friends in PVP races, and create the ultimate workshop!

name: Lalli
short_description: Lalli tells the tale of a Finnish folk hero and freedom fighter. In 1240, Finland is invaded by the neighboring Swedish Kingdom, aiming to convert the tribes to Christianity by force. This is when a regular woodsman is forced to adapt into a warrior - and a legend, remembered centuries later.

name: Shiftall Controller Driver
short_description: Installing this driver allows the supported controller to be used with SteamVR.

name: Sigils of Nightfall
short_description: Sigils of Nightfall is a roguelike deckbuilder that combines dungeon crawling with elements of the award-winning RPG, Mörk Borg. Embark on a dark journey, improve your character, and survive at all costs — or be consumed by the horrors lurking in the darkness.

name: Holy Shot
short_description: Holy Shot is a fast-paced, physics-based top-down shooter. Face nasty hordes of monsters in a chaotic environmental destruction, combining powerful weapons and strategic abilities to survive intense battles against challenging bosses.

about_the_game:
Are you a fan of sarcasm, the 90s, and pineapples? Then Pineapple Panic! is the game for you!

In Pineapple Panic!, you play as Piña, a sarcastic pineapple on the run from the temperamental chef, Joe Colada, who is determined to turn you into a delicious beverage. In this endless runner the main goal is simple, survive as long as you can without getting caught by Joe Colada. He'll say anything to get you to slow down, so stay sharp!

Maintain your distance from Joe by jumping over and dodging obstacles.


Collect pineapple chunks to earn a unique ability that you can use to slow Joe down.


Challenge yourself with the Leaderboard system, which allows you to see the top scores.


Meet Piña:


Life as a pineapple isn't easy, according to Piña. Between beach lounging and long naps, Piña never imagined he'd be sprinting for his life. Everything changed when Joe Colada started chasing him, turning his peaceful life into an endless escape.

Meet Joe Colada:


With a flair for dramatic presentations and a relentless pursuit of culinary perfection, Joe Colada is always looking for the finest ingredients. And he believes Piña is the pièce de resistance he needs.

Why will you love Pineapple Panic?
Humor and Sarcasm: Piña's witty commentary and the game's humorous take on the endless runner genre will keep you entertained.
Retro Aesthetic: Relive the 90s with vibrant visuals and a catchy, nostalgic soundtrack.

Challenging Yet Fun: The game is easy to pick up but hard to master, providing endless fun and replayability.

Note: No pineapples were harmed in the making of this game.
name: Pineapple Panic!
short_description: Have your games become bland and fruitless? Help Pina, the terrified pineapple, to dodge and leap over obstacles so that he can outwit the dastardly Chef Joe Colada in this rear-facing endless runner. Can you outpace his culinary madness, or will you end up in a fruity predicament?

name: 50 Floors of Madness
short_description: You are a former patient of an abandoned asylum, waking up on the 50th floor. To escape, descend all the floors by detecting anomalies using your observation and memory. Correct choices reduce the remaining floors, but mistakes are unforgivable. Can you escape?

name: 地球勇者 Earth Fighter
short_description: “Knights of Earth Realm” is a 2D platform shooter action light rogue game. Synthesize various homemade or advanced weapon equipment, lead your pet, and fight against human looters, out-of-control mech, evil insectoids, and other threats on the post-disaster wasteland.

about_the_game:
Be a Hero. Wishlist Now. ♥

SOLOMANIA is a narrative-driven visual novel drama about flawed heroes and their collateral damage.

You are Astra, a hero and a menace. Nobody asks questions as long as the job is done. That has always been enough, until now.

Now, the higher ups are... uncomfortable with your latest actions. They demand someone else keeps you in check. Your only choice is another hero, and the only heroes left are alone for a reason.

To clear your good name, take on the task of investigating a strange civilian report deep in the dark woods, smoothly and without issue.

  • Chaos or Romance: Navigate the story with the partner of your choice. Will your relationship develop into romance, hate, or somewhere in-between?

  • Superpowered or Supernatural?: Survive your encounter with the unknown. Either alone, or in sync.

  • Tempting fate: Explore multiple endings, defined by your choices and your relationship with your partner. Is your path one of growth, independence, or darkness?

  • ♥ Crafted with indie love ♥ : Experience striking, hand-painted visuals that belong in a graphic novel. Created by a small, but passionate team. 

Characters

Astra

The protagonist. A hero, who for whatever reason, is determined to stay alone.

Dread

Perceptive, but mischievous. There is something about Dread no one seems to trust. Rumours say he brings out the darkness in everyone he meets. What does he bring out in you?

Atlas

Quiet and loyal, Atlas comes across as the Sentinel's loyal dog. Tall and broad-shouldered, he is a hammer personified. Are you the crooked nail he must put in its place?

Lore

Your guiding compass and last remaining friend.

About the Developer

Ephua is a micro-studio dedicated to creating immersive, thought-provoking tales.

We believe stories are a universal truth, and humans are at the heart of them.
name: Solomania
short_description: SOLOMANIA is a romance drama about flawed heroes and their collateral damage. With your new reluctant partner, prove that you're not as messed up as everyone thinks. Your mission? Investigate a strange civilian report in the woods, smoothly and without issue. Playing nice is optional.

short_description: Minigolf game. 3 different levels with totally 42 holes. Play alone or against bots
