short_description: Volleyborne: Unbound Horizons redefines sports gaming with its groundbreaking first-person volleyball experience. Offering realism and immersion, it brings every aspect of real-life volleyball to your screen with unmatched precision. From powerful spikes to insane digs, it mirrors every court move.

about_the_game:
... When you finally regain consciousness, you find yourself lying face down in the snow, with a long trail of footprints behind you. It seems you had collapsed from exhaustion.

  You find yourself struggling to flip yourself over. When you eventually do, you find several newly acquired cuts and bruises all over yourself. You quickly administer some first aid, before spending a few minutes fiddling with your radio set. But as you expect, your frequencies remain silent.

  On your back lies a small saving grace: a state-of-the-art imported bolt action sniper rifle, far superior to any domestically manufactured equivalent. You forgot exactly how it fell into your hands in the midst of the chaotic rout. And despite everything, part of you wished its previous owner was still alive.

  Your chain of command has completely broken down. Hadrian soldiers are pouring across the eastern border in their tens of thousands, and you are one of the last few things standing between them and the defenseless villages across the vast Altheimian wilderness. In the absence of further orders, you have no choice but to conduct a fighting retreat by yourself.

  • Quietly eliminiate Hadrian officers and agents. Set up ambushes, plan your attacks, and do everything in your power to slow down the enemy advance.

  • Navigate through the vast Altheimian wilderness, trudging through terrain that may aid or hinder you. Encounter the occasional wildlife curious enough to approach your bonfire.

  • Rendezvous with fellow soldiers. Exchange intel, or assist them if they are in trouble. Deal with any who had stepped out of line. 

  • Encounter fellow Altheimians, resupply and rest in friendly villages, purchase their goods and services if needed. Help any remaining civilians flee the oncoming Hadrian onslaught, or ignore them to focus on your objectives. 

  • Find abandoned items within the war-torn ruins that scatter the wilderness, and try not to get drunk from any leftover alcohol you find. 

  • Try to balance your Sanity and personal well-being with the realities and necessities of war.

short_description: The empire of Hadria has turned its war machine against the vulnerable eastern hinterlands of Altheim. With only your sniper rifle on your back, and a few strips of rabbit meat in your pocket, you must defend the motherland and wage a lone guriella war against the overwhelming tide of invaders.

about_the_game:
The game unfolds in Ha_Bits, a town within a simulation on the brink of collapse. Players assume the role of Lead, a program afflicted by memory loss, on a quest to uncover her forgotten past. However, as Lead delves deeper into the simulation, she discovers that some secrets are best left buried. Along the way, she must navigate through grotesque viruses and encounter enigmatic inhabitants.

You will find a haunting atmosphere, intricate puzzles, profound storytelling, and captivating pixel art in 2.5D, Neo Ha_Bits immerses players in a nightmare neon realm, blurring the line between reality and delusion, and leaving them questioning their own sanity.
name: Neo HaBits
short_description: Neo Ha_Bits plunges players into a chilling journey of psychological horror and mystery within a cyberpunk setting.

about_the_game:
My mom wants me to be nothing but a head... and I don't want that.

Features of this game.
This is an exploration adventure game where you control Coco, the princess of Creepzone, as she explores the city and takes down various monsters.
There are many monsters living in this city.
Some are in trouble, some are drunk and ranting, some are doing bad business, some are under a terrible curse, etc...
The way Coco, who has no magical powers, gets them under her thumb is by solving their problems or by exposing their secrets and taking advantage of their weaknesses... well, Coco seems to be better at the latter.
By taking monsters under your wing, you can advance the story, go to new areas, and even extort money from them.
The player's ultimate goal is to increase the number of minions and take the throne of this country from Mama... that's the player's ultimate goal.



...Oops, I forgot to mention one important thing... You must do these things secretly without your mother knowing.



If she finds out, you'll have to say goodbye from the neck down at the end.

Story.
Creep Zone. It is a city of monsters ruled by the king, Mama, with magical powers...
Coco, Mama's daughter and the princess of the Creep Zone, is still unable to use her magical powers. Mama believes that this is due to the "bulge" that grew under her head, which is still stuck to her head. Coco is a descendant of a race of people who lost their bodies when they grew up and lived with only their heads. Coco hated the idea that she would eventually become as horribly ugly as her mother...　
One day, Mama orders a ceremony to amputate the "bulge" that had grown under Coco's head. Coco manages to convince her mother and is given a short reprieve, but she is disheartened by the fact that she will eventually have to part with her body. Then, a book that had been gathering dust on the bookshelf suddenly begins to speak.
If you want to overturn the king's order, why don't you just become the king yourself?
According to the book, if she can tame all the monsters in this town and make more of them than her mother, the title of king will be transferred to Koko.
I'm the king... well, I'm going to be one sooner or later, so it's best to get started. Heh heh..."
And so began Coco's adventure to become king herself, with the monsters of the Creep Zone as her minions...

about_the_game:
关注我们了解《仙灵正传》的最新情报

【游戏特色】

★唯美江湖 纯正仙侠

玄幻的修仙世界，恢弘的地图场景，诛仙塔、九幽魔窟、蛮荒大陆、洪荒岛、万古仙殿、鸿蒙古殿、神兽岛、太极古境、星辰暗殿、帝尊神域，层层深入的唯美古境，令人沉浸其中!

★全新地图 无限BOSS

神装随机掉落，抢夺BOSS归属，将神装据为已有！无限战斗乐趣，无限难度副本考验真正的技术!

★逆天改命 突破极限

觉醒之日，称霸之时，屠魔戮仙，神帝至尊，帝域修炼，圣化触顶复见新天。群仙乱斗，神威现世，万物归烬。

★帮派社交 跨服PK

帮派聚义，跨服称霸做大佬。组建仙盟，守卫帮派，全帮成员同心御外敌，挚友开黑，史诗副本不在话下。强强对决，打造全服超强帮派，是时候表演真正的技术了。

short_description: 《仙灵正传》是一款以中国上古洪荒神话为题材的放置角色扮演游戏，游戏具有独特的功能和精美的画面。玩家不仅可以在游戏中修仙，还可以结识仙侣，驯服神兽坐骑，全新的地图和装备，让你体验修仙。玩家在游戏中化身修真者，穿梭于修仙界，不断提升实力，在战斗中成长，用神器武装自己，一步步走向修仙界的巅峰。多种多样的酷炫时装，神奇百变的天神坐骑，最原汁原味的仙侠世界等你一起来体验！

about_the_game:
You have to climb to the top using hooks.
Use the keyboard to move, and the mouse to control your hands and hooks (or gamepad if you are not in enough pain).
Only the most persistent will make it to the top.

-Prepare to fall down.

-Practice and over time you will be able to overcome those obstacles that at first seemed impassable.

-Don't give up, because only the persistent can overcome difficulties.

-Legs... You can use your legs, but they're not much help.

Note from developer:
This game was also made by one person, me(hello). This game is inspired by "Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy" and "A Difficult Game About Climbing". The game was first person at first, but it didn't feel unique. After playing "Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy" and "A Difficult Game About Climbing" I thought this style of game would be better, and I wasn't wrong. So I too want to, and hopefully contribute to the "Foddian Type" genre.

about_the_game:
Fungi Fantastico is a fun first person platforming adventure set in a vibrant mushroom filled world. Play as a druidic nature-magic staff wielder who is dealing with a toxic fungal infestation in your peaceful valley. Set off on an adventure to purge the corruption and learn some new tricks along the way.

Pop Mushrooms, and develop the way you move through the world:

A game where mushrooms on the ground can be popped with your nature beam to give you various buffs, making you move and jump higher to faster traverse the environment. Along with that, gain skills to improve your movement, double jumps, dashes and gravity control.

Colorful environments and chill lofi/ambient music made just for the game await you in this adventure to kick back and relax with after a tough day. Escape with the Fungi, in Fungi Fantastico ~

about_the_game:
Void Collector is a speedrunning FPS with a unique weapon-switching system, focusing on tightly designed stages that can be replayed over and over again to get faster and faster.

USE A LARGE ARSENAL OF WEAPONRY

Utilize a variety of powerful weapons with many different effects. From a powerful, knockback-inducing shotgun, to an uppercut that sends you and your opponents soaring, to a middle finger that fires an immensely powerful laser, there's an ideal weapon for any situation.

MASTER THE SYSTEM

Press 1-5 on the keyboard to toggle each finger of your hand on or off. This adds a layer of difficulty that allows for a ton of deep skill expression and clever tactics.

FIGHT A TON OF ENEMIES

Blast through a wide array of enemies. From the projectile-shooting Gunther to the bomb-placing Steve Strike, these guys are sure to keep you on your toes at all times!

MANAGE YOUR RESOURCES

Attacking drains your JUICE meter, but defeating enemies gets some back! There's also a combo system, which rewards skillful play with more Juice to use so that you can pull off impressive skips! But be careful, playing too recklessly will leave you open to attack!

BECOME A VOID MASTER

Each stage has a target time to beat to test the most skilled players in their weapon-swapping and rapid movement abilities! Void Collector focuses on a high skill-ceiling to ensure it's fun to play and replay over and over again!

COLLECT DOODADS

Each main stage has a hidden piece of 'memorabilia' to collect. Find them all to understand the history of the mysterious Void Collector and those who hunt it!

ANYONE CAN PLAY

Includes multiple difficulties to give some breathing room to new players and truly challenge seasoned veterans. Also included is a simplified control scheme, ensuring that anyone can enjoy!

The game sports a loose, wobbly artstyle with a jazzy soundtrack to match.
name: Void Collector
short_description: Void Collector is a fast-paced FPS where your hand is your weapon! Create a variety of hand poses to make a large arsenal of weapons and blast through a ton of stages and enemies as quickly as you can while mastering a difficult, unique control scheme!

about_the_game:
Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

The game is a 3D puzzle, the player needs to put in place the missing pieces of the puzzle (items) scattered around the location. To create an entire location.

You need to go to the item, take it by pressing the left mouse button and take the item to the desired location marked in green. If you brought the correct item, it will snap into place and you will receive leaderboard points and achievements for this.

Collect as much items as possible as quickly as possible to get more points for the leaderboard.

If you brought the wrong item, you can throw it away, it will return to the starting location so that you can pick it up again.

about_the_game:
Overview:
Embark on a thrilling RPG adventure set in the matriarchal world of Draconia, where women rule with an iron fist and men must fight for survival. In this femdom-themed game, you'll navigate a brutal society, manage resources, and make critical choices that determine your fate.

Gameplay:
As a prisoner in the Draconian mining camp, your goal is to survive and ultimately gain your freedom. The game features classic RPG mechanics, including exploration, resource management, and decision-making.

You'll need to work in the mines to earn money, while carefully managing your hunger and stamina. Explore the treacherous mines in search of the legendary Alanothian Crystal, which can be exchanged for your freedom. Be cautious, as the mines are filled with dangers and challenges that will test your skills and resolve.

Throughout your journey, you'll interact with powerful female characters who will influence your path. Your choices and actions will have consequences, leading to multiple endings based on the decisions you make. Will you try to escape the camp, submit to the evil women, or find another way to gain your freedom?

Key Features:

  • RPG Mechanics: Classic RPG gameplay with exploration, resource management, and decision-making.
  • Survival Aspects: Manage your hunger and stamina while working in the mines to survive.
  • Femdom Theme: Experience a dark, matriarchal world where women hold all the power.
  • Multiple Endings: Your choices throughout the game will lead to different outcomes and endings.

Do you have what it takes to survive in the unforgiving world of Draconia? Make your choices wisely, manage your resources carefully, and maybe, just maybe, you'll find a way to break free and find freedom again.
name: Survival In Draconia
short_description: Survival in Draconia is a femdom 2D Fantasy RPG set in a continent where dominant women reign supreme. Navigate a harsh landscape, manage your resources, and find your place in a society where survival is anything but guaranteed.

name: The Faceless Killer
short_description: The Faceless Killer is a first-person survival horror game with retro PS1-style graphics, consisting of 2 chapters. Solve logic puzzles, fight against your enemies, or hide when there's no other option. Unravel this mystery surrounding the Faceless Killer. Who is he, and what are his motivations?

about_the_game:
Step into the Squared Circle in Neckbreaker, the physics-driven pro wrestling game.

Physics-Driven Dynamic Gameplay

Smash your opponent into turnbuckles. Get tangled up in the ring ropes. Dive from a 20 foot balcony. Use the environment to your advantage as you take your competitors to their limits.

The active physics system affects every grapple, slam and strike leaving no two impacts the same. Power through with extra strength, or feel the overexertion as you struggle to lift your opponent.

Feed off the energy of the crowd to build momentum and give you the edge you need to get the 1-2-3.

Rise to the Top

Climb the ladder to the top in career mode, where each match is a new chapter in your wrestling legacy. Go from rookie to hall-of-fame as a wrestler, or take charge of the show as a booker, or even be in full control of it all in sandbox mode.

Test your skills and endurance in knockout or round-robin style tournaments. With fully customisable match types, take on your friends and foes and prove who is the real world champion.

Sculpt your Universe

Use the detailed creation suite to create your perfect fighter, from industry vet to local enhancement talent. Fine tune their moveset with adjustable moves, enter the limelight in style with detailed entrance options.

Customise the arena with colours, decorations and more. Choose between a four or six-sided ring.

Features

  • Deep Grappling & Strikes: Unleash a variety of moves with our dynamic grappling and striking system, making every hit feel distinct and impactful.
  • Physics-Powered Gameplay: Experience every slam and takedown with a realistic feel thanks to the active-ragdoll physics engine.
  • Impactful Weapons: Smash through tables, explode a light tube, dive from a 20ft ladder or pick up any of the plethora of foreign objects.
  • Crowd Momentum: Feel the energy of the crowd rise and fall with the match. The unique system influences your performance.
  • Robust Character Creation: Sculpt your dream grappler with extensive options in the Create-A-Wrestler system.
  • Personalise the arena: Choose decorations, colours, or even swap between a four or six sided ring.
  • Reinvent the match: Flexible match rule options gives you the power to decide how the match ends.
  • Endless Career: Fight your way to the top in the sprawling wrestler mode, take charge of the show in booker mode, or control it all in sandbox mode.
  • Tournament Mode: Put your skills to the test in customisable dedicated tournaments.

about_the_game:
Build your Kingdom

Night Keep is a minimalist strategy game with hack and slash, inspired by Thronefall. By day you build your kingdom; when the night starts you defend it with towers, troops, and your hero’s abilities.

Balance Economy and Defense

At its core, Night Keep strips away unnecessary complexity while staying challenging, inviting players to devise their own strategies. Choose from a range of buildings, each with unique abilities and upgrade paths, and find the right balance between economy and defense for every level. Build houses, windmills, and fields that generate gold if they survive the night, but don’t get too greedy. Invest in towers with three distinct upgrade routes, or in barracks to raise an army of active ragdolls.

Select Class & Fight Ragdolls

Night Keep offers three classes, each with two unique abilities. You can play all three classes at once and switch seamlessly during battle. Hack and slash through waves of twenty different ragdolls. Customize your playstyle by selecting perks and challenges before each level. Night Keep has seven levels that deliver around five to eight hours of playtime, plus higher difficulties and an endless mode for those chasing a new high score.

Main Features:

- Three playable classes

- Seven levels

- 13 buildings

- 20 unique enemies

- Normal, difficult, endless mode

- Two Quests per level

- High score system

- 15 perks and 10 challenges

- Play in 3rd person or fixed birds-eye perspective
name: Night Keep
short_description: Build a kingdom by day, slash ragdoll hordes by night in this streamlined hack-and-slash strategy game.

name: Wander Hero
short_description: This is the fantasy of a two-dimensional traverser in a different world. You can take a leisurely and strategically deep adventure. You can also collect beautiful girls without hurting your wallet, and form your own harem... ahem, mercenary group.

about_the_game:
The prologue only contains content before the big world

is a game that combines card strategy and marble ejection.
Players can explore, take risks, trade, and recruit mercenaries in randomly generated dungeons and towns.
As the mercenary captain, lead carefully selected partners to survive in this turbulent world.


The group leader can travel to various towns in different worlds: Pimo Town, surrounded by mountains, has a pleasant scenery, and the sound of blacksmithing is endless; Luanwu Village, where treehouse buildings are popular, with trees, small bridges and flowing water, is the best choice for living... ...The "adventures" and "events" in the town can also help the group leader meet different mercenaries and invite them to form the strongest mercenary group! Train mercenaries to improve their skills, buy equipment for them to improve their strength, and take adventures in a wonderful world together.




Keep meeting beautiful partners in different worlds! Different outfits, different personalities and even different races, there is always one that suits you. A newborn succubus who can change clothes to seduce people, a knight commander who has powerful combat power but loves to be clingy, a battle maid who escapes from the master and loves adventure...or many people who visit the tavern may also find out about Oh, their rumors~




Each character will turn into a marble, gently pull out the baseline, and you can fight after ejecting! A powerful group leader will also pass the baseline, predict the strength and path, and eject more monsters. The characters can also affect each other's ejection effects, and use the linkage mechanism to hit a refreshing combo!




For every adventure in a different world, the leader can bring the powerful mercenary group partners he formed to experience different combat experiences in each week. Each cooperative battle has a different combat experience, which combination is the best combination to eliminate the devil, waiting for you to explore!




There are also many skill cards scattered in the different world. There are various attack, defense and buff cards. Collect and build your own genre. Cooperate with ejection to play in-depth strategy! Of course, occasionally you will get inappropriate cards, and trade-offs can make the deck stronger.

About 【Developer】


The author is a dead house developed by Solo.

I hope that by constructing this game, I can complete the dream of fantasy and different worlds in my heart together with the vast number of travelers.

At present, the game has not been completed yet, if there are any deficiencies, I hope everyone understands, and the author will try his best to improve it.

about_the_game:
Description

'Face the Abyss' is 1 vs 3 PvP game. One player takes on the role of the monster, or 'Stalker', who hunts down the survivors with its powerful psychic abilities. The other three players are the survivors, or 'Crew', who must find a way to escape.

Indoor Chase

The Stalker chases the Crew through a narrow and complex facility, relying on sound and terrain features. The Crew must overcome and utilize the limitations of restricted vision in this complex indoor environment to achieve their goal.

Escape scenarios

Escaping the facility won't be simple. The Crew must complete one of the 'escape scenarios' to make their way out. Observe the current situation carefully and figure out the most appropriate way to escape. Cooperate with other Crew members to achieve the goal quickly. Escape the facility before being overwhelmed by the Stalker's abilities.

Stalker and Abilites

The Stalker has various abilities at its disposal. Decrease the Crew's sanity with powerful psychic abilities. A Crew member with low sanity is much easier to hunt down. Erode the facility and destroy doors to leave the Crew with nowhere to run.

Crew and Items

The Crew can find plenty of items throughout the facility. Use these itmes wisely to delay the Stalker's pursuit and stay alive. Some items are essential for completing escape scenarios.
name: Face The Abyss
short_description: The experiment has failed. The facility that was supposed to control the monster has stopped working, and now your only hope is to escape the facility before the monster hunts you down.

  • The rest of the players wins when they complete the construction tasks

Play with you friends or random people 1vs2, 1vs3 or 1vs4

3 Game Modes

  • Base game mode with foreman where players sober up and need to be resuced by teammates

  • Base with forman where players when get sobbered spawn after some amount of time

  • Destruction mode where the winner is who destroy more objects

                       The game is meant to be played for 2-5 people for the optimal experience

name: Frightening Monastery
short_description: After receiving a mysterious invitation to a summer camp, you are captured by Sister Madeline inside Eagle's Junior High School. Now, your mission is to escape the school before Sister Madeline manages to complete her evil plan.

about_the_game:
▶游戏历程—————————————————
作者是一个修仙迷，喜欢修仙小说，也是一个独立游戏开发者，开发这款游戏，
想把喜欢的元素加入到游戏里面。

游戏开始选择派系，各个派系的玩法不同，剑修普攻会群攻，
魔修会暴击，炼体会反伤，妖修会吸血。

进入游戏后，可选择职业。
阵法师，阵法比较厉害。
傀儡师，多个傀儡上阵
炼丹师，升级加快。
炼器师，装备极品。
灵兽师，多个灵兽上阵。

攻击：分普攻，技能，还有属性攻击，
属性攻击：雷，火，冰，毒。
雷是50%攻击力。
火是30%攻击力。
冰是30%攻击力。还会减速。
毒是10%攻击力。还会叠加。

追击：打败一个怪，会打下一个。
连击：对一个怪多次打击。
反击：对攻击者反击。
反震：对攻击者反伤。
分裂：可以对多个怪伤害。

装备可以升级，需要寒铁与灵石。
装备可以炼化，需要灵石。
阵法可以升级。
灵兽的被动技能可以遗忘。
傀儡的被动不能遗忘。

可以学习不同的技能。

每升到9阶，就需要渡劫。渡劫下面有按钮。

有什么好的想法，玩法就会加入到游戏里。

▶交流途径—————————————————
QQ群：592537246
有游戏的建议、想法，欢迎联系作者。

▶ 友情提醒—————————————————
游戏没有声音，因为作者不懂声乐，弄得不好。
游戏画面为2D，不精美。
detailed_description:
▶游戏历程—————————————————
作者是一个修仙迷，喜欢修仙小说，也是一个独立游戏开发者，开发这款游戏，
想把喜欢的元素加入到游戏里面。

游戏开始选择派系，各个派系的玩法不同，剑修普攻会群攻，
魔修会暴击，炼体会反伤，妖修会吸血。

进入游戏后，可选择职业。
阵法师，阵法比较厉害。
傀儡师，多个傀儡上阵
炼丹师，升级加快。
炼器师，装备极品。
灵兽师，多个灵兽上阵。

攻击：分普攻，技能，还有属性攻击，
属性攻击：雷，火，冰，毒。
雷是50%攻击力。
火是30%攻击力。
冰是30%攻击力。还会减速。
毒是10%攻击力。还会叠加。

追击：打败一个怪，会打下一个。
连击：对一个怪多次打击。
反击：对攻击者反击。
反震：对攻击者反伤。
分裂：可以对多个怪伤害。

装备可以升级，需要寒铁与灵石。
装备可以炼化，需要灵石。
阵法可以升级。
灵兽的被动技能可以遗忘。
傀儡的被动不能遗忘。

可以学习不同的技能。

每升到9阶，就需要渡劫。渡劫下面有按钮。

有什么好的想法，玩法就会加入到游戏里。

▶交流途径—————————————————
QQ群：592537246
有游戏的建议、想法，欢迎联系作者。

▶ 友情提醒—————————————————
游戏没有声音，因为作者不懂声乐，弄得不好。
游戏画面为2D，不精美。
name: 幻想修仙世界
pc_requirements_min:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3或以上
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Grahics Series

short_description: 这是一个小型修真世界，包含了派系，道侣，灵兽，阵法，丹药，炼器， 傀儡等修真元素，是2D回合卡牌类玩法，作者独立开发，若有反馈可以联系作者。 游戏开始选择派系，各个派系的玩法不同，剑修普攻会群攻， 魔修会暴击，炼体会反伤，妖修会吸血，进入游戏后，可选择职业。 地图上，有各种功法，配方，可以收集。 怪物有掉落展示。 也可以挂机，挂机可以挑战与主角当前等级的怪物，获得修为与物品。 游戏整体就是收集各种装备，阵法，灵兽等，搭配自己的修仙阵容。

Having successfully hypnotised her, you have taken her to your secret basement. Tie her up in chains for some erotic discipline!

about_the_game:
The Ministry's vaults store digital copies of every person. To investigate a simple murder, it would be enough to just talk to the victim's copy. However, for a case of national importance, you'll have to use the most recent and most terrifying technological advancements.

Plug someone's brain scan into one device and have a peaceful chat with them on neutral ground.

Plug them into something a little more unorthodox and see how they behave under pressure.

I could say that the choice is yours, but that would be a lie—you will have to get your hands dirty one way or another.

A short (1-2 hour) linear narrative puzzle based on dialogues, plugging wires into devices, and messing with switches. If you always thought that the ending of 1984 could use a little more wiring puzzles, then this is the game for you.
name: Major's Heart
short_description: A sci-fi detective game where you interrogate the brain scans of crime victims. Uncover the hidden truth behind the dystopian regime by any means necessary.

name: Fisht Fight
short_description: PUNCH FISH in a global Fishing and Fighting competition for the highest, sickest air combos! With easy-to-learn, difficult-to-master VR combat and many unique fish to fight, there's a whole ocean of depth to explore!

name: Heian City Story
short_description: A city-building sim with a historical twist

name: Eternal Skies TCG
short_description: Eternal Skies is a fully customizable single player TCG RPG, similar to old handheld titles like the Pokemon Trading Card Game for GBC. The cards and story are inspired by Skies of Arcadia and Slavic mythology, and there are a variety of modes + difficulty options as well as a card creator.

name: Velvet 89
short_description: How did the communist regime in Czechoslovakia fall? This hidden-object game tells the story of ordinary people taking part in the peaceful demonstrations that changed the course of history. Big crowds hide those, who want to tell you why they took to the streets.

name: Climbing with Silly Cat
short_description: Fun and difficult game about climbing with cute silly cat that rotate a lot! With 10 unlockable skins Game includes cute cat pictures! And you can meow!!!

name: Piczle Cross: Rune Factory
short_description: Experience the character, monsters and world of the Rune Factory series through addictive nonogram logic-puzzles!

name: LOVE ! again ... - Episode 1 & 2
short_description: In LOVE! again... every choice leads to consequences. Choose your romance, and write your own story.

name: To Clean The Mountain
short_description: To Clean The Mountain is a platformer where you traverse a mountainous environment by flinging yourself with a trash bag. Enjoy the open environment without guardrails as you persevere towards the summit.

name: Transmorphosis
short_description: Transmorphosis is a single-player horror and point-and-click puzzle game. You arrive as a doctor at a remote mental hospital where no sane person has been able to stay for long. Can you use your willpower and patience to heal the patients?

about_the_game:
Do No Harm is a doctor simulator with a Lovecraftian twist. You take on the role of a village doctor, diagnosing and treating patients using ancient and often cryptic medical procedures.

If you’re a fan of profession-related simulators or games that test your decision-making under pressure, Do No Harm is a unique blend of strategy and horror that will keep you guessing until the very end.

  • Lovecraftian Atmosphere

    • Nightmarish entities that warp reality as you play, causing hallucinations, blocking your ability to interact with items, and even deceiving you about treatment results.

    • Anomalies creeping into your daily medical practice, impacting your Sanity.

    • Lovecraftian story involving the proxy war between Azathoth and Cthulhu over the island village and through it the world and humanity.

  • 19-th century Doctor Simulator

    • Diagnose patients based on their symptoms

    • Use tools to narrow down treatment possibilities, and inject the patients with the medicine

    • Consult your Book of Medicine—a beautifully crafted grimoire-like guide.

    • Experiment with remedies inspired by Early Modern medicine, and hope they work… or brace for the consequences.

  • Rich Story & Multiple Endings

    • Reputation system impacting how villagers act around you

    • Each diagnosis, treatment, and moral decision impacts the outcome, leading to multiple endings. Find all 12 Endings.

    • Survive 30 Days: Navigate the pressures of treating the sick while also surviving for 30 days in an increasingly hostile environment.

    • Will you save the villagers, descend into madness, or uncover the truth behind the horrors?
name: Do No Harm
short_description: Lovecraftian Doctor Simulator. Diagnose patients by analyzing unsettling symptoms and treat them using your Book of Medicine. Make moral choices — decide who to save or kill, discover whom to trust, and unlock multiple endings! Can you endure 30 days of perilous decisions?

name: Numbers of Everything
short_description: Numbers of Everything interprets common objects/concepts in everyday life from unique perspectives. These perspectives are then mashed into puzzles based on numerical manipulations. Let’s talk about cats, work, time, and everything by playing puzzles.

name: NeveRossa Remaster
short_description: That day, the sky was also snowing scarlet— Classic PC game from Firedog Studio in 2005 "NeveRossa~Mille e una notte" Remastered! Nurture a pretty girl Lilies, the "Goddess Seed", through trainings, adventures, and battles, into a true Goddess within a thousand nights!

name: Pixel Frenzy
short_description: Pixel Frenzy is a fast-paced first-person shooter game where you create your own combat style in fully destructible environments. Defeat the pixel monsters invading the real world. Grab your weapon and save the world by destroying everything in your path!

about_the_game:
Dive into "Bizzy Bouncy Boo," an exciting platformer where you play as a lively slime. Your goal is to jump higher and higher, navigating through tricky platforms and avoiding falls. Precision and timing are key as you bounce your way to the top in this fun and challenging adventure.
Embark on a bouncy adventure and see how high you can go in "Bizzy Bouncy Boo!" Will you reach the top, or will you bounce back down?
name: Bizzy Bouncy Boo
short_description: Bounce your way to the top as a slime in "Bizzy Bouncy Boo," a challenging precision platformer where every jump counts.

name: Exovia
short_description: Exovia is a relaxing physics-based asteroid mining and logistics sim. Move minerals, automate production, and explore deeper into the unknown. What begins as a cold, chaotic rock becomes a thriving machine under your command.

about_the_game:
Dive into a thrilling 3D local multiplayer board game where strategy and wit go hand in hand. In Dynastopia, your goal is simple: be the last player standing. Arm yourself with a diverse arsenal of weapons from city shops or unleash the ultimate game-changer—the God Eye, a secret weapon that wipes out all competition.

Robberies


Strategize your approach by balancing between lethal weaponry and banking heists. Rob banks to give you money to purchase weapons in order to stay ahead, but remember, your salary increases the more you play it clean. The less bank robberies, or weapons you own, the more money the salary gives you. Robbing banks though, comes with high risk but high reward. Based on what robbery Card you pick up, you'll be required to roll between a range of numbers. If you win, you take the money. If you lose you go to jail and lose half your money.

Gun Shops & weapons


The Gun shops are the main tools you will use to best your friends/Enemies. They offer a wide variety of weapons that come with their own set of ammo, lives they take, and range(board squares) they cover. Buy your weapons wisely based on your enemies' positions, the weapons they possess, and your lives.

Hospitals & other squares

The Hospitals heal you by giving a spare life, the police stops arrest you if you posses weapons, the traps take lives and the mystery cards present you with a random set of events either good or bad.

Whether you choose to build your empire through crime or skillful gameplay, every decision shapes your path to victory.
Prepare for intense battles, cunning strategies, and a fight to the finish in Dynastopia

Note From Dev

Hello everyone! I'm glad you checked my page out. If you ever think of buying my game please keep in mind that while I am super excited about developing this game, I am also just a solo developer, a teenager, and a human being. Which means i'll be prone to mistakes, which would inevitably show up in the game as bugs.

With that said, please always still feel free to contact me or let me know if you have any problems or issues, or encounter any bugs within the game.
Thank you, and I hope you have fun!

about_the_game:
In "Digital Influence," you're hired in 2010 to create and manage a groundbreaking social media platform. Your decisions will shape its growth, user trust, and societal impact.

Key Features:

- Daily Choices: Make impactful decisions on features, privacy, monetization, and censorship.
- Ethical Dilemmas: Balance user satisfaction, financial success, and ethical integrity.
- Real Reactions: See the effects of your choices through dynamic social media feeds, news broadcasts, and financial reports.
- Multiple Endings: Discover diverse outcomes based on your management style.

Are you ready to leave your mark on the digital world?

about_the_game:
《爱上幻影的少年》是一款电子小说作品。该创作源于作者在大学期间因疫情赋闲时期的同名小说，故事讲述一个架空的未来风格世界末期所发生的故事。以数个小人物为线索展开，进而寻求在一个极端的条件下讨论人生的意义和生命的价值。

人的欲望多种多样，对于人生价值的判断也各有异同。古往今来，因为价值观不能相容而产生的争端乃至战争贯穿了人类的历史，也使无数人在看不到生命意义的同时选择通往尽头的道路。如何活着才是正确的？在本故事中，作者希望从不同人物的命运中找到一个相对合理的解释，并部分地（不能全部）挖掘其背后的深层次动机。

本文分为22个章节，每个章节对应一个主题进行讨论，另因笔力有限，部分情节怎么改也不合适，还请谅解。

本游戏为三无电子小说，没有配音，也没有分支选项，为纯文字作品，请注意。

下面简单介绍部分人物：

春：以成为偶像为梦想，但不知不觉就混到了30多岁，未来要怎么办？只有天知道。

雷恩：因为家里的关系而得以进入军队，混上了铁饭碗，从不喜欢多想无关的事情，为人简单直接，他是大多数人的样子。

皮特：某种意义上的天才，凭借自己的能力轻松卷进了军队，但他似乎对自己的生活并不满意。

阿兰：村庄里被排斥的异类少年，患有某种精神障碍。

short_description: Basically, it's a combination of a cyberpunk story that lacks cyberpunk style and a post-apocalyptic story that lacks a post-apocalyptic flavor, which contains the author's dream talk, special hobbies, and other nonsense...Not recommended for anyone to read.

name: Love n Life: Happy Student
short_description: Love n Life: Happy Student, a unique dating sim, incorporates inventory management for the first time. As a top-scoring third-year student, you are chosen to join the most prestigious college, where you’ll meet gorgeous ladies. Discover intriguing personalities and the school’s mysteries.

name: Soul Kira
short_description: To quench his boredom, God of Souls has summoned Souls of all kinds of warriors from different dimensions to take part in his Soul Killer Battles and become the next God of Souls. Soul Kira is a 2D platform shooter featuring PvP, PvE and PvPvE gameplay with a unique character creator system.

name: There Is No Lore
short_description: Collect Cards, build Decks, alter with Trinkets, discover Synergies, win Locations, beat Bosses. All this and more await you in this roguelite deckbuilding auto-battler, but please remember - There Is No Lore, stop looking.

about_the_game:
Witchfire is a single-player RPG shooter from the creative minds behind Painkiller and Bulletstorm. Embark on perilous expeditions, vanquishing foes to enhance your powers and arsenal. Scavenge valuable resources and retreat to your sanctuary, or push your luck by confronting Familiars— the powerful guardians of the witch.



Skill and knowledge are essential for success against the Witch of the Black Sea and her witchfire-fueled army. If you die, return to the battlefield for a one-time chance to reclaim what you lost, or attack again with a new plan.



Explore vast, immersive biomes and choose your battleground to confront the witch's forces. Each completed encounter strengthens you and your arsenal through the roguelite system called Arcana. There are countless ways to build your preyer and dominate the witch.



Only the most wicked sinners are transformed into preyers, undead assassins sustained by witchfire flowing through their veins. In the base of operations known as the Hermitory, you can choose from a wide selection of distinctive weapons, spells, and artifacts to build your own preyer.



On each expedition, you can extract your looted items or, if you feel confident, confront the witch’s Familiar to unlock new areas and powerful items and upgrades.



Piece together a story from the past to save the future. Investigate ships crashing on the verge of the witch’s land and locate the artifact that can tip the scales in the ongoing war between the Church and the witches.



During the Early Access period, Witchfire will undergo changes, including new areas, enemies, weapons, and tools of destruction. Help us shape the game to reach its full potential!
name: Witchfire
short_description: Witchfire is a first-person dark fantasy RPG shooter in which you play as a wicked sinner turned witch hunter on his final mission to reach salvation.

【游戏背景】

上古传说，女娲在天外天建太幽墟，将上古凶兽和血海魔物用神石封印，上古旧神退场。

不想千万年后，天帝为了稳固权力，成为真正的天帝之主，用了数千年时间使太幽墟封印松动，同时又忌惮修成圆满的斗战佛孙悟空的神力，便诓骗其舍去佛身重化神石，然而已有诸多魔物挣脱牢笼，祸乱众生。

我们的故事从这里开始，世界是否迎来破晓将由你谱写......

【实景展示】

游戏打击畅快淋漓，各职业技能炫酷，还原西游原汁原味的经典场景：花果山、盘丝洞、火焰山、凌霄殿、瑶池等

妖猴职业瑶池打斗实录

骨姬职业BOSS打斗实录

灵童职业花果山打斗实录

【游戏特色】

★妖魔集结 多职业自由切换

莲花太子灵童，高爆发战场奇袭；半面狂暴半面佛妖猴，单体PK无人能敌；还有一心修仙的真人和冰肌冷艳的骨姬职业，领略不一样的养成体验。

★超高爆率 顶级装备全掉落

割草刷怪收割，宝箱全屏掉落；装备拍卖有保值，惊喜套装飚战力！时尚外观不重样，自由搭配耀全身。

★神魔图鉴 诸神万妖全搜罗

卡片收集，隐藏属性加不停；封神榜系统的开启，不仅满足你的收集欲，还大大提升了人物属性。

★神龙变身 多形态进化养成

孵蛋、化形、成人、魔化，半神半魔由你选择自由变身！快来探索神龙的终极形态。

通往西行之路已经开启，快跟猴哥一起激斗神魔！

short_description: 《洪荒西行录》是以暗黑西游为题材的动作角色扮演游戏。猴哥挥棒斗神魔，逆命战洪荒。爽快的游戏体验带你探寻暗黑神话的真相！

name: Chaos in the harem
short_description: is a casual light rogue-type game. You play a beautiful girl with magic. Defeat all kinds of enemies, enemies are beautiful but also very powerful. Don't be attracted by their beauty. Pick up your weapon and don't let it crush them.

name: Feltopia
short_description: In this hand-felted, stop-motion "cute-em-up," the realms of Feltopia have been infected by a mysterious Smog Spirit. Skyrider flies on their pegasus through wondrous landscapes to save their magical sheep, transform creatures, and battle bosses on their quest to uncover Feltopia’s secrets.

name: The Soldier and the Golden Princess
short_description: Princess Knight Lucrezia is known for her exceptional swordsmanship and striking beauty, but when whispers about a secret relationship with the much-maligned General Abol start sweeping through the ranks, it falls to you, a lone soldier, to uncover the truth!
steamspy_name: The Soldier and the Golden Princess

name: Inside Utopia
short_description: Inside Utopia is a Visual Novel in which you play as Didi, a brave young girl who is forced to infiltrate Utopia and steal the legendary Gold Stone back into her home land, or else the Queen will execute her mother.

name: Cozy Garden
short_description: Help adorable guinea pigs manage their farm and expand their family in a farming simulation that combines resource management and pet care. This cozy game runs at the bottom of your screen, providing a quick break that lets you stay productive.

name: Necrocat
short_description: In a card field, choose wisely your next move on the grid, for every item collected and every monster defeated brings you one step closer to death. Answer the call and uncover Necrocat's schemes that disrupt the cycle of life!

name: Harmagedon
short_description: The player, as God's agent, takes the power of God and embarks on a journey to reclaim his power against beings who run wild at will.

name: Legend of Lilie
short_description: This is an RPG in which Lilie, an adventurous girl, does her best, plays an active role, and does H things.

name: Tower Collapse
short_description: Tower Collapse is an arcade puzzle game. Remove blocks to score points, the more blocks are removed the faster the camera spins! Play singleplayer or play local multiplayer (2 player). Two different gamemodes - classic mode or block push mode!

name: Bureau of Contacts: Mansion
short_description: Explore an old mansion full of paranormal dangers alone. Find clues, identify ghosts, collect their dossiers and exorcise them.

name: Cities Domination
short_description: Cities Domination is a city builder, resource management and strategy game. Gestion all the units and resources between cities for create an empire, attack enemies cities, build, defend and expand your cities and dominate the castles... or lose yours.

name: Frame Data: Mech Arena
short_description: A fast paced, one on one, mecha arena fighter, where you're pitted against an array of unique and opposing mecha called Frames. Movement is crucial for victory in the arena and so is your choice in weapons and abilities, that show your true potential as a Frame pilot.

name: VR Iron Fist Guardian
short_description: This is a fighting game specially designed for VR devices, which brings players into a world full of tension. In this world, players will play a steel warrior, standing on the ring to start a fierce contest with other opponents.

name: Market Mania
short_description: Run a store. what do you think?... Alright fine. Place shelves buy stock. Fill the shelves in this online co-op 4 player economic catastrophe. Deal with customers both good and bad. While you reap the Rewards.

name: Witch's Dungeon
short_description: Witch's Dungeon is a small pixel top-down shooter game, you will be played as a witch and advanced through the dungeon!     Chouka, woke up in an unknown dungeon when she heard a mysterious woman's voice guiding her to escape.

name: NOBK Overlay
short_description: Welcome to NOBK Overlay, the ultimate fruit-clicking adventure! Your task is simple: click on delicious, vibrant fruits to generate even more fruits. The more you click, the more your orchard grows, and the juicier your rewards become!

name: Bible Verse Challenge
short_description: Test your Bible Verse Knowledge. Try to get the highest score without running out of hearts!

name: PictoRobot
short_description: A platform game in which you have to reveal the hidden image of each level by shooting colored bubbles at numbered walls.

name: MatchOOlu
short_description: A card matching game like no other. Test your memory. Test your dexterity. Explore your mind.

name: Cardstronaut
short_description: A unique spin on the deckbuilding genre, where you must play cards and use strategy and tactics to activate ceiling mounted flame throwers to defeat the aliens and find out the truth

name: Black Light Kills
short_description: Welcome to the darkness of the town; here, you walk a fine line between reality and dreams, questioning your sanity. Black Light Kills takes you deep into Aiden’s mind, where nightmares begin as reality fades.

name: Standing Together
short_description: The world has fallen by zombies. As a part of the association, you are dispatched to the places where zombies are concentrated and stabilize these areas. Fill your backpack with the full of items, and eliminate zombies with the bullet hell.

name: Billie's Wheelie
short_description: Billie's Wheelie is an adventure racing platformer game, You can play it with up to 8 players Co-op/PvP, Playing as a hamster in his ball trying to beat all challenges, Collecting all cheese pieces for rewards, And beating your friend's time records.

about_the_game:
A short and simple game about gaining momentum to rip through the dimensions!

Particle Accelerator is a round based arcade style game where you are scored by your maximum momentum in a round. There are three perspectives that you can break into by reaching speeds. You gain momentum by collecting orbs and lose speed over time or by hitting obstacles or enemies. The map is infinite in all directions and non repeating.

Arcade style game where you play as a particle swimming, flying and collecting orbs to gain momentum while avoiding obstacles, when you gain enough momentum to fill up the bar you tear through the dimensions going from 2D to 3D to 4D!

It has simple but addicting gameplay, beautiful visuals and a great sound track.

Initially made for the 5K BlackThornProd Game Dev Competition.

This game is NOT:
- Long
- Complex
- Full of features

However, this game is:
- A VIBE

Play the music loud I guarantee you will feel something!
name: Particle Accelerator
short_description: A simple, short, and beautiful arcade game about gaining enough momentum and ripping through dimensions!

name: Dream Eater Girl
short_description: A girl dives into a nightmare in search of her lost sister. Defeat hordes of monsters lurking within countless dreams. Enchanting creatures and formidable bosses await her arrival. Prove your survival skills through items and upgrades, and push forward into even deeper nightmares.

name: The Bench
short_description: Relax on a park bench, find hidden objects, solve quirky puzzles, and fend off pesky pigeons in this charming, interactive adventure. Enjoy beautifully stylized, colorful levels keeping you entertained!

name: Swords, Arrows & Shields
short_description: Swords, Arrows & Shields is a 2D card game that introduces a unique set of rules, in which luck and strategy intertwine within a tarot-inspired theme. Your goal is to outscore your opponent after 10 rounds by forming sets of Major Arcana cards with matching colors.

about_the_game:
Find clues, interview memorable characters, and navigate your way through a shabby hotel in this comedic, story-rich mystery game.

Humans had the silly idea of bringing dinosaurs back to life, and ever since, relationships between the two species have been strained. You were created in a laboratory to become the only dinosaur cop. Every day, you ask yourself: are you making the world better for your dino peers, or are you just a tool of human propaganda? The meaty case you'll face today might help you answer your most profound existential dilemma.

Features:

  • A rich and funny story starring a cast of anthropomorphic dinosaurs faced with sociopolitical and personal issues

  • A puzzling case set in a day cycle. Uncover secrets scattered through time.
name: Dinocop
short_description: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side by side, you're the one and only Dinocop. And you got a meaty case to crack. In this mystery game set in a day cycle, uncover secrets scattered through time.

name: NexBox
short_description: Your plane of existence has shattered, making perfect entry for anomalous figures to invade. Welcome to NexBox, a streamlined experience for anyone looking to run from Nexbots. All you have to do is upload an image and sound of your choice or choose the ones we have made.

name: Cape Hideous
short_description: Amongst the motliest of all crews, an enigmatic woman prepares the ship to enter an intense thunderstorm raging in the middle of the ocean. What otherworldly mysteries lie within?

name: Protect Larry
short_description: In Protect Larry, lead an army to defend your magical pet duck, Larry, from monstrous enemies. Switch between tactical command and third-person combat. Upgrade your hero and troops to survive escalating battles. Larry's survival means saving humanity!

name: DEEPLANDERS
short_description: DEEPLANDERS is a cozy and relaxing, minimalist building game where you must satisfy the needs of the Deeplanders to populate the depths. Explore, build, and decorate your own underground kingdom... and when you're ready, embark on a journey to new, unexplored depths!

developers: かくかくしかじか, demiş ünsüz oyun geliştiricisi
name: HiHi
short_description: Jump up, don't fall.

name: 全网公敌：诡村
short_description: 本作是与《全网公敌》联动的全新故事，通过一台“旧电脑”进行互联网搜索解密的剧情互动游戏。你作为一名特殊调查员，需要负责解开隐藏在“登山客意外失踪”背后的超自然事件。随着调查深入，始作俑者也渐渐浮出水面，“祂”，似乎又与四十多年前消失在大火中的白河村，有着千丝万缕的联系。

name: RWorld: Love RuRu
short_description: RWorld: Love RuRu is an interactive graphic novel with contextual mini-games, RPG-style combat, and high-quality animated scenes. For a mature audience, it explores bold, erotic themes through immersive storytelling and complex character interactions, set in a world filled with emotion and drama.

name: Coffee Bonds: A Neighborhood Simulator
short_description: Start a new life in cozy Hearthstone Bay! Restore your grandmother’s cafe, sharpen your barista skills, and build bonds with the locals as you uncover the town’s hidden secrets! Enjoy festivals, explore nature, and bring warmth back to Hearthstone Bay, one cup and connection at a time.

name: Skylax! The Lab Runner
short_description: Skylax! The Lab Runner is an FPS game that presents you with tight gameplay and good mechanics. In the game, you can pass levels either by hiding using the invisible mechanic or by fighting against enemies. And after each level you will upgrade your weapons and utilities!

name: Cat Tree
short_description: Cat Tree is a relaxing indie game. Collect cats, watch them grow on your tree, and unlock new sections of it. Gather rare, epic, and legendary cats to create a unique collection and uncover all the secrets of the tree!

name: Samurai Sundries
short_description: Discover the unique talents of every artisan in Samurai Sundries—a crafting RPG where blacksmiths, herbalists, cooks, and aestheticians create wonderful goods while you explore woods and caverns for scarce materials and protect the village from ancient, greedy spirits.

name: Pathologic 3
short_description: Save a town from a mysterious plague in this narrative first-person RPG. Learn the stories of its unusual inhabitants. Shape their lives with your decrees. Diagnose patients. Face the Plague. Connect the dots. Find out who killed the immortal man. Correct your mistakes in the past.

name: Mad Jack. The Craziest Roguelike Game Ever!
short_description: The funniest and most exciting Roguelike you'll ever play! 🤪 With Star Wars and Game of Thrones references, crazy enemies, bizarre weapons, and loads of Easter eggs and humor. You’ve never played a game like this before! 🎮
steamspy_name: Mad Jack. The Craziest Roguelike Game Ever!

name: 水浒群侠传
short_description: The Legend of the Heroes of the Water Margin is an ancient Chinese RPG game based on Shi Naian's novel Water Margin, in which players can have adventures with some of Shi Naian's characters from the protagonist's point of view. This only to understand the purpose of the protagonist is to find.

name: Dash
short_description: Race through a plethora of levels, customize your characters, and unlock new abilities.

name: JeliWave
short_description: JeliWave is a linear 3D platformer with the visual appearance of retro games from the 90s. Swing your way through various worlds, unlock new abilities and master the art of Jeli's grapple!

about_the_game:
Embrace Christmas villages. Your mission? To spot the differences between two seemingly identical scenes to progress.

Santa’s Spot It offers a delightful blend of challenge and charm, with multiple levels that increase in difficulty as you progress. Every scene is packed with festive details that will keep you on your toes. Whether you’re a seasoned spot-the-difference pro or a first-time player, the game’s intuitive design ensures fun for the whole family.
name: Santa's Spot It
short_description: Embrace Christmas villages. Your mission? To spot the differences between two seemingly identical scenes to progress.

name: The Back Country
short_description: Help wolves, pigs, and crocodiles survive in the humanless valley. You are an old being that has lived in the valley for many generations, keeping to yourself and your thoughts. But now you want to connect with other creatures, and don't quite know how to go about this properly.

name: BeyondThere
short_description: Beyond There is an immersive first-person horror game where you explore the eerie house of a missing friend. As you uncover dark secrets and confront terrifying encounters, your sanity will be tested. Can you uncover the truth behind their disappearance, or will the house consume you too?

name: Bathhouse Creatures
short_description: Ready, set, bath! Run your bathhouse for animals in this cozy and wholesome management game. Keep your bathtubs clean and filled, serve a cast of whimsical creatures, decorate your bathhouse with your hard earned cash, and be the best bathhouse there can be!

name: Legendary Survivors: Prologue
short_description: Survive against hordes of monsters.

name: Sword Road
short_description: Make your best sword! Fight monsters in dungeon, collect items and craft a various sword.

name: Transfer
short_description: Transfer supplies with a Train in a post apocalyptic world filled with creatures that you need to fend off to survive and do your goal

name: Nature's Wrath
short_description: In Nature's Wrath, a 2D action roguelike with puzzles, explore dangerous swamps full of hostile creatures and secrets. Gather resources for your village and survive the harsh environment. Can you face the challenges and make it out alive?

about_the_game:
Roombattle is a party fighting game where players will control robotic vacuum cleaners and will fight equipped with sharp objects and balloons. The main objective is to be the last to be equipped balloons in the game. In addition to the battles, the game contains a large crowd of minigames.

Meet up with your friends, customize your vacuum, and get ready to battle in different rooms to claim victory!

Play with your friends in thrilling vacuum battles across colorful and dynamic rooms. Each theme features exclusive mechanics, making every round unique and exciting. Destroy the room and then clean it up!

Compete in multi-round matches, eliminating rival vacuums by popping their balloons to secure victory. Collect power-ups to become the most powerful vacuum cleaner in the room and defeat your friends!

Roombattle is designed for all types of players and can be played with just 2 buttons and a stick. Don’t have a controller? No problem—you can also play using a keyboard!

And if you have more than 4 players, don’t worry—Roombattle supports up to 6 players!

Everyone loves to battle… but also to have fun. Why not mix both? Enjoy battles with mini-games! Win the mini-game rounds to earn a mystery skill. With such power under your brushes, the next round will be a breeze!

A pirate vacuum cleaner?? A unicorn vacuum cleaner??? In Roombattle, anything is possible! Each player can personalize their vacuum and make it unique with a wide range of customizable options.

short_description: You'd never have guessed that vacuum cleaners could break up friendships. Burst the balloons, dominate all the mini-games, and compete with your friends across different themed rooms. Wreck, clean, and claim your victory—in that order.

name: Dark Light
short_description: On a quiet night, John is awoken by a mysterious lightning strike. Armed with improvised items, he must face hordes of monsters and uncover the source of the strange anomaly.

about_the_game:
You don't remember who you are. Act like her. Talk like her.

Am I Nima puts you in control of Nima’s fractured mind. Trapped by your mother in a dimly lit basement, you must pass her tests and navigate once-familiar rooms if you want to escape.

You start with nothing, your thoughts a blank slate. As you explore, you uncover words and concepts tied to the objects around you: a worn-out plushie, a locked drawer, an old note scribbled in hurried handwriting. These words become the building blocks of your understanding and are used to direct the conversations with your mom.

But knowledge alone isn’t enough, you must actively combine words in Nima's mind, experimenting with different pairings to unlock deeper meanings and access buried memories. Some combinations spark sudden realizations, flooding your vision with glimpses of the past. Others twist and distort, revealing unsettling contradictions in what you think you know.

The more you uncover, the more questions arise: Why has your mother locked you in the basement? What do these tests mean? And are you really Nima?

short_description: Am I Nima is a psychological-horror game where you must convince your mom that you really are her daughter. Combine words together in your brain and use them to talk. Get her to trust you.

about_the_game:
Witness the events preceding the story of Diluvian Ultra in this free, stand-alone FPS. Embody a young Diluvian Knight, Qasar, and face the brutal Myrmidon invasion of your tomb-ship. Find and protect the sarcophagus of Attila, your Lord, and ensure he survives to set in motion the events of Diluvian Ultra.

Featuring a brand-new level, new characters, story and dialogues, Diluvian Ultra: Awakening is an excellent introduction for new explorers of the game’s universe, as well as an interesting new addition to veterans who have already completed the first chapter of Diluvian Ultra.

Strategic combat

Diluvian Ultra’s combat is built around a dual-damage system where you have to combine weapons to be effective. Armour absorbs damage, but some weapons are designed to quickly strip it off your targets - unable to kill them, but exposing them for a single lethal blow. You have to be careful though, as enemies will mix their attacks in the same way. Collect and consume blood to upgrade your weapons and pick up various power-ups at the opportune moment, to become vengeance incarnate - if only for a while!

Keep it moving

Surviving in Diluvian Ultra is all about mobility. Dodge enemy fire while you chain together ranged attacks with close combat blows and devastating ground slams. Double-jump, dash, find cover and even deflect projectiles with your sword, but never stay in one place for too long!

Organic philosophy

Your spaceship home is a living combination of flesh and stone, and so it is with your arsenal of weapons; use both traditional Tech weapons as well as grotesque, living Organic armaments, and don’t forget to take good care of your closest companion, your sentient Squire Gun.

Epic story

Diluvian Ultra may be an over the top retro FPS filled with frenetic action, but all that carnage is set on a background of an epic, tragic story tackling the themes of fanaticism, trauma, betrayal and hope for redemption, playing out in neo-gothic architectural set pieces and immense, cathedral-like spaceships.
detailed_description:

As a young Diluvian Knight, stage a heroic defense against insurmountable odds, in this single-player FPS with a retro aesthetic and fast-paced, strategic combat.

Unlock power-ups, set up satisfying chains and combos, brave obstacles and cheeky weather twists. Play to relax or compete to leave your pawprint on our leaderboards. 🐈

name: Taryn Barker: Demon Hunter
short_description: Taryn Barker is on a quest for vengeance against the demonic forces that haunt the night. Wield deadly weapons, solve puzzles, and battle dark enemies in this action-packed 2D adventure inspired by survival horror classics. Can you survive and uncover the truth?

short_description: A stealth-based adventure set in the 1960s where you play as Doctor Clint, navigating the dangerous corridors of a secret underground facility. Outsmart guards, avoid detection, and team up with rebels to bring down a brutal regime.

name: Echos
short_description: Immerse yourself in an open-world survival adventure where exploration, crafting, and combat await. Traverse diverse biomes, gather resources, craft tools, and face dangerous creatures. Engage in dynamic quests, multiplayer modes, and adapt to changing environments.

With unpredictable environments, cute characters to meet and crazy obstacles to overcome, you'll need to keep your balance to complete the journey! Are YOU ready for the bonanza?

about_the_game:
The Looper Rabbit family had been living a quiet life in the city, until the rabbit father was laid off. One family can not repay the rest of the housing loan, but under the rabbit father had to sign a contract with the black heart company to do a cow and horse. Mother rabbit with two small rabbits to find a pastoral, where the land out of the fruit and vegetables to eat a miracle, sales are particularly good. Three people decided to plant fruits and vegetables desperately, in order to earn enough to redeem rabbit father's gold coins.

In the game, you can choose to manipulate the character to pick up the fruit, or you can do nothing and wait for the fallen fruit to become gold on its own. However, it should be noted that unlocking new fruits is viewed in the warehouse and mail screen. In your spare time, reading the contents of the letter is also a good choice. The current version only has the orchard map and a small amount of white noise, the remaining white noise will be fixed in the next update. The garden map and food map will be presented in the big update next year, all the updates are free, no purchase, stay tuned.

name: Cowgirl Trainer
short_description: Cowgirl Trainer is a JRPG dating sim. Fight bandits and monsters, collect bounties, and romance a sexy cowgirl as you explore the town of Tombwood and its surrounding areas. Level up, spec your characters, pass persuasion checks, and more as you strive to take down the Black Cactus Gang.

about_the_game:
Fatebound is a turn-based kingdom-building strategy game where every decision shapes the destiny of your realm. Starting from humble beginnings as a small town, you’ll expand, develop, and rise to greatness—if you can navigate the challenges fate throws your way. Manage your resources, construct vital buildings, and carefully spend your limited action points each turn to strengthen your kingdom.

The world of Fatebound is full of unpredictability. Dynamic events, both good and bad, can drastically alter the flow of the game, challenging you to adapt your strategy on the fly. Seasons shift, affecting resource production and altering the effectiveness of your plans, as you balance growth with survival.

Turn based actions

With each turn, the fate of your kingdom is in your hands—will you guide it to a prosperous empire, or will your choices doom it to collapse? In Fatebound Kingdoms, the future is yours to shape, but fate is always watching.

Gather Resources

Collect resources through workshops or use single action points to gather them directly from available world sources.

Automation

Automate your kingdom to gather resources for you automatically, letting you collect the resources you need daily.
name: Fatebound
short_description: Fatebound is a turn-based kingdom builder where your choices shape the realm’s destiny. Manage resources, build your kingdom, and adapt to dynamic events and seasons that alter the game's flow. Will your empire rise to greatness, or fall to the whims of fate?

about_the_game:
The Last Landlord is a roguelike card game inspired by the rules of Landlord, where you devote yourself wholeheartedly to building a powerful deck and achieving great victories.

Get powerful relics, upgrade your card type and hero attributes, and receive an enhanced version of playing cards

Use different skills from different professions in combination with playing cards to defeat enemies with various skills

Breaking the boundaries of the game

7 initial card decks

More than 20 types of playing cards hands

4 dynamic maps

8 professions with different styles

Over 400 types of relics

Over 100 types of consumables

12.2 This agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties regarding the game and services, and supersedes all prior oral or written agreements, statements, or warranties.
12.3 Mud Maru Bird Studio may update this agreement at any time, and the updated agreement terms shall replace the original agreement terms upon publication. The modified agreement will be notified to users through in-game announcements, official websites, or other appropriate means. If the user does not accept the modified terms of the agreement after the Mudpill Studio modifies them, please immediately stop using the games or services provided by Mudpill Studio. If the user continues to use the games or services provided by Mudpill Studio, it will be deemed that they have accepted the modified agreement.

12.5 Inability, failure to exercise in a timely manner, or failure to fully exercise the rights enjoyed under this agreement or in accordance with legal provisions by Mudpill Studio shall not be deemed a waiver of such rights, nor shall it affect Mudpill Studio's future exercise of such rights.
Article 13 Notice

Users should ensure that the contact information provided to Ni Wan Bird Studio is genuine and effective in order to receive notifications in a timely manner.
Article 14 Supplementary Provisions

short_description: last landlord a roguelike deckbuilder using poker rules,beat all skill enemy,gain relic and consumables,upgrade your poker hand type,add stats to your champion,receive enhanced poker card,encouter all random event and becoming ultimate poker champion.

name: No Escape from Madness
short_description: No Escape from Madness is a thrilling shooting adventure game that blends Lovecraftian elements with extraction gameplay. You will guide the self-sacrificing infantry operators into the Sector where The Elder One is poised to descend.

about_the_game:
🍿 Pop the Corn: Kernel Clicker 🍿

Welcome to the tastiest clicker game around! Pop the Corn: Kernel Clicker is all about turning tiny kernels into a mountain of delicious, profitable popcorn, one satisfying pop at a time!

🔥 Pop 'til you drop:

  • Drop kernels into the pan and watch the magic happen

  • Collect your popped treasures for cold, hard cash

  • Upgrade your popping game to churn out popcorn faster than ever!

💰 Chase that golden dream:

  • Embrace the endorphins when you hear the jingle of the rarer golden popcorn

  • Spend your hard-earned cash on shiny new pans

  • Switch up your popping scenery with unlockable skies

🎵 Unwind and relax:

  • Let the satisfying pop-pop-pop soothe your stress away!

  • Enjoy a calm, pressure-free gaming experience

  • Perfect for unwinding after a long day or during short breaks

🏅 Pop and achieve at your pace:

  • Tons of in-game and Steam achievements to unlock!

  • Challenge yourself with a variety of popcorn-popping goals

  • No rush, no pressure - just pure popcorn fun at your own pace, accompanied by some soothing jazzy tunes!

Pop the Corn: Kernel Clicker is your cosy corner in the gaming world. It's a small, fun game that's always satisfying to play, whether you've got five minutes or five hours. Let the rhythmic popping and gentle gameplay wash away your worries, and why not grab a bag of Popcorn to munch on as you play, because you deserve it!

Take it easy, and get popping!

name: Unbound Eternity
short_description: Unbound Eternity is a turn-based combat game with deck-building mechanics where you play as a monster. Invade a mysterious domain, create powerful cards, and seize every opportunity to establish your reign over the world!

name: Pirates Never Die
short_description: Pirates Never Die is a third-person horror zombie game set in a chilling, atmospheric world where players must uncover the mysteries of a cursed island. Play as Deacon, a young pirate in search for his brother after rumors of his disappearance. Faced with a new reality the fight for survival begins.

name: Catch A Fish
short_description: Catch A Fish is a 3D platformer. Jump, run and collect fishes to finish a level and unlock the next one.

name: Blue Hill Wendigo
short_description: Arm yourself with weapons, traps, and supplies in this survival horror FPS. Battle ruthless bandits and a relentless wendigo as you uncover the truth and fight to survive in this open world horror game.

name: Nina NTMP
short_description: Ocean View is a world where magic flows and mysteries await you around every corner. In this charming place lives Nina, a curious and somewhat antisocial girl whose goal in life is to find the cure for the Great Sickness. Join her on her classic RPG-style pixel art adventure.

name: Stellar Rhythm
short_description: Stellar Rhythm is a music-driven 2D space shooter inspired by R-Type and Rez. Weapons, enemies, and levels all sync to the beat, and your supermoves remix the soundtrack in real-time. With multiple game modes and unlockable upgrades, every battle is a rhythm-fueled rush of action and sound.

about_the_game:
In a world ravaged by a relentless zombie apocalypse, survival means more than just fighting the undead. In Farming Through The End, players must balance the need for resources, fortification, and combat with the desperate necessity to grow food in a dying world. Civilization has collapsed, cities are overrun, and survivors are scattered. The only chance for long-term survival lies in returning to the roots of humanity—farming.

You play as a lone survivor or a small group struggling to maintain a patch of land in the midst of chaos. Hordes of zombies roam the landscape, and survivors may become your allies or enemies. Scarce resources, unpredictable weather, and the constant threat of the undead will push you to your limits.

Grow crops, tend to livestock, and build makeshift defenses to protect your farm. At night, beware: zombie hordes are drawn to signs of life, and your farm will face relentless attacks after dark. Fortify your land, craft traps, and ensure your defenses hold through the night.

During the day, take your trusty pickup truck and explore the desolate world to scavenge for scrap, materials, and valuable supplies. Visit abandoned towns, forests, and junkyards in search of rare items that can be used to upgrade your farm, repair your vehicle, or craft powerful new weapons. But be careful—these excursions are risky, and you may encounter both zombies and rival survivors along the way.

A thriving barter economy also emerges as you sell your raised crops to other survivor groups in exchange for better equipment, advanced weapons, and critical materials. Strengthen your farm, evolve your defenses, and gain access to powerful tools to survive. Will you prioritize upgrading your truck for safer scavenging or fortify your farm to withstand larger hordes?

Survive, grow, and thrive—if you can—by Farming Through The End. Explore, defend against nightly zombie assaults, build alliances, and turn your farm into a fortress in a collapsing world.
name: Farming Through The End
short_description: In Farming Through The End, players navigate a zombie apocalypse by growing food, gathering resources, and fortifying their land, as farming becomes humanity's last hope for survival.

name: NekoPunch Island
short_description: Defend your cheese stash in NekoPunch Island! Join Mo, Bo, and a growing team of heroic cats as they face endless waves of cloned mice led by the evil Dr. Nesumi. Gather resources, build defenses, and protect the cheese at all costs in this island survival adventure!

name: It: Unstoppable
short_description: A world dominated by slime, as time passes, they will gradually establish their own civilization, but at the same time, they will also face some crises. Different events will occur in different times, and you can intervene in these events and observe the results of all of them.

name: Life's Short 人生苦短
short_description: "We clung to the illusion of life's infinite respawns, until time's grinding gears revealed the corroded save button beyond salvation."

name: Evolution of Species 2: Online
short_description: Welcome to the world of microscopic creatures! Help your creation evolve from an inconspicuous inhabitant of the microscopic depths into a unique creature that can stand up for itself. Create the most unusual creature! Show it to the world! Fight with other players online!

name: Masters of the Air
short_description: This is a flying barrage shooting game, the background is the Pacific theater of World War II, the player controls a fighter plane in the game, in order to experience the exhilarating barrage shooting.

name: Slingshot Pilot
short_description: Master fast paced gravity manuevers in this arcade space game.

name: StarSim: BattleZone
short_description: StarSim: BattleZone is a real-time strategy (RTS) game set in the StarSim universe. Take command of an army and lead your faction to victory. Gameplay includes classic RTS mechanics such as: building a base, gathering resources, researching new technologies, building defences, training units, etc.

name: Kopitiam Story
short_description: After experiencing the closure of your uncle's beloved kopitiam, you are now determined to continue sharing the joy of his kopi to the big city. Embark on an adventure of growth and adaptation to the bustling city-life. How will you continue your uncle's legacy?

about_the_game:
We're Here, Papa is a VR horror game.

In the dark depths of the sewer, you must find your way and escape on your own. But you are not alone down there. Something is pursuing you. You don’t know what it is, but one thing is certain… you must not let it catch you.

STORY

Late at night in 2015, Las Vegas. After a long day, you were on your way back to the hotel when you suddenly blacked out. When you woke up, you found yourself in a dark, damp sewer.

To get back home, you must navigate this maze alone. But in this desolate place, the echo of footsteps tells you someone — or something — is following. You must hurry and escape this darkness.

"We're Here, PAPA" Game Guide

  • Find your way out of the sewer and contact the rescue team.

  • Use your phone to light up the dark paths and clear the obstacles blocking your way to escape.

  • But be careful—never let the thing chasing you catch up. If it does, you might never make it out of there.

Immersive graphics and realistic sound effects will draw you into the experience.
Try it now!

name: Nightmare Journey
short_description: You’re on a bus, caught in a cycle of shifting nightmares. escape the horrors, and reach the station awake and alive.

name: Blumenia - Historias de un Mundo de Plantas
short_description: A plant world is struck by a drought! Follow three girls in their journey between The Four Seasons in search of the solution. You'll meet plants and will know the stories behind them
steamspy_name: Blumenia - Historias de un Mundo de Plantas

name: The Last Phoenix
short_description: Platformer RPG about Felix the goblin who posses a demonic power of reincarnation! With it he must save his kind from eradication! Customize your gear. Unlock multiple story endings. Choose how you play with optional rogue lite settings if you are up for the challenge!

name: OpenDraft
short_description: OpenDraft is a minimalistic & offline writing, note-taking, and doodling tool with infinite space and distraction-free focus.

name: Mercy Station - Zombie Hospital Simulation
short_description: Run an emergency clinic during a violent viral outbreak in first-person co-op medical sim and FPS gameplay. Treat the injured, quarantine the infected, keep the facility clean, and manage resources while fighting off zombies, werewolves, and other infection types. Do the right harm.

about_the_game:
Step into the Shadows as the Gravewatcher!

In Gravewatcher: Nightfall, you are the lone guardian of a graveyard teetering between realms, where restless spirits and ancient evils are waiting for night to fall. By day, manage and fortify your cemetery to keep it serene and inviting for the living. By night, defend it fiercely as ghosts, spirits, and demons attempt to break free and haunt the nearby town.

Daytime Management: Build, Repair, and Prepare

During daylight hours, your role as Gravewatcher is to craft a secure and respectful graveyard for the departed and their visitors. Construct graves, restore damaged tombstones, and build paths for visitors to pay their respects. Each decision during the day—whether to add defenses, upgrade graves, or enhance mana reserves—will be vital for the challenges of nightfall.

Nighttime Defense: Survive the Supernatural Assault

When the sun sets, the peaceful cemetery transforms into a supernatural battleground. Dark spirits, roaming ghosts, and even powerful demons emerge, seeking to escape and terrorize nearby villagers. Use spells & defenses to keep them contained. The stakes are high: if spirits break through, panic will grip the townsfolk, and your job as the Gravewatcher could be at risk!

Key Features:

  • Strategic Cemetery Management: Plan and expand your graveyard with paths, graves, and defenses to both honor the dead and prepare for nighttime attacks.

  • Dynamic Day-Night Cycle: Utilize the calm of day to reinforce and build, and face the escalating horrors of night, each more challenging than the last.

  • Customizable Defenses: Place magical runes, blessed crosses, statues, and other defenses to slow, trap, or weaken spirits based on their strength and cunning.

  • Spellcasting Abilities: As the Gravewatcher, cast area-based spells to hold or exorcise spirits as they attempt to break free. Manage your mana carefully; it's your main line of defense at night.

  • Resource Management: Balance two essential resources: gold to build and maintain graves and structures, and mana to wield defensive spells.

  • Special Events: Events like Halloween, Blood Moons, and Divine Days bring unique challenges and powerful new rewards, keeping you on your toes.

Will You Hold Back the Shadows?

In Gravewatcher: Nightfall, every night is a test of your skills as a cemetery keeper. Protect the living, contain the restless dead, and find harmony between life and the afterlife. Are you ready to embrace your role as the Gravewatcher and face the night?
