short_description: As the Gravewatcher, protect the living from the restless dead in this eerie blend of management and tower defense. By day, build and fortify your graveyard; by night, face waves of spirits, ghosts, and demons trying to escape. Can you keep the darkness at bay?

name: Ambush All Sides
short_description: This is a roguelite game. You will remotely control a robot to explore the underground world, full of ghost monsters, they are afraid of light, your flashlight can do damage to them, the mouse control the direction of the flashlight, Keyboard 'WASD' controls the direction,has 3 lives per turn.

name: Cloud Piercer
short_description: It's time to go on an adventure! Board an airship, load your cannons, set off to discover the secrets of the clouds and... Who knows? How far can you go?

name: Abstract Dwelling
short_description: 《Abstract Dwelling》 is a game that’s “just about building houses.” There’s no complicated currency system, no complex menus, and no intricate storylines.

name: Starship Destroyer
short_description: A sci-fi space vehicle combat game, where the player must defend their capital ship from being destroyed, while attempting to destroy the alien force's own capital ship!

developers: Darcy Morris, Elie Begg, Connor Galy, Kaiden Day, Chia-yu Chang, Monique Gonzales, Daniel Lloyd
name: Vartra Abyss
short_description: Vartra Abyss is an isometric ARPG that has the player exploring a dystopian underground cavern in search of their lost friend. You must learn to fight using your new abilities that you will attain by slaying enemies. Play your way and mix up your abilities to suit your playstyle.

name: Dragon Eclipse ARENA
pc_requirements_min:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4500K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 / Radeon HD 7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
short_description: Dragon Eclipse ARENA is an auto-battler deckbuilder that combines clever 3x3 grid positioning, tactical combat, and powerful synergies. For each run, draft a new starting deck and choose a unique Tamer. Use Blessings to get mighty permanent buffs, evolve Mystlings, and achieve victory!

name: At Sea
short_description: Step into the shoes of Maris, a lone child trapped at sea. Surrounded by eerie creatures, you'll need to outwit dangers and solve puzzles to survive. But the island ahead holds secrets darker than you can imagine. Will escape truly mean freedom?

about_the_game:
• Immersive Puzzle Solving: Solve intricate, interactive puzzles where observation and logic are essential. Manipulate objects, discover hidden clues, and combine items to unlock new areas.

  • Relentless Pursuer: Catch glimpses of a tormented man through windows, shouting disturbing accusations and threatening your life. His unpredictable presence adds a constant sense of dread.

  • Unravel the Mystery: Piece together the story behind the AI entity manipulating the events. Face a final choice—defend yourself or find another way to survive the madness.

  • Cinematic Horror Experience: Inspired by classic horror games and films, the game combines suspenseful storytelling, jump scares, and psychological tension to create an unforgettable experience.

short_description: You must escape a mysterious facility and solve complex puzzles in this psychological horror game. An unseen entity manipulates both you and a deranged man, forcing you to make life-or-death decisions to survive.

name: Accolade Sports Collection (QUByte Classics)
short_description: Prove that you're the best gamer of the 90s. Take on everything from legendary baseball to electrifying street basketball, winter and summer sports and try to beat five games that made history: Hardball!, Hardball II, Hoops Shut Up And Jam!, Winter Challenge and Summer Challenge.

name: Linked
short_description: Explore past and future, high and low in this short platformer game!

name: Dreamland Farm
short_description: After living in a big city your dreams come true – today you start your new life on a peaceful pixel farm!

name: I Touched Tips with a Femboy
short_description: A boring hike with a femboy yields new experiences... 😜
steamspy_name: I Touched Tips with a Femboy

name: Baracop - Gay Platform Action Game
short_description: To save the world from the big villain, Baracop must face the enemies. Enjoy an NSFW platform action game with gay sexual animations and different weapons.

developers: Felipe Fleming, Morris Åstrand, Christoffer Ryrvall, Erik Wahlström, Rasmus Westner, Fredrik Westerlund, Cynthia Pailaqueo Duarte, Gabriel Henningsohn
name: Necro Blade
short_description: Enter the world of darkness and save the town from damnation, as their only salvation! Will you save your village, or get consumed by death's grasp?

about_the_game:
Explore and share Stan & Jan Berenstain’s classic, "The Berenstain Bears In the Dark", adapted from the original "Berenstain Bears" storybook into an interactive animated adventure! The Berenstain Bear family brings the story alive, offering an easy to digest reading mode which is fully animated and voiced. Increase the challenge and the fun with an interactive at-your-own-pace option with lots of bonuses and secrets to discover!

After a family trip to the library, Brother Bear finds a spooky story in the mystery section, "The Case of the Crying Cave". Later that night, Brother Bear offers to read the story to Sister Bear. However, the spooky story keeps her up in bed at night, and Brother Bear teases her making wailing noises! Is there any way for Sister Bear to overcome her imagination running away with scary thoughts?

Since it's first release in 1996, Living Books' rendition of "The Berenstain Bears In the Dark" has been enjoyed by countless children. Step-by-step, the reader will find the story is full of all the entertaining scenes that have made Stan & Jan Berenstain’s "Berenstain Bears" books enduring classics. All while providing new ways to interact with the book again and again.

  • Both interactive and story modes suitable for different levels of skill.

  • Interact with the pictures and discover hidden scenes.

  • An easy-to-use point and click interface.

  • Attractive animations bring the characters to life.

  • Fully voiced as you read! Chock full of memorable scenes!

  • A revitalized re-release compatible with modern platforms.

name: Undercover
short_description: In Undercover, you enter a medieval world as a noble knight among trusted comrades. But beware—one of you is an infiltrator with a deadly mission. While you carry out your knightly duties, deception and danger lurk in the shadows. Can you unmask the traitor before they strike?

name: HyperCoven
short_description: In HyperCoven you don’t collect resources – you collect units. Cleverly devise your expansion on the map, to gain control of the most effective mix.

name: Little Resort Simulator
short_description: Relaxed first person simulator where you manage a little hotel, you customize the Customer's room furniture, clean rooms, serve drinks at the Bar, serve buffet food in the eating area and unlock more facilities

name: Nightmariners
short_description: Nightmariners is a co-op sailing-horror game. Deliver cargo between islands while avoiding sinister creatures.

name: Chronicles Reborn
short_description: As a sworn protector of the Brightwyn Order, uncover lost knowledge in a world rich with secrets. Gather resources, master ancient skills, and face formidable foes across diverse biomes. Build, craft, and fight your way through a vast land filled with quests, mysteries, and untold adventures.

about_the_game:
You are in a village in which the monster has killed all the villagers, now it is your turn. SURVIVAL HORROR. 

Set in Bhagwatpur's India, the Himalayas lived a monk named Vidyut.

Vidyut’s change into a bad demon was awful. He killed many creatures. Afterward, he controlled bad forces.

Violence overtook him. Lightning fired down on him. His skin got Red. His face warped. His eyes turned evil-red. They showed no life. A bad spirit lived inside him now. now you have to save

"The Cursed Monk," offering players a mix of exploration, resource management, puzzle-solving, and combat.

Each task is designed to contribute to the overall goal of banishing Vidyut while providing a rich, immersive experience in the game's world.

Uncover the dark history of Vidyut by exploring the village, finding hidden documents.

Where are you hiding to save yourself?

By EerieEcho
name: Brahmarakshas
short_description: The village, named Bhagwatpur ,When that demon got powers He slowly killed the villagers one by one .....Now there is only one village boy you have to save and take revenge from that beast.

English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Hindi*
*languages with full audio support

name: Book of Decisions
short_description: A game in the Chatbot Roleplay category.Among the ancient Egyptian ruins, a book is found, and in our game, we talk to this book. The book answers everything we write. The book's general power is that everything written in it becomes real in the world, but we discuss the consequences with the book.

about_the_game:
Slide down in Pingbert’s Snow Ride, an endless high-speed platformer where you take control of Pingbert, the cheerful penguin mail carrier. Glide above snowy hills, dodge obstacles, avoid falling off the edge, and deliver mail faster than ever while pulling off slick moves like drifting, spinning, and diving! Earn coins as you play to improve Pingbert's cozy cabin, which doubles as a humble mail postal service, and unlock a variety of useful upgrades and stylish customizations!

Slide, drift, spin, and glide your way through Bubble Mountain. Nail these moves to fullfill your duty as a mail carrier penguin and rack up high scores!

Take your shot at Endless Mode where each playthrough brings fresh, procedurally generated terrain with new obstacles, slopes, and surprises. No two rides are the same!

Grab powerups found across Bubble Mountain. These powerups can turn the tide in tricky situations, giving you the boost you need to stay ahead. Use magnets to attract all nearby mail, use rockets to recover from a fall, use bubble shields to bounce across the land, and more!

Use your well-earned coins to improve Pingbert's cozy mail postal cabin with Pingette, Pingbert's lovely partner. Unlock new costumes, gameplay upgrades, and much more!

Uncover hidden areas. Look for secret paths and challenges that unlock extra rewards, and keep an eye out for reports of malicious creatures causing havoc. They may try to mess up your delivery, so stay sharp and be ready for anything!
name: Pingbert's Snow Ride
short_description: Slide, soar, and deliver! Join Pingbert, the upbeat penguin mail carrier, in Pingbert’s Snow Ride—a fast-paced, endless platformer where you'll slide down snowy slopes to deliver mail at high speed!

about_the_game:
How long can you survive the road?

In Oh My Wrench, you’ll take the wheel in an endless car-driving adventure where the main goal is to survive as long as possible while dodging unpredictable obstacles. As you progress, the speed increases, pushing your reflexes to the limit. Compete for the highest score on a global leaderboard that now features both all-time and weekly rankings, giving you fresh opportunities to shine every week!

To spice up the challenge, pick up bonuses along the way: grab an extra life to keep going, a time-slowing hourglass to catch your breath, or special coins to boost your score. Combined with a fast-paced day-night cycle and dynamic weather shifts, every moment feels fresh, thrilling, and filled with new surprises.

Can you navigate the chaos, collect the bonuses, and claim the top spot? Find out in Oh My Wrench!

Can you navigate the chaos, collect the bonuses, and claim the top spot? Find out in Oh My Wrench!

about_the_game:
「Be the King of a False World」

１．To Discover and Fix [Anomaly]

There is something wrong with this world, there are many [Anomaly].

[Anomaly] can be Fixed to normal by hitting the shot.

２．Discover [Anomaly] by comparing the “True time” with the “False time.”

The “True time,” in which the true appearance is seen,

and the “False time,” in which the false appearance is seen, switch periodically.

Any suspicious part when comparing these two times is suspected of being [Anomaly], Fixed it.

３．Score higher than the others and be the King.

There are others in this world who have modified [Anomaly] (multi play).

The competition is based on the score obtained by modifying [Anomaly],

The one with the highest score becomes the King.

(A mode to play against the CPU will also be implemented.)

４．Unlock various elements with the rewards earned from winning.

Store to purchase character skins, accessories, emotes, and other customizations

５．Use your unique abilities.

Unique characters, each with different abilities.

Use various characters to correct [Anomaly]

and become the King of the False World.

about_the_game:
SUMMARY

Co-developed by one of the writer/designers behind The Rise of the Golden Idol, City of Voices is a short, Golden Idol-inspired deduction game that begins as a slice-of-life tale but soon transforms into something far more mysterious.

STORY

In suburban England, at the turn of the millennium, a young girl is being bullied on her first day at secondary school. Just when things seem like they can’t get any hairier, she finds herself mysteriously transported to the ancient Maya city of Tikal, back in its first-millennium heyday.

GAMEPLAY

Investigate a series of moments frozen in time. Examine clues and make deductions to uncover what happened in each scenario. Piece together a heartfelt story full of twists and turns.

FEATURES

· 4-6 hours of pure deduction gameplay—no filler!

· 9 scenarios to solve, ranging from a simple opener to fiendishly difficult later levels

· Lovingly drawn pixel art (by an artist who can’t stop drawing trees!)

· Original orchestral soundtrack guaranteed to get you singing in the shower
name: City of Voices
short_description: A short Golden Idol-like deduction game about a young girl who is catapulted from her suburban life into the mysterious world of the ancient Maya. Investigate a series of moments frozen in time. Examine clues and solve puzzles to uncover a story full of twists and turns.

name: AND10
short_description: The Full campaign of AND10 is a fast paced TPS based in a futuristic version of Tokyo call Neo - Tokyo. From Neo - Tokyo you can travel to far off Alien worlds and meet up with friends to trade or fight off enemies in combat in a variety of cyberpunk themed challenges.

about_the_game:
Keep recycling - new challenges, containers, improved models, more management and much more.

Design and expand your new recycling center in this first-person simulation game. Take care of unloading, sorting and compacting the waste.

The new level editor allows you to freely design the yard, place upgrades and set it up the way you like.

With increasing experience, multiple customers will show up simultaneously and might create a queue if unloading does not happen fast enough.

Completely new shaders for containers and vehicles bring realistic graphics and more possibilities. You can not only clean containers with the pressure washer but also restore old paint jobs with the new paint gun.

If you don't take care of the maintenance, compactors can wear off and stop working properly.

New ways to sell used goods like furniture and electronics: The enlarged second-hand shop and new advertisement signs attract customers.

New human and vehicle 3D models with many variations in clothing and style will keep unloading and sorting the trash interesting.More information soon!

- Randomly generated customers and trash objects

- Authentic animation of garbage compactors

- Unload and sort customer's trash

- Realistic containers and machines for different types of trash

- Real-time destruction physics (runtime fragmentation)

- Buy, paint and configure new containers

- Resell second hand items and save them from the crusher

- Waste paper, bulky trash, recyclables, scrap metal and more

- Use the management to configure the yard the way you like

- Earn cash and satisfaction to unlock new trash types and containers

- Purchase upgrades for machines and containers

- Use the pressure washer to clean the containers

name: Stormwater - Complete Edition
short_description: Over the last seventy years the number of curses on the continent has grown. This invisible war against spectral evils is fought not just on the battlefield, but also in the hearts and minds of the citizens. And for a lowly priest deep in the haunted countryside, the parish is the frontline.

name: Hagsville
short_description: Strange noises echo through empty rooms, shadows seem to shift, and it feels like you’re never truly alone. To feel safer, you’ve installed a smart monitoring system, allowing you to watch every room. But in a place like this, will that be enough?

name: The Ghost of Anna
short_description: A young girl, suffering from sensory abnormalities, finds herself in a thrilling adventure fighting with her imagination.

about_the_game:
Strategic dice rolls, keen population management, and navigating factional rivalries are all vital to thriving in Amberspire. Beneath the glow of a gas giant, build your city in harmony with an alien ecology. Atop the ruins of an abandoned moon, a new city dawns.

Dice are at the heart of Amberspire. Each building has a unique die to roll for creating resources, used to construct and operate other buildings. Buildings may not always give you the resources you need, so you and your city will adapt to what fortune provides.

The moon orbiting the gas giant Amber has developed an unusual ecology – viscous floodplains and rust blooms, dense fog and silica grass dominate the environment. They will impact your city's growth and must be managed, but cohabitation is better than eradication.

The citizens of Amberspire have their own goals and rivalries with your city caught in between their grand hopes and nefarious intentions. Influence their plans to avoid their ire and prosper.

  • Dice-driven systems govern resources, buildings, weather, and events. Dice guide you to play reactively and create interesting scenarios.

  • Systemic ecology and citizen dynamics create a lively and unique world. The residents of your city grow according to their environment. Likewise, the weather and ecology of the moon respond to the increasing number of buildings and can threaten your progress. 

  • Factions and political drama can dramatically affect your capabilities. Dynamic events infuse the story of your city as factions compete with each other.

  • Hand-drawn isometric art beautifully realize the buildings that comprise your city, and lush portraits depict the many factions in the galaxy. 

  • An original soundtrack composed by nervous_testpilot that brings to life the unique world of Amber and its moon.
name: Amberspire
short_description: A science fantasy dice city builder. Construct buildings, manage resources, and build in harmony with an alien ecology. Beneath the glow of a gas giant, Amberspire will grow and prosper into a flourishing city atop the ruins of an abandoned moon.

short_description: "Enjoy Twice" – A new Sokoban-style puzzle game, Play Twice! Once you clear a stage, a second playthrough begins on the same board. Enjoy a dual-layered puzzle experience where strategic planning for the second round is the key to success!

about_the_game:
Synopsis

Officer Gabriel, Sgt. Natalia & Col. John Tyson are investigating an abandoned town. Many residents claim it is a cursed place.

As they investigate, they encounter inexplicable phenomena and struggle to survive in critical conditions.

Key Features

  • Multiple Game Mode

Play in various mode starting from Investigation, Rescue, or Versus. No matter what you choose, zombie will chasing you. 

  • Retro Co-Op Split Screen

Bring your closest person or family, become a solid partner or challenge them to prove who's the badass investigator.

  • Investigate the Anomaly

A terrifed accident came to the Outer Town. Get your clues, find the way out, and survive from the living corpse in this cursed land.

  • Save the Professor

There's a professor doing a research in the cursed land, however something bad happened, something not expected. Protect him and stay alive until rescue arrive.

  • Compete your Partner

Challenge your partner to prove who's the best investigator. Remember, no matter where you are, it's always zombie chasing for scar. 

PromiZed Land: Outer Town 2025 is a third-person shooter horror simulator that takes you into a cursed land. Experience an immersive shooting game that blends excitement and thrill with moments of joy and satisfaction.

#EnterTheCursedLand #LostInOuterTown

about_the_game:
Take command of your destiny in Run the Rings, a strategic PvP spaceship management auto battler where careful planning is the key to galactic supremacy. Design and deploy your spaceship, then test your creation against other players in asynchronous battles through distant star systems.

In Run the Rings, the action begins before the battle. Craft your spaceship with precision, choosing from a vast array of modules, including weapons, shields, and support systems. Position your components strategically to maximize effectiveness, anticipate enemy strategies, and counter their strengths. Once your ship is ready, it’s time to set it loose in the galaxy! Battles are resolved automatically, so your preparation and ingenuity determine the outcome.

Choose your role in this bustling galaxy: be a cunning space pirate raiding trade routes, a savvy merchant trader running valuable cargo through the ring systems, or a fearless bounty hunter taking down high-value targets. Each role offers unique rewards and challenges, letting you shape your adventure to match your playstyle.

Features:

  • Asynchronous Auto Battler: Battles play out automatically, letting you focus on strategy and ship design. Compete against other players even while offline!

  • Custom Ship Design: Build your perfect spacecraft by equipping weapons, defenses, and advanced tech modules. Every layout decision can mean the difference between victory and defeat.

  • Dynamic Roles: Choose to be a pirate, trader, bounty hunter, or carve out your own unique niche in a vibrant and competitive galaxy.

  • Intergalactic Rivalries: Challenge other players’ designs in non-interactive battles and rise through the leaderboards. Analyze results to refine your strategy and improve your fleet.

  • Exploration and Progression: Travel to exotic planets, trade resources, and complete missions to earn valuable upgrades and unlock new ship technologies.

  • Ever-Expanding Universe: Regular updates bring new challenges, modules, and opportunities to the galaxy, keeping gameplay fresh and exciting.

In Run the Rings, your tactical mind and creative designs are your greatest weapons. Will your ship reign supreme through the rings, or will you be just another wreck in the void? The galaxy is waiting for you to make your mark.

about_the_game:
Welcome to join the official communication group:834885556

You can play different roles into the squid park to play, your every choice or behavior will have a slight impact on the squid Park, and this is a fusion of Roguelite horizontal action game, so don't think back, death is not the end, just wake up from a dream.

Rich main line, branch line, butterfly effect

Different protagonists have different main lines, during the adventure, your ability level and state will make your main line and branch to different possibilities, and the different choices you make will also have an impact on the subsequent, causing the butterfly effect.

Rich skill tree

Whether the main character or the supporting character, all the actionable characters in the game have their own unique skill tree, which can be developed according to the way you like to play.

Rich equipment and magical items

There are a lot of special effects equipment and items in the game, some dropped randomly by monsters, some given to you by different story branches or NPCS, or who you stole them from? Anyway, they'll be useful.

Random map

Every map, every room is randomly generated, and you don't know what's going to happen next, and neither do I.

Random monsters and powerful BOSS battles

Every battle here has randomly generated monsters, there are some powerful BOSS battles, and of course there will be some characters who are not bosses due to your choice, so be careful.

【 Developer's words 】

First of all, thank you for downloading and supporting the "Squid Park" everyone (to the knees of orz), this game is currently only a demo, because from the project to the completion of the production only 6 months, there are many imperfect places, whether it is the plot, combat or art performance, can be described as rough, because of the lack of manpower, We even used AI assistance on scenes, monster drawings, and BGM, but please be assured that we will replace all AI content with official footage in the official release.

Originally, we planned to do the main line of three characters and two complete regional content, but obviously we were too ignorant, and now the content presented has been made by the partners working overtime (who would have thought that we this group of guys who are not in class, even more than at work)...

Finally, we hope that after the experience, a lot of comments, to provide us with guidance and advice, which is very important to us! (Please don't pity us ~~)

If you are interested in this project, you can also contact us to join us, we welcome all friends who have a passion for the game to participate! (Of course, free is even better!!) )

about_the_game:
Start as a broke and humiliated janitor, living in a women's dormitory.

Plan and optimize your day-to-day activities throughout the week, like Persona games, but filled with kinky femdom. Grind and strategize your way through, or surrender your fate into their hands!

Endure and manage your days while keeping track of the changes and find various ways to exploit your position. Learn what goes on inside a girls' dorm and discover numerous secrets as you go through your day-to-day life full of humiliation and frustration.

Interact with characters full of personalities and take part in their kinkiest requests. Learn about their nature and motivate them to do nasty things, whether by slipping a lewd comic, replacing their vibrators, or simply using aphrodisiacs. Either abuse them or get abused and let them make you their little toy!

Set up cameras, traps, and other ways to spy on them. Explore and uncover dark and dirty mysteries, and decide which goals to pursue. Buy various items to aid your schemes and establish a profitable business by selling pictures, recordings, panties, milk, etc.

Blackmail the girls or simply leak their nudes after you jerk off. Extort someone too much, and they might leave the dorm for good. But new girls will move in shortly if there's a vacancy!

With fun and short dialogues and texts, enjoy a punchy premise. Your every choice may reveal something different and impact your overall experience, whether it’s degrading or dignified.

While engaging in devious acts, maintain a low suspicion level and pay your rent as you progress toward an ending. Depending on your choices, you may branch out to different routes leading to dark, fulfilling, or secret endings.

Hidden variables and switches may keep track of what you do and reflect the game based on your behavior. There is also a bit of randomness involved to keep each playthrough fresh.

Experience an old-school RPG with modern retro pixel art!

about_the_game:
What would make a great hero like Achilles harvest olives for an ordinary market woman? What would drive the great Greek heroes to become ordinary couriers? The desire for fame and adventure, of course!

Ahapika is the most heroic agency in Greece, and only the most valorous and glorious are accepted. Follow the path of its origin from the very beginning! You will have to fulfill the requests and orders of both ordinary mortals and the great Olympian gods. But be careful - sometimes an innocent request to deliver a package can lead to fatal consequences. Fight with beasts and monsters, argue with gods and titans, gather the best heroes to help.

An exciting story:

In your adventures, you will immerse yourself in the multifaceted world of intrigues and mysteries of Ancient Greece. When carrying out the orders of the gods, be careful: the proud inhabitants of Olympus do not forgive mistakes and may hold a grudge against you for a long time. You will have to understand what a new mysterious prophecy means to the world, and, of course, fight in the great final battle. It depends only on your actions which side you will be on, and who will come to the rescue at this hour.

Classic bullet heaven battles:

Many different heroes, various weapons, hordes of enemies, powerful amulets and Divine Gifts! More than 50 unique story tasks! Fight and unlock new heroes. Be prepared for the fact that powerful forces may intervene in the battle, both to help you and to counteract. Hone your skills on the arena in endless mode.

Welcome to "AHAPIKA - Heroic Agency"!
name: AHAPIKA – Heroic Agency
short_description: Gather brave heroes and open the most heroic agency in Ancient Greece! Help people, argue with the gods, but remember: a mistake can be fatal.

short_description: Memory of Lust is an adult visual novel set in a mysterious town. Discover secrets, forge bonds, and enjoy fully animated sex scenes in a non-linear story filled with romance, intrigue, and passion. Shape your destiny through unforgettable moments.

about_the_game:
SEXXX GIRLS [18+] is a futuristic visual novel with point-and-click elements where you step into the shoes of a PR agent working with the city’s most popular superheroines.

In a world where heroes are nothing more than a flashy media product, it’s your job to clean up their messes, build their perfect image, and cater to their wild demands. But will you play along with the system or fight back? The choice is yours!

Game Features:

  • Drama-packed storyline with tough moral choices. Cover up scandals or expose the shady truths behind the corporate world—your decisions matter.
  • Bold and unique heroines. Each superheroine has her own personality, backstory, and challenges. Earn their trust or call them out!
  • Spicy adult content. Steamy scenes, provocative encounters, and intense moments are all part of the ride.
  • Immersive futuristic world. Explore a high-tech metropolis filled with stunning locations, a thriving media culture, and cutting-edge gadgets.
  • Reputation-based gameplay. Your actions shape the careers of the heroines, the public image of corporations, and even the fate of the city. Play it clean or embrace the chaos!

    Are you ready to dive into a world of lies, temptation, and heated rivalries? Make your mark in SEXXX GIRLS [18+].

short_description: Cozy Forge is a cozy medieval sim where you run a blacksmith shop. Melt, mold, and forge tools for townsfolk be it a sickle for a peasant or a sword for a knight. Lose yourself in the relaxing rhythm of your forge.

about_the_game:
Overview

In a distant land, the retired valiant knight, Sir William, renowned for his unwavering bravery and loyalty, embarks on an unexpected adventure when he stumbles upon a mysterious portal after a night at the pub. Accidentally falling through, he lands in the bewildering modern city of Old York, completely unaware that he's intruded into the perilous territory of a ruthless street gang led by the enigmatic Big B.O.B. Armed with his trusty sword and an unyielding spirit, Sir William doesn't back down from a challenge.

Instead of a duel, he challenges the gang members in a quest for more alcohol, setting off a chain of events that leads him to parry his way through the gritty streets of Old York. Join Sir William as he navigates the city, uncovering the depths of the Killer Serpents' crimes and the mystery behind his unexpected transportation, all while satisfying his unique quest for spirits and swords. It's a thrilling journey that combines chivalry, chaos, and a dash of liquid courage in a mesmerizing urban landscape.

Features

  • Dynamic Combat System: Utilize precise attacks, blocking, and parrying to masterfully fend off enemies. Add a bit of flair to your fights by engaging in the exclusive Drunk Dash ability when Sir William gets, shall we say, fortified.

  • Urban Adventure: Explore the sprawling streets of Old York, each filled with dangers, and hidden coin.

  • Mysterious Storyline: Uncover the secrets behind the Killer Serpents’ criminal empire and the mystical portal that brought you here in Old York.

  • Knightly Platforming: Leap, climb, and dash your way through challenging environments, with simple but engaging controls.

Controls

  • Move Right: D

  • Move Left: A

  • Jump: W / Space Bar

  • Climb: W

  • Attack: Left Mouse Button

  • Block: C

  • Parry: While Holding C, Press Left Mouse Button

  • Dash: While Drunk, Shift

Special Codes (In Clues)

  • Unlock Rampage Mode = Sir William's favourite drink

  • Unlock All Levels = The leader of the Killer Serpents

  • Unlock Everything = One Word of The Killer Serpents' Dialogue

  • Reset Everything = Its just "Reset"
name: [K]night City
short_description: Parry your way through Old York with Sir William!

You play as a young Doctrine Bearer named Aric.Aric is an orphan who was adopted and raised to be a Doctrine Bearer by the Order. He is tasked with upholding the sect's teachings and making sure that other sects don't upset the balance of the world

about_the_game:
Spider Canyon is a physics platformer game set in the dangerous Mojave desert. Jump through hand-crafted environments to test your wits and parkour skills to reach the finish the line the fastest. Bounce, leap, and survive. Gravity is your playground!

Key Features

  • Shoot webs that turn once hard and dangerous surfaces of the desert into bounce pads to navigate the environment with.

  • Precise physics based movement to master.

  • Use the in-game timer to track your progress and chase the time down.

  • In-game free movement mode to explore the level and plot your path.

  • 24 hand made levels.

  • Minimalist and clean UI and graphics.

  • Desert themed soundtrack and sound effects.
detailed_description:
Spider Canyon is a physics platformer game set in the dangerous Mojave desert. Jump through hand-crafted environments to test your wits and parkour skills to reach the finish the line the fastest. Bounce, leap, and survive. Gravity is your playground!

Key Features

  • Shoot webs that turn once hard and dangerous surfaces of the desert into bounce pads to navigate the environment with.

  • Precise physics based movement to master.

  • Use the in-game timer to track your progress and chase the time down.

  • In-game free movement mode to explore the level and plot your path.

  • 24 hand made levels.

  • Minimalist and clean UI and graphics.

  • Desert themed soundtrack and sound effects.
name: Spider Canyon
pc_requirements_min:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
pc_requirements_rec:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Graphics: Support for Vulkan 1.2
short_description: Set in an unforgiving desert world, SPIDER CANYON is a first person physics-based puzzle platformer where you play as a spider. Use your trusty spiderweb to scale the dangerous desert terrain and reach the finish line. Good luck!

name: The Highland Ritual
short_description: The Highland Ritual is a PSX Style First-Person horror game. A game where you go on a ritual hunt in the Scottish highlands, but not all is what it seems and soon enough, you're caught up in something dark and sinister.

about_the_game:
Superstition: Black Cat is a roguelite where superstition never fails!

Are you ready to explore a world where superstitions come to life and change everything? Superstition: Black Cat takes place in a fantasy universe, but its roots lie in what we deeply believe — the signs, omens, and little rules we follow to avoid bad luck or attract good fortune. Here, these beliefs transform into game-changing items.

Key Features:

🖤 Dive into Folklore:

Discover the coolest superstitions from Brazil while facing challenging enemies.

⚔️ Unique Roguelite:

Every run is a different experience, and you can pick up items reflecting Brazilian superstitions and beliefs. Find items that can be swapped and stacked for a new experience in every journey.

✨ Supernatural Artifacts:

Collect powerful items, but beware! They come with curses until you can bargain with the black cat!

👥 Local Co-op:

Invite a friend to face the unknown by your side. Together, you can defy bad luck and have loads of fun!

♾️ Infinite Replayability:

With randomly generated rooms, enemies, and events, no playthrough will ever be the same. Each run brings a new challenge.

pc_requirements_min:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10, Win 11
  • Processor: intel i3 / ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
short_description: A roguelite where superstitions take shape as items! Face enemies, collect drops with negative effects that can be traded for advantages. Explore always different rooms, with challenges inspired by beliefs that make us think twice before taking a risk.

about_the_game:
In this casual multiplayer Co-Op game, play as a squad of vainglorious lifeguards and work together to keep your chaotic beach safe, clean, and most importantly famous!

Start your run with up to 4-players. Use your brains and brawns to cooperate for timely swimmer rescues, gain Fame from completing lifeguard duties, stay on task to avoid getting fired at the end of each Day, and make it to the end of the Week to win!

Will you be Drowning in Seawater? Or Drowning in Fame!?

Completing small challenges such as throwing away trash and "keep it up" with the beach ball is sure to turn some heads. However, putting your lives on the line to save drowning swimmers is the ultimate feat! Just make sure not to make a fool out of yourself, or you'll tank your fame!

Gear Up & Put a Pin in it!

Experiment with a variety of game-changing Gear, such as Whistles and Flippers, as well as passive-effects called Pins to adapt to new swimmer types and events. Discover new synergies and create the highest fame-generating strategies with your squad!

Shop 'til you Drop!

At the end of each day, your squad will get a big payout of Bucks depending on your Fame! Spend your Bucks at the Shop to get new Gear, upgrade your Pin arsenal, improve your beach, and help you and your squad achieve its fullest potential!
name: Boast Guards
short_description: In this casual multiplayer Co-Op game, play as a squad of prideful lifeguards and work together to keep your chaotic beach safe, clean, and most importantly famous! Experiment with game-changing Gear & many passive-effects to create the highest fame-generating strategies with friends!

name: Supre-Immune
short_description: Supremmune is a top-down arena game where you play as an immune cell fighting off bacteria and viruses. Earn DNA from battles to buy weapons and items, enhancing each cell's abilities. Make strategic choices to survive unexpected challenges. Evolve into a powerful cell, defeat enemies, and win!

name: Mermeows: Chill Cat Mermaids
short_description: Welcome to Mermeows: Chill Cat Mermaids – where every splash brings a smile! In this enchanting idle clicker creature collection game, traverse hand-drawn lakes, hatch unique Mermeows, and upgrade serene habitats. Collect pearls and let magical currents carry you into a world of calm strategy.

name: Zovid27: The Last Vaccine
short_description: Zovid27: The Last Vaccine is an open-world survival game where you fight through a post-apocalyptic world. Scavenge for supplies, hunt, and manage hunger and thirst as you struggle to find a way to reach your family in Europe. Survive, adapt, and overcome deadly factions and infected.

about_the_game:
A free Butterfly X game featuring characters from all versions of the Butterfly series of puzzle games. You can choose any level to pass through. But it will be great if you pass them all, helping the caterpillar to fulfill its mission.

As usual, the caterpillar can't jump on its own. It can fly from place to place like a butterfly, bouncing off various game objects in its path. It also moves around the level on pipes.

We hope you will enjoy it and have fun!

Features

- Collect all the flowers to advance to the next level.

- Kill bees and bounce off objects to advance to the end of the level.

- Use pipes along the way to overcome obstacles in the level.

- Moving objects help to pass the level.

- There are several paths, find the right one.

- Beware of the blue bird, it pecks to death.

- The levels are very different, be alert.

Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Widows XP / Vista /7 / 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8-compadible graphics card with at least 32 Mb of video
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
short_description: A free cute puzzle game from the Butterfly series of games. You can choose any level to pass through. The caterpillar can't jump on its own! It can fly from place to place bouncing off various game objects in its path. It also moves around the level on pipes. Use logic and have fun!

name: Carpathian Survival
short_description: Experience the untamed beauty of the Carpathian wilderness. Gather resources, chop trees, mine for materials, craft tools, and build shelter to withstand the harsh environment. Hunt wildlife and master essential survival skills as you navigate the untamed mountains.

name: Military Incremental Complex
short_description: Make weapons, make money. An active incremental game where you amass as much money as you can by starting a Military Industrial Complex company. Produce multiple different weapons, research upgrades, manipulate the stock market, and lobby the government for favors.

name: Aleprok
short_description: A cooperative survival and strategy game where you explore diverse environments, build and defend your clan town, upgrade weapons and skills, and master magic to survive relentless enemy attacks.

name: Super World War
publishers: Zero Games Studios, Plug In Digital, Dear Villagers
short_description: The world has gone mad, it's time to unleash chaos! Super World War is a turn based strategy game for up to 4 players. Take control of wild leaders and wage war in solo, local multiplayer or online.

name: Caprice: Domina Noctis
short_description: Caprice: Domina Noctis is a choice-driven adult visual novel where every decision leads you deeper into a world of power, seduction, and consequences. Will you play by their rules, or rewrite the game? Explore this world of Female Domination.

name: Catnip Fever Dreamland
short_description: Explore vast cloudscapes while you confront your past in this intense psychological adventure.

name: Blobbert 64
short_description: A 3D Platformer featuring Blobbert and Tutorialbert!

about_the_game:
Step into Fillet Fury, where every card draw can end in a flash of steel. Set against the backdrop of a ruthless Wild West, players engage in high-stakes games that test both their nerves and their skills with a knife. But be warned, in Fillet Fury, the stakes are painfully high as players wager not their fortunes, but their fingers.

Experience an innovative blend of strategy and real-time action, where each decision can either bolster your position or cost you dearly. As you navigate through, you will need more than just luck to survive.

Gameplay:

Intense Mechanics: Bet your way through increasingly challenging opponents, where each round could escalate into a life-altering knife game.

Strategize: Adapt your strategy on the fly as every game unfolds differently based on your choices and your courage.

Wild West Atmosphere: From the visuals to the sound design, every element is crafted to plunge you into a merciless era of outlaws and sharpshooters.

Warning: This game is intended for mature audiences and features graphic violence, including simulated blood and gore, along with themes of self-harm inherent to its gameplay. Player discretion is advised.

short_description: Set in the Original Wild West, Fillet Fury is a high stakes game of strategy, skill, and survival. Engage in intense showdowns where every decision counts. Will you walk away a legend or lose it all? Literally!

name: Vaccine Zombies
short_description: You are sent to a Vaccine Zombie colony because you have developed early symptoms of the illness that will soon make you a zombie. You may need to eliminate hundreds of zombies to find the antidote. If successful, your mission will be extended to destroy the aliens that started this.

about_the_game:
Battle AirForce is a vertical scrolling bullet hell STG.

Story

Three years after Battle Marine you have been rescued by an enemy soldier and decided to defect to the opposing nation.

In your homeland, the commander who lured you into a trap has become emperor in a military coup. The emperor is now expanding his territory by invading formerly neutral countries while converting them into colonies.

You have risen up to thwart his ambitions in Battle AirForce.

Player Controls

  • The autocannon is fully automatic.

  • The laser can be charged with energy while holding the button and fired by releasing.

  • Canon and laser can be fired simultaneously.

  • The players movement slows slightly while the laser is charging and even slower when it is firing.

  • The laser can cancel enemy bullets.

Recommended Game Controller

We recommended playing with one of the following game controllers:

  • SteamDeck

  • Logicool (Logitech) F310 series

If you are playing on a PC we have confirmed that F310 can be played successfully on all operating systems. (Windows, macOS, Linux (Ubuntu Desktop))

The game is built to take full advantage of the SteamInput API. As a result the game can function with numerous game controllers, not just the F310. The SteamInput menu allows you to customize your input.

As for SteamDeck, we have not yet verified this as we are not entitled to submit a compatibility check, but it worked fine as far as we have independently verified.

Additional information for playing with the F310

  • When playing on Windows the switch on the back of the F310 must be set to “X” (XInput mode).

  • When playing on macOS or Ubuntu Desktop the switch on the back of the F310 must be set to “D” (DirectInput mode).

Keyboard Assignments

  • Z: Autocannon

  • X: Laser

  • Space: Start & Pause

  • Cursor-keys: D-Pads

  • R: Reset (macOS, Linux)

  • Ctrl+R: Reset (Windows)

  • Q: Exit Game (macOS, Linux)

  • Ctrl+X: Exit Game (Windows)

  • Alt+Enter: Toggle Full Screen (Windows)

Player's Life

  • When the player collides with enemy aircraft or enemy bullets the life gauge will decrease.

  • When the life gauge is empty your game is over.

  • When your life is not full you can continuously shoot ground targets to obtain recovery hearts.

  • Obtaining a recovery heart restores partial life but with the penalty that the hit combo is reset and the number of medals obtained is reduced.

Elements of Scoring

  • In Battle AirForce the player earns "Shooting Points" by shooting enemies with the autocannon, "Bullet Erase Points" by canceling enemy bullets, and "Bonus Points" from medal acquisitions.

  • Shooting Points = number of medals acquired x 30 + number of HIT combos x 10 points

  • Bonus Points = number of HIT combos x 10 points

  • Bullet Erase Points = number of HIT combos x 10 + number of medal acquired x 10

  • When adding the Shooting and Bonus points to the score, their added values are attenuated linearly depending on the amount of laser charge.

  • Shooting Points is not added while the laser is being fired.

  • The number of medals you get decreases as you fire lasers or as your life gauge decreases.

  • The number of HIT combos is continuously added by firing shots and lasers within 60 frames (about 1 second) or by acquiring medals, up to a maximum of 9999 HITs on display.

  • Medals are automatically tracked when you are in proximity.

  • If the HIT combo number is over 1000, the medal will be auto-tracked from the beginning.

  • Aim for a high score by maintaining the number of HIT combos while obtaining medals as long as possible.

Simple score increase guidelines

  • When combos and medals are low, you aggressively use lasers to try to increase combos and medals.

  • When combos and medals are high, you shoot lasers as little as possible to score points.

Player's Special Abilities

Your newest machine, the Battle AirForce, has the special ability to slow down the speed of bullets when enemy bullets approach your AT zone. This special ability is automatically activated.

Stage Composition

  • This game has four areas each with four phases (16 phases in all).

  • There are 16 different enemy characters in each phase.

  • Once the phase is completed the ZAKO RUSH mode is unlocked.

ZAKO RUSH

  • Of the total of 16 phases, you can play phases that you have completed once in the main game.

  • You have unlimited lives in this mode.

  • Total number of times played, number of times cleared with no mistakes, and high score will be recorded.

Leaderboards

  • View high scores obtained in the main game and ZAKO RUSH

  • Press the START button to play the replay movie of your high score.

  • The global leaderboard can be viewed by pressing the LEFT or RIGHT keys.

  • The global Leaderboard allows you to view the scores of the Top 16 players from all over the world and view replays of when those players earned those scores.

  • Downloading replays that have not been registered for a short time may cause an error. If an error occurs, please wait a while and try again.

  • The DOWNLOAD data size for replays is approximately 10KB (0.01MB) for a 10-minute movie, so there is no need to be concerned about the traffic in most Internet environments.

  • Future updates may result in replay incompatibility. Please be aware that we may reset the global leaderboards after releasing an update that will cause a loss of replay compatibility. We will make sure to maintain replay compatibility whenever possible but we encourage you to post any superplays you wish to keep for future reference on YouTube or elsewhere.

Scores that fall under the following cases may be removed (reset) if we discovers a score within the top 16 of the Global Ranking.

  • Replay data is not attached

  • Replay data is corrupted (e.g., replay results and scores are mismatched)

If you find a score that falls into any of the above categories, please contact the community or the operator Twitter (X) and we may be able to take action.

How to Customize Operation Settings (In-Game)

The following settings can be customized in CONFIG on the title screen:

  • Window Mode: Select full screen or window

  • Window Size: Select Linux or macOS window size

  • Scanline: Select ON or OFF for the scanline screen effect.

  • BG Interlace: Select ON or OFF for map interlace effect

  • BGM Volume: Select the volume of background music from 0% to 100%.

  • SFX Volume: Selects the volume of sound effects from 0% to 100%.

Remarks

  • In case of BigPicture mode (e.g. SteamDeck), the setting will automatically change to full screen mode when the application is launched, even if windowed mode is selected.

  • On macOS or Linux, a restart of the application is required to reflect the Window Mode, Window Size, and Scanline settings.

  • The Window Size setting is disabled in Windows. (It will always be ADJUST)

  • If you want to adjust the window size in Windows, switch to Window mode and drag the four corners of the window.

How to Customize Operation Settings (Windows)

  • Press Alt+Enter to exit full screen mode

  • Customize various settings on the status bar

How to customize settings (macOS and Linux)

  • In the Steam client, click Settings (gear icon) in Battle AirForce.

  • Click Manage → Browse Local Files

  • Edit config.json file in a text editor

In config.json, you can set the following items:

  • avoidNotch: true = avoid that notch on MacBook when in full screen

  • isFullScreen: true = full screen mode, false = window mode

  • isScanline: true = filter ON, false = filter OFF

  • keyboard: SDL keycode as hex string for assigned keys

  • sound: Set the sound pressure of music (BGM) and sound effects (SE) as a number (%) from 0 to 100

If isScanline is true and isFullScreen is true, the screen will be slightly smaller by 0.5x increments of magnification to avoid line noise on the screen.

You can restore the default settings by deleting the config.json file and restarting the game.

About Video Distribution

  • This game can be freely distributed on video distribution platforms such as Nico Nico Douga, YouTube, Twitch, terrestrial TV, and cable TV for gameplay and play-by-play videos.

  • There are no restrictions on monetization (Nico Nico Douga's Creator Incentive Program, YouTube Partner Program, etc.) for video distribution using this game.

  • You are also free to use screenshots, music and video clips for your web media and magazines. Of course, you do not need our supervision.

  • There are no restrictions on holding eSports tournaments using this game, nor are there any restrictions on the use of assets, but please comply with the laws of the country or state where the event is held.

  • It does not matter whether the media distributor is an individual or a corporation.

  • No prior or subsequent permission is required.

  • The regulations regarding video distribution for the GBA version are the same as above.

About the GBA version

The ROM file of the GBA version of this title is distributed as a purchase bonus on Steam.

The GBA version can also be played on the actual device by writing the ROM file to a Flash cartridge, but basically we recommend using an emulator such as mGBA.

The GBA version ROM file is stored in a folder called “omake” which can be checked by clicking the Battle AirForce settings icon on the Steam client and selecting ‘Manage’ -> “Browse Local Files” to launch Explorer or Finder.

  • There are no restrictions on monetization (Nico Nico Douga's Creator Incentive Program, YouTube Partner Program, etc.) for video distribution using this game.

  • You are also free to use screenshots, music and video clips for your web media and magazines. Of course, you do not need our supervision.

  • There are no restrictions on holding eSports tournaments using this game, nor are there any restrictions on the use of assets, but please comply with the laws of the country or state where the event is held.

  • It does not matter whether the media distributor is an individual or a corporation.

  • No prior or subsequent permission is required.

  • The regulations regarding video distribution for the GBA version are the same as above.

About the GBA version

The ROM file of the GBA version of this title is distributed as a purchase bonus on Steam.

The GBA version can also be played on the actual device by writing the ROM file to a Flash cartridge, but basically we recommend using an emulator such as mGBA.

The GBA version ROM file is stored in a folder called “omake” which can be checked by clicking the Battle AirForce settings icon on the Steam client and selecting ‘Manage’ -> “Browse Local Files” to launch Explorer or Finder.

short_description: Three years after Battle Marine a new battle is about to begin! Battle AirForce is the first orthodox style vertical scrolling bullet hell STG since NOKOGI Rider by SUZUKI PLAN. It was created in Z80 full assembly language, aiming at a level close to the limit of VGS-Zero.

name: Hentai Tales: Cheating Family
short_description: The protagonist is a fifty-year-old bald retired uncle who lost his wife in his early years. Due to his son's proposal, he now lives with his son and daughter-in-law. What happens there?

name: Destind: Mr. Almost Right
short_description: “When are you getting married?” When you’re finding the reality of your romantic life too bleak to bare, you’re matched through an app to a man with a 99% compatibility rating. Who could be the man of your destiny?

name: Bonjin ~ An Ordinary Man
short_description: When your beloved wants to abandon his personality and become an absolutely ordinary person, what do you do? Bonjin ~ An Ordinary Man is an young adult romantic story about transgender identity, exploration of masculinity, and mutual understanding.

about_the_game:
Terminal Outbreak is a fast paced speed game where you are constantly accelerating forward and can only slow down and move left and right to avoid the obstacle filled levels.

The game thrives on simple controls but hard levels and is focused on players achieving the best times they can.

You play as an Anti Virus on a mission to stop a Super Virus from infecting computers worldwide. You will travel through Nostalgic Worlds, Tricky Levels, and Brutal Boss Fights in order to cleanse the internet of this Virus threat!

Features

  • 20+ Levels of Fast Paced, Score Chasing, Speed Running Goodness

  • 3 Computerized Worlds

  • Best Time Leaderboards

  • Nostalgic Early 2000's Internet Style

  • Dodge Obstacles, Launch Into the Air, Teleport Across Levels and more.

  • Environments that react and bounce to the Soundtrack

  • 100+ Death Messages to announce your failures

  • Minor Dating Sim Elements?
name: Terminal Outbreak
short_description: The only speed game where you want to slow down, as you infinitely accelerate and race to save the Internet from a Horrible Super Virus infecting computers worldwide! Launch, Crash, and Slam on the Breaks through Multiple Nostalgic Worlds, Tricky Levels, and Brutal Boss Fights.

name: Soda Splash
short_description: Soda Splash is a multiplayer co-op survival PVP game made with a game editing tool『CliCli』. Players team up to defeat soda cans and gather resources to enhance their characters. Work strategically to increase the rival’s soda cans for the victory!

name: Isle Frontier
short_description: Make a life of your own in this isometric point-and-click life simulator. Level up your skills by fishing, hunting, cooking, crafting, and much more. The island has everything you need to not only survive, but thrive!

name: THIS IS KIKO
short_description: A long time ago, my younger sister and I lived together in a house by the sea.And then, one day—I remember meeting her.Was she a good person? I should have asked myself that question sooner."THIS IS KIKO" is an adventure game set in the modern era.

about_the_game:
Song of Maka is a unique 2D adventure puzzle game in which you play as a king of the Kingdom of Birds who has just been reincarnated into his youthful form and must save the Kingdom from its Pandemonium through your graceful voice.

Kingdom of Birds

The main stage for the story of the Song of Maka is the Kingdom of Birds. Long ago, the birds on land were still beasts without sanity. In order to gain the rumoured Wisdom, the birds went to the sky island in the sky and stole the "Sanity" to their land. The light of "Sanity" gave all the birds the capability to speak, and the Kingdom of Birds was established.

Singing and Flying

As a bird, players will interact with many elements of the game world through singing. Different sound waves resonate with various creatures and obstacles, altering them in unique ways to assist players on their adventure.

Exploration and Puzzle-Solving

The core player experience in the game revolves around exploration and puzzle-solving. The world consists of multiple large sky archipelagos, along with many smaller islands to explore. Each major island offers a linear narrative, but players can also uncover hidden secrets and small islands by using various abilities to complete side quests, puzzles, and challenges. Along the way, players will discover mysterious feathers, which may grant special skills or enhance their flying abilities.

Audiovisual Experience

Song of Maka has more than 100 unique hand-painted scenes, over 50 distinctive bird NPCs, and a beautiful and elegant UI.
We have also created orchestra-esque original music/BGM for each area of the Kingdom of Birds, allowing the players to truly immerse themselves in the world.
name: Song of Maka
short_description: Song of Maka is a unique 2D adventure puzzle game in which you play as a king of the Kingdom of Birds who has just been reincarnated into his youthful form and must save the Kingdom from its Pandemonium through your graceful voice.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean

name: Train Hero
short_description: Train Hero is a train railway action puzzle game with a retro feel. It’s easy to play but hard to master and you only need one click to play.

name: BLADEMANCER
short_description: Blademancer is a brutal and bloody JRPG where every choice shapes the fate of the realm. Explore a vast world, descend into treacherous dungeons, and endure relentless battles. Will you become the savior the world needs, or the scourge that brings its downfall?

name: Gamba Gun
short_description: Gamba Gun is the idiotic fusion of top-down shooter and deck building rogue-likes. Experiment with endless ammo combinations, and create powerful synergies to fight against a colorful cast of enemies.

name: Find My Love
short_description: Find My Love is a beautiful memory game where you must find lovely couples and be careful to not flip the bad card.

name: Very Aggressive Adventure
short_description: A fast-paced platformer where Panda just wants to play—but right now, it's all about movement. Run, jump, and roll through an early test level focused on fine-tuning platforming mechanics. No combat yet, just physics, movement, and chaos in the making!

about_the_game:
You're a filmmaker and you recently purchased a box of VHS tapes at a flea market.

Now you need to look through them and select tapes on which occur supernatural, violent, inexplicable scenes, in general everything that can interest the viewer.

Features:

  • Simple intuitive gameplay.

  • Creepy atmosphere in the best traditions of such movies as Skinamarink, V/H/S and others.

  • Short horror packed experience. Play Time 30-60 minutes

Gameplay:

You watch different tapes and decide which ones to keep for your movie, if you choose tapes on which nothing happens, you will lose, but you also need to not overlook interesting tapes with mystical, violent or other kind of interesting scenes.
name: BANNED TAPES
short_description: VHS found footage horror experience. You have purchased a box of VHS tapes and now you have to select those tapes on which horrifying, violent, shocking events take place.

about_the_game:
『OGWorld』
– An Unprecedented Multidimensional Adventure Where an Old Guy Saves the World!

The protagonist is a 50-year-old bald otaku.

One day, his precious collection of beautiful girl figurines is stolen!

Teaming up with his fairy companion—another Old Guy, he embarks on an interdimensional journey to reclaim what was taken from him.

＜Explore Various Alternate Dimensions＞

Travel across multiple dimensions!
Explore post-apocalyptic wastelands, deep-sea ruins, pyramids, Japanese castles, Shinjuku, New York, dark caves, fantasy worlds, futuristic sci-fi cities, outer space, and eerie haunted mansions.

Climb higher and higher!

＜Catch and Train OGmons!＞

Wild Old Guys (OGmons) roam the land—drunk, reckless, and out of control.
Subdue them and capture them using the OG Ball! (Captured OGmons are crushed inside the ball and then revived using their DNA and memories.)
Once captured, OGmons become your allies, assisting you in battles and even labor.

＜The Floating Phenomenon＞

A strange event known as the "Floating Phenomenon" is affecting the world, causing objects and people to float uncontrollably, making daily life nearly impossible.

However, the protagonist is the only one unaffected by this phenomenon!
Use this unique ability to experience a one-of-a-kind gameplay mechanic where "one Old Guy carries another Old Guy."

Experience new and innovative action like never before!

＜Diverse Enemies and Giant Bosses!＞

Throughout your interdimensional journey, you'll encounter bizarre foes and enormous bosses standing in your way.
Fight alongside OGmons and take on wild and wacky action-packed battles!

Add to Your Wishlist Now!

With laughter, emotional moments, and pure absurdity, this adventure will take you on an unforgettable journey with an Old Guy by your side.

—Your gateway to the Old Guy adventure is just a click away!

pc_requirements_min:
Minimum:

  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070
short_description: 『OGWorld』 is a wild action-adventure where a 50-year-old bald otaku, Snark, travels across dimensions to reclaim his stolen figurines. Add to your wishlist and join this bizarre adventure!

name: The Void Corridors
short_description: A first-person puzzle horror game where you explore shifting corridors, solve intricate puzzles, and manage scarce resources to survive.

name: Brominion
short_description: Brominion is an interactive overlay strategy game for live broadcasters on Twitch. Through the chat, viewers can farm resources to build an army, hunt monsters and even duel other viewers!

name: Isekai Captain
short_description: "Isekai Captain" is a 2D fantasy Roguelike where you lead a squad against demons. Customize your hero, choose classes like Warrior or Hunter, and unlock advanced roles. Explore Kalan, grow your team, and stop the Demon King’s awakening in this epic adventure!

about_the_game:
Survival in a Distorted Reality

This is a horror game with elements of exploration and survival. You will explore a strange world, find ways to move forward, and control your fear. Reality will begin to distort, familiar things will become alien, and disturbing events will escalate.

Gameplay and Features:

  • Exploration – discover a world full of strange locations, unexpected transitions, and hidden details.

  • Distorted Reality – the environment shifts, and you never know what awaits around the next corner.

  • An Atmosphere of Unsettling Calm – nothing is chasing you here... for now.

Ordinary Life

You are an ordinary villager, living a peaceful life among familiar faces and a well-known routine. Day after day, everything follows its usual course—until one day, something happens that changes your world forever…

Blurred Reality

Strange occurrences begin to unfold in your village—subtle at first, but growing more unsettling over time. Nightmares become frequent visitors, and the line between dreams and reality starts to blur. Until one day, you wake up in an unfamiliar place…

Illusion of Serenity

Explore the world around you and fight to escape the grasp of a mysterious entity, whose deceptive calm pulls you deeper and deeper.
name: Lobotomy
short_description: Dive into a surreal adventure where the boundaries between reality and illusion blur. Explore distorted spaces, battle rising stress, and try to hold on to yourself
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

name: Finger Soccer
short_description: Finger Soccer is a button soccer game where you flick to score incredible goals from midfield! Choose from over 30 teams, compete in tournaments, penalty shootouts, and many more. Play solo or with friends, and become a finger football champion!

about_the_game:
The Great Moth has taken over the tower, and it's up to you to deliver the eviction notice! Utilize your sword and the tools you discover as you hop your way through this puzzle platformer. Reach the top to remove the unlawful moth from the tower and restore peace in the minds of the royal family.

MoonSpire is a short 2D puzzle platformer with a rage element inspired by Nintendo's Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons platforming sections.

Features:

  • Sword to kill the monsters infesting the tower.

  • Ladder to climb and interact with puzzle elements.

  • Bow for ranged interactions, be they combat or puzzle related.

  • Logic gate based puzzles.

name: I commissioned some snails 2

name: CLTRS
short_description: Sometimes to reach the climax you just need to explore...

name: Catalyst: From The Stars
short_description: Catalyst: From the stars, a Boss-Rush First person shooter. As a lone mercenary sent into a ruined military base hired to steal a power source, you must fight for your life through dark halls and thrilling boss arenas to complete your mission! Do you have what it takes to face the Catalyst?

name: DUDU
short_description: Pick up garbage, collect fruits from plants, exchange them at the recycling station for gold coins to buy the outfits and houses you want. Build a new ranch and raise all kinds of small animals.

name: Comfy Girl: Lofi Companion
short_description: Need a cozy companion while you plan your day or just zone out? Comfy Girl: Lofi Companion lets you unlock and collect cute pets, decorate your virtual space, and relax with lofi music. Focus while you work or study, and enjoy time with Grandma and Zoe.

name: PLEASE KNOCK: Sloppy Research Life
short_description: 『PLEASE KNOCK: Sloppy Research Life』は、先輩と後輩のちょっと変わった研究生活を観察しながら、時には手助けする日常観察型ライフシミュレーションゲームです。

name: Brave  risks
short_description: This is an exciting 2D platform fighting game that combines classic platforming elements with intense and thrilling combat. In this challenging world。

about_the_game:
In a world where information is the most valuable asset, your mission is to obtain data that could change the course of scientific progress and shape the future. By taking control of a miniature cockroach, you’ll infiltrate restricted areas, bypass security systems, and face unexpected challenges.

Key Features:

  • Unique Gameplay: Take control of a cockroach and experience what it’s like to be the smallest yet most crucial agent.

  • Stealth and Strategy: Your tiny size is both an advantage and a limitation. Use it wisely.

  • Engaging Storyline: Immerse yourself in a thrilling narrative where no choice is ever simple.

  • Puzzles and Secrets: Pay close attention to details and use your wits to overcome traps and uncover hidden truths.

Are you ready for a mission where your eyes, ears, and legs belong to a tiny spy?
name: IntelRoach
short_description: A spy mission with an unusual agent - a cockroach - awaits you! Infiltrate the scientist's house, bypass guards, hack into systems and solve puzzles. But be careful: you're just a small insect. Are you ready to become the most stealthy spy ever?

name: Clawsome
short_description: Help Clawby find unique friends in this wholesome adventure! Collect cute figurines with the help of Clawby to create colorful dioramas in this cozy claw machine game.

name: Horny Elf
short_description: One New Year's Eve, a girl named Violeta was drinking hot tea in her hut when suddenly there was a crash. Hurrying outside, she found a girl lying in the snow, frozen, with torn clothes and pointy ears.

name: Leadbelly
short_description: Leadbelly is a narrative-driven roguelike deckbuilder. You are a brain trapped in a war tank, seeking vengeance. Battle multiple enemy factions, build your deck, and uncover the truth with your AI companion. Adapt, upgrade, and fight, because the ones who did this to you will pay.

about_the_game:
🕹️ About This Game

Cute Jump Game is a fun and casual jumping game that tests your reflexes and sense of rhythm! Tap the screen to make your adorable character jump, navigate through platforms, and aim for the highest score!

🎮 Features

  • Easy to Play: Just tap to jump—timing is everything!

  • Endless Mode: Keep jumping and beat your high score!

Are you ready for the challenge? Jump into Cute Jump Game now!
name: Cute Jump Game
short_description: Cute Jump Game is a fun and casual jumping game that tests your reflexes and sense of rhythm! Tap the screen to make your adorable character jump, navigate through platforms, and aim for the highest score!

name: Felisade
short_description: A strategic digital card game where anthropomorphic cats battle in turn-based duels. Build decks, cast spells, and outsmart opponents in a feline-powered adventure! 🐾🎴

name: Cute Fruit Game
short_description: Cute Fruit Game is a creative and challenging fruit-merge puzzle game where players combine different types of fruits to create higher-level fruits and earn more points. The game features a fresh, cartoonish art style with simple mechanics

name: Frontiers Reach : Battlespace
short_description: Frontiers Reach : Battlespace is a low stress management/idle game set in the Frontiers Reach Universe, here you'll take command of a carrier and participate directly in the fight for control of planets in the frontier worlds.

name: Shut the windows and don't look outside
short_description: The respective authorities are hard at work to restore normal life for your loved ones. In the meantime, B.L.I.S. strongly urges you to keep your windows shut and do not look outside.
steamspy_name: Shut the windows and don't look outside

about_the_game:
Drill Space puts you in command of a lone explorer venturing into the vast and unforgiving cosmos. Armed with a powerful drill and an arsenal of devastating weapons, you must carve your path through hostile planets, extract valuable minerals, and defend your mothership against relentless alien invaders. Adapt to the ever-changing dangers of space, and survive as long as you can in the chaos of the unknown.

MINE, CRAFT, SURVIVE

Drill through planets, unearth valuable resources, and use them to craft weapons, gadgets, and powerful upgrades to enhance your ship. Every mineral brings you one step closer to survival.

FORGE YOUR WAY TO VICTORY

Arm yourself with powerful weapons to mine faster and defend against relentless alien threats. Collect, upgrade, and unleash powerful tools, each designed for specific challenges and customizable to help you tackle the ever-changing dangers of space.

CONQUER THE COSMOS

Explore a dynamic, randomly generated solar system, each with unique biomes, weather, mysteries, and dangers. Adapt to each world’s challenges and reap its rewards.

HOLD THE LINE

Your mothership is your lifeline, and the alien threat is relentless. Arm yourself with powerful weapons to fend off escalating waves of invaders, fortify your defenses, and keep your mission alive. Stand your ground or risk losing everything to the void.

name: Bless You Again
short_description: Lily” is a magician and a homunculus. She challenges a dungeon named “Tomb of Blessings” in search of a certain blessing! The player controls a character faithfully reproduced from the cel animation and defeats many monsters in search of a powerful blessing.

name: FLICKER
short_description: FLICKER is a physics-based arcade game where you control a Godly hand to flick unsuspecting colorful guys hundreds of meters to meet zany objectives and fulfill your own personal flicking desires.

about_the_game:
[GAME INTRODUCTION]

Solve the riddles and escape from the room!

This game comes with auto-save, so you can play from the beginning of the game at any time.

If you have trouble solving the riddle, you can see the hints and solutions in the game.

[How to play]

  • Click on the place you are interested in to investigate.

  • Select an item by clicking on it, and click on the location where you want to use it.

  • Click on the item to enlarge it.

  • Some items will combine with each other if you use another item on the enlarged item.

Tiny Room Collection is a game in which you use the mouse to click on various places in the room, solve puzzles, and escape from the room.

There are 21 tiny rooms in total.

Can you escape from all the rooms?

name: Rescue Quest
short_description: Rescue Quest is a single-player game that combines team-building, Roguelike elements, and match-three mechanics. Hero have gone missing, and the demons is about to strike again. Your task is to find the heroes as quickly as possible and uncover the mastermind behind it all from the clues.

name: Greed & Darkness
short_description: Venture into a foreboding fortress to gather riches with only a torch to guide you. Use sight, sound and the tools at hand to navigate its dark tunnels and unlock the Gorged One's chamber. Leaving empty-handed is not an option.

name: After Juice: Animal Disco Mafia
short_description: Welcome to this graphic adventure! You play as a little hamster 🐹 named Tofu. You will join him on a series of adventures trough university nights, in a city full of parties and mistery, tons of humor and bad jokes, but above all..... Dru.... i mean, SUGAR!

name: Trump Simulator 2025
short_description: 'Trump Simulator 2025' is a silly little game. Run the country while flying in Air Force One, thousands of feet in the air. Immerse yourself into the role of the President Elect!

name: Scribble Wolf
short_description: A Werewolf game (or social deduction game), in which you can control the character that you have drawn. Up to 10 players can play online. Perhaps the key to victory is to "draw tracing" of an opposing team's character and "disguise yourself" as it...? 😏

name: Salary-Mon | Hiro Versus His Demons
short_description: Help Japanese Salaryman Hiro overcome his inner demons by facing his fears head on, battling his worst traits, and becoming more powerful with each victory to ultimately take down his oppressive boss in this Poke-like JRPG adventure.

name: Revive
short_description: A mysterious plague known as the Sleeping Sickness has taken your beloved. But it is too soon for despair. There is still a chance to bring them back. Gather the tears of the Hero’s bloodline and reclaim your love.

name: In the Midst of a Neverending Season
short_description: "Don't you want to experience a love like that some day?" As dreary days roll by, who should appear before Tokiha Sai but Emiya Hanabi, his childhood friend and first love, who he had alienated long ago. That is the start of a day that seems like a dream.
steamspy_name: In the Midst of a Neverending Season

name: Backrooms: The Next Level
short_description: Backrooms: The Next Level is a Co-op horror game up to 4 players, where you and your friends will explore the game, try to pass the game level using your mind, wit, remembering the places where you were

name: Keycards
