about_the_game:
Welcome to the worst vacation in the life of Thomas Brutus - a brutal student of a spiritual academy, who just wanted to relax, but got into a supernatural mess. It all started with the fact that his chance encounter with a witch, turned his whole life upside down. And now he is forced to spend three nights at her coffin, fighting not only for his life, but also for the remnants of sanity.

This visual novel in the best traditions of black humor and mystical horror offers the player:

- Choices that affect the witch's behavior and the course of events. Will you be able to piss her off to the point of “tearing her apart”, or will you talk her down to “light psychological torture”?

- A lot of creepy, disgusting and absurdly funny situations. Excuses won't help - you'll have to answer questions, play horrifying games and come face to face with nightmares.

- A ton of weird, sarcastic and deadly dialog. Gogol's classic? Forget it! Even the shadows can joke around here.

- Different endings depending on your decisions. Who knows, maybe the witch will fall in love with you... Or make a stew out of you?

Are you willing to endure three nights of hell? Or would you rather sign your death warrant on the first? The choice is yours.

about_the_game:
Obliterate the enemy by the thousands, carefully select your upgrade modules, and become the ultimate weapon of destruction in eradicating an unstoppable force in this action roguelite. You alone stand in defiance of the robot scourge, and the odds are overwhelming. Good luck, Space Cowboy.

Space Cowboy and the Robot Scourge is a bullet-heaven roguelite, focused on an absurd number of enemies and over-powered weaponry. On your first run you won't stand a chance. Upgrade your starting stats run over run and perfect your build until the Robot Empire crumbles under the relentless might of Space Cowboy.

Gameplay Description:

Collect various weapons during each run and modify them with powerful upgrades from black market vendors. Defeat difficult bosses to progress through increasingly infested star systems and collect Dimensional Shards to upgrade your abilities for future runs.  And finally, take the fight to their home world, face the Robot Overlord, and kill the oppression at its source.

Key Features:

  • Overwhelming numbers

  • Insane power scaling

  • Meta progression

  • Multiple weapons

  • Upgrade shop

  • Boss fights

about_the_game:
Sage wakes up every morning to the same routine—serving coffee in a train café. But at 6PM, the train she works on crashes, and the day resets. Time is limited, and every action pushes the clock forward. To escape the loop, Sage must uncover the hidden connections between passengers, solve puzzles in the right order, and survive surreal bullet-hell boss fights. But the deeper she digs, the more she realizes that not everyone on the train is who they seem to be.

As Sage gathers clues, she gets closer to the horrifying truth about her surreal reality.

Features:

  • Time-Based Puzzle Gameplay – Every interaction moves the clock forward, forcing players to plan their actions wisely.

  • Bullet Hell Boss Fights – Intense, rhythmic battles reward players with new inventory items.

  • Psychological Narrative – A haunting mystery about memory, loss, and identity unfolds with each loop.

  • Persistent Items & Progression – Certain items carry over between loops, unlocking new paths and possibilities.

  • Immersive Train Setting – A modern, dreamlike train environment filled with unique NPCs hiding secrets.

Genres:

  • Narrative-Driven Puzzle Adventure

  • Psychological Mystery

  • Bullet Hell

  • Time Loop

about_the_game:
TRAILS is a cozy puzzle game in which you guide sand ships across a crumbling desert to reach isolated outposts. Draw paths for each ship across the treacherous sands, planning carefully to avoid collisions and ensure each ship reaches its goal.

Chart Your Course

Plan your route by drawing paths across the desert grid. All sand ships must follow their trails without visiting the same space twice - and without crashing into one another. With every route you sketch, you're constructing a web of paths across the dunes.

Supply the Outposts

Scattered across the wasteland, remote villages rely on the convoy for vital cargo. To complete each level you'll need to supply every outpost. Pick up the right goods and bring them safely to their destination. Careful coordination and efficient routing are the key to your success.

Juggle Resources

Each sand ship can carry one item at a time, whether its crucial cargo, a key to unlock a new route or a rare power-up, improving the ship's capabilities. Managing pickups, handoffs and avoiding unwanted items is essential to reaching your goal.

Hazards of the Wasteland

The dunes are your home, but they are not without danger. Collapsing terrain, narrow passages, gaping chasms, ancient traps and errant drones can block your path or derail your journey. Foresight and careful coordination will keep the convoy on track.

Extra Challenges

For those who seek an even greater test, optional levels and hidden challenges offer more complex maps, tighter constraints and push the puzzle mechanics to their limits. Use all you have learned to take on the toughest challenges TRAILS has to offer.

Can you chart the perfect paths and navigate all trials of the desert?
name: Trails
short_description: TRAILS is a cozy puzzle game in which you plot routes for floating sand ships. Deliver vital cargo to remote outposts - without collisions, dead ends, or backtracking. Every move counts in the wasteland.

about_the_game:
HideSeekBattle: A Style-Differentiated Scenery and Multi-Character Hide-and-Seek FPS Game

In the independent game field full of endless possibilities, HideSeekBattle is a unique multiplayer and AI online hide-and-seek FPS game. It ingeniously combines the fun of hide-and-seek with the tension and excitement of FPS games. Through diverse character settings and scenes with various styles, it brings players an unprecedented gaming feast.

Core gameplay of the game

The core gameplay of HideSeekBattle integrates the classic hide-and-seek mode with the FPS shooting mechanism. In each game, players will be assigned to different roles and take on different identities to engage in intense confrontations in complex scenarios.

Hunter

As a key figure in tracking and hunting, the hunter possesses a variety of powerful weapons and practical skills.

The weapon systems are rich and diverse: machine guns, pistols, knives, shotguns, sniper rifles, and rifles.

Unique and practical skills:

Throwing Molotov Cocktails: Hunters can throw Molotov Cocktails forward. The Molotov Cocktails will explode upon hitting the target or upon landing, and will produce a continuous flame effect. This skill is very effective in narrow passages, enemy assembly areas, or situations where it is necessary to restrict enemy movement. It can cause massive damage to enemies at critical moments and create opportunities for offense or escape for oneself.

Healing skill: Considering that the game is full of various dangers and challenges, hunters are bound to suffer damage during battles. The healing skill can help hunters quickly restore a certain amount of health when their life points are low, enabling them to maintain the fighting state and continue to counter the attacks of enemies.

Sprint Skill: The Sprint Skill endows the hunter with the ability to move quickly on the field. When the hunter detects the position of the enemy or needs to evade the enemy's attack, he can instantly release the Sprint Skill and move rapidly in the direction of the target. This skill not only enables the hunter to be more swift when pursuing the enemy but also helps him evade attacks in time when danger approaches.

Insider

The main weapon of the traitor is a knife. His aim is to approach the hunter skillfully and stab him to death.

Disguise and Hide: The traitor needs to make use of various coverings and obstacles in the scene to conceal his whereabouts and quietly approach the hunter. During the chase and counter-chase, the traitor must remain vigilant at all times, look for the hunter's flaws, and then launch a sudden attack to deal a fatal blow to the hunter without being detected.

Pig

The pig character possesses a unique ability to shrink.

Flexible and agile movement: When the pig activates the shrinking skill, its body will become small and flexible. It can take advantage of this feature to easily squeeze into various narrow spaces, such as pipes, drawers, and corners filled with clutter. This concealment method enables the pig to hide itself in places where enemies are hard to notice, avoiding the pursuit of hunters and creating opportunities for the team to survive.

Chicken

The skill of chickens is that they can throw basketballs and cause the effect of stunning enemies.

Tactical Distraction: During the game, the player controlling the chicken can disrupt the enemy's action rhythm by throwing basketballs at them. When the basketball hits the enemy, the enemy will be temporarily stunned, during which their actions will be restricted and they will be unable to fight normally. This provides an excellent opportunity for teammates to attack or escape, enabling the team to better formulate tactics and achieve their goals.

Item

The special ability of the item character is invisibility.

Sneak Attack: With the ability to become invisible, the item character can approach the enemy without being detected and launch a surprise attack. On the battlefield, the invisibility ability enables the item character to become a secret weapon for the team, quietly approaching those vigilant hunters or other important targets and delivering an unexpected blow to them.

Stylized scene design

HideSeekBattle features a variety of stylized scenes, each of which adds a unique atmosphere and challenge to the game.

Game Features and Enjoyment

Strategic Game: Support Multiplayer Mode.

A thrilling showdown with AI: Besides playing against other players, HideSeekBattle also supports online multiplayer with AI opponents. The AI opponents have highly intelligent behavior patterns, capable of responding and making decisions differently based on the players' actions. Engaging with AI not only enhances the challenge of the game but also provides players with opportunities to hone their gaming skills.

HideSeekBattle, with its unique character designs and stylized scenes, offers players an intense and enjoyable multiplayer and AI online hide-and-seek FPS gaming experience. Whether it's competing against opponents in tense and thrilling battles or exploring the unknown mysteries in mysterious scenes, players can find their own joys and sense of achievement in the game.

In each round of the game, players will be assigned different roles and play as different character identities to engage in intense battles in complex scenarios.

Relax. Hatch dinos. Embrace the chaos.

Welcome to Dino & Chill – the ultimate laid-back dinosaur sim where cozy vibes meet prehistoric fun. Collect and name adorable dinos, build up your sanctuary, and watch as your scaly companions roam, poop, and live their best Jurassic lives.

Whether you're managing your growing herd, opening surprise daily chests, or just vibing with your favorite dinos, there's always something delightful happening in the park.

🦖 Collect Them All – Discover a growing list of cute, quirky dinosaurs – from classics to rare retirees.

💩 Dino Poo Happens – Yes, your dinos poop. Yes, it's important. Yes, we balanced it.

And get 30 different turrets from the stages of 5 worlds!

Many gimmicks and enemies are also waiting for you!

Finally, get rid of the bosses who are looking for a chance to attack you!

(Uh... Additionally, stage scores are meaningless.....)
detailed_description:
About This Game

Mechanic VS AI is a 2D top-down tower defense game.

Influenced by classic tower defense and flash games,

it is filled with unique worlds, figure of enemies and exciting music!

Play as a very intelligent mechanic!

Maybe You will move forward with a great mission...

And get 30 different turrets from the stages of 5 worlds!

Many gimmicks and enemies are also waiting for you!

Finally, get rid of the bosses who are looking for a chance to attack you!

(Uh... Additionally, stage scores are meaningless.....)

name: Bingo Pet
short_description: The cute pet will keep you company. As you type on the keyboard, the cute pet will also press the corresponding keys. As your writing companion, the cute pet will strive together with you. O(∩_∩)O~

name: Failed Falling
short_description: Plan your falls and learn from failure in a challenging descent along an active volcano! Sail its updrafts with your reusable parachute to move forward, but going up is the opposite of your goal, so don't drift for too long: losing progress will be inevitable, but giving up it's always a choice...

name: MoonShot
short_description: You're a NASA intern working on the Apollo 11 project.  Each day, you have a checklist to complete.  Your tasks are well-reasoned and appropriate to your skill level as an intern.  The Apollo team are all competent professionals.  Everything goes very well, and you have no difficulties at all.  😛

name: The Runics
short_description: The Runics is a tower defense game with auto chess, Rougelite and incremental flavors. Deploy "Runics" as defenders, best infinite enemies, gathering resources to upgrade your base and gigantic technology tree.

name: 摸鱼小镇 Loafing Town Playtest
steamspy_name: 摸鱼小镇 Loafing Town Playtest

name: SQUASER 7
short_description: SQUASER 7 is a minimalist puzzle game where you control a white square and erase the darkness on each level. Clear your path using logic and memory!

name: GREED
short_description: GREED is a PSX styled FPS designed for replayability through speedrunning. Inspired by the best shooters of the '90s and today, watch your enemies fall to the ground and crush their skulls with your onslaught of weapons. Do you have what it takes to stop greed and take back heaven?

name: Host Mortem
short_description: You're a ghost named Ash. Possess your fallen foes and survive endlessly challenging dungeons in Host Mortem — a minimalist roguelike where corpses are canon.

name: Grocery Run
short_description: Grocery Run is a fast-paced obstacle course game filled with cartoon action and comedy. Test your reflexes as you collect tasty treats and dodge hazardous obstacles. Race through the aisles and discover what lurks inside the mysterious Employees Only section - you know you've always wondered!

name: Super Yapori Minigames
short_description: Super Yapori Minigames is a singleplayer game with several minigames, different game modes, several playable characters and much more!

about_the_game:
In 2,4D, you take on the role of a knight whose village was burned to the ground by a ruthless warlord. With nothing left but the memories of your fallen people, you embark on a relentless quest for justice—determined to track down the one responsible and make them pay.

Your journey leads you through treacherous landscapes. Along the way, you will face deadly enemies: evil goblins under the warlord’s command. Every battle is a test of skill, demanding precise movement, perfectly timed attacks, and complete mastery of your weapons.
But vengeance is rarely so simple.

As you venture deeper into the world, you'll need to leap with precision from one platform to the next—careful not to fall, or your mission may take longer then you want it to.

Will you let rage consume you, or will you forge a new path? 

The warlord awaits.

The path of vengeance begins now—will you be strong enough to see it through?

Battle through intense platforming challenges, deadly enemies and uncover the truth behind the attack. Will you reclaim your honor and bring justice to your fallen home?

name: drift online
short_description: Cruise through night traffic for a chill ride or hit real-life tracks for intense drifting! Meet up with friends, customize your car, and create your own style. Compete or just enjoy the drive—the choice is yours!

about_the_game:
Slime Store Simulator is a small casual game where you operate a store that sells cute slimes! Order a variety of different types of slimes, set your own prices, take payments, hire help, and expand the store.

Buy Slimes

Stock up on lots of different slimes. The slimes vary in color, size, shape, price, and some even come with accessories.  

Sell Slimes

Place the slimes on the shelf and set your own price.

Checkout Customers

Interact with different customers and sell your slimes at the register. The slime store accepts cash and credit.

Manage The Warehouse

As you get further along in the game you will unlock the warehouse where you can keep everything neatly stored in one place. 

Expand Your Store

As you sell more slimes you will level up and make more money which will allow you to expand the store, hire staff, and buy even more slimes!
name: Slime Store Simulator
short_description: Slime Store Simulator is a small casual game where you operate a store that sells cute slimes! Order a variety of different types of slimes, set your own prices, take payments, hire help, and expand the store.

about_the_game:
In a desolate and ominous world, a young girl faces dark creatures that lurk in every shadow. With each step, the danger grows. But there is only one rule: stay awake.

Explore the dark world of Numbra

Solve puzzles and escape from the enemies

And stay awake!

This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.

short_description: In a desolate and ominous world, a young girl faces dark creatures that lurk in every shadow. With each step, the danger grows. But there is only one rule: stay awake.

about_the_game:
Heavy in the Hand is a Lovecraftian action horror game that puts the weight of the action directly into the player's hands.

Key Features

  • Single-Action Horror

    Master a single-action revolver to fight off cosmic horrors and descend further into the abyss beneath.

  • Limited Vision

    Eldritch horrors hide and attack from the shadows. Your vision is limited, and you can only shoot what you can see.

  • Eldritch Horrors

    You will have to shoot the horrors you can comprehend. But will you survive the horrors you cannot?

Pay no mind to the length of your gaze into those deep places - the void has always stared back.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
short_description: Cock the hammer, pull the trigger, count to six. Release the cylinder, eject the shells, count to six again. You hold death in your hand, and death is heavy. Descend to the abyss, shoot the horrors you can comprehend, and survive the horrors you cannot.

name: Upgrade My Heart
short_description: Mathew builds an AI robot with stolen tech. As the government closes in, trust, love, and survival collide in this sci-fi visual novel full of choices.

name: The Inspireist
short_description: Unravel the mysteries of the ocean spirit world by accompanying a recent high school graduate, Bulut, who lost all of his memories of family and friends. The Inspireist is a story-rich puzzle adventure narrative set in a recent 21st century, alternate realm Izmrr.

name: Lunar Impact
short_description: Go to the Moon to explore its harsh nature and mysterious anomalies. Build your own lunar base, craft equipment, extract valuable resources and make many discoveries. Overcome the challenges of extreme lunar conditions, an oxygen-free atmosphere and much more unknown...

name: Max Madness
short_description: Enter the world of Max Madness, a post-apocalyptic survival game with RPG and action elements. Navigate a treacherous open world, ravaged by nuclear devastation, where tension and terror lurk around every corner. Forge alliances, confront chaos, and make choices that shape your destiny.

name: 家训 Dogma
short_description: "Dogma": A first-person Chinese horror game where you return to a decaying ancestral home to decipher cryptic family rules. Shift between realms, evade spirits, and collect cursed relics to uncover a millennium-era family tragedy. Choose redemption or destruction at the Yin-Yang threshold.

name: Traceback
short_description: Traceback is a next-gen ultra-realistic bodycam shooter built with the power of Unreal Engine 5. Make every move count — your choices decide who survives. Prepare for intense bodycam firefights where precision matters, and every decision shapes the fate of your mission.

name: Worker: 7549
short_description: 7549 was one of the worker class servants. That was until this mine turned from a peaceful workplace into a headquarters of rebellion. This place is now filled with the remnants of the relentless war between humanity and robots. Illuminate your path through the darkness and dust.

name: Aleato
short_description: Aleato is a dynamic roguelike dice game where you aim to surpass each level's score by strategically experimenting with a diverse array of unique builds each game.

name: 彼德海姆之影
short_description: 1096年12月，整合运动入侵切尔诺伯格。 身为感染者组织的他们不知为何选择将一群中学生关在了名为彼德海姆的高中之中，任由这些学生自生自灭。 作为被带来这所学校的一名贵族学生，你的选择将会深深地影响发生在这座学校里的一切。

name: Flowrate
short_description: A minimalist space survival game about managing fuel in a field of procedurally generated planets. Scan atmospheres, land carefully, and keep moving—because if you run out of antimatter, it's over.

name: AS:RA Ashen Skies: Radiant Arena
short_description: A multiplayer online battle arena where myth-infused heroes from across time fight for control in tactical 5v5 combat. Built for cross-platform play with fast action, deep strategy, and expressive hero design.

about_the_game:
Explore the quirky town of Larcenest Gap. Take pictures with your camera and write articles in your journal. Interact with the people who have daily routines and help them with their various tasks. Use your investigating skills to unravel the mystery surrounding this town.


Day and night cycle - Experience a different environment at night as you see the people and other creatures go about their daily routines.

[GIF]
Camera - Take pictures of everything you like and of what the townspeople ask you.

[GIF]
Journal - Full freedom to write whatever you like and customize your journal into something personal.

[GIF]
Publish - Have your articles posted around the town.

[GIF]
Collect - Find stickers and gnomes scattered around the area.

short_description: Uncover the strange and wholesome town of Larcenest Gap as a curious reporter — Snap photos, write stories, investigate bizarre encounters, and investigate a mystery that runs deeper than the headlines.

about_the_game:
🛰️ Storm Mined

Destroy. Retry. Understand.

As a technician piloting a remote-controlled ship, your job is to clear space of mines still being produced by obsolete—yet operational—AIs.

💥 A fast-paced, musical rogue-lite

One hit is all it takes: Everyone dies in a single shot – enemies and you alike. Reflexes, timing, and composure are your only weapons.

Each run is unique: After every level, pick between three upgrades. Triple shot? Shockwaves? Special modules? Shape your playstyle on the fly.

Rhythm in destruction: Some levels are synced to the music – shoot, dodge, and survive to the beat. A sound-driven visual experience with original tracks composed for the game.

🎮 A modern tribute to arcade classics

Inspired by Mine Storm (Vectrex, 1982), this remake evolves the original into a full-fledged experience:

  • Memorable bosses

  • Varied and unpredictable enemies

  • Retro-futuristic visual effects

  • Accessible yet demanding gameplay: Can you survive Hard and Nightmare modes?

about_the_game:
You are a claim jumper, you must make your way back to Missouri for another chance to receive a claim in Oregon. This game was made for my NMU CS120 Winter 2025 semester final project. It is a text-based game similar to games like The Oregon Trail, where you use number inputs in order to make decisions that control the game played through the console. You will have to deal with random events with success based off of random chance and manage resources because there has to be some fail state or the game would be boring.

Open JDK will need to be installed and added to your systems PATH. Do not be alarmed when a Command Prompt window opens, that is the game.
name: The Journey East and West
short_description: This game was made for my NMU CS120 Winter 2025 semester final project. It is a text-based game where you use number inputs to control the game through the console. Open JDK will need to be installed and added to your systems PATH do not be alarmed when a Command Prompt window opens that's the game.

name: The Others
short_description: A first-person multiplayer survival game where humans must escape and mannequins hunt—who's real, and who will replace you?

name: Minute Man
short_description: Minute Man is a 2D beat 'em up platformer game where you can freeze time as you're fighting enemies to secure an advantage. Fight through various waves of enemies and defeat bosses in several levels, keeping time frozen as you chain combos against your enemies!

about_the_game:
After being bullied and teased by Sophie and Yuki all day, you collapse in your bed and prepare yourself for your session with Isabelle the next day. Among you and your bullies, Isabelle's bullying consists of almost exclusively facesitting and body worship. Because of this, you and your bullies have given her the title of "The Facesitting Queen". Other than Victoria when she's in a good mood, you consider Isabelle the gentlest and least violent by far. But unfortunately for you, (Or fortunately depending on how perverted you are) something seems to have awakened inside Isabelle, something that will make her bullying much much much worse than you thought.

  • ~5K words

  • Kinetic novel

  • Censored & uncensored mode

  • 22 Unique character images

  • 28 Total images

  • A gallery with uncensored CG's of images in the game
name: Femdom Girlfriend 4: Isabelle, The Facesitting Queen
short_description: Among you and your bullies, Isabelle's bullying consists of almost exclusively facesitting and body worship. Because of this, you and your bullies have given her the title of "The Facesitting Queen". And today, Isabelle has you all for herself to bully and torment as she pleases

name: Hordelord
short_description: Hi-octane arena shooter where you face waves of nasty enemies. Use destructive weapons and high mobility to secure your spot on global leaderboards. Expect tight gunplay, satisfying kills, and meaningful upgrades.

name: Boxing Machine VR
short_description: Step into the gritty, gear driven world of Boxing Machine VR, an exclusive virtual reality experience set in a steampunk inspired gym brimming with robotic pugilists. Your mission? Crush every opponent in the ring and rise as the undisputed champion.

name: The Dark Legacy
short_description: The Dark Legacy is a first-person psychological horror set in an abandoned surgeon’s home. Every room holds an unfinished experiment. Every wall hides a silenced scream. In a house where death was denied, escape means remembering.

about_the_game:
This is a top-down roguelike deck-building game where you can combine a wide variety of cards to unleash unimaginable attack effects. With a high degree of freedom in deck construction, countless powerful combos await your creativity.

The game is set in a magical forest ruled by a dark lord. You will take on the role of a brave cat hero summoned from the city, fighting to rescue animal companions under the dark lord's control. Build powerful combos, defeat the dark forces, and save the enchanted forest!

name: BossFish
short_description: BossFish is a casual simulation game where you raise adorable little fish to earn coins, purchase decorations, and build a fully customized aquarium.The game sits anywhere on your desktop, letting you interact with your live aquarium during work or study breaks.

short_description: Each time the doors open—is it reality, or the Otherworld?As a rookie delivery person, you visit the eerie Kagesumi Manor. Follow the rules, deliver all packages, and survive. First-person short walking simulator x elevator horror. Playtime: 15-60 min.

short_description: Cute, relaxing memory game where you match pairs of adorable butterflies in space

name: Douchebag: Ultimate Bro Pack
short_description: Step back into the sun, where bikinis are on, muscles are ripped and oiled, and the bass is blasting. Your mission? Become the ultimate douchebag—build massive muscles, crank up your swag, and flirt with the ladies to dominate the scene. WISHLIST NOW!

name: Apocalypse Zombie TD
short_description: 《Apocalypse Zombie TD》is a Tower Defense Game. You will collect resources and build fortifications before the zombies arrive to kill the zombies that invade your home. In the game, you will unlock different defensive buildings, create a unique style, defend your home in a world full of zombies.

name: I Checkmate Thee
short_description: "I Checkmate Thee" is a turn-based puzzle game with limited vision, in the setting and genre of horror and chess. The king is armed with a sword to escape from the confinement of the chessboard. Go through chess games, where every move is a step towards death!

name: Felt Mansion
short_description: Felt Mansion is an Adventure/Action RPG fan-game set in the world of Andrew Hussie's Homestuck. Save the young Handmaid from the clutches of the fearsome Doc Scratch!

about_the_game:
In this cozy hidden object game, you will explore the settlements of forest elves who are engaged in all sorts of cool activities. There are many cute and funny stories happening in the forest, you just need to look closely.

Key features:

❓ Find over 500+ hidden objects: including elves, fireflies, berries, and much more.

🎮 2 hand-drawn forest locations: immerse yourself in two elf settlements, each with its own story.
🖼️ Loop location: you can rotate the scene endlessly in a circle, however you like.

🎵 Relaxing forest lo-fi soundtrack: gentle melodies will help you relax and immerse yourself in the atmosphere.

💡 Pleasant glow: found items are highlighted with a magical glow.

Wishlist:

Add to your wishlist — this will support our small indie team and help us continue to create the cozy games you love. Thank you!

name: quarantine ME
short_description: A projective test disguised as a videogame.Confine yourself for 10 days, explore 12 different paths, make imperfect choices, and face over 100 endings.quarantine ME is not for those seeking entertainment — it’s for those willing to confront themselves.

about_the_game:
Park the car!

Valet parking in parking garages is not an easy job. You have to park the cars without a scratch in a quick and efficient manner. You have to avoid obstacles like cones, puddles, pot holes, oil slicks? and... gates? Wait...

Speed and Precision

Your boss requires you to park these cars in record time. Every scratch, every dink, every bump is taken away from you. All while the owner looks on... Oh and those cones also come out of your paycheck I'm sure...

A Puzzle of Limitations

Valet Parking Not Included is a puzzle game about having limited controls and attempting to get the best times and score possible. How will you deal with each level, and how will you park the cars?

Features

  • Multiple types of cars to park.

  • 60 levels and more to come.

  • All sound effects voiced by me!

  • More surprises to come post launch!

short_description: A survival horror experience set in a cursed forest. Players must explore, solve puzzles, and evade terrifying creatures lurking in the shadows. With relentless tension, a haunting atmosphere, and monsters hiding within the woods. Survival depends on wit, and instinct.

name: Test of Fear | 肝試しの夜に
short_description: The game is a test of courage for players who have come to a secluded shrine in the mountains to explore and try to escape from this unusual place. There are numerous horror gimmick elements to torment the player.
steamspy_name: Test of Fear | 肝試しの夜に

name: Robots with Guns
short_description: Robots with Guns is a PvP rouge-lite shooter where you have to outplay your opponents with fast-paced shooting, dashing and gathering items! Each time you win, your opponent gets stronger. Overcome this imbalance to claim ultimate victory!

name: The Forgotten Apartment
short_description: A psychological horror experience set in a forgotten apartment filled with dark memories, eerie puzzles, and emotional scars waiting to resurface.

name: Nomyou
short_description: You find yourself inexplicably in a strange world where everyone - and I mean everyone - wants you! How do they want you? In whatever way they desire.

name: Demonborg Mining Co
short_description: Demonborg Mining Co is a unique rogue-lite about mining the insides of giant demon cyborgs with your auto-firing turret loaded drill drone.

name: The Between
short_description: A text-based roguelike RPG where you explore a shifting world, battle nightmarish foes, and evolve your powers through death.

about_the_game:
✍️ 101 Cats Hidden in Greece challenges you to find hidden kitties in a beautiful hand-crafted landscape.

🎵 While you search, enjoy a peaceful and immersive soundtrack.

😸 Earn tons of achievements.

🏆 Challenge your friends to find all the cats in the shortest time! ⏱️

GAMEPLAY:

🐾 101 cats hidden in a single Landscape.
👉 Click on the kitties you find.
👀 Adjust brightness so your eyes don't get tired.
🔎 AMAZING ZOOM!

😺🐾🐈 😻

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Greece
pc_requirements_min:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
short_description: Join this adventure and discover the hiding places of 101 kittens 🐾 in the hand-crafted Greece landscape. 🏆 Earn lots of achievements. How many 😺 can you find? 🔎 Be quick! ⏱️

name: Come To An End
short_description: Race to the END in this horror labyrinth speed runner. Use abilities and survival instincts to get the END. Avoid traps and enemies while you are keeping an eye on the timer. Each level is unique with its own challenges and 3 different game modes. Are you up for the challenge?!

name: Cave of Gurg
short_description: "Dark. Silent. Waiting." This is a text-based, turn-based strategy mini-game that runs on the command line. You play as a hunter exploring a mysterious cave in pursuit of the terrifying, man-eating creature known as the "Garg."

name: 世界之外的愚人船
short_description: This is a visual novel, in reality we create different worlds that belong only to you for various reasons, and they will gradually fade away with your memories. Please enjoy this time traveling in different worlds with the girls, and then return to where you are meant to exist - your life.

name: REFRACTION
short_description: Refraction is a third-person psychological horror experience where you awaken in a strange room, only to find yourself trapped in a haunting time loop, forced to witness a brutal murder replay itself over and over again.

name: Annunaki Clicker
short_description: Mine the Planets. Feed The Annunaki. Rewrite the fate of humanity. Anunnaki Clicker is a clicker cosmic idle game inspired by ancient Sumerian mythology.

name: Flying Bird
short_description: Flying Bird is a simple yet addictive arcade game where you control a little bird by tapping to make it flap and fly upwards. Navigate your way through endless rows of pipes and see how far you can go. Easy to play, hard to master.

name: THUMBLEMANIA
short_description: Thumb up and fight! THUMBLEMANIA is an action-packed wrestling game where you smack down your opponents to become the “Strongest Thumb of the Univeeeeerse”!

name: HALLOW BLADE
short_description: HALLOW BLADE is a dark fantasy action adventure set in a vast interconnected subterranean kingdom where you form an unbreakable bond with an ancient possessed sword hungry for souls and vengeance.
